tika-vin05t:134_5: heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ omako nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ
tika-vin05t:134_6: tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ omakomako nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ na sampāpuṇāti antogadhameva
tika-vin05t:134_7: hoti, ayaṃ omakukkaṭṭho nāma patto. Evamete nava pattā. Tesu dve apattā ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho
tika-vin05t:134_8: ca omakomako cāti. Tasmā ete bhājanaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbā, na adhiṭṭhānūpagā
tika-vin05t:134_9: na vikappanūpagā. Itare pana satta adhiṭṭhahitvā vā vikappetvā vā paribhuñjitabbā.
tika-vin05t:135_0: Pamāṇayuttānampi etesaṃ adhiṭṭhānavikappanūpagattaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ – ayopatto pañcahi
tika-vin05t:135_1: pākehi, mattikāpatto dvīhi pākehi pakko adhiṭṭhānūpago. Ubhopi yaṃ mūlaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:135_2: tasmiṃ dinneyeva. Sace ekopi pāko ūno hoti, kākaṇikamattampi vā mūlaṃ adinnaṃ, na
tika-vin05t:135_3: adhiṭṭhānūpago. Sace pattasāmiko vadati “yadā tumhākaṃ mūlaṃ bhavissati, tadā dassatha
tika-vin05t:135_4: adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjathā”ti, neva adhiṭṭhānūpago hoti, pākassa hi ūnattā pattasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin05t:135_5: na gacchati, mūlassa sakalassa vā ekadesassa vā adinnattā sakabhāvaṃ na upeti, aññasseva
tika-vin05t:135_6: santako hoti, tasmā pāke ca mūle ca suniṭṭhiteyeva adhiṭṭhānūpago hoti. Yo adhiṭṭhānūpago,
tika-vin05t:135_7: sveva vikappanūpago. So hatthaṃ āgatopi anāgatopi adhiṭṭhātabbo vikappetabbo vā.
tika-vin05t:135_8: Yadi hi pattakārako mūlaṃ labhitvā sayaṃ vā dātukāmo hutvā “ahaṃ bhante tumhākaṃ
tika-vin05t:135_9: pattaṃ katvā asukadivase nāma pacitvā ṭhapessāmī”ti vadati, bhikkhu ca tena paricchinnadivasato
tika-vin05t:135_10: paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana pattakārako “ahaṃ
tika-vin05t:135_11: tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā pacitvā sāsanaṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti, tena pesitabhikkhu
tika-vin05t:135_12: pana tassa bhikkhuno na āroceti, añño disvā vā sutvā vā “tumhākaṃ, bhante, patto
tika-vin05t:135_13: niṭṭhito”ti āroceti, etassa ārocanaṃ na pamāṇaṃ. Yadā pana tena pesitoyeva āroceti,
tika-vin05t:135_14: tassa vacanaṃ sutadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:135_15: Sace pana pattakārako “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā pacitvā kassaci hatthe pahiṇissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:135_16: vatvā tatheva karoti, pattaṃ gahetvā āgatabhikkhu pana attano pariveṇe ṭhapetvā tassa
tika-vin05t:135_17: na āroceti, añño koci bhaṇati “api, bhante, adhunā ābhato patto sundaro”ti. “Kuhiṃ,
tika-vin05t:135_18: āvuso, patto”ti? “Itthannāmassa hatthe pesito”ti. Etassapi vacanaṃ na pamāṇaṃ. Yadā
tika-vin05t:135_19: pana so bhikkhu pattaṃ deti, laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:135_20: pācittiyaṃ, tasmā dasāhaṃ anatikkāmetvāva adhiṭṭhātabbo vikappetabbo vā.
tika-vin05t:136_0: Tattha dve pattassa adhiṭṭhānā kāyena vā adhiṭṭhāti, vācāya vā adhiṭṭhāti. Tesaṃ
tika-vin05t:136_1: vasena adhiṭṭhahantena “imaṃ pattaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti vā “etaṃ pattaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:136_2: vā vatvā evaṃ sammukhe vā parammukhe vā ṭhitaṃ purāṇapattaṃ paccuddharitvā aññassa
tika-vin05t:136_3: vā datvā navaṃ pattaṃ yattha katthaci ṭhitaṃ hatthena parāmasitvā “idaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:136_4: cittena ābhogaṃ katvā kāyavikāraṃ karontena kāyena vā adhiṭṭhātabbo. Vacībhedaṃ katvā
tika-vin05t:136_5: vācāya vā adhiṭṭhābhabbo. Tatra duvidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ – sace hatthapāse hoti, “imaṃ
tika-vin05t:136_6: pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā, atha antogabbhe vā uparipāsāde vā sāmantavihāre
tika-vin05t:136_7: vā hoti, ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā “etaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā.
tika-vin05t:136_8: Adhiṭṭhahantena pana ekakena adhiṭṭhātumpi vaṭṭati, aññassa santike adhiṭṭhātumpi
tika-vin05t:136_9: vaṭṭati. Aññassa santike ayamānisaṃso – sacassa “adhiṭṭhito nu kho me, no”ti vimati
tika-vin05t:136_10: uppajjati, itaro sāretvā vimatiṃ chindissatīti. Sace koci dasa patte labhitvā sabbe
tika-vin05t:136_11: attanāva paribhuñjitukāmo hoti, na sabbe adhiṭṭhātabbā, ekaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāya punadivase
tika-vin05t:136_12: taṃ paccuddharitvā añño adhiṭṭhātabbo. Eteneva upāyena vassasatampi pariharituṃ sakkā.
tika-vin05t:137_0: Evaṃ appamattassa siyā adhiṭṭhānavijahananti? Siyā. Sace hi sayaṃ pattaṃ aññassa
tika-vin05t:137_1: deti, vibbhamati vā, sikkhaṃ vā paccakkhāti, kālaṃ vā karoti, liṅgaṃ vāssa parivattati,
tika-vin05t:137_2: paccuddharati vā, patte vā chiddaṃ hoti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati. Vuttañcetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:140_0: Coragahaṇavissāsaggāhehipi vijahatiyeva. Kittakena chiddena adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhijjati?
tika-vin05t:140_1: Yena kaṅgusitthaṃ nikkhamati ceva pavisati ca. Idañhi sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ lāmakadhaññasitthaṃ.
tika-vin05t:140_2: Tasmiṃ chidde ayacuṇṇena vā āṇiyā vā paṭipākatike kate dasāhabbhantare puna adhiṭṭhātabbo.
tika-vin05t:141_0: 49. Vikappane pana dve vikappanā sammukhāvikappanā ceva parammukhāvikappanā ca. Kathaṃ
tika-vin05t:141_1: sammukhāvikappanā hoti? Pattānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā “imaṃ
tika-vin05t:141_2: patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā “tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti
tika-vin05t:141_3: vattabbaṃ, ayamekā sammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati, paribhuñjituṃ pana
tika-vin05t:141_4: vissajjetuṃ vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vā na vaṭṭati. “Mayhaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi
tika-vin05t:141_5: vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti evaṃ pana vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti, tato pabhuti
tika-vin05t:142_0: Aparo nayo – tatheva pattānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā tasseva
tika-vin05t:142_1: bhikkhuno santike “imaṃ patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti
tika-vin05t:142_2: vā vatvā pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa attanā abhirucitassa yassa kassaci nāmaṃ
tika-vin05t:142_3: gahetvā “tissassa bhikkhuno vikappemī”ti vā “tissāya bhikkhuniyā, sikkhamānāya, sāmaṇerassa,
tika-vin05t:142_4: tissāya sāmaṇeriyā vikappemī”ti vā vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ aparāpi sammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā
tika-vin05t:142_5: nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati. Paribhogādīsu pana ekampi na vaṭṭati. Tena pana bhikkhunā tissassa
tika-vin05t:142_6: bhikkhuno santakaṃ…pe… tissāya sāmaṇeriyā santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ
tika-vin05t:142_7: vā karohīti vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti, tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:143_0: Kathaṃ parammukhāvikappanā hoti? Pattānaṃ tatheva ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca
tika-vin05t:143_1: ñatvā “imaṃ patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā
tika-vin05t:143_2: “tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammī”ti vattabbaṃ. Tena vattabbo “ko te mitto vā sandiṭṭho
tika-vin05t:143_3: vā”ti. Tato itarena purimanayena “tisso bhikkhū”ti vā…pe… “tissā sāmaṇerī”ti vā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:143_4: Puna tena bhikkhunā “ahaṃ tissassa bhikkhuno dammī”ti vā…pe… “tissāya sāmaṇeriyā
tika-vin05t:143_5: dammī”ti vā vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ parammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati, paribhogādīsu
tika-vin05t:143_6: pana ekampi na vaṭṭati. Tena pana bhikkhunā dutiyasammukhāvikappanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-vin05t:143_7: “itthannāmassa santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti vutte
tika-vin05t:143_8: paccuddhāro nāma hoti, tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭanti. Ayaṃ vikappane nayo.
tika-vin05t:144_0: 50. Evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā vikappetvā ca paribhuñjantena patte bhinne kiṃ kātabbanti?
tika-vin05t:144_1: Yassa patte rājimukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulappamāṇā na hoti tena na kiñci kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:144_2: Yassa pana tādisā ekāpi rāji hoti, tena tassā rājiyā heṭṭhimapariyante pattavedhakena
tika-vin05t:144_3: vijjhitvā pacitvā suttarajjukamakacirajjukādīhi vā tipusuttakena vā bandhitvā taṃ
tika-vin05t:144_4: bandhanaṃ āmisassa alagganatthaṃ tipupaṭṭena vā kenaci vā baddhasilesena paṭicchādetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:144_5: So ca patto adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbo. Sukhumaṃ vā chiddaṃ katvā bandhitabbo.
tika-vin05t:144_6: Suddhehi pana madhukasitthakalākhāsajjurasādīhi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati, phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā
tika-vin05t:144_7: pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Mukhavaṭṭisamīpe pana pattavedhakena vijjhiyamāno
tika-vin05t:144_8: kapālassa bahalattā bhijjati, tasmā heṭṭhā vijjhitabbo. Yassa pana dve rājiyo, ekāyeva
tika-vin05t:144_9: vā caturaṅgulā, tassa dve bandhanāni dātabbāni. Yassa tisso, ekāyeva vā chaḷaṅgulā,
tika-vin05t:144_10: tassa tīṇi. Yassa catasso, ekāyeva vā aṭṭhaṅgulā, tassa cattāri. Yassa pañca, ekāyeva
tika-vin05t:144_11: vā dasaṅgulā, so baddhopi abaddhopi apattoyeva, añño viññāpetabbo. Esa tāva mattikāpatte vinicchayo.
tika-vin05t:145_0: Ayopatte pana sacepi pañca vā atirekāni vā chiddāni honti, tāni ca ayacuṇṇena vā
tika-vin05t:145_1: āṇiyā vā lohamaṇḍalakena vā baddhāni maṭṭhāni honti, sveva patto paribhuñjitabbo,
tika-vin05t:145_2: añño na viññāpetabbo. Atha pana ekampi chiddaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, lohamaṇḍalakena baddhampi
tika-vin05t:145_3: maṭṭhaṃ na hoti, patte āmisaṃ laggati, akappiyo hoti, ayaṃ apatto, añño viññāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:145_4: Viññāpentena ca saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne pañcabandhaneneva pattena aññaṃ pattaṃ
tika-vin05t:145_5: viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, puggalavasena pana pavāritaṭṭhāne ūnapañcabandhanenāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:145_6: Pattaṃ labhitvā paribhuñjantena ca yāgurandhanarajanapacanādinā aparibhogena na paribhuñjitabbo,
tika-vin05t:145_7: antarāmagge pana byādhimhi uppanne aññasmiṃ bhājane asati mattikāya limpetvā yāguṃ
tika-vin05t:145_8: vā pacituṃ udakaṃ vā tāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Mañcapīṭhachattanāgadantakādike adesepi na
tika-vin05t:145_9: nikkhipitabbo. Pattassa hi nikkhipanadeso “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pattādhāraka”ntiādinā
tika-vin05t:149_0: 51. Cīvarenavināvāsoti ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarena
tika-vin05t:149_1: vippavāso. Evaṃ adhiṭṭhitesu hi tīsu cīvaresu ekenapi vinā vasituṃ na vaṭṭati, vasantassa
tika-vin05t:149_2: saha aruṇuggamanā cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, tasmā aruṇuggamanasamaye cīvaraṃ aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇe
tika-vin05t:149_4: pana ayaṃ viseso – sace ekassa rañño gāmabhojakassa vā santako gāmo hoti, yena kenaci
tika-vin05t:149_5: pākārena vā vatiyā vā parikhāya vā parikkhitto ca, evarūpe gāme cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:149_6: gāmabbhantare yattha katthaci yathārucitaṭṭhāne aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana
tika-vin05t:149_7: aparikkhitto hoti, evarūpe gāme yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tasmiṃ vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:149_8: tassa vā gharassa hatthapāse samantā aḍḍhateyyaratanabbhantare vasitabbaṃ. Taṃ pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:149_9: atikkamitvā sacepi iddhimā bhikkhu ākāse aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti, cīvaraṃ nissaggiyameva hoti.
tika-vin05t:150_0: Sace nānārājūnaṃ vā bhojakānaṃ vā gāmo hoti vesālīkusinārādisadiso parikkhitto ca,
tika-vin05t:150_1: evarūpe gāme yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tattha vā vatthabbaṃ, tattha saddasaṅghaṭṭanena
tika-vin05t:150_2: vā janasambādhena vā vasituṃ asakkontena sabhāye vā vatthabbaṃ nagaradvāramūle vā.
tika-vin05t:150_3: Tatrāpi vasituṃ asakkontena yattha katthaci phāsukaṭṭhāne vasitvā antoaruṇe āgamma
tika-vin05t:150_4: tesaṃyeva sabhāyanagaradvāramūlānaṃ hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ. Gharassa pana cīvarassa
tika-vin05t:151_0: Sace ghare aṭṭhapetvā “sabhāye ṭhapessāmī”ti sabhāyaṃ gacchanto hatthaṃ pasāretvā
tika-vin05t:151_1: “handimaṃ cīvaraṃ ṭhapehī”ti evaṃ nikkhepasukhe hatthapāsagate kismiñci āpaṇe cīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:151_2: nikkhipati, tena purimanayeneva sabhāye vā vatthabbaṃ, dvāramūle vā tesaṃ hatthapāse vā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:152_0: Sace nagarassa bahūnipi dvārāni honti bahūni ca sabhāyāni, sabbattha vasituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:152_1: Yassā pana vīthiyā cīvaraṃ ṭhapitaṃ, yaṃ tassā sammukhaṭṭhāne sabhāyañca dvārañca,
tika-vin05t:152_2: tassa sabhāyassa ca dvārassa ca hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ. Evañhi sati sakkā cīvarassa
tika-vin05t:152_3: pavattiṃ jānituṃ. Sabhāyaṃ pana gacchantena yassa āpaṇikassa hatthe nikkhittaṃ, sace
tika-vin05t:152_4: so taṃ cīvaraṃ atiharitvā ghare nikkhipati, vīthihatthapāso na rakkhati, gharassa
tika-vin05t:152_5: hatthapāse vatthabbaṃ. Sace mahantaṃ gharaṃ hoti dve vīthiyo pharitvā ṭhitaṃ, purato
tika-vin05t:152_6: vā pacchato vā hatthapāseyeva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Sabhāye nikkhipitvā pana sabhāye
tika-vin05t:152_7: vā tassa sammukhe nagaradvāramūle vā tesaṃyeva hatthapāse vā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:152_8: Sace pana gāmo aparikkhitto hoti, yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tasmiṃ ghare tassa
tika-vin05t:153_0: Sace ekakulassa santakaṃ nivesanaṃ hoti parikkhittañca nānāgabbhaṃ nānāovarakaṃ,
tika-vin05t:153_1: antonivesane cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antonivesane vatthabbaṃ. Sace aparikkhittaṃ, yasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:153_2: gabbhe cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ gabbhe vatthabbaṃ gabbhassa hatthapāse vā.
tika-vin05t:153_3: Sace nānākulassa nivesanaṃ hoti parikkhittañca nānāgabbhaṃ nānāovarakaṃ, yasmiṃ gabbhe
tika-vin05t:153_4: cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ gabbhe vatthabbaṃ, sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇe gharadvāramūle
tika-vin05t:153_5: vā gabbhassa vā gharadvāramūlassa vā hatthapāse. Sace aparikkhittaṃ hoti, yasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:153_6: gabbhe cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tasmiṃ gabbhe vatthabbaṃ gabbhassa vā hatthapāse. Udositaaḍḍamāḷapāsādahammiyesupi
tika-vin05t:154_0: Sace ekakulassa nāvā hoti, antonāvāyaṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antonāvāyaṃ vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:154_1: Sace nānākulassa nāvā hoti nānāgabbhā nānāovarakā, yasmiṃ ovarake cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ
tika-vin05t:154_2: hoti, tasmiṃ ovarake vatthabbaṃ ovarakassa hatthapāse vā.
tika-vin05t:155_0: Sace ekakulassa sattho hoti, tasmiṃ satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā purato vā pacchato
tika-vin05t:155_1: vā sattabbhantarā na vijahitabbā, passato abbhantaraṃ na vijahitabbaṃ. Ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ
tika-vin05t:155_2: aṭṭhavīsatihatthaṃ hoti. Sace nānākulassa sattho hoti, satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:155_3: cīvarassa hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ. Sace sattho gacchanto gāmaṃ vā nadiṃ vā pariyādiyitvā
tika-vin05t:155_4: tiṭṭhati, antopaviṭṭhena saddhiṃ ekābaddho hutvā orañca pārañca pharitvā ṭhito hoti,
tika-vin05t:155_5: satthaparihāro labbhati. Atha gāme vā nadiyā vā pariyāpanno hoti, gāmaparihāro ceva
tika-vin05t:155_6: nadīparihāro ca labbhati. Sace vihārasīmaṃ atikkamitvā tiṭṭhati, antosīmāya ca cīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:155_7: hoti, vihāraṃ gantvā vasitabbaṃ. Sace bahisīmāya cīvaraṃ hoti, satthasamīpeyeva vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:155_8: Sace gacchanto sattho sakaṭe vā bhagge goṇe vā naṭṭhe antarā chijjati, yasmiṃ koṭṭhāse
tika-vin05t:156_0: Sace ekakulassa khettaṃ hoti parikkhittañca, antokhette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antokhette
tika-vin05t:156_1: vatthabbaṃ. Sace aparikkhittaṃ hoti, cīvarassa hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ. Sace nānākulassa
tika-vin05t:156_2: khettaṃ hoti parikkhittañca, antokhette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā dvāramūle vatthabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:156_3: dvāramūlassa hatthapāse vā. Sace aparikkhittaṃ hoti, cīvarassa hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:157_0: Sace ekakulassa dhaññakaraṇaṃ hoti parikkhittañca, antodhaññakaraṇe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:157_1: antodhaññakaraṇe vatthabbaṃ. Sace aparikkhittaṃ hoti, cīvarassa hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:157_2: Sace nānākulassa dhaññakaraṇaṃ hoti parikkhittañca, antodhaññakaraṇe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:157_3: dvāramūle vā vatthabbaṃ dvāramūlassa vā hatthapāse. Sace aparikkhittaṃ hoti, cīvarassa
tika-vin05t:157_4: hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ. Pupphārāmaphalārāmesupi khette vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:158_0: Sace ekakulassa vihāro hoti parikkhitto ca, antovihāre cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antovihāre
tika-vin05t:158_1: vatthabbaṃ. Sace aparikkhitto hoti, yasmiṃ vihāre cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tasmiṃ vatthabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:159_0: Sace ekakulassa rukkhamūlaṃ hoti, yaṃ majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati, antochāyāya
tika-vin05t:159_1: cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antochāyāya vatthabbaṃ. Viraḷasākhassa pana rukkhassa ātapena
tika-vin05t:159_2: phuṭṭhokāse ṭhapitaṃ nissaggiyameva hoti, tasmā tādisassa rukkhassa sākhacchāyāya
tika-vin05t:159_3: vā khandhacchāyāya vā ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace sākhāya vā viṭape vā ṭhapeti, upari aññasākhacchāyāya
tika-vin05t:159_4: phuṭṭhokāseyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Khujjarukkhassa chāyā dūraṃ gacchati, chāyāya gataṭṭhāne
tika-vin05t:159_5: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Sace nānākulassa rukkhamūlaṃ hoti, cīvarassa hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:160_0: Ajjhokāse pana agāmake araññe cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā tassa samantā sattabbhantare vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:160_1: Agāmakaṃ nāma araññaṃ viñjhāṭavīādīsu vā samuddamajjhe vā macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathe
tika-vin05t:160_2: dīpakesu labbhati. Tādise araññe majjhe ṭhitassa samantā sattabbhantaraparicchedo,
tika-vin05t:160_3: vinibbedhena cuddasa honti. Majjhe nisinno puratthimāya vā pacchimāya vā disāya pariyante
tika-vin05t:160_4: ṭhapitacīvaraṃ rakkhati. Sace pana aruṇuggamanasamaye kesaggamattampi puratthimaṃ
tika-vin05t:160_5: disaṃ gacchati, pacchimāya disāya cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Esa nayo itarasmiṃ. Nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:160_6: pana cīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjanto dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin05t:161_0: 52. Sace padhāniko bhikkhu sabbarattiṃ padhānamanuyuñjitvā paccūsasamaye “nahāyissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:161_1: tīṇi cīvarāni tīre ṭhapetvā nadiṃ otarati, nahāyantasseva cassa aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin05t:161_2: kiṃ kātabbaṃ? So hi yadi uttaritvā cīvaraṃ nivāseti, nissaggiyaṃ cīvaraṃ, anissajjitvā
tika-vin05t:161_3: paribhuñjanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Atha naggo gacchati, evampi dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-vin05t:161_4: Nāpajjati. So hi yāva aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā vinayakammaṃ na karoti, tāva tesaṃ cīvarānaṃ
tika-vin05t:161_5: aparibhogārahattā naṭṭhacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhito hoti, naṭṭhacīvarassa ca akappiyaṃ nāma
tika-vin05t:161_6: natthi, tasmā ekaṃ nivāsetvā dve hatthena gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā vinayakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:161_7: Sace dūre vihāro hoti, antarāmagge manussā sañcaranti, ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā
tika-vin05t:161_8: ekaṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ. Sace vihāre sabhāgaṃ bhikkhuṃ na passati, bhikkhācāraṃ
tika-vin05t:161_9: gatā honti, saṅghāṭiṃ bahigāme ṭhapetvā santaruttarena āsanasālaṃ gantvā vinayakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:161_10: kātabbaṃ. Sace bahigāme corabhayaṃ hoti, pārupitvā gantabbaṃ. Sace āsanasālā sambādhā
tika-vin05t:161_11: hoti, janākiṇṇā na sakkā ekamante cīvaraṃ apanetvā vinayakammaṃ kātuṃ, ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin05t:161_12: ādāya bahigāmaṃ gantvā vinayakammaṃ katvā cīvarāni paribhuñjitabbāni.
tika-vin05t:162_0: Sace therā bhikkhū daharānaṃ hatthe pattacīvaraṃ datvā maggaṃ gacchantā pacchimayāme
tika-vin05t:162_1: sayitukāmā honti, attano attano cīvaraṃ hatthapāse katvāva sayitabbaṃ. Sace gacchantānaṃyeva
tika-vin05t:162_2: asampattesu daharesu aruṇaṃ uggacchati, cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, nissayo pana na
tika-vin05t:162_3: paṭippassambhati. Daharānampi purato gacchantānaṃ theresu asampattesu eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:162_4: Maggaṃ virajjhitvā araññe aññamaññaṃ apassantesupi eseva nayo. Sace pana daharā “mayaṃ,
tika-vin05t:162_5: bhante, muhuttaṃ sayitvā asukasmiṃ nāma okāse tumhe sampāpuṇissāmā”ti vatvā yāva
tika-vin05t:162_6: aruṇuggamanā sayanti, cīvarañca nissaggiyaṃ hoti, nissayo ca paṭippassambhati. Dahare
tika-vin05t:162_7: uyyojetvā theresu sayantesupi eseva nayo. Dvedhāpathaṃ disvā therā “ayaṃ maggo”,
tika-vin05t:162_8: daharā “ayaṃ maggo”ti vatvā aññamaññassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā gatā, saha aruṇassa uggamanā
tika-vin05t:162_9: cīvarāni ca nissaggiyāni honti, nissayo ca paṭippassambhati. Sace daharā maggato
tika-vin05t:162_10: okkamma “antoaruṇeyeva nivattissāmā”ti bhesajjatthāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā āgacchanti,
tika-vin05t:162_11: asampattānaṃyeva ca nesaṃ aruṇo uggacchati, cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti, nissayo
tika-vin05t:162_12: pana na paṭippassambhati. Sace pana dhenubhayena vā sunakhabhayena vā muhuttaṃ ṭhatvā
tika-vin05t:162_13: “gamissāmā”ti ṭhatvā vā nisīditvā vā gacchanti, antarā aruṇe uggate cīvarāni ca nissaggiyāni
tika-vin05t:163_0: Sace “antoaruṇeyeva āgamissāmā”ti antosīmāyaṃ gāmaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ antarā aruṇo uggacchati,
tika-vin05t:163_1: neva cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti, na nissayo paṭippassambhati. Sace pana “vibhāyatu
tika-vin05t:163_2: tāvā”ti nisīdanti, aruṇe uggate na cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti, nissayo pana paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin05t:163_3: Sace yepi “antoaruṇeyeva āgamissāmā”ti sāmantavihāraṃ dhammassavanatthāya saussāhā
tika-vin05t:163_4: gacchanti, antarāmaggeyeva ca nesaṃ aruṇo uggacchati, cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti,
tika-vin05t:163_5: nissayo pana na paṭippassambhati. Sace dhammagāravena “yāvapariyosānaṃ sutvāva gamissāmā”ti
tika-vin05t:163_6: nisīdanti, saha aruṇassa uggamanā cīvarānipi nissaggiyāni honti, nissayo ca paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin05t:163_7: Therena daharaṃ cīvaradhovanatthāya gāmakaṃ pesentena attano cīvaraṃ paccuddharitvāva
tika-vin05t:163_8: dātabbaṃ, daharassapi cīvaraṃ paccuddharāpetvāva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace asatiyā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:163_9: attano cīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā daharassa cīvaraṃ vissāsena gahetvā ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:163_10: thero na sarati, daharova sarati, daharena attano cīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā therassa
tika-vin05t:163_11: cīvaraṃ vissāsena gahetvā gantvā vattabbaṃ “bhante, tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin05t:163_12: paribhuñjathā”ti. Attanopi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekassa satiyāpi āpattimokkho hoti.
tika-vin05t:167_0: 53. Bhaṇḍassa paṭisāmananti paresaṃ bhaṇḍassa gopanaṃ. Paresañhi kappiyavatthu vā
tika-vin05t:167_1: hotu akappiyavatthu vā, antamaso mātu kaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ kālapaṇṇampi gihisantakaṃ
tika-vin05t:167_2: bhaṇḍāgārikasīsena paṭisāmentassa pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ avassaṃ
tika-vin05t:167_3: paṭisāmetabbaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ hoti, attano atthāya gahetvā paṭisāmetabbaṃ. “Idaṃ
tika-vin05t:167_4: paṭisāmetvā dehī”ti pana vutte “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace “paṭisāmehī”ti
tika-vin05t:167_5: pātetvā gacchanti, palibodho nāma hoti, paṭisāmetuṃ vaṭṭati. Vihāre kammaṃ karontā
tika-vin05t:167_6: vaḍḍhakīādayo vā rājavallabhā vā “attano upakaraṇabhaṇḍaṃ vā sayanabhaṇḍaṃ vā paṭisāmetvā
tika-vin05t:167_7: dethā”ti vadanti, chandenapi bhayenapi na kātabbameva, guttaṭṭhānaṃ pana dassetuṃ
tika-vin05t:167_8: vaṭṭati, balakkārena pātetvā gatesu ca paṭisāmetuṃ.
tika-vin05t:168_0: Sace attano hatthe paṭisāmanatthāya ṭhapitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sāmikena “dehi me bhaṇḍa”nti
tika-vin05t:168_1: yācito adātukāmo “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti bhaṇati, sampajānamusāvādepi adinnādānassa payogattā
tika-vin05t:168_2: dukkaṭaṃ. “Kiṃ tumhe bhaṇatha, nevidaṃ mayhaṃ anurūpaṃ, na tumhāka”ntiādīni vadantassapi
tika-vin05t:168_3: dukkaṭameva. “Raho mayā etassa hatthe ṭhapitaṃ, na añño koci jānāti, dassati nu kho
tika-vin05t:168_4: me, no”ti sāmiko vimatiṃ uppādeti, bhikkhussa thullaccayaṃ. Tassa pharusādibhāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:168_5: disvā sāmiko “na mayhaṃ dassatī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati, tatra sacāyaṃ bhikkhu “kilametvā
tika-vin05t:168_6: naṃ dassāmī”ti dāne saussāho, rakkhati tāva. Sacepi so dāne nirussāho, bhaṇḍasāmiko
tika-vin05t:168_7: pana gahaṇe saussāho, rakkhatiyeva. Yadi pana tasmiṃ dāne nirussāho bhaṇḍasāmiko
tika-vin05t:168_8: “na mayhaṃ dassatī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati, evaṃ ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepena bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:168_9: pārājikaṃ. Yadipi mukhena “dassāmī”ti vadati, cittena pana adātukāmo, evampi sāmikassa
tika-vin05t:168_10: dhuranikkhepe pārājikaṃ. Taṃ pana saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe parehi ṭhapitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:168_11: aguttadesato ṭhānā cāvetvā guttaṭṭhāne ṭhapanatthāya harato anāpatti. Theyyacittenapi
tika-vin05t:168_12: ṭhānā cāventassa avahāro natthi. Kasmā? Attano hatthe nikkhittattā, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ
tika-vin05t:168_13: pana hoti. Theyyacittena paribhuñjatopi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:169_0: 54. Pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ santakaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci parikkhāraṃ paṭisāmetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:169_1: Sace āgantuko bhikkhu āvāsikānaṃ cīvarakammaṃ karontānaṃ samīpe pattacīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t:169_2: “ete saṅgopessantī”ti maññamāno nahāyituṃ vā aññatra vā gacchati, sace taṃ āvāsikā
tika-vin05t:169_3: saṅgopenti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce, naṭṭhe gīvā na hoti. Sacepi so “idaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:169_4: ṭhapethā”ti vatvā gacchati, itare ca kiccapasutattā na jānanti, eseva nayo. Athāpi
tika-vin05t:169_5: te “idaṃ, bhante, ṭhapethā”ti vuttā “mayaṃ byāvaṭā”ti paṭikkhipanti, itaro ca “avassaṃ
tika-vin05t:169_6: ṭhapessantī”ti anādiyitvā gacchati, eseva nayo. Sace pana te tena yācitā vā ayācitā
tika-vin05t:169_7: vā “mayaṃ ṭhapessāma, tvaṃ gacchā”ti vadanti, taṃ saṅgopitabbaṃ. No ce saṅgopenti,
tika-vin05t:170_0: Yo bhikkhu bhaṇḍāgāriko hutvā paccūsasamaye eva bhikkhūnaṃ pattacīvarāni heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ
tika-vin05t:170_1: oropetvā dvāraṃ apidahitvā tesampi anārocetvāva dūre bhikkhācāraṃ gacchati, tāni
tika-vin05t:170_2: ce corā haranti, tasseva gīvā. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi “oropetha, bhante, pattacīvarāni,
tika-vin05t:170_3: kālo salākaggahaṇassā”ti vutto “samāgatātthā”ti pucchitvā “āma samāgatāmhā”ti vutte
tika-vin05t:170_4: pattacīvarāni nīharitvā nikkhipitvā bhaṇḍāgāradvāraṃ bandhitvā “tumhe pattacīvarāni
tika-vin05t:170_5: gahetvā heṭṭhāpāsādadvāraṃ paṭijaggitvā gaccheyyāthā”ti vatvā gacchati. Tatra ceko
tika-vin05t:170_6: alasajātiko bhikkhu bhikkhūsu gatesu pacchā akkhīni puñchanto uṭṭhahitvā udakaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:170_7: mukhadhovanatthaṃ gacchati, taṃ khaṇaṃ disvā corā tassa pattacīvaraṃ haranti, suhaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:171_0: Sacepi koci bhaṇḍāgārikassa anārocetvāva bhaṇḍāgāre attano parikkhāraṃ ṭhapeti, tasmimpi
tika-vin05t:171_1: naṭṭhe bhaṇḍāgārikassa gīvā na hoti. Sace pana bhaṇḍāgāriko taṃ disvā “aṭṭhāne ṭhapita”nti
tika-vin05t:171_2: gahetvā ṭhapeti, naṭṭhe tasseva gīvā. Sacepi ṭhapitabhikkhunā “mayā, bhante, īdiso
tika-vin05t:171_3: nāma parikkhāro ṭhapito, upadhāreyyāthā”ti vutto “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati, dunnikkhittaṃ
tika-vin05t:171_4: vā maññamāno aññasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapeti, naṭṭhe tasseva gīvā. “Nāhaṃ jānāmī”ti paṭikkhipantassa
tika-vin05t:171_5: pana natthi gīvā. Yopi tassa passantasseva ṭhapeti, bhaṇḍāgārikañca na sampaṭicchāpeti,
tika-vin05t:171_6: naṭṭhaṃ sunaṭṭhameva. Sace pana naṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko aññatra ṭhapeti, naṭṭhe gīvā. Sace
tika-vin05t:171_7: bhaṇḍāgāraṃ suguttaṃ, sabbo saṅghassa cetiyassa ca parikkhāro tattheva ṭhapīyati,
tika-vin05t:171_8: bhaṇḍāgāriko ca bālo abyatto dvāraṃ vivaritvā dhammakathaṃ vā sotuṃ aññaṃ vā kiñci
tika-vin05t:171_9: kātuṃ katthaci gacchati, taṃ khaṇaṃ disvā yattakaṃ corā haranti, sabbaṃ tassa gīvā.
tika-vin05t:171_10: Bhaṇḍāgārato nikkhamitvā bahi caṅkamantassa vā dvāraṃ vivaritvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpentassa
tika-vin05t:171_11: vā tattheva samaṇadhammānuyogena nisinnassa vā tattheva nisīditvā kenaci kammena
tika-vin05t:171_12: byāvaṭassa vā uccārapassāvapīḷitassapi sato tattheva upacāre vijjamāne bahi gacchato
tika-vin05t:171_13: vā aññena vā kenaci ākārena pamattassa sato dvāraṃ vivaritvā vā vivaṭameva pavisitvā
tika-vin05t:171_14: vā sandhiṃ chinditvā vā yattakaṃ tassa pamādapaccayā corā haranti, sabbaṃ tasseva
tika-vin05t:171_15: gīvā. “Uṇhasamaye pana vātapānaṃ vivaritvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Uccārapīḷitassa
tika-vin05t:171_16: pana tasmiṃ upacāre asati aññattha gacchantassa gilānapakkhe ṭhitattā avisayo, tasmā gīvā na hoti.
tika-vin05t:172_0: 55. Yo pana anto uṇhapīḷito dvāraṃ suguttaṃ katvā bahi nikkhamati, corā taṃ gahetvā
tika-vin05t:172_1: “dvāraṃ vivarā”ti vadanti, yāvatatiyaṃ na vivaritabbaṃ. Yadi pana te corā “sace na
tika-vin05t:172_2: vivarasi, tañca māressāma, dvārañca bhinditvā parikkhāraṃ harissāmā”ti pharasuādīni
tika-vin05t:172_3: ukkhipanti, “mayi ca mate saṅghassa ca senāsane vinaṭṭhe guṇo natthī”ti vivarituṃ
tika-vin05t:172_4: vaṭṭati. Idhāpi “avisayattā gīvā natthī”ti vadanti. Sace koci āgantuko kuñcikaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:172_5: deti, dvāraṃ vā vivarati, yattakaṃ corā haranti, sabbaṃ tassa gīvā. Saṅghena bhaṇḍāgāraṃ
tika-vin05t:172_6: guttatthāya sūciyantakañca kuñcikamuddikā ca yojetvā dinnā hoti, bhaṇḍāgāriko ghaṭikamattaṃ
tika-vin05t:172_7: datvā nipajjati, corā vivaritvā parikkhāraṃ haranti, tasseva gīvā. Sūciyantakañca
tika-vin05t:172_8: kuñcikamuddikañca yojetvā nipannaṃ panetaṃ sace corā āgantvā “dvāraṃ vivarāhī”ti
tika-vin05t:172_9: vadanti, tattha purimanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Evaṃ suguttaṃ katvā nipanne pana
tika-vin05t:172_10: sace bhittiṃ vā chadanaṃ vā bhinditvā umaṅgena vā pavisitvā haranti, na tassa gīvā.
tika-vin05t:173_0: Sace bhaṇḍāgāre aññepi therā vasanti, vivaṭe dvāre attano attano parikkhāraṃ gahetvā
tika-vin05t:173_1: gacchanti, bhaṇḍāgāriko tesu gatesu dvāraṃ na jaggati, sace tattha kiñci avaharīyati,
tika-vin05t:173_2: bhaṇḍāgārikassa issaravatāya bhaṇḍāgārikasseva gīvā, therehi pana sahāyehi bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:173_3: Ayañhi sāmīci. Yadi bhaṇḍāgāriko “tumhe bahi ṭhatvā tumhākaṃ parikkhāraṃ gaṇhatha,
tika-vin05t:173_4: mā pavisitthā”ti vadati, tesañca eko lolamahāthero sāmaṇerehi ceva upaṭṭhākehi ca
tika-vin05t:173_5: saddhiṃ bhaṇḍāgāraṃ pavisitvā nisīdati ceva nipajjati ca, yattakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ nassati,
tika-vin05t:173_6: sabbaṃ tassa gīvā, bhaṇḍāgārikena pana avasesatherehi ca sahāyehi bhavitabbaṃ. Atha
tika-vin05t:173_7: bhaṇḍāgārikova lolasāmaṇere ca upaṭṭhāke ca gahetvā bhaṇḍāgāre nisīdati ceva nipajjati
tika-vin05t:173_8: ca, yattakaṃ nassati, sabbaṃ tasseva gīvā. Tasmā bhaṇḍāgārikeneva tattha vasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:173_9: avasesehi appeva rukkhamūle vasitabbaṃ, na ca bhaṇḍāgāreti.
tika-vin05t:174_0: 56. Ye pana attano attano sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ vasanagabbhesu parikkhāraṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin05t:174_1: parikkhāre naṭṭhe yehi ṭhapito, tesaṃyeva gīvā, itarehi pana sahāyehi bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:174_2: Yadi pana saṅgho bhaṇḍāgārikassa vihāreyeva yāgubhattaṃ dāpeti, so ca bhikkhācāratthāya
tika-vin05t:174_3: gāmaṃ gacchati, naṭṭhaṃ tasseva gīvā. Bhikkhācāraṃ pavisantehi atirekacīvaraṃ rakkhaṇatthāya
tika-vin05t:174_4: ṭhapitavihāravārikassapi yāgubhattaṃ vā nivāpaṃ vā labhamānasseva bhikkhācāraṃ gacchato
tika-vin05t:174_5: yaṃ tattha nassati, sabbaṃ gīvā. Na kevalañca ettakameva, bhaṇḍāgārikassa viya yaṃ
tika-vin05t:175_0: Sace vihāro mahā hoti, aññaṃ padesaṃ rakkhituṃ gacchantassa aññasmiṃ padese nikkhittaṃ
tika-vin05t:175_1: haranti, avisayattā gīvā na hoti. Īdise pana vihāre vemajjhe sabbesaṃ osaraṇaṭṭhāne
tika-vin05t:175_2: parikkhāre ṭhapetvā nisīditabbaṃ, vihāravārikā vā dve tayo ṭhapetabbā. Sace tesampi
tika-vin05t:175_3: appamattānaṃ ito cito ca rakkhataṃyeva kiñci nassati, gīvā na hoti. Vihāravārike
tika-vin05t:175_4: bandhitvā haritabhaṇḍampi corānaṃ paṭipathaṃ gatesu aññena maggena haritabhaṇḍampi
tika-vin05t:175_5: na tesaṃ gīvā. Sace vihāravārikānaṃ vihāre dātabbaṃ yāgubhattaṃ vā nivāpo vā na hoti,
tika-vin05t:175_6: tehi pattabbalābhato atirekā dve tisso yāgusalākā tesaṃ pahonakabhattasalākā ca ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin05t:175_7: vaṭṭati, nibaddhaṃ katvā pana na ṭhapetabbā. Manussā hi vippaṭisārino honti “vihāravārikāyeva
tika-vin05t:175_8: amhākaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjantī”ti, tasmā parivattetvā parivattetvā ṭhapetabbā. Sace tesaṃ
tika-vin05t:175_9: sabhāgā salākabhattādīni āharitvā denti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce denti, vāraṃ gāhāpetvā
tika-vin05t:175_10: nīharāpetabbāni. Sace vihāravāriko dve tisso yāgusalākā ca cattāri pañca salākabhattāni
tika-vin05t:175_11: ca labhamāno bhikkhācāraṃ gacchati, bhaṇḍāgārikassa viya sabbaṃ naṭṭhaṃ gīvā hoti.
tika-vin05t:175_12: Sace saṅghassa vihārapālānaṃ dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ vā nivāpo vā natthi, bhikkhū vihāravāraṃ
tika-vin05t:175_13: gahetvā attano attano nissitake vihāraṃ jaggāpenti, sampattavāraṃ aggahetuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin05t:175_14: Yathā aññe bhikkhū karonti, tatheva kātabbaṃ. Bhikkhūhi pana asahāyassa vā adutiyassa
tika-vin05t:175_15: vā yassa sabhāgo bhikkhu bhattaṃ ānetvā dātā natthi, evarūpassa vāro na pāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:176_0: Yampi pākavaṭṭatthāya vihāre ṭhapenti, taṃ gahetvā upajīvantena ṭhātabbaṃ. Yo taṃ
tika-vin05t:176_1: na upajīvati, so vāraṃ na gāhāpetabbo. Phalāphalatthāyapi vihāre bhikkhuṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin05t:176_2: jaggitvā gopetvā phalavārena bhājetvā khādanti. Yo tāni khādati, tena ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:176_4: āvāse vasantena ṭhātabbaṃ, abbhokāsiko pana rukkhamūliko vā na gāhāpetabbo. Eko navako
tika-vin05t:176_5: hoti, bahussuto pana bahūnaṃ dhammaṃ vāceti, paripucchaṃ deti, pāḷiṃ vaṇṇeti, dhammakathaṃ
tika-vin05t:176_6: katheti, saṅghassa bhāraṃ nittharati, ayaṃ lābhaṃ paribhuñjantopi āvāse vasantopi
tika-vin05t:176_7: vāraṃ na gāhāpetabbo. “Purisaviseso nāma ñātabbo”ti vadanti. Uposathāgārapaṭimāgharajagganakassa
tika-vin05t:176_8: pana diguṇaṃ yāgubhattaṃ, devasikaṃ taṇḍulanāḷi, saṃvacchare ticīvaraṃ dasavīsagghanakaṃ
tika-vin05t:176_9: kappiyabhaṇḍañca dātabbaṃ. Sace pana tassa taṃ labhamānasseva pamādena tattha kiñci
tika-vin05t:176_10: nassati, sabbaṃ gīvā. Bandhitvā balakkārena acchinnaṃ, na gīvā. Tattha cetiyassa
tika-vin05t:176_11: vā saṅghassa vā santakena cetiyassa santakaṃ rakkhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, cetiyassa santakena
tika-vin05t:176_12: saṅghassa santakaṃ rakkhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana cetiyassa santakena saddhiṃ saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:176_13: santakaṃ ṭhapitaṃ hoti, taṃ cetiyasantake rakkhāpite rakkhitameva hotīti evaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:176_14: Pakkhavārena uposathāgārādīni rakkhatopi pamādavasena naṭṭhaṃ gīvāyevāti.
tika-vin05t:180_0: 57. Kayavikkayasamāpattīti kayavikkayasamāpajjanaṃ. “Iminā imaṃ dehī”tiādinā hi nayena
tika-vin05t:180_1: parassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanto kayaṃ samāpajjati, attano kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ dento vikkayaṃ.
tika-vin05t:180_2: Ayaṃ pana kayavikkayo ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike avasesehi gihipabbajitehi antamaso
tika-vin05t:181_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – vatthena vā vatthaṃ hotu, bhattena vā bhattaṃ, yaṃ kiñci kappiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:181_1: “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti vadati, dukkaṭaṃ. Evaṃ vatvā mātuyāpi attano bhaṇḍaṃ deti, dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:181_2: “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti vutto vā “imaṃ dehi, imaṃ te dassāmī”ti taṃ vatvā vā mātuyāpi
tika-vin05t:181_3: bhaṇḍaṃ attanā gaṇhāti, dukkaṭaṃ, attano bhaṇḍe parahatthaṃ, parabhaṇḍe ca attano
tika-vin05t:181_4: hatthaṃ sampatte nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Mātaraṃ vā pana pitaraṃ vā “imaṃ dehī”ti
tika-vin05t:181_5: vadato viññatti na hoti, “imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti dadato saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin05t:181_6: Aññātakaṃ “imaṃ dehī”ti vadato viññatti, “imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti dadato saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ,
tika-vin05t:181_7: “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti kayavikkayaṃ āpajjato nissaggiyaṃ. Tasmā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ parivattantena
tika-vin05t:181_8: mātāpitūhipi saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ, aññātakehi saddhiṃ tisso āpattiyo mocentena parivattetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:182_0: Tatrāyaṃ parivattanavidhi – bhikkhussa pātheyyataṇḍulā honti, so antarāmagge bhattahatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:182_1: purisaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ taṇḍulā atthi, na ca no imehi attho, bhattena pana attho”ti
tika-vin05t:182_2: vadati, puriso taṇḍule gahetvā bhattaṃ deti, vaṭṭati. Tissopi āpattiyo na honti,
tika-vin05t:182_3: antamaso nimittakammamattampi na hoti. Kasmā? Mūlassa atthitāya. Yo pana evaṃ akatvā
tika-vin05t:182_4: “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti parivatteti, yathāvatthukameva. Vighāsādaṃ disvā “imaṃ odanaṃ
tika-vin05t:182_5: bhuñjitvā rajanaṃ vā dārūni vā āharā”ti vadati, rajanachalligaṇanāya dārugaṇanāya
tika-vin05t:182_6: ca nissaggiyāni honti. “Imaṃ odanaṃ bhuñjitvā imaṃ nāma karothā”ti dantakārādīhi
tika-vin05t:182_7: sippikehi dhammakaraṇādīsu taṃ taṃ parikkhāraṃ kāreti, rajakehi vā vatthaṃ dhovāpeti,
tika-vin05t:182_8: yathāvatthukameva. Nahāpitena kese chindāpeti, kammakārehi navakammaṃ kāreti, yathāvatthukameva.
tika-vin05t:182_9: Sace pana “idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā idaṃ karothā”ti na vadati, “idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñja,
tika-vin05t:182_10: bhuttosi, bhuñjissasi, idaṃ nāma karohī”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Ettha ca kiñcāpi vatthadhovane
tika-vin05t:182_11: vā kesacchedane vā bhūmisodhanādinavakamme vā parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ nissajjitabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:182_12: nāma natthi, mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā na sakkā etaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ,
tika-vin05t:182_13: tasmā yathā nissaggiyavatthumhi paribhutte vā naṭṭhe vā pācittiyaṃ deseti, evamidhāpi desetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:183_0: Yaṃ kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhitukāmatāya agghaṃ pucchituṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā “ayaṃ tava
tika-vin05t:183_1: patto kiṃ agghatī”ti pucchite “idaṃ nāmā”ti vadati, sace attano kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ mahagghaṃ
tika-vin05t:183_2: hoti, evañca naṃ paṭivadati “upāsaka mama idaṃ vatthu mahagghaṃ, tava pattaṃ aññassa
tika-vin05t:183_3: dehī”ti. Taṃ sutvā itaro “aññaṃ thālakampi dassāmī”ti vadati, gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin05t:183_4: so patto mahaggho, bhikkhuno vatthu appagghaṃ, pattasāmiko cassa appagghabhāvaṃ na
tika-vin05t:183_5: jānāti, patto na gahetabbo, “mama vatthu appaggha”nti ācikkhitabbaṃ. Mahagghabhāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:183_6: ñatvā vañcetvā gaṇhantopi hi bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabbataṃ āpajjati. Sace pattasāmiko
tika-vin05t:183_7: “hotu, bhante, sesaṃ mama puññaṃ bhavissatī”ti deti, vaṭṭati. Kappiyakārakassa pana
tika-vin05t:183_8: “iminā imaṃ gahetvā dehī”ti ācikkhituṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā yassa hatthato bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t:183_9: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ antamaso tassa puttabhātikampi kappiyakārakaṃ katvā “iminā imaṃ
tika-vin05t:183_10: nāma gahetvā dehī”ti ācikkhati, so ce cheko hoti, punappunaṃ apanetvā vivaditvā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t:183_11: tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ. No ce cheko hoti, na jānāti gahetuṃ, vāṇijako ca taṃ vañceti,
tika-vin05t:184_0: “Idaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ telaṃ vā sappi vā amhākaṃ atthi, amhākañca aññena appaṭiggahitakena
tika-vin05t:184_1: attho”ti vutte pana sace so taṃ gahetvā aññaṃ deti, paṭhamaṃ attano telaṃ na mināpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:184_2: Kasmā? Nāḷiyañhi avasiṭṭhatelaṃ hoti, taṃ pacchā minantassa appaṭiggahitaṃ dūseyya.
tika-vin05t:184_3: Ayañca kayavikkayo nāma kappiyabhaṇḍavasena vutto. Kappiyena hi kappiyaṃ parivattentassa
tika-vin05t:184_4: kayavikkayasikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ vuttaṃ, akappiyena pana akappiyaṃ parivattentassa,
tika-vin05t:184_5: kappiyena vā akappiyaṃ akappiyena vā kappiyaṃ parivattentassa rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpadena
tika-vin05t:184_6: nissaggiyaṃ, tasmā ubhosu vā ekasmiṃ vā akappiye sati rūpiyasaṃvohāro nāma hoti.
tika-vin05t:185_0: 58. Rūpiyasaṃvohārassa ca garubhāvadīpanatthaṃ idaṃ pattacatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yo
tika-vin05t:185_1: hi rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā tena ayabījaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, taṃ koṭṭāpetvā tena lohena pattaṃ
tika-vin05t:185_2: kāreti, ayaṃ patto mahāakappiyo nāma, na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātuṃ. Sacepi
tika-vin05t:185_3: taṃ vināsetvā thālakaṃ kāreti, tampi akappiyaṃ. Vāsiṃ kāreti, tāya chinnadantakaṭṭhampi
tika-vin05t:185_4: akappiyaṃ. Baḷisaṃ kāreti, tena māritā macchāpi akappiyā. Vāsiṃ tāpetvā udakaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:186_0: Yo pana rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā tena pattaṃ kiṇāti, ayampi patto akappiyo. “Pañcannampi
tika-vin05t:186_1: sahadhammikānaṃ na kappatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sakkā pana kappiyo kātuṃ. So
tika-vin05t:186_2: hi mūle mūlasāmikānaṃ, patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hoti, kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:187_0: Yopi rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā kappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā
tika-vin05t:187_1: “ayaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vadati, kappiyakārako ca taṃ rūpiyaṃ datvā kammāraṃ saññāpeti,
tika-vin05t:187_2: ayampi patto kappiyavohārena gahitopi dutiyapattasadisoyeva, mūlassa sampaṭicchitattā
tika-vin05t:187_3: akappiyo. Kasmā sesānaṃ na kappatīti? Mūlassa anissaṭṭhattā.
tika-vin05t:188_0: Yo pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā “therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti pahitakappiyakārakena
tika-vin05t:188_1: saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī”ti kahāpaṇe
tika-vin05t:188_2: dāpetvā gahito, ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati dubbicāritattā, aññesaṃ
tika-vin05t:188_3: pana vaṭṭati mūlassa asampaṭicchitattā. Mahāsumattherassa kira upajjhāyo anuruddhatthero
tika-vin05t:188_4: nāma ahosi. So attano evarūpaṃ pattaṃ sappissa pūretvā saṅghassa nissajji. Tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherassa
tika-vin05t:188_5: saddhivihārikānaṃ evarūpo patto ahosi. Taṃ theropi sappissa pūretvā saṅghassa nissajjāpesīti.
tika-vin05t:189_0: Sace pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā “therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti pahitakappiyakārakena
tika-vin05t:189_1: saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vā “imāhaṃ gahessāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:189_2: vā vadati, kappiyakārako ca taṃ rūpiyaṃ datvā kammāraṃ saññāpeti, ayaṃ patto sabbakappiyo
tika-vin05t:189_3: buddhānampi paribhogāraho. Imaṃ pana rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ karontena “iminā imaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin05t:193_0: 59. Rūpiyādipaṭiggahoti jātarūpādipaṭiggaṇhanaṃ. Tattha jātarūpaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpamāsako
tika-vin05t:193_1: rajatamāsakoti catubbidhaṃ nissaggiyavatthu. Tambalohādīhi kato lohamāsako. Sāradārunā
tika-vin05t:193_2: vā veḷupesikāya vā antamaso tālapaṇṇenapi rūpaṃ chinditvā kato dārumāsako. Lākhāya
tika-vin05t:193_3: vā niyyāsena vā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā kato jatumāsako. Yo yo yattha yattha janapade
tika-vin05t:193_4: yadā yadā vohāraṃ gacchati, antamaso aṭṭhimayopi cammamayopi rukkhaphalabījamayopi
tika-vin05t:193_5: samuṭṭhāpitarūpopi asamuṭṭhāpitarūpopīti ayaṃ sabbopi rajatamāsakeneva saṅgahito.
tika-vin05t:193_6: Muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅko masāragallaṃ satta dhaññāni dāsidāsakhettavatthupupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti
tika-vin05t:193_7: idaṃ dukkaṭavatthu. Tattha nissaggiyavatthuṃ attano vā saṅghagaṇapuggalacetiyānaṃ
tika-vin05t:193_8: vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati. Attano atthāya sampaṭicchato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:193_9: hoti, sesānaṃ atthāya dukkaṭaṃ. Dukkaṭavatthuṃ sabbesampi atthāya sampaṭicchato dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin05t:194_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – sace koci jātarūparajataṃ āharitvā “idaṃ saṅghassa dammi, ārāmaṃ
tika-vin05t:194_1: vā karotha cetiyaṃ vā bhojanasālādīnaṃ vā aññatara”nti vadati, idaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin05t:194_2: na vaṭṭati. Sace pana “nayidaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitte “vaḍḍhakīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:194_3: vā kammakārānaṃ vā hatthe bhavissati, kevalaṃ tumhe sukatadukkaṭaṃ jānāthā”ti vatvā
tika-vin05t:194_4: tesaṃ hatthe datvā pakkamati, vaṭṭati. Athāpi “mama manussānaṃ hatthe bhavissati,
tika-vin05t:194_5: mayhameva vā hatthe bhavissati, kevalaṃ tumhe yaṃ yassa dātabbaṃ, tadatthāya pesethā”ti
tika-vin05t:194_6: vadati, evampi vaṭṭati. Sace pana saṃghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā anāmasitvā “idaṃ
tika-vin05t:194_7: hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ cetiyassa dema, vihārassa dema, navakammassa demā”ti vadanti, paṭikkhipituṃ
tika-vin05t:194_8: na vaṭṭati, “ime idaṃ bhaṇantī”ti kappiyakārakānaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. “Cetiyādīnaṃ atthāya
tika-vin05t:194_9: tumhe gahetvā ṭhapetvā”ti vutte pana “amhākaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:195_0: Sace pana koci bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ ānetvā “idaṃ saṃghassa dammi, cattāro paccaye
tika-vin05t:195_1: paribhuñjathā”ti vadati, tañce saṃgho sampaṭicchati, paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpatti.
tika-vin05t:195_2: Tatra ceko bhikkhu “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati, upāsako ca “yadina kappati,
tika-vin05t:195_3: mayhameva bhavissatī”ti taṃ ādāya gacchati. So bhikkhu “tayā saṃghassa lābhantarāyo
tika-vin05t:195_4: kato”ti na kenaci kiñci vattabbo. Yo hi taṃ codeti, sveva sāpattiko hoti. Tena panekena
tika-vin05t:195_5: bahū anāpattikā katā. Sace pana bhikkhūhi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitte “kappiyakārakānaṃ
tika-vin05t:195_6: vā hatthe bhavissati, mama purisānaṃ vā mayhaṃ vā hatthe bhavissati, kevalaṃ tumhe
tika-vin05t:196_0: Catupaccayatthāya ca dinnaṃ yena yena paccayena attho hoti, taṃ tadatthaṃ upanetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:196_1: Civaratthāya dinnaṃ cīvareyeva upanetabbaṃ. Sace cīvarena tādiso attho natthi, piṇḍapātādīhi
tika-vin05t:196_2: saṃgho kilamati, saṃghasuṭṭhutāya apaloketvā tadatthāyapi upanetabbaṃ. Esa nayo piṇḍapātagilānapaccayatthāya
tika-vin05t:196_3: dinnepi. Senāsanatthāya dinnaṃ pana senāsanassa garubhaṇḍattā senāsaneyeva upanetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:196_4: Sace pana bhikkhūsu senāsanaṃ chaḍḍetvā gatesu senāsanaṃ vinassati, īdise kāle senāsanaṃ
tika-vin05t:196_5: vissajjetvāpi bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogo anuññāto, tasmā senāsanajagganatthaṃ mūlacchejjaṃ
tika-vin05t:197_0: 60. Sace koci “mayhaṃ tisassasampādanakaṃ mahātaḷākaṃ atthi, taṃ saṃghassa dammī”ti
tika-vin05t:197_1: vadati, tañce saṃgho sampaṭicchati, paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattiyeva. Yo pana
tika-vin05t:197_2: taṃ paṭikkhipati, so purimanayeneva na kenaci kiñci vattabbo. Yo hi taṃ codeti, sveva
tika-vin05t:197_3: sāpattiko hoti. Tena panekena bahū anāpattikā katā. Yo pana “tādisaṃyeva taḷākaṃ
tika-vin05t:197_4: dammī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto vadati “asukañca asukañca saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:197_5: taḷākaṃ atthi, taṃ kathaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So vattabbo “kappiyaṃ katvā dinnaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:197_6: Kathaṃ dinnaṃ kappiyaṃ hotīti. “Cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathā”ti vatvā dinnanti.
tika-vin05t:197_7: So sace “sādhu, bhante cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathā”ti deti, vaṭṭati. Athāpi “taḷākaṃ
tika-vin05t:197_8: gaṇhathā”ti vatvā “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto “kappiyakārako atthī”ti pucchitvā “natthī”ti
tika-vin05t:197_9: vutte “idaṃ asuko nāma vicāressati, asukassa vā hatthe mayhaṃ vā hatthe bhavissati,
tika-vin05t:197_10: saṅgho kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ paribhuñjatū”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Sacepi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto
tika-vin05t:197_11: “udakaṃ paribhuñjissati, bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovissati, migapakkhino pivissantī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:197_12: evampi vaṭṭati. Athāpi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto vadati “kappiyasīsena gaṇhathā”ti.
tika-vin05t:197_13: “Sādhu upāsaka, saṅgho pānīyaṃ pivissati, bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovissati, migapakkhino pivissantī”ti
tika-vin05t:197_14: vatvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Athāpi “mama taḷākaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā saṅghassa dammī”ti
tika-vin05t:197_15: vutte “sādhu upāsaka, saṅgho pānīyaṃ pivissatī”tiādīni vatvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:198_0: Yadi pana bhikkhūhi hatthakammaṃ yācitvā sahatthena ca kappiyapathaviṃ khaṇitvā udakaparibhogatthāya
tika-vin05t:198_1: taḷākaṃ kāritaṃ hoti, tañce nissāya sassaṃ nipphādetvā manussā vihāre kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:198_2: denti, vaṭṭati. Atha manussā eva saṅghassa upakāratthāya saṅghikabhūmiṃ khaṇitvā
tika-vin05t:198_3: taṃ nissāya nipphannasassato kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ denti, etampi vaṭṭati. “Amhākaṃ ekaṃ
tika-vin05t:198_4: kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapethā”ti vutte ca ṭhapetumpi labbhati. Atha te manussā rājabalinā
tika-vin05t:198_5: upaddutā pakkamanti, aññe paṭipajjanti, na ca bhikkhūnaṃ kiñci denti, udakaṃ vāretuṃ
tika-vin05t:198_6: labbhati, tañca kho kasikammakāleyeva, na sassakāle. Sace te vadanti “nanu, bhante,
tika-vin05t:198_7: pubbepi manussā imaṃ nissāya sassaṃ akaṃsū”ti, tato vattabbā “te saṅghassa imañca
tika-vin05t:198_8: imañca upakāraṃ akaṃsu, idañcidañca kappiyabhaṇḍakaṃ adaṃsū”ti. Sace te vadanti “mayampi
tika-vin05t:199_0: Sace pana koci abyatto akappiyavohārena taḷākaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti vā kāreti vā, taṃ bhikkhūhi
tika-vin05t:199_1: na paribhuñjitabbaṃ, taṃ nissāya laddhakappiyabhaṇḍampi akappiyameva. Sace bhikkhūhi
tika-vin05t:199_2: pariccattabhāvaṃ ñatvā sāmiko vā tassa puttadhītaro vā añño vā koci vaṃse uppanno
tika-vin05t:199_3: puna kappiyavohārena deti, vaṭṭati. Pacchinne kulavaṃse yo tassa janapadassa sāmiko,
tika-vin05t:199_4: so acchinditvā kappiyavohārena puna deti cittalapabbate bhikkhunā nīhaṭaudakavāhakaṃ
tika-vin05t:199_5: aḷanāgarājamahesī viya, evampi vaṭṭati. Kappiyavohārepi udakavasena paṭiggahitataḷāke
tika-vin05t:199_6: suddhacittānaṃ mattikuddharaṇapāḷibandhanādīni ca kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Taṃ nissāya pana
tika-vin05t:199_7: sassaṃ karonte disvā kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yadi te sayameva kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:199_8: denti, gahetabbaṃ. No ce denti, na codetabbaṃ. Paccayavasena paṭiggahitataḷāke kappiyakārakaṃ
tika-vin05t:199_9: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, mattikuddharaṇapāḷibandhanādīni kāretuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace kappiyakārakā
tika-vin05t:199_10: sayameva karonti, vaṭṭati. Abyattena pana lajjibhikkhunā kārāpitesu kiñcāpi paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:199_11: kappiyaṃ, bhikkhussa pana payogapaccayā uppannena missattā visagatapiṇḍapāto viya
tika-vin05t:199_12: akappiyamaṃsarasamissabhojanaṃ viya ca dubbinibhogaṃ hoti, sabbesaṃ akappiyameva.
tika-vin05t:200_0: 61. Sace pana udakassa okāso atthi, taḷākassa pāḷi thirā, “yathā bahuṃ udakaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t:200_1: evaṃ karohi, tīrasamīpe udakaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ udakameva vicāreti, vaṭṭati. Uddhane
tika-vin05t:200_2: aggiṃ na pātenti, “udakakammaṃ labbhatu upāsakā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, “sassaṃ katvā
tika-vin05t:200_3: āharathā”ti vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati. Sace pana taḷāke atibahuṃ udakaṃ disvā passato
tika-vin05t:200_4: vā piṭṭhito vā mātikaṃ nīharāpeti, vanaṃ chindāpetvā kedāre kārāpeti, porāṇakedāresu
tika-vin05t:200_5: vā pakatibhāgaṃ aggahetvā atirekaṃ gaṇhāti, navasasse vā aparicchinnabhāge “ettake
tika-vin05t:200_6: kahāpaṇe dethā”ti kahāpaṇe uṭṭhāpeti, sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:201_0: Yo pana “kasatha vapathā”ti avatvā “ettakāya bhūmiyā ettako nāma bhāgo”ti evaṃ bhūmiṃ
tika-vin05t:201_1: vā patiṭṭhāpeti, “ettake bhūmibhāge amhehi sassaṃ kataṃ, ettakaṃ nāma bhāgaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin05t:201_2: vadantesu kassakesu bhūmippamāṇagahaṇatthaṃ rajjuyā vā daṇḍena vā mināti, khale vā
tika-vin05t:201_3: ṭhatvā rakkhati, khalato vā nīharāpeti, koṭṭhāgāre vā paṭisāmeti, tasseva taṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:201_4: Sace kassakā kahāpaṇe āharitvā “ime saṅghassa āhaṭā”ti vadanti, aññataro ca bhikkhu
tika-vin05t:201_5: “na saṅgho kahāpaṇe khādatī”ti saññāya “ettakehi kahāpaṇehi sāṭake āharatha, ettakehi
tika-vin05t:201_6: yāguādīni sampādethā”ti vadati, yaṃ te āharanti, taṃ sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ. Kasmā? Kahāpaṇānaṃ
tika-vin05t:201_7: vicāritattā. Sace dhaññaṃ āharitvā “idaṃ saṅghassa āhaṭa”nti vadanti, aññataro ca
tika-vin05t:201_8: bhikkhu purimanayeneva “ettakehi vīhīhi idañcidañca āharathā”ti vadati, yaṃ te āharanti,
tika-vin05t:201_9: taṃ tasseva akappiyaṃ. Kasmā? Dhaññassa vicāritattā. Sace taṇḍulaṃ vā aparaṇṇaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:201_10: āharitvā “idaṃ saṅghassa āhaṭa”nti vadanti, aññataro ca bhikkhu purimanayeneva “ettakehi
tika-vin05t:201_11: taṇḍulehi idañcidañca āharathā”ti vadati, yaṃ te āharanti, taṃ sabbesaṃ kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:201_12: Kasmā? Kappiyānaṃ taṇḍulādīnaṃ vicāritattā. Kayavikkayepi anāpatti kappiyakārakassa ācikkhitattā.
tika-vin05t:202_0: 62. Pubbe pana cittalapabbate eko bhikkhu catusāladvāre “aho vata sve saṅghassa ettakappamāṇe
tika-vin05t:202_1: pūve paceyyu”nti ārāmikānaṃ saññājananatthaṃ bhūmiyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ akāsi. Taṃ disvā cheko
tika-vin05t:202_2: ārāmiko tatheva katvā dutiyadivase bheriyā ākoṭitāya sannipatite saṅghe pūvaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin05t:202_3: saṅghattheraṃ āha – “bhante, amhehi ito pubbe neva pitūnaṃ, na pitāmahānaṃ evarūpaṃ
tika-vin05t:202_4: sutapubbaṃ, ekena ayyena catusāladvāre pūvatthāya saññā katā, ito dāni pabhuti ayyā
tika-vin05t:202_5: attano attano cittānurūpaṃ vadantu, amhākampi phāsuvihāro bhavissatī”ti. Mahāthero
tika-vin05t:202_6: tatova nivatti, ekabhikkhunāpi pūvo na gahito. Evaṃ pubbe tatruppādaṃ na paribhuñjiṃsu. Tasmā –
tika-vin05t:205: Yo cāyaṃ taḷāke vutto, pokkharaṇīudakavāhakamātikādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:206_0: 63. Pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaucchuphalāphalādīnaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ yaṃ kiñci khettaṃ vā vatthuṃ
tika-vin05t:206_1: vā “dammī”ti vuttepi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitvā taḷāke vuttanayeneva yadā kappiyavohārena
tika-vin05t:206_3: araññaṃ dammī”ti vutte pana vaṭṭati. Sace manussā bhikkhūhi anāṇattāyeva tattha rukkhe
tika-vin05t:206_4: chinditvā aparaṇṇādīni sampādetvā bhikkhūnaṃ bhāgaṃ denti, vaṭṭati, adentā na codetabbā.
tika-vin05t:206_5: Sace kenacideva antarāyena tesu pakkantesu aññe karonti, na ca bhikkhūnaṃ kiñci denti,
tika-vin05t:206_6: te vāretabbā. Sace vadanti “nanu, bhante, pubbe manussā idha sassāni akaṃsū”ti, tato
tika-vin05t:206_7: vattabbā “te saṅghassa idañcidañca kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ adaṃsū”ti. Sace vadanti “mayampi
tika-vin05t:207_0: Kiñci sassuṭṭhānakaṃ bhūmippadesaṃ sandhāya “sīmaṃ demā”ti vadanti, vaṭṭati. Sīmaparicchedanatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:207_1: pana thambhā vā pāsāṇā vā sayaṃ na ṭhapetabbā, bhūmi nāma anagghā, appakenapi pārājiko
tika-vin05t:207_2: bhaveyya. Ārāmikānaṃ pana vattabbaṃ “iminā ṭhānena amhākaṃ sīmā gatā”ti. Sacepi hi
tika-vin05t:207_3: te adhikaṃ gaṇhanti, pariyāyena kathitattā anāpatti. Yadi pana rājarājamahāmattādayo
tika-vin05t:207_4: sayameva thambhe ṭhapāpetvā “cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathā”ti denti, vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:208_0: Sace koci antosīmāyaṃ taḷākaṃ vā khaṇati, vihāramajjhena vā mātikaṃ neti, cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇādīni
tika-vin05t:208_1: dussanti, vāretabbo. Sace saṅgho kiñci labhitvā āmisagarukatāya na vāreti, eko bhikkhu
tika-vin05t:208_2: vāreti, sova bhikkhu issaro. Sace eko bhikkhu na vāreti “netha tumhe”ti, tesaṃyeva
tika-vin05t:208_3: pakkho hoti. Saṅgho vāreti, saṅghova issaro. Saṅghikesu hi kammesu yo dhammakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:208_4: karoti, sova issaro. Sace vāriyamānopi karoti, heṭṭhā gahitaṃ paṃsuṃ heṭṭhā pakkhipitvā,
tika-vin05t:208_5: upari gahitaṃ paṃsuṃ upari pakkhipitvā pūretabbā.
tika-vin05t:209_0: Sace koci yathājātameva ucchuṃ vā aparaṇṇaṃ vā alābukumbhaṇḍādikaṃ vā valliphalaṃ
tika-vin05t:209_1: dātukāmo “etaṃ sabbaṃ ucchukhettaṃ aparaṇṇavatthuṃ valliphalāvāṭaṃ dammī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:209_2: saha vatthunā parāmaṭṭhattā na vaṭṭatīti mahāsumatthero āha. Mahāpadumatthero pana
tika-vin05t:209_3: “abhilāpamattametaṃ, sāmikānaṃyeva hi so bhūmibhāgo, tasmā vaṭṭatī”ti āha. “Dāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:209_4: dammī”ti vadati, na vaṭṭati. “Ārāmikaṃ dammi, veyyāvaccakaraṃ dammi, kappiyakārakaṃ
tika-vin05t:209_5: dammī”ti vutte vaṭṭati. Sace ārāmiko purebhattampi pacchābhattampi saṅghasseva kammaṃ
tika-vin05t:209_6: karoti, sāmaṇerassa viya sabbaṃ bhesajjaṃ paṭijagganampi tassa kātabbaṃ. Sace purebhattameva
tika-vin05t:209_7: saṅghassa kammaṃ karoti, pacchābhattaṃ attano karoti, sāyaṃ nivāpo na dātabbo. Yepi
tika-vin05t:209_8: pañcadivasavārena vā pakkhavārena vā saṅghassa kammaṃ katvā sesakāle attano kammaṃ
tika-vin05t:209_9: karonti, tesampi karaṇakāleyeva bhattañca nivāpo ca dātabbo. Sace saṅghassa kammaṃ
tika-vin05t:209_10: natthi, attanoyeva kammaṃ katvā jīvanti, te ce hatthakammamūlaṃ ānetvā denti, gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:209_11: No ce denti, na kiñci vattabbā. Yaṃ kiñci rajakadāsampi pesakāradāsampi ārāmikanāmena
tika-vin05t:210_0: Sace “gāvo demā”ti vadanti, “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbā. Imā gāvo kutoti. Paṇḍitehi
tika-vin05t:210_2: vaṭṭanti. Ajikādīsupi eseva nayo. “Hatthiṃ dema, assaṃ, mahiṃsaṃ, kukkuṭaṃ, sūkaraṃ
tika-vin05t:210_3: demā”ti vadanti, sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace keci manussā “appossukkā, bhante,
tika-vin05t:210_4: tumhe hotha, mayaṃ ime gahetvā tumhākaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ dassāmā”ti gaṇhanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:210_5: Kukkuṭasūkare “sukhaṃ jīvantū”ti araññe vissajjāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Imaṃ taḷākaṃ, imaṃ
tika-vin05t:210_6: khettaṃ, imaṃ vatthuṃ vihārassa demā”ti vutte paṭikkhipituṃ na labbhati.
tika-vin05t:211_0: 64. Sace koci bhikkhuṃ uddissa dūtena hiraññasuvaṇṇādicīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyya
tika-vin05t:211_1: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti,
tika-vin05t:211_2: so ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ
tika-vin05t:211_3: uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, paṭiggaṇhatu āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti, tena bhikkhunā
tika-vin05t:211_4: so dūto evamassa vacanīyo “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, cīvarañca
tika-vin05t:211_5: kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya”nti. So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadeyya “atthi
tika-vin05t:211_6: panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti, cīvaratthikena bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo
tika-vin05t:211_7: ārāmiko vā upāsako vā “eso kho, āvuso, bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti. Na vattabbo
tika-vin05t:211_8: “tassa dehī”ti vā “so vā nikkhipissati, so vā parivattessati, so vā cetāpessatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:211_9: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya
tika-vin05t:211_10: “yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi, āṇatto so mayā, upasaṅkamatu āyasmā
tika-vin05t:211_11: kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī”ti. Cīvaratthikena bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin05t:211_12: dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo “attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”ti. Na vattabbo “dehi
tika-vin05t:211_13: me cīvaraṃ, āhara me cīvaraṃ, parivattehi me cīvaraṃ, cetāpehi me cīvara”nti. Sace
tika-vin05t:211_14: dvattikkhattuṃ codayamāno sārayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
tika-vin05t:211_15: No ce abhinipphādeti, tattha gantvā catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ
tika-vin05t:211_16: tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ, na āsane nisīditabbaṃ, na āmisaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:211_17: na dhammo bhāsitabbo. “Kiṃ kāraṇā āgatosī”ti pucchiyamānena “jānāhi, āvuso”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:212_0: Sace āsane vā nisīdati, āmisaṃ vā paṭiggaṇhāti, dhammaṃ vā bhāsati, ṭhānaṃ bhañjati.
tika-vin05t:212_1: Sace catukkhattuṃ codeti, catukkhattuṃ ṭhātabbaṃ. Pañcakkhattuṃ codeti, dvikkhattuṃ
tika-vin05t:212_2: ṭhātabbaṃ. Chakkhattuṃ codeti, na ṭhātabbaṃ. Ekāya hi codanāya ṭhānadvayaṃ bhañjati.
tika-vin05t:212_3: Yathā chakkhattuṃ codetvā na ṭhātabbaṃ, evaṃ dvādasakkhattuṃ ṭhatvā na codetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:212_4: Tasmā sace codetiyeva na tiṭṭhati, cha codanā labbhanti. Sace tiṭṭhatiyeva na codeti,
tika-vin05t:212_5: dvādasa ṭhānāni labbhanti. Sace codetipi tiṭṭhatipi, ekāya codanāya dve ṭhānāni hāpetabbāni.
tika-vin05t:212_6: Tattha yo ekadivasameva punappunaṃ gantvā chakkhattuṃ codeti, sakiṃyeva vā gantvā
tika-vin05t:212_7: “attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”ti chakkhattuṃ vadati, tattha ekadivasameva punappunaṃ
tika-vin05t:212_8: gantvā dvādasakkhattuṃ tiṭṭhati, sakimeva vā gantvā tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhati, sopi
tika-vin05t:212_9: sabbacodanāyo sabbaṭṭhānāni ca bhañjati, ko pana vādo nānādivasesu. Tato ce uttari
tika-vin05t:212_10: vāyamamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:212_11: No ce sakkoti taṃ abhinipphādetuṃ, yato rājato rājamahāmattato vā assa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:212_12: taṃ cīvaracetāpannaṃ ānītaṃ, tassa santikaṃ sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ, dūto vā pāhetabbo
tika-vin05t:212_13: “yaṃ kho tumhe āyasmanto bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha, na taṃ tassa
tika-vin05t:212_14: bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti, yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṃ, mā tumhākaṃ santakaṃ vinassatū”ti.
tika-vin05t:212_15: Ayaṃ tattha sāmīci. Yo pana neva sāmaṃ gacchati, na dūtaṃ pāheti, vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin05t:213_0: 65. Kiṃ pana sabbakappiyakārakesu evaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Na paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Ayañhi
tika-vin05t:213_1: kappiyakārako nāma saṅkhepato duvidho niddiṭṭho aniddiṭṭho ca. Tattha niddiṭṭho duvidho
tika-vin05t:213_2: bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho dūtena niddiṭṭhoti. Aniddiṭṭhopi duvidho mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako
tika-vin05t:213_3: parammukhakappiyakārakoti. Tesu bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho sammukhāsammukhavasena catubbidho
tika-vin05t:213_4: hoti, tathā dūtena niddiṭṭhopi. Kathaṃ? Idhekacco bhikkhussa cīvaratthāya dūtena
tika-vin05t:213_5: akappiyavatthuṃ pahiṇati, dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idaṃ, bhante, itthannāmena
tika-vin05t:213_6: tumhākaṃ cīvaratthāya pahitaṃ, gaṇhatha na”nti vadati, bhikkhu “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti
tika-vin05t:213_7: paṭikkhipati, dūto “atthi pana te, bhante, veyyāvaccakaro”ti pucchati, puññatthikehi
tika-vin05t:213_8: ca upāsakehi “bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karothā”ti āṇattā vā, bhikkhūnaṃ vā sandiṭṭhasambhattā
tika-vin05t:213_9: keci veyyāvaccakarā honti, tesaṃ aññataro tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhussa santike nisinno
tika-vin05t:213_10: hoti, bhikkhu taṃ niddisati “ayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti, dūto tassa hatthe
tika-vin05t:213_11: akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti gacchati, ayaṃ bhikkhunā sammukhāniddiṭṭho.
tika-vin05t:214_0: No ce bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti, apica kho bhikkhu niddisati “asukasmiṃ nāma
tika-vin05t:214_1: gāme itthannāmo bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti, so gantvā tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ
tika-vin05t:214_2: datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dadeyyāsī”ti āgantvā bhikkhussa ārocetvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:215_0: Na heva kho so dūto attanā āgantvā āroceti, apica kho aññaṃ pahiṇati “dinnaṃ mayā,
tika-vin05t:215_1: bhante, tassa hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṃ, tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti, ayaṃ dutiyo
tika-vin05t:216_0: Na heva kho aññaṃ pahiṇati, apica gacchantova bhikkhuṃ vadati “ahaṃ tassa hatthe
tika-vin05t:216_1: cīvaracetāpannaṃ dassāmi, tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti, ayaṃ tatiyo bhikkhunā asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin05t:216_2: evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā
tika-vin05t:217_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito natthitāya vā avicāretukāmatāya vā “natthamhākaṃ
tika-vin05t:217_1: kappiyakārako”ti vadati, tasmiṃ khaṇe koci manusso āgacchati, dūto tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ
tika-vin05t:217_2: datvā “imassa hatthato cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā gacchati, ayaṃ dūtena sammukhāniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin05t:218_0: Aparo dūto gāmaṃ pavisitvā attanā abhirucitassa kassaci hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā
tika-vin05t:218_1: purimanayeneva āgantvā vā āroceti, aññaṃ vā pahiṇati “ahaṃ asukassa nāma hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṃ
tika-vin05t:218_2: dassāmi, tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā vā gacchati, ayaṃ tatiyo dūtena asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin05t:218_3: evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro dūtena niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā
tika-vin05t:218_4: nāma. Etesu meṇḍakasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:219_0: “Santi, bhikkhave, manussā saddhā pasannā, te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti
tika-vin05t:219_1: ‘iminā yaṃ ayyassa kappiyaṃ, taṃ dethā’ti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ tato kappiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:219_2: taṃ sādituṃ, na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ‘kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:220_0: Ettha codanāya parimāṇaṃ natthi, mūlaṃ asādiyantena sahassakkhattumpi codanāya vā
tika-vin05t:220_1: ṭhānena vā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭati. No ce deti, aññaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetvāpi
tika-vin05t:220_2: āharāpetabbaṃ. Sace icchati, mūlasāmikānampi kathetabbaṃ. No ce icchati, na kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:221_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito “natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:221_1: tadañño samīpe ṭhito sutvā “āhara bho, ahaṃ ayyassa cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā dassāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:221_2: vadati. Dūto “handa bho dadeyyāsī”ti tassa hatthe datvā bhikkhussa anārocetvāva gacchati,
tika-vin05t:221_3: ayaṃ mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako. Aparo bhikkhuno upaṭṭhākassa vā aññassa vā hatthe
tika-vin05t:221_4: akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ dadeyyāsī”ti ettova pakkamati, ayaṃ parammukhākappiyakārakoti
tika-vin05t:221_5: ime dve aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakā nāma. Etesu aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:221_6: Sace sayameva cīvaraṃ ānetvā dadanti, gahetabbaṃ. No ce, na kiñci vattabbā. Yathā
tika-vin05t:221_7: ca dūtassa hatthe cīvaratthāya akappiyavatthumhi pesite vinicchayo vutto, evaṃ piṇḍapātādīnampi
tika-vin05t:221_8: atthāya pesite sayaṃ āgantvā dīyamāne ca vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:222_0: 66. Upanikkhittasādiyane pana ayaṃ vinicchayo – kiñci akappiyavatthuṃ pādamūle ṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t:222_1: “idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti vutte sacepi cittena sādiyati, gaṇhitukāmo hoti, kāyena vā
tika-vin05t:222_2: vācāya vā “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati, anāpatti. Kāyavācāhi vā appaṭikkhipitvāpi
tika-vin05t:222_3: suddhacitto hutvā “nayidaṃ amhākaṃ kappatī”ti na sādiyati, anāpattiyeva. Tīsu dvāresu
tika-vin05t:222_4: hi yena kenaci paṭikkhittaṃ paṭikkhittameva hoti. Sace pana kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:222_5: cittena adhivāseti, kāyavācāhi kattabbassa paṭikkhepassa akaraṇato akiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:222_6: kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre ca āpattiṃ āpajjati, manodvāre pana āpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin05t:223_0: Eko sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā pādamūle ṭhapeti “tuyhidaṃ hotū”ti, bhikkhu “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti
tika-vin05t:223_1: paṭikkhipati, upāsako “pariccattaṃ mayā tumhāka”nti gato, añño tattha āgantvā pucchati
tika-vin05t:223_2: “kiṃ, bhante, ida”nti, yaṃ tena ca attanā ca vuttaṃ, taṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. So ce vadati
tika-vin05t:223_3: “gopayissāmahaṃ, bhante, guttaṭṭhānaṃ dassethā”ti, sattabhūmikampi pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā
tika-vin05t:223_4: “idaṃ guttaṭṭhāna”nti ācikkhitabbaṃ, “idha nikkhipāhī”ti na vattabbaṃ. Ettāvatā kappiyañca
tika-vin05t:223_5: akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ hoti, dvāraṃ pidahitvā rakkhantena vasitabbaṃ. Sace kiñci
tika-vin05t:223_6: vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā gahetvā āgacchati, “idaṃ gahessatha, bhante”ti
tika-vin05t:223_7: vutte “upāsaka, atthi amhākaṃ iminā attho, vatthu ca evarūpaṃ nāma saṃvijjati, kappiyakārako
tika-vin05t:223_8: natthī”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace so vadati “ahaṃ kappiyakārako bhavissāmi, dvāraṃ vivaritvā
tika-vin05t:223_9: dethā”ti, dvāraṃ vivaritvā “imasmiṃ okāse ṭhapita”nti vattabbaṃ, “idaṃ gaṇhā”ti na
tika-vin05t:223_10: vattabbaṃ. Evampi kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hoti. So ce taṃ gahetvā
tika-vin05t:223_11: tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ deti, vaṭṭati. Sace adhikaṃ gaṇhāti, “na mayaṃ tava bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:224_0: 67. Yena pana jātarūpādicatubbidhaṃ nissaggiyavatthu paṭiggahitaṃ, tena kiṃ kātabbanti?
tika-vin05t:224_1: Saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ
tika-vin05t:224_2: uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ
tika-vin05t:224_3: paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “ahaṃ, bhante, rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahesiṃ, idaṃ me nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:224_4: imāhaṃ nissajjāmī”ti nissajjitvā āpatti desetabbā. Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena
tika-vin05t:224_5: āpatti paṭiggahetabbā. Sace tattha āgacchati ārāmiko vā upāsako vā, so vattabbo “āvuso,
tika-vin05t:224_6: idaṃ jānāhī”ti. Sace so bhaṇati “iminā kiṃ āharissāmī”ti, na vattabbo “imaṃ vā imaṃ
tika-vin05t:224_7: vā āharā”ti, kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ sappiṃ vā telaṃ vā madhuṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā. Ācikkhantena
tika-vin05t:224_8: ca “iminā sappiṃ vā telaṃ vā madhuṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā āharā”ti na vattabbaṃ, “idañcidañca
tika-vin05t:224_9: saṅghassa kappiya”nti ettakameva vattabbaṃ. Sace so tena parivattetvā kappiyaṃ āharati,
tika-vin05t:224_10: rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbeheva bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ, rūpiyapaṭiggāhakena bhāgo na gahetabbo.
tika-vin05t:225_0: Aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāgampi labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:225_1: antamaso makkaṭādīhi tato haritvā araññe ṭhapitaṃ vā tesaṃ hatthato gaḷitaṃ vā tiracchānapaṭiggahitampi
tika-vin05t:225_2: paṃsukūlampi na vaṭṭatiyeva. Tato āhaṭena phāṇitena senāsanadhūpanampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:225_3: Sappinā vā telena vā padīpaṃ katvā dīpāloke nipajjituṃ, kasiṇaparikammaṃ kātuṃ, potthakampi
tika-vin05t:225_4: vācetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Telamadhuphāṇitehi pana sarīre vaṇaṃ makkhetuṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:225_5: Tena vatthunā mañcapīṭhādīni vā gaṇhanti, uposathāgāraṃ vā bhojanasālaṃ vā karonti,
tika-vin05t:225_6: paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Chāyāpi gehaparicchedena ṭhitāva na vaṭṭati, paricchedātikkantā
tika-vin05t:225_7: āgantukattā vaṭṭati. Taṃ vatthuṃ vissajjetvā katena maggenapi setunāpi nāvāyapi uḷumpenāpi
tika-vin05t:225_8: gantuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tena vatthunā khaṇāpitāya pokkharaṇiyā ubbhidodakaṃ pātuṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin05t:225_9: vā na vaṭṭati. Anto udake pana asati aññaṃ āgantukaṃ udakaṃ vā vassodakaṃ vā paviṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:225_10: vaṭṭati. Kītāya yena saddhiṃ kītā, taṃ āgantukampi na vaṭṭati. Taṃ vatthuṃ upanikkhepaṃ
tika-vin05t:225_11: ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati, tepi paccayā tassa na vaṭṭanti. Ārāmo gahito
tika-vin05t:225_12: hoti, sopi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Yadi bhūmipi bījampi akappiyaṃ, neva bhūmiṃ,
tika-vin05t:225_13: na phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace bhūmiṃyeva kiṇitvā aññāni bījāni ropitāni,
tika-vin05t:225_14: phalaṃ vaṭṭati. Atha bījāni kiṇitvā kappiyabhūmiyaṃ ropitāni, phalaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:225_15: bhūmiyaṃ nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:226_0: Sace pana tattha āgato kappiyakārako taṃ parivattetvā saṅghassa kappiyaṃ sappitelādiṃ
tika-vin05t:226_1: āharituṃ na jānāti, so vattabbo “āvuso, imaṃ chaḍḍehī”ti. Sace so chaḍḍeti, iccetaṃ
tika-vin05t:226_2: kusalaṃ. No ce chaḍḍeti, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu rūpiyachaḍḍako sammannitabbo
tika-vin05t:226_3: yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ
tika-vin05t:226_4: gaccheyya, chaḍḍitāchaḍḍitañca jāneyya. Evañca pana sammannitabbo, paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu
tika-vin05t:226_5: yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin05t:227_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin05t:227_1: rūpiyachaḍḍakaṃ sammanneyya, esā ñatti. Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin05t:227_2: bhikkhuṃ rūpiyachaḍḍakaṃ sammannati, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:227_3: rūpiyachaḍḍakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya. Sammato saṅghena
tika-vin05t:227_4: itthannāmo bhikkhu rūpiyachaḍḍako, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:228_0: 68. Tena sammatena bhikkhunā nimittaṃ akatvā akkhīni nimīletvā nadiyā vā papāte vā
tika-vin05t:228_1: vanagahane vā gūthaṃ viya anapekkhena patitokāsaṃ asamannārahantena chaḍḍetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:228_2: Sace nimittaṃ katvā pāteti, dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Evaṃ jigucchitabbepi rūpiye bhagavā
tika-vin05t:228_3: pariyāyena bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogaṃ ācikkhi. Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa pana kenaci pariyāyena
tika-vin05t:228_4: tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo na vaṭṭati. Yathā cāyaṃ etassa na vaṭṭati, evaṃ asantasambhāvanāya
tika-vin05t:228_5: vā kuladūsakakammena vā kuhanādīhi vāuppannapaccayā neva tassa, na aññassa vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin05t:228_6: dhammena samena uppannāpi apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti. Cattāro hi paribhogā
tika-vin05t:228_7: – theyyaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo sāmiparibhogoti. Tattha saṅghamajjhepi
tika-vin05t:228_8: nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāma. Sīlavato apaccavekkhitaparibhogo
tika-vin05t:228_9: iṇaparibhogo nāma. Tasmā cīvaraṃ paribhoge paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṃ, piṇḍapāto
tika-vin05t:228_11: Sacassa apaccavekkhato aruṇo uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Senāsanampi
tika-vin05t:228_12: paribhoge paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṃ. Bhesajjassa paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi satipaccayatā
tika-vin05t:228_13: vaṭṭati, evaṃ santepi paṭiggahaṇe satiṃ katvā paribhoge akarontasseva āpatti, paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin05t:228_14: pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti. Catubbidhā hi suddhi – desanāsuddhi
tika-vin05t:229_0: Tattha desanāsuddhi nāma pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Tañhi desanāya sujjhanato “desanāsuddhī”ti
tika-vin05t:229_1: vuccati. Saṃvarasuddhi nāma indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Tañhi “na punevaṃ karissāmī”ti cittādhiṭṭhānasaṃvareneva
tika-vin05t:229_3: Tañhi anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye uppādentassa pariyesanāya suddhattā
tika-vin05t:229_5: Tañhi “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmī”tiādinā nayena vuttena paccavekkhaṇena
tika-vin05t:229_6: sujjhanato “paccavekkhaṇasuddhī”ti vuccati, tena vuttaṃ “paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā
tika-vin05t:230_0: Sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ paccayaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo nāma. Te hi bhagavato puttā,
tika-vin05t:230_1: tasmā pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti. Kiṃ pana te
tika-vin05t:230_2: bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti, gihīnaṃ paccaye paribhuñjantīti? Gihīhi dinnāpi
tika-vin05t:230_3: bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti, tasmā bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjantīti
tika-vin05t:230_4: veditabbaṃ. Dhammadāyādasutta ñcettha sādhakaṃ. Khīṇāsavānaṃ paribhogo sāmiparibhogo
tika-vin05t:230_5: nāma. Te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjanti. Iti imesu paribhogesu
tika-vin05t:230_6: sāmiparibhogo ca dāyajjaparibhogo ca sabbesampi vaṭṭati, iṇaparibhogo na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:231_0: Aparepi cattāro paribhogā – lajjiparibhogo alajjiparibhogo dhammiyaparibhogo adhammiyaparibhogoti.
tika-vin05t:231_1: Tattha alajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo vaṭṭati, āpattiyā na kāretabbo. Lajjino
tika-vin05t:231_2: alajjinā saddhiṃ yāva na jānāti, tāva vaṭṭati. Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthi,
tika-vin05t:231_3: tasmā yadāssa alajjibhāvaṃ jānāti, tadā vattabbo “tumhe kāyadvāre vacīdvāre ca vītikkamaṃ
tika-vin05t:231_4: karotha, taṃ appatirūpaṃ, mā evamakatthā”ti. Sace anādiyitvā karotiyeva, yadi tena
tika-vin05t:231_5: saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karoti, sopi alajjīyeva hoti. Yopi attano bhārabhūtena alajjinā
tika-vin05t:231_6: saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karoti, sopi nivāretabbo. Sace na oramati, ayampi alajjīyeva hoti.
tika-vin05t:231_7: Evaṃ eko alajjī alajjisatampi karoti. Alajjino pana alajjināva saddhiṃ paribhoge
tika-vin05t:231_8: āpatti nāma natthi. Lajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo dvinnaṃ khattiyakumārānaṃ suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:231_9: bhojanasadiso. Dhammiyādhammiyaparibhogo paccayavaseneva veditabbo. Tattha sace puggalopi
tika-vin05t:231_10: alajjī, piṇḍapātopi adhammiyo, ubho jegucchā. Puggalo alajjī, piṇḍapāto dhammiyo,
tika-vin05t:231_11: puggalaṃ jigucchitvā piṇḍapāto na gahetabbo. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “dussīlo saṅghato
tika-vin05t:231_12: uddesabhattādīni labhitvā saṅghasseva deti, etāni yathādānameva gahitattā vaṭṭantī”ti
tika-vin05t:231_13: vuttaṃ. Puggalo lajjī, piṇḍapāto adhammiyo, piṇḍapāto jeguccho na gahetabbo. Puggalo
tika-vin05t:232_0: Apare dve paggahā dve ca paribhogā – lajjipaggaho alajjipaggaho, dhammaparibhogo
tika-vin05t:232_1: āmisaparibhogoti. Tattha alajjino lajjiṃ paggahetuṃ vaṭṭati, na so āpattiyā kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:232_2: Sace pana lajjī alajjiṃ paggaṇhāti, anumodanāya ajjhesati, dhammakathāya ajjhesati,
tika-vin05t:232_3: kulesu upatthambheti, itaropi “amhākaṃ ācariyo īdiso ca īdiso cā”ti tassa parisati
tika-vin05t:232_4: vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, ayaṃ sāsanaṃ osakkāpeti antaradhāpetīti veditabbo. Dhammaparibhogaāmisaparibhogesu
tika-vin05t:232_5: pana yattha āmisaparibhogo vaṭṭati, dhammaparibhogopi tattha vaṭṭati. Yo pana koṭiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:232_6: ṭhito, gantho tassa puggalassa accayena nassissati, taṃ dhammānuggahena uggaṇhituṃ
tika-vin05t:232_7: vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Tatridaṃ vatthu – mahābhaye kira ekasseva bhikkhuno mahāniddeso
tika-vin05t:232_8: paguṇo ahosi. Atha catunikāyikatissattherassa upajjhāyo mahātipiṭakatthero nāma mahārakkhitattheraṃ
tika-vin05t:232_9: āha “āvuso mahārakkhita, etassa santike mahāniddesaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti. “Pāpo kirāyaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:232_10: na gaṇhāmī”ti. “Gaṇhāvuso, ahaṃ te santike nisīdissāmī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante, tumhesu
tika-vin05t:232_11: nisinnesu gaṇhissāmī”ti paṭṭhapetvā rattindivaṃ nirantaraṃ pariyāpuṇanto osānadivase
tika-vin05t:232_12: heṭṭhāmañce itthiṃ disvā “bhante, sutaṃyeva me pubbe, sacāhaṃ evaṃ jāneyyaṃ, na īdisassa
tika-vin05t:232_13: santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti āha. Tassa pana santike bahū mahātherā uggaṇhitvā
tika-vin05t:236_0: 69. Dānavissāsaggāhehi lābhassa pariṇāmananti ettha tāva dānanti attano santakassa
tika-vin05t:236_1: cīvarādiparikkhārassa saddhivihārikādīsu yassa kassaci dānaṃ. Tatridaṃ dānalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:236_2: – “idaṃ tuyhaṃ demi dadāmi dajjāmi oṇojemi pariccajāmi vissajjāmī”ti vā “itthannāmassa
tika-vin05t:236_3: demi…pe… vissajjāmī”ti vā vadati, sammukhāpi parammukhāpi dinnaṃyeva hoti. “Tuyhaṃ
tika-vin05t:236_4: gaṇhāhī”ti vutte “mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti vadati, sudinnaṃ suggahitañca. “Tava santakaṃ
tika-vin05t:236_5: karohi, tava santakaṃ hotu, tava santakaṃ hotī”ti vutte “mama santakaṃ karomi, mama
tika-vin05t:236_6: santakaṃ hotu, mama santakaṃ karissāmī”ti vadati, dudinnaṃ duggahitañca. Neva dātā
tika-vin05t:236_7: dātuṃ jānāti, na itaro gahetuṃ, sace pana “tava santakaṃ karohī”ti vutte “sādhu,
tika-vin05t:236_8: bhante, mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti gaṇhāti, suggahitaṃ. Sace pana eko “idaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhāhī”ti
tika-vin05t:236_9: vadati, itaro “na gaṇhāmī”ti vadati, puna so “dinnaṃ mayā tuyhaṃ, gaṇhāhī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:236_10: itaropi “na mayhaṃ iminā attho”ti vadati, tato purimopi “mayā dinna”nti dasāhaṃ atikkāmeti,
tika-vin05t:236_11: pacchimopi “mayā paṭikkhitta”nti, kassa āpattīti? Na kassaci. Yassa pana ruccati,
tika-vin05t:236_12: tena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. “Itthannāmassa dehī”ti dinnaṃ yāva parassa hatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:236_13: na pāpuṇāti, tāva yo pahiṇati, tasseva santakaṃ, “itthannāmassa dammī”ti dinnaṃ pana
tika-vin05t:236_14: yassa pahīyati, tassa santakaṃ. Tasmā bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati
tika-vin05t:236_15: “idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dehī”ti. So antarāmagge yo pahiṇati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t:236_16: suggahitaṃ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, duggahitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:237_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dehī”ti. So
tika-vin05t:237_1: antarāmagge suṇāti “yo pahiṇati, so kālakato”ti, tassa matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin05t:237_2: svādhiṭṭhitaṃ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, duggahitaṃ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa
tika-vin05t:237_3: hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dehī”ti. So antarāmagge suṇāti
tika-vin05t:237_4: “yassa pahīyati, so kālakato”ti, tassa matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti, dvādhiṭṭhitaṃ. Yo
tika-vin05t:237_5: pahiṇati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, suggahitaṃ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati
tika-vin05t:237_6: “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dehī”ti. So antarāmagge suṇāti “ubho kālakatā”ti, yo
tika-vin05t:237_7: pahiṇati, tassa matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti, svādhiṭṭhitaṃ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa matakacīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:237_8: adhiṭṭhāti, dvādhiṭṭhitaṃ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:237_9: itthannāmassa dammī”ti. So antarāmagge yo pahiṇati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, duggahitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:237_10: Yassa pahīyati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, suggahitaṃ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:237_11: pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti. So antarāmagge suṇāti “yo pahiṇati,
tika-vin05t:237_12: so kālakato”ti, tassa matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti, dvādhiṭṭhitaṃ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa
tika-vin05t:237_13: vissāsā gaṇhāti, suggahitaṃ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:237_14: itthannāmassa dammī”ti. So antarāmagge suṇāti “yassa pahīyati, so kālakato”ti, tassa
tika-vin05t:237_15: matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti, svādhiṭṭhitaṃ. Yo pahiṇati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, duggahitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:237_16: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṃ pahiṇati “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti.
tika-vin05t:237_17: So antarāmagge suṇāti “ubho kālakatā”ti. Yo pahiṇati, tassa matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin05t:237_18: dvādhiṭṭhitaṃ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti, svādhiṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:238_0: Pariccajitvā dinnaṃ puna kenaci kāraṇena kupito āharāpetuṃ na labhati. Attanā dinnampi
tika-vin05t:238_1: hi cīvaraṃ sakasaññāya acchindato nissaggiyaṃ, aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ antamaso sūcimpi
tika-vin05t:238_2: acchindato dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana “bhante, tumhākaṃ idaṃ sāruppa”nti sayameva deti,
tika-vin05t:238_3: gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Atha pana “āvuso, mayaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘vattapaṭivattaṃ karissati, amhākaṃ
tika-vin05t:238_4: santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissati, dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇissatī’ti cīvaraṃ adamhā, so dāni tvaṃ
tika-vin05t:238_5: na vattaṃ karosi, na upajjhaṃ gaṇhāsi, na dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāsī”ti evamādīni vutto
tika-vin05t:238_6: “bhante, cīvaratthāya maññe bhaṇatha, idaṃ vo cīvara”nti deti, evampi vaṭṭati. Disāpakkamantaṃ
tika-vin05t:238_7: vā pana daharaṃ “nivattetha na”nti bhaṇati, so na nivattati, cīvare gahetvā nirundhathāti,
tika-vin05t:238_8: evañce nivattati, sādhu. Sace “pattacīvaratthāya maññe tumhe bhaṇatha, gaṇhatha na”nti
tika-vin05t:238_9: deti, evampi vaṭṭati. Vibbhamantaṃ vā disvā “mayaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘vattaṃ karissatī’ti pattacīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:238_10: adamhā, so dāni tvaṃ vibbhamitvā carasī”ti vadati, itaro “gaṇhatha tumhākaṃ pattacīvara”nti
tika-vin05t:238_11: deti, evampi vaṭṭati. “Mama santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhantasseva demi, aññattha gaṇhantassa
tika-vin05t:238_12: na demi, vattaṃ karontasseva demi, akarontassa na demi, dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantasseva
tika-vin05t:238_13: demi, apariyāpuṇantassa na demi, avibbhamantasseva demi, vibbhamantassa na demī”ti
tika-vin05t:238_14: evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭati, dadato dukkaṭaṃ, āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭati, vissajjetvā
tika-vin05t:238_15: dinnaṃ acchinditvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Ayaṃ tāva dāne vinicchayo.
tika-vin05t:240: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa vissāsaṃ gahetuṃ sandiṭṭho ca hoti, sambhatto ca, ālapito ca, jīvati ca, gahite ca attamano hotī”ti.
tika-vin05t:241_0: Tattha sandiṭṭhoti diṭṭhamattakamitto. Sambhattoti daḷhamitto. Ālapitoti “mama santakaṃ
tika-vin05t:241_1: yaṃ icchasi, taṃ gaṇheyyāsi, āpucchitvā gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti vutto. Jīvatīti
tika-vin05t:241_2: anuṭṭhānaseyyāya sayitopi yāvajīvitindriyupacchedaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Gahite ca attamanoti
tika-vin05t:241_3: gahite tuṭṭhacitto hoti. “Evarūpassa santakaṃ gahite me attamano bhavissatī”ti jānantena
tika-vin05t:241_4: gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Anavasesapariyādānavasena cetāni pañcaṅgāni vuttāni, vissāsaggāho
tika-vin05t:241_5: pana tīhi aṅgehi ruhati sandiṭṭho, jīvati, gahite attamano, sambhatto, jīvati, gahite
tika-vin05t:241_6: attamano, ālapito, jīvati, gahite attamanoti. Yo pana na jīvati, na ca gahite attamano
