tika-vin05t:241_7: hoti, tassa santakaṃ vissāsaggāhena gahitampi puna dātabbaṃ. Dadamānena ca matakadhanaṃ
tika-vin05t:241_8: tāva ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā, tesaṃ dātabbaṃ. Anattamanassa
tika-vin05t:241_9: santakaṃ tasseva dātabbaṃ, yo pana paṭhamaṃyeva “suṭṭhu kataṃ tayā mama santakaṃ
tika-vin05t:241_10: gaṇhantenā”ti vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā anumoditvā pacchā kenaci kāraṇena
tika-vin05t:241_11: kupito, paccāharāpetuṃ na labhati, yopi adātukāmo, cittena pana adhivāseti, na kiñci
tika-vin05t:241_12: vadati, sopi puna paccāharāpetuṃ na labhati. Yo pana “mayā tumhākaṃ santakaṃ gahitaṃ
tika-vin05t:241_13: vā paribhuttaṃ vā”ti vutte “gahitaṃ vā hotu paribhuttaṃ vā, mayā pana taṃ kenacideva
tika-vin05t:241_14: karaṇīyena ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ pākatikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadati, ayaṃ paccāharāpetuṃ labhati.
tika-vin05t:242_0: 71. Lābhassa pariṇāmananti idaṃ pana aññesaṃ atthāya pariṇatalābhassa attano aññassa
tika-vin05t:242_1: vā pariṇāmanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – saṅghassa pariṇataṃ sahadhammikānaṃ
tika-vin05t:242_2: vā gihīnaṃ vā antamaso mātusantakampi “idaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti saṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:242_3: ñatvā attano pariṇāmetvā gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, “imassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti
tika-vin05t:242_4: evaṃ aññassa pariṇāmentassa suddhikapācittiyaṃ. Tasmā yopi vassikasāṭikasamaye mātugharepi
tika-vin05t:242_5: saṅghassa pariṇataṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:242_6: parassa pariṇāmeti, suddhikapācittiyaṃ. Manussā “saṅghabhattaṃ karissāmā”ti sappitelādīni
tika-vin05t:242_7: āharanti, gilāno cepi bhikkhusaṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā kiñci yācati, nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:242_8: pācittiyameva. Sace pana so “tumhākaṃ sappiādīni ābhatāni atthī”ti pucchitvā “āma,
tika-vin05t:242_9: atthī”ti vutte “mayhampi dethā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Athāpi naṃ kukkuccāyantaṃ upāsakā
tika-vin05t:242_10: vadanti “saṅghopi amhehi dinnameva labhati, gaṇhatha, bhante”ti, evampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:243_0: Ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññavihāraṃ uddisitvā “asukasmiṃ nāma vihāre saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:243_1: dethā”ti pariṇāmeti, “kiṃ saṅghassa dānena, cetiyassa pūjaṃ karothā”ti evaṃ cetiyassa
tika-vin05t:243_2: vā pariṇāmeti, dukkaṭaṃ. Cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā gaṇassa
tika-vin05t:243_3: vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, dukkaṭameva. Niyametvā aññacetiyassa atthāya ropitamālāvacchato
tika-vin05t:243_4: aññacetiyamhi pupphampi āropetuṃ na vaṭṭati, ekassa cetiyassa pana chattaṃ vā paṭākaṃ
tika-vin05t:243_5: vā āropetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā sesaṃ aññacetiyassa dāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Antamaso sunakhassapi
tika-vin05t:243_6: pariṇataṃ “imassa sunakhassa mā dehi, etassa dehī”ti evaṃ aññapuggalassa pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin05t:243_7: dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana dāyakā “mayaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ kātukāmā, cetiyapūjaṃ kātukāmā, ekassa
tika-vin05t:243_8: bhikkhuno parikkhāraṃ dātukāmā, tumhākaṃ ruciyā dassāma, bhaṇatha kattha demā”ti
tika-vin05t:243_9: vadanti, evaṃ vutte tena bhikkhunā “yattha icchatha, tattha dethā”ti vattabbā. Sace
tika-vin05t:243_10: pana kevalaṃ “kattha demā”ti pucchanti, “yattha tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo paribhogaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:243_11: labheyya, paṭisaṅkhāraṃ vā labheyya, ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa, yattha vā pana tumhākaṃ
tika-vin05t:243_12: cittaṃ pasīdati, tattha dethā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:247_0: 72. Pathavīti dve pathavī jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavīti. Tattha jātā nāma pathavī
tika-vin05t:247_1: suddhapaṃsukā suddhamattikā appapāsāṇā appasakkharā appakaṭhalā appamarumbā appavālukā
tika-vin05t:247_2: yebhuyyenapaṃsukā yebhuyyenamattikā, adaḍḍhāpi vuccati “jātā pathavī”ti. Yopi paṃsupuñjo
tika-vin05t:247_3: vā mattikāpuñjo vā atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho, sopi vuccati “jātā pathavī”ti. Ajātā
tika-vin05t:247_4: nāma pathavī suddhapāsāṇā suddhasakkharā suddhakaṭhalā suddhamarumbā suddhavālukā
tika-vin05t:247_5: appapaṃsukā appamattikā yebhuyyenapāsāṇā yebhuyyenasakkharā yebhuyyenakaṭhalā yebhuyyenamarumbā
tika-vin05t:247_6: yebhuyyenavālukā, daḍḍhāpi vuccati “ajātā pathavī”ti. Yopi paṃsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo
tika-vin05t:247_7: vā omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho, sopi vuccati “ajātā pathavī”ti.
tika-vin05t:248_0: Tattha jātapathaviṃ khaṇantassa khaṇāpentassa vā pācittiyaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo
tika-vin05t:248_1: – sace sayaṃ khaṇati, pahāre pahāre pācittiyaṃ. Sace aññaṃ āṇāpeti, sakiṃ āṇatto
tika-vin05t:248_2: sacepi sakaladivasaṃ khaṇati, āṇāpakassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana kusīto hoti,
tika-vin05t:248_3: punappunaṃ āṇāpetabbo, taṃ āṇāpetvā khaṇāpentassa vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:248_4: “pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāhī”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Khatāyeva hi pokkharaṇī nāma hoti. Tasmā
tika-vin05t:248_5: ayaṃ kappiyavohāro. Esa nayo “vāpiṃ taḷākaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇā”tiādīsupi. “Imaṃ okāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:248_6: khaṇa, imasmiṃ okāse pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇā”ti vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati. “Kandaṃ khaṇa,
tika-vin05t:248_7: mūlaṃ khaṇā”ti aniyametvā vattuṃ vaṭṭati, “imaṃ valliṃ khaṇa, imasmiṃ okāse kandaṃ
tika-vin05t:248_8: vā mūlaṃ vā khaṇā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:249_0: 73. Pokkharaṇiṃ sodhentehi yo kuṭehi ussiñcituṃ sakkā hoti tanukakaddamo, taṃ apanetuṃ
tika-vin05t:249_1: vaṭṭati, bahalo na vaṭṭati. Ātapena sukkhakaddamo phalati, tatra yo heṭṭhā pathaviyā
tika-vin05t:249_2: asambandho, tameva apanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Udakena gataṭṭhāne udakapappaṭako nāma hoti,
tika-vin05t:249_3: vātapahārena calati, taṃ apanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Pokkharaṇīādīnaṃ taṭaṃ bhijjitvā udakasāmantā
tika-vin05t:249_4: patati. Sace omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhaṃ, chindituṃ bhindituṃ vā vaṭṭati, cātumāsato
tika-vin05t:249_5: uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana udakeyeva patati, devena atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhepi
tika-vin05t:250_0: Pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ soṇḍiṃ khaṇanti, sace tattha paṭhamameva sukhumarajaṃ patati, taṃ
tika-vin05t:250_1: devena ovaṭṭhaṃ hoti, cātumāsaccayena akappiyapathavīsaṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Udake pariyādinne
tika-vin05t:250_2: soṇḍiṃ sodhentehi vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace paṭhamameva udakena pūrati, pacchā rajaṃ
tika-vin05t:250_3: patati, taṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha hi deve vassantepi udakeyeva udakaṃ patati.
tika-vin05t:250_4: Piṭṭhipāsāṇe sukhumarajaṃ hoti, deve phusāyante allīyati, tampi cātumāsaccayena vikopetuṃ
tika-vin05t:250_5: na vaṭṭati. Akatapabbhāre vammiko uṭṭhito hoti, yathāsukhaṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin05t:250_6: abbhokāse uṭṭhahati, omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhoyeva vaṭṭati. Rukkhādīsu āruḷhaupacikamattikāyampi
tika-vin05t:250_7: eseva nayo. Gaṇḍuppādagūthamūsikukkaragokaṇṭakādīsupi eseva nayo. Gokaṇṭako nāma
tika-vin05t:250_8: gāvīnaṃ khuracchinnakaddamo vuccati. Sace pana heṭṭhimatalena bhūmisambandho hoti,
tika-vin05t:250_9: ekadivasampi na vaṭṭati. Kasitaṭṭhāne naṅgalacchinnamattikāpiṇḍaṃ gaṇhantassa eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:251_0: Purāṇasenāsanaṃ hoti acchadanaṃ vā vinaṭṭhacchadanaṃ vā atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:251_1: jātapathavīsaṅkhyameva gacchati, tato avasesaṃ chadaniṭṭhakaṃ vā gopānasīādikaṃ upakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:251_2: vā “iṭṭhakaṃ gaṇhāmi, gopānasiṃ bhittipādaṃ padarattharaṇaṃ pāsādatthambhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:251_3: saññāya gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati, tena saddhiṃ mattikā patati, anāpatti, bhittimattikaṃ gaṇhantassa
tika-vin05t:251_4: pana āpatti. Sace yā yā atintā, taṃ taṃ gaṇhāti, anāpatti. Antogehe mattikāpuñjo
tika-vin05t:251_5: hoti, tasmiṃ ekadivasaṃ ovaṭṭhe gehaṃ chādenti. Sace sabbo tinto, cātumāsaccayena
tika-vin05t:251_6: jātapathavīyeva. Athassa uparibhāgoyeva tinto, anto atinto, yattakaṃ tintaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin05t:251_7: kappiyakārakehi kappiyavohārena apanāmetvā sesaṃ yathāsukhaṃ vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭati udakena
tika-vin05t:251_8: temitattā. Ekābaddhāyeva hi jātapathavī hoti, na itarāti. Abbhokāse mattikāpākāro
tika-vin05t:251_9: hoti, atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho jātapathavīsaṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tattha laggapaṃsuṃ pana
tika-vin05t:251_10: allahatthena chupitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace iṭṭhakapākāro hoti, yebhuyyenakaṭhalaṭṭhāne
tika-vin05t:251_11: tiṭṭhati, yathāsukhaṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭati. Abbhokāse ṭhitamaṇḍapatthambhaṃ ito cito
tika-vin05t:251_12: ca sañcāletvā pathaviṃ vikopentena gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati, ujukameva uddharituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:251_13: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṃ sukkhakhāṇukaṃ vā gaṇhantassa eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:252_0: 74. Navakammatthaṃ thambhaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā daṇḍakehi uccāletvā pavaṭṭentā
tika-vin05t:252_1: gacchanti, tattha jātapathavī bhijjati, sace suddhacittā pavaṭṭenti, anāpatti. Atha
tika-vin05t:252_2: pana tena apadesena pathaviṃ bhinditukāmāyeva honti, āpatti. Sākhādīni kaḍḍhantānampi
tika-vin05t:252_3: pathaviyaṃ dārūni phālentānampi eseva nayo. Pathaviyaṃ aṭṭhisūcikaṇṭakādīsupi yaṃ
tika-vin05t:252_4: kiñci ākoṭetuṃ vā pavesetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati, “passāvadhārāya vegena pathaviṃ bhindissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:252_5: evaṃ passāvampi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Karontassa bhijjati, āpatti, “visamabhūmiṃ samaṃ
tika-vin05t:252_6: karissāmī”ti sammajjaniyā ghaṃsitumpi na vaṭṭati. Vattasīseneva hi sammajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:252_7: Keci kattarayaṭṭhiyā bhūmiṃ koṭṭenti, pādaṅguṭṭhakena vilikhanti, “caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:252_8: dassessāmā”ti punappunaṃ bhūmiṃ bhindantā caṅkamanti, sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati, vīriyasampaggahatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:252_9: pana samaṇadhammaṃ karontena suddhacittena caṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati. “Hatthaṃ khovissāmā”ti
tika-vin05t:252_10: pathaviyaṃ ghaṃsanti, na vaṭṭati, aghaṃsantena pana allahatthaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t:253_0: Keci kaṇḍukacchuādīhi ābādhikā chinnataṭādīsu aṅgapaccaṅgāni ghaṃsanti, na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:253_1: Jātapathaviṃ dahati vā dahāpeti vā, pācittiyaṃ, antamaso pattampi pacanto yattakesu
tika-vin05t:253_2: ṭhānesu aggiṃ deti vā dāpeti vā, tattakāni pācittiyāni, tasmā pattaṃ pacantenapi
tika-vin05t:253_3: pubbe pakkaṭṭhāneyeva pacitabbo. Adaḍḍhāya pathaviyā aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati, pattapacanakapālassa
tika-vin05t:253_4: pana upari aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dārūnaṃ upari ṭhapeti, so aggi tāni dahanto gantvā
tika-vin05t:253_5: pathaviṃ dahati, na vaṭṭati. Iṭṭhakakapālādīsupi eseva nayo. Tatrāpi hi iṭṭhakādīnaṃyeva
tika-vin05t:253_6: upari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Tesaṃ anupādānattā. Na hi tāni aggissa upādānasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin05t:253_7: gacchanti, sukkhakhāṇusukkharukkhādīsupi aggiṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana “pathaviṃ
tika-vin05t:253_8: appattameva nibbāpetvā gamissāmī”ti deti, vaṭṭati. Pacchā nibbāpetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:253_9: avisayattā anāpatti. Tiṇukkaṃ gahetvā gacchanto hatthe ḍayhamāne bhūmiyaṃ pāteti,
tika-vin05t:253_10: anāpatti. Patitaṭṭhāneyeva upādānaṃ datvā aggiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Daḍḍhapathaviyā ca
tika-vin05t:253_11: yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ usumāya anugataṃ, sabbaṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:254_0: Yo pana ajānanako bhikkhu araṇisahitena aggiṃ nibbattetvā hatthena ukkhipitvā “kiṃ
tika-vin05t:254_1: karomī”ti vadati, “jālehī”ti vattabbo. “Hattho ḍayhatī”ti vadati, “yathā na ḍayhati,
tika-vin05t:254_2: tathā karohī”ti vattabbo. “Bhūmiyaṃ pātehī”ti pana na vattabbo. Sace hatthe ḍayhamāne
tika-vin05t:254_3: pāteti, “pathaviṃ dahissāmī”ti apātitattā anāpatti, patitaṭṭhāne pana aggiṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin05t:254_4: vaṭṭati. “Imassa thambhassa āvāṭaṃ jāna, mahāmattikaṃ jāna, thusamattikaṃ jāna, mahāmattikaṃ
tika-vin05t:254_5: dehi, thusamattikaṃ dehi, mattikaṃ āhara, paṃsuṃ āhara, mattikāya attho, paṃsunā
tika-vin05t:254_6: attho, imassa thambhassa āvāṭaṃ kappiyaṃ karohi, imaṃ mattikaṃ kappiyaṃ karohi, imaṃ
tika-vin05t:254_7: paṃsuṃ kappiyaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ kappiyavohārena yaṃ kiñci kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Aññavihito
tika-vin05t:254_8: kenaci saddhiṃ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā pathaviṃ vilikhanto
tika-vin05t:254_9: tiṭṭhati, evaṃ asatiyā vilikhantassa bhindantassa vā anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:258_0: 75. Bhūtagāmoti pañcahi bījehi jātānaṃ rukkhalatādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tatrimāni
tika-vin05t:258_1: pañca bījāni – mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti. Tattha mūlabījaṃ
tika-vin05t:258_2: nāma haliddi siṅgiveraṃ vacā vacattaṃ ativisaṃ kaṭukarohiṇī usīraṃ bhaddamuttakaṃ,
tika-vin05t:258_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūle jāyanti mūle sañjāyanti, etaṃ mūlabījaṃ nāma. Khandhabījaṃ
tika-vin05t:258_4: nāma assattho nigrodho pilakkho udumbaro kacchako kapitthano, yāni vā panaññānipi
tika-vin05t:258_5: atthi khandhe jāyanti khandhe sañjāyanti, etaṃ khandhabījaṃ nāma. Phaḷubījaṃ nāma
tika-vin05t:258_6: ucchu veḷu naḷo, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi pabbe jāyanti pabbe sañjāyanti, etaṃ phaḷubījaṃ
tika-vin05t:258_7: nāma. Aggabījaṃ nāma ajjukaṃ phaṇijjakaṃ hiriveraṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi agge
tika-vin05t:258_8: jāyanti agge sañjāyanti, etaṃ aggabījaṃ nāma. Bījabījaṃ nāma pubbaṇṇaṃ aparaṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin05t:258_9: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi bīje jāyanti bīje sañjāyanti, etaṃ bījabījaṃ nāma. Tattha
tika-vin05t:258_10: bhūtagāme bhūtagāmasaññī chindati vā chindāpeti vā bhindati vā bhindāpeti vā pacati
tika-vin05t:258_11: vā pacāpeti vā, pācittiyaṃ. Bhūtagāmañhi vikopentassa pācittiyaṃ, bhūtagāmaparimocitaṃ
tika-vin05t:259_0: 76. Bījagāmabhūtagāmo nāmesa atthi udakaṭṭho, atthi thalaṭṭho. Tattha udakaṭṭho sāsapamattikatilabījakādibhedā
tika-vin05t:259_1: sapaṇṇikā ca apaṇṇikā ca sabbā sevālajāti, antamaso udakapappaṭakaṃ upādāya “bhūtagāmo”ti
tika-vin05t:259_2: veditabbo. Udakapappaṭako nāma upari thaddho pharusavaṇṇo heṭṭhā mudu nīlavaṇṇo hoti.
tika-vin05t:259_3: Tattha yassa sevālassa mūlaṃ oruhitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, tassa pathavī ṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin05t:259_4: Yo udake sañcarati, tassa udakaṃ. Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ yattha katthaci vikopentassa,
tika-vin05t:259_5: uddharitvā vā ṭhānantaraṃ saṅkāmentassa pācittiyaṃ, udake sañcarantaṃ vikopentasseva
tika-vin05t:259_6: pācittiyaṃ. Hatthehi pana ito cito caviyūhitvā nahāyituṃ vaṭṭati. Sakalañhi udakaṃ
tika-vin05t:259_7: tassa ṭhānaṃ, tasmā na so ettāvatā ṭhānantaraṃ saṅkāmito hoti. Udakato pana udakena
tika-vin05t:259_8: vinā sañcicca ukkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati, udakena saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā puna udake pakkhipituṃ
tika-vin05t:259_9: vaṭṭati. Uppalinipaduminiādīni jalajavallitiṇāni udakato uddharantassa vā tattheva
tika-vin05t:259_10: vikopentassa vā pācittiyaṃ, parehi uppāṭitāni vikopentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Tāni hi bījagāme
tika-vin05t:259_11: saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, tilabījakasāsapamattikasevālopi udakato uddhaṭo amilāto aggabījasaṅgahaṃ
tika-vin05t:259_13: vuttaṃ, tattha kāraṇaṃ na dissati. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sampuṇṇabhūtagāmaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin05t:259_14: tasmā dukkaṭa”nti vuttaṃ, tampi na sameti. Bhūtagāme hi pācittiyaṃ bījagāme dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin05t:259_15: vuttaṃ. Asampuṇṇabhūtagāmo nāma tatiyo koṭṭhāso neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāsu āgato,
tika-vin05t:259_16: athetaṃ bījagāmasaṅgahaṃ gamissatīti, tampi na yuttaṃ abhūtagāmamūlattā tādisassa
tika-vin05t:259_17: bījagāmassāti. Apica “garukalahukesu garuke ṭhātabba”nti etaṃ vinayalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:260_0: Thalaṭṭhe chinnarukkhānaṃ avasiṭṭho haritakhāṇu nāma hoti, tattha kakudhakarañjapiyaṅgupanasādīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:260_1: khāṇu uddhaṃ vaḍḍhati, so bhūtagāmena saṅgahito. Tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ khāṇu uddhaṃ na
tika-vin05t:260_2: vaḍḍhati, so bījagāmena saṅgahito. Kadaliyā pana aphalitāya khāṇu bhūtagāmena saṅgahito,
tika-vin05t:260_3: phalitāya bījagāmena. Kadalī pana phalitā yāva nīlapaṇṇā, tāva bhūtagāmeneva saṅgahitā,
tika-vin05t:260_4: tathā phalito veḷu. Yadā pana aggato paṭṭhāya sussati, tadā bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin05t:260_5: Katarabījagāmena? Phaḷubījagāmena. Kiṃ tato nibbattati? Na kiñci. Yadi hi nibbatteyya,
tika-vin05t:260_6: bhūtagāmena saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya. Indasālādirukkhe chinditvā rāsiṃ karonti, kiñcāpi
tika-vin05t:260_7: rāsikatadaṇḍakehi ratanappamāṇāpi sākhā nikkhamanti, bījagāmeneva pana saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin05t:260_8: Maṇḍapatthāya vā vatiatthāya vā valliāropanatthāya vā bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇanti, mūlesu
tika-vin05t:260_9: ceva paṇṇesu ca niggatesu puna bhūtagāmasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti, mūlamattesu pana paṇṇamattesu
tika-vin05t:261_0: Yāni kānici bījāni pathaviyaṃ vā udakena siñcitvā ṭhapitāni, kapālādīsu vā allapaṃsuṃ
tika-vin05t:261_1: pakkhipitvā nikkhittāni honti, sabbāni mūlamatte vā paṇṇamatte vā niggatepi bījāniyeva.
tika-vin05t:261_2: Sacepi mūlāni ca upari aṅkuro ca niggacchati, yāva aṅkuro harito na hoti, tāva bījāniyeva.
tika-vin05t:261_3: Muggādīnaṃ pana paṇṇesu uṭṭhitesu, vīhiādīnaṃ vā aṅkure harite nīlavaṇṇe jāte bhūtagāmasaṅgahaṃ
tika-vin05t:261_4: gacchanti. Tālaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭhamaṃ sūkaradāṭhā viya mūlaṃ niggacchati, niggatepi yāva
tika-vin05t:261_5: upari pattavaṭṭi na niggacchati, tāva bījagāmo nāmayeva. Nāḷikerassa tacaṃ bhinditvā
tika-vin05t:261_6: dantasūci viya aṅkuro niggacchati, yāva migasiṅgasadisā nīlapattavaṭṭi na hoti, tāva
tika-vin05t:261_7: bījagāmoyeva. Mūle aniggatepi tādisāya pattavaṭṭiyā jātāya amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin05t:262_0: Ambaṭṭhiādīni vīhiādīhi vinicchinitabbāni. Vandākā vā aññā vā yā kāci rukkhe jāyitvā
tika-vin05t:262_1: rukkhaṃ ottharati, rukkhova tassā ṭhānaṃ, taṃ vikopentassa vā tato uddharantassa
tika-vin05t:262_2: vā pācittiyaṃ. Ekā amūlikā latā hoti, aṅguliveṭhako viya vanappagumbadaṇḍake veṭheti,
tika-vin05t:262_3: tassāpi ayameva vinicchayo. Gehapamukhapākāravedikā cetiyādīsu nīlavaṇṇo sevālo hoti,
tika-vin05t:262_4: yāva dve tīṇi pattāni na sañjāyanti, tāva aggabījasaṅgahaṃ gacchati. Pattesu jātesu
tika-vin05t:262_5: pācittiyavatthu, tasmā tādisesu ṭhānesu sudhālepampi dātuṃ na vaṭṭati, anupasampannena
tika-vin05t:262_6: littassa upari sinehalepo dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace nidāghasamaye sukkhasevālo tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t:262_7: taṃ sammuñjanīādīhi ghaṃsitvā apanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Pānīyaghaṭādīnaṃ bahi sevālo dukkaṭavatthu,
tika-vin05t:262_8: anto abbohāriko, dantakaṭṭhapūvādīsu kaṇṇakampi abbohārikameva. Vuttañhetaṃ “sace
tika-vin05t:262_9: gerukaparikammakatā bhitti kaṇṇakitā hoti, coḷakaṃ temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā”ti.
tika-vin05t:263_0: 77. Pāsāṇajāti pāsāṇadaddusevālaseleyyakādīni aharitavaṇṇāni apattakāni ca dukkaṭavatthukāni.
tika-vin05t:263_1: Ahicchattakaṃ yāva makuṭaṃ hoti, tāva dukkaṭavatthu, pupphitakālato paṭṭhāya abbohārikaṃ,
tika-vin05t:263_2: allarukkhato pana ahicchattakaṃ gaṇhanto rukkhatacaṃ vikopeti, tasmā tattha pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:263_3: Rukkhapapaṭikāyapi eseva nayo. Yā pana indasālakakudhādīnaṃ papaṭikā rukkhato muccitvā
tika-vin05t:263_4: tiṭṭhati, taṃ gaṇhantassa anāpatti. Niyyāsampi rukkhato muccitvā ṭhitaṃ sukkharukkhe
tika-vin05t:263_5: vā laggaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati, allarukkhato na vaṭṭati. Lākhāyapi eseva nayo. Rukkhaṃ
tika-vin05t:263_6: cāletvā paṇḍupalāsaṃ vā pariṇatakaṇikārādipupphaṃ vā pātentassa pācittiyameva. Hatthakukkuccena
tika-vin05t:263_7: mudukesu indasālanuhīkhandhādīsu vā tatthajātakatālapaṇṇādīsu vā akkharaṃ chindantassapi
tika-vin05t:263_8: eseva nayo. Sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphaṃ ocinantānaṃ sākhaṃ onāmetvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tehi pana
tika-vin05t:263_9: pupphehi pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbaṃ, pānīyavāsatthikena sāmaṇeraṃ ukkhipitvā ocināpetabbāni.
tika-vin05t:263_10: Phalasākhāpi attanā khāditukāmena na onāmetabbā, sāmaṇeraṃ ukkhipitvā phalaṃ gāhāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:263_11: Kiñci gacchaṃ vālataṃ vā uppāṭentehi sāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:263_12: tesaṃ pana ussāhajananatthaṃ anākaḍḍhantena kaḍḍhanākāraṃ dassentena viya agge gahetuṃ
tika-vin05t:263_13: vaṭṭati. Yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhati, tesaṃ sākhaṃ makkhikabījanādīnaṃ atthāya kappiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:263_14: akārāpetvā gahitaṃ, tace vā patte vā antamaso nakhenapi vilekhantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Allasiṅgiverādīsupi
tika-vin05t:263_15: eseva nayo. Sace pana kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā sītale padese ṭhapitassa mūlaṃ sañjāyati,
tika-vin05t:263_16: uparibhāge chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace aṅkuro jāyati, heṭṭhābhāge chindituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:263_17: mūle ca aṅkure ca jāte na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:264_0: “Sammuñjanīsalākāyapi tiṇāni chindissāmī”ti bhūmiyaṃ sammajjanto sayaṃ vā chindati,
tika-vin05t:264_1: aññena vā chedāpeti, na vaṭṭati. Caṅkamantopi “chijjanakaṃ chijjatu, bhijjanakaṃ
tika-vin05t:264_2: bhijjatu, caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmī”ti sañcicca pādehi akkamanto tiṇavalliādīni
tika-vin05t:264_3: sayaṃ vā chindati, aññena vā chedāpeti, na vaṭṭati. Sacepi hi tiṇaṃ vā lataṃ vā ganthiṃ
tika-vin05t:264_4: karontassa bhijjati, ganthimpi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tālarukkhādīsu pana corānaṃ anāruhaṇatthāya
tika-vin05t:264_5: dārumakkaṭakaṃ ākoṭenti, kaṇṭake bandhanti, bhikkhussa evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin05t:264_6: dārumakkaṭako rukkhe allīnamattova hoti, rukkhaṃ na pīḷeti, vaṭṭati. “Rukkhaṃ chinda,
tika-vin05t:264_7: lataṃ chinda, kandaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā uppāṭehī”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati aniyamitattā. Niyametvā
tika-vin05t:264_8: pana “imaṃ rukkhaṃ chindā”tiādi vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Nāmaṃ gahetvāpi “ambarukkhaṃ caturaṃsavalliṃ
tika-vin05t:264_9: āluvakandaṃ muñjatiṇaṃ asukarukkhacchalliṃ chinda bhinda uppāṭehī”tiādivacanampi
tika-vin05t:264_10: aniyamitameva hoti. “Imaṃ ambarukkha”ntiādivacanameva hi niyamitaṃ nāma, taṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:264_11: Pattampi pacitukāmo tiṇādīnaṃ upari sañcicca aggiṃ karonto sayaṃ vā pacati, aññena
tika-vin05t:264_12: vā pacāpeti, na vaṭṭati. Aniyametvā pana “mugge paca, māse pacā”tiādi vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:264_13: “ime mugge pacā”ti evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Imaṃ mūlabhesajjaṃ jāna, imaṃ mūlaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:264_14: paṇṇaṃ vā dehi, imaṃ rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā āhara, iminā pupphena phalena vā attho,
tika-vin05t:264_15: imaṃ rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā phalaṃ vā kappiyaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ pana vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Ettāvatā
tika-vin05t:265: 78. Paribhuñjantena pana bījagāmaparimocanatthaṃ puna kappiyaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ. Kappiyakaraṇañcettha iminā suttānusārena veditabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:266: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ aggiparijitaṃ satthaparijitaṃ nakhaparijitaṃ abījaṃ nibbaṭṭabījaññeva pañcama”nti.
tika-vin05t:267_0: Tattha aggiparijitanti agginā parijitaṃ adhibhūtaṃ daḍḍhaṃ phuṭṭhanti attho. Satthaparijitanti
tika-vin05t:267_1: satthena parijitaṃ adhibhūtaṃ chinnaṃ viddhaṃ vāti attho. Esa nayo nakhaparijite.
tika-vin05t:267_2: Abījanibbaṭṭabījāni sayameva kappiyāni. Agginā kappiyaṃ karontena kaṭṭhaggigomayaggiādīsu
tika-vin05t:267_3: yena kenaci antamaso lohakhaṇḍenapi ādittena kappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ, tañca kho ekadese
tika-vin05t:267_4: phusantena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ. Satthena karontena yassa kassaci lohamayasatthassa
tika-vin05t:267_5: antamaso sūcinakhacchedanānampi tuṇḍena vā dhārāya vā chedaṃ vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena
tika-vin05t:267_6: “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ. Nakhena kappiyaṃ karontena pūtinakhena na kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:267_7: manussānaṃ pana sīhabyagghadīpimakkaṭānaṃ sakuntānañca nakhā tikhiṇā honti, tehi
tika-vin05t:267_8: kātabbaṃ. Assamahiṃsasūkaramigagorūpādīnaṃ khurā atikhiṇā, tehi na kātabbaṃ, katampi
tika-vin05t:267_9: akataṃ hoti. Hatthinakhā pana khurā na honti, tehi ca vaṭṭati. Yehi pana kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:267_10: tehi tatthajātakehipi uddharitvā gahitakepi chedaṃ vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena “kappiya”nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:268_0: Tattha sacepi bījānaṃ pabbatamatto rāsi, rukkhasahassaṃ vā chinditvā ekābaddhaṃ katvā
tika-vin05t:268_1: ucchūnaṃ vā mahābhāro bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti, ekasmiṃ bīje vā rukkhasākhāya vā ucchumhi
tika-vin05t:268_2: vā kappiye kate sabbaṃ kataṃ hoti. Ucchū ca dārūni ca ekato baddhāni honti, “ucchuṃ
tika-vin05t:268_3: kappiyaṃ karissāmī”ti dāruṃ vijjhati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Sace pana yāya rajjuyā vā valliyā
tika-vin05t:268_4: vā baddhāni, taṃ vijjhati, na vaṭṭati. Ucchukhaṇḍānaṃ pacchiṃ pūretvā āharanti, ekasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:268_5: khaṇḍe kappiye kate sabbaṃ katameva. Marīcapakkādīhi ca missetvā bhattaṃ āharanti,
tika-vin05t:268_6: “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti vutte sacepi bhattasitthe vijjhati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Tilataṇḍulādīsupi
tika-vin05t:268_7: eseva nayo. Yāguyā pakkhittāni pana ekābaddhāni hutvā na santiṭṭhanti, tattha ekamekaṃ
tika-vin05t:268_8: vijjhitvā kappiyaṃ kātabbameva. Kapitthaphalādīnaṃ anto miñjaṃ kaṭāhaṃ muñcitvā sañcarati,
tika-vin05t:268_9: bhindāpetvā kappiyaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ, ekābaddhaṃ hoti, kaṭāhepi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:272_0: 79. Duvidhaṃ sahaseyyakanti “yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ
tika-vin05t:272_1: sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya,
tika-vin05t:272_2: pācittiya”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ sahaseyyasikkhāpadadvayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo
tika-vin05t:272_3: – anupasampannena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ rattīnaṃ upari catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye
tika-vin05t:272_5: vā ekakkhaṇe vā nipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ. Tattha chadanaṃ anāhacca diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena
tika-vin05t:272_6: pākārādinā yena kenaci paricchannampi sabbaparicchannamicceva veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ senāsanaṃ
tika-vin05t:272_7: upari pañcahi chadanehi aññena vā kenaci sabbameva paricchannaṃ, idaṃ sabbacchannaṃ
tika-vin05t:272_8: nāma senāsanaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana pākaṭavohāraṃ gahetvā vācuggatavasena “sabbacchannaṃ
tika-vin05t:272_9: nāma pañcahi chadanehi channa”nti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, atha kho dussakuṭiyaṃ sayantassapi
tika-vin05t:272_10: na sakkā anāpatti kātuṃ, tasmā yaṃ kiñci paṭicchādanasamatthaṃ idha chadanañca paricchannañca
tika-vin05t:272_11: veditabbaṃ. Pañcavidhacchadaneyeva hi gayhamāne padaracchannepi sahaseyyā na bhaveyya,
tika-vin05t:272_12: tasmā yaṃ senāsanaṃ bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāvachadanaṃ āhacca pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci
tika-vin05t:272_13: antamaso vatthenapi parikkhittaṃ, idaṃ sabbaparicchannaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ. Chadanaṃ
tika-vin05t:272_14: anāhacca sabbantimena pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā parikkhittampi
tika-vin05t:272_15: sabbaparicchannameva. Yassa pana upari bahutaraṃ ṭhānaṃ channaṃ, appaṃ acchannaṃ,
tika-vin05t:272_16: samantato vā bahutaraṃ parikkhittaṃ, appaṃ aparikkhittaṃ, idaṃ yebhuyyenachannaṃ
tika-vin05t:273_0: Iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmiko pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti, satagabbhaṃ
tika-vin05t:273_1: vā catusālaṃ, ekaṃ senāsanamicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Evarūpe senāsane anupasampannena
tika-vin05t:273_2: saddhiṃ catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye nipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sace pana
tika-vin05t:273_3: sambahulā sāmaṇerā, eko bhikkhu, sāmaṇeragaṇanāya pācittiyā. Te ce uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t:273_4: nipajjanti, tesaṃ payoge payoge bhikkhussa āpatti, bhikkhussa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjane
tika-vin05t:273_5: pana bhikkhusseva payogena bhikkhussa āpatti. Sace sambahulā bhikkhū, eko sāmaṇero,
tika-vin05t:273_6: ekopi sabbesaṃ āpattiṃ karoti. Tassa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjanenapi bhikkhūnaṃ āpattiyeva.
tika-vin05t:274_0: 80. Apicettha ekāvāsādikampi catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yo hi ekasmiṃ āvāse ekeneva anupasampannena
tika-vin05t:274_1: saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassa catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya devasikā āpatti.
tika-vin05t:274_2: Yopi ekasmiṃyeva āvāse nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t:274_3: Yopi nānāāvāsesu ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṃ tirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t:274_4: Yopi nānāāvāsesu nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṃ yojanasatampi gantvā sahaseyyaṃ kappeti,
tika-vin05t:275_0: Ayañca sahaseyyāpatti nāma “bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:275_1: antamaso pārājikavatthubhūtena tiracchānagatenapi saddhiṃ hoti, tasmā sacepi godhābiḷālamaṅgusādīsu
tika-vin05t:275_2: koci pavisitvā bhikkhuno vasanasenāsane ekūpacāraṭṭhāne sayati, sahaseyyāva hoti.
tika-vin05t:275_3: Yadi pana thambhānaṃ upari katapāsādassa uparimatalena saddhiṃ asambaddhabhittikassa
tika-vin05t:275_4: bhittiyā upariṭhitasusiratulāsīsassa susirena pavisitvā tulāya abbhantare sayitvā
tika-vin05t:275_5: teneva susirena nikkhamitvā gacchati, heṭṭhāpāsāde sayitabhikkhussa anāpatti. Sace
tika-vin05t:275_6: chadane chiddaṃ hoti, tena pavisitvā antochadane vasitvā teneva pakkamati, nānūpacāre
tika-vin05t:275_7: uparimatale chadanabbhantare sayitassa āpatti, heṭṭhimatale sayitassa anāpatti. Sace
tika-vin05t:275_8: antopāsādeneva ārohitvā sabbatalāni paribhuñjanti, ekūpacārāni honti, tesu yattha
tika-vin05t:275_9: katthaci sayitassa āpatti, sabhāsaṅkhepena kate aḍḍhakuṭṭake senāsane sayitassa tulāvāḷasaghāṭādīsu
tika-vin05t:275_10: kapotādayo sayanti, āpattiyeva. Parikkhepassa bahigate nibbakosabbhantare sayanti,
tika-vin05t:275_11: anāpatti. Parimaṇḍalaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā ekacchadanāya gabbhamālāya satagabbhaṃ cepi
tika-vin05t:275_12: senāsanaṃ hoti, tatra ce ekena sādhāraṇadvārena pavisitvā visuṃ pākārena aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre
tika-vin05t:275_13: sabbagabbhepi pavisanti, ekagabbhepi anupasampanne nipanne sabbagabbhesu nipannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:275_14: āpatti. Sace sapamukhā gabbhā honti, pamukhañca upari acchannaṃ, pamukhe sayito gabbhe
tika-vin05t:275_15: sayitānaṃ āpattiṃ na karoti. Sace pana gabbhacchadaneneva saddhiṃ sambandhachadanaṃ,
tika-vin05t:275_16: tatra sayito sabbesaṃ āpattiṃ karoti. Kasmā? Sabbacchannattā ca sabbaparicchannattā
tika-vin05t:276_0: 81. Yepi ekasāladvisālatisālacatusālasannivesā mahāpāsādā ekasmiṃ okāse pāde dhovitvā
tika-vin05t:276_1: paviṭṭhena sakkā honti sabbattha anuparigantuṃ, tesupi sahaseyyāpattiyā na muccati.
tika-vin05t:276_2: Sace tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne upacāraṃ paricchinditvā katā honti, ekūpacāraṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin05t:276_3: āpatti. Dvīhi dvārehi yuttassa sudhāchadanamaṇḍapassa majjhe pākāraṃ karonti, ekena
tika-vin05t:276_4: dvārena pavisitvā ekasmiṃ paricchede anupasampanno sayati, ekasmiṃ bhikkhu, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:276_5: Pākāre godhādīnaṃ pavisanamattaṃ chiddaṃ hoti, ekasmiñca paricchede godhā sayanti,
tika-vin05t:276_6: anāpattiyeva. Na hi chiddena gehaṃ ekūpacāraṃ nāma hoti. Sace pākāramajjhe chinditvā
tika-vin05t:276_7: dvāraṃ yojenti, ekūpacāratāya āpatti. Taṃ dvāraṃ kavāṭena pidahitvā sayanti, āpattiyeva.
tika-vin05t:276_8: Na hi dvārapidahanena gehaṃ nānūpacāraṃ nāma hoti, dvāraṃ vā advāraṃ. Kavāṭañhi saṃvaraṇavivaraṇehi
tika-vin05t:276_9: yathāsukhaṃ vaḷañjanatthāya kataṃ, na vaḷañjupacchedanatthāya. Sace taṃ dvāraṃ puna
tika-vin05t:276_10: iṭṭhakāhi pidahanti, advāraṃ hoti, purime nānūpacārabhāveyeva tiṭṭhati. Dīghapamukhaṃ
tika-vin05t:276_11: cetiyagharaṃ hoti, ekaṃ kavāṭaṃ anto, ekaṃ bahi, dvinnaṃ kavāṭānaṃ antare anupasampanno
tika-vin05t:277_0: Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – senāsanaṃ khuddakaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ vā, aññena saddhiṃ sambandhaṃ
tika-vin05t:277_1: vā asambandhaṃ vā, dīghaṃ vā vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā, ekabhūmikaṃ vā anekabhūmikaṃ
tika-vin05t:277_2: vā, yaṃ yaṃ ekūpacāraṃ, sabbattha sahaseyyāpatti hotīti. Ettha ca yena kenaci paṭicchadanena
tika-vin05t:277_4: pācittiyaṃ, sabbacchanne yebhuyyenaparicchanne pācittiyaṃ, sabbacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne
tika-vin05t:277_5: pācittiyaṃ, yebhuyyenachanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne pācittiyaṃ, sabbaparicchanne yebhuyyenachanne
tika-vin05t:277_6: pācittiyaṃ, sabbaparicchanne upaḍḍhacchanne pācittiyaṃ, yebhuyyenaparicchanne upaḍḍhacchanne
tika-vin05t:277_7: pācittiyanti aṭṭha pācittiyāni. Upaḍḍhacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne dukkaṭaṃ, sabbacchanne
tika-vin05t:277_8: cūḷakaparicchanne dukkaṭaṃ, yebhuyyenachanne cūḷakaparicchanne dukkaṭaṃ, sabbaparicchanne
tika-vin05t:277_9: cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭaṃ, yebhuyyenaparicchanne cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭanti pañca dukkaṭāni
tika-vin05t:277_10: veditabbāni. Sabbacchanne sabbaaparicchanne, sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyenaacchanne
tika-vin05t:277_12: cūḷakaparicchanne ca anāpatti. Mātugāmena saha nipajjantassapi ayameva vinicchayo.
tika-vin05t:277_13: Ayañhettha viseso – anupasampannena saddhiṃ nipajjantassa catutthadivase āpatti,
tika-vin05t:277_14: mātugāmena saddhiṃ paṭhamadivaseti. Yakkhipetīhi pana dissamānakarūpāhi tiracchānagatitthiyā
tika-vin05t:277_15: ca methunadhammavatthubhūtāya eva dukkaṭaṃ, sesāhi anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:281: 82. Vihāre saṅghike seyyaṃ, santharitvāna pakkamoti saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvāna aññattha vasitukāmatāya vihārato pakkamanaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo –
tika-vin05t:282: “Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya na uddharāpeyya anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiya”nti –
tika-vin05t:283_0: Vacanato saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ sayaṃ santharitvā aññena vā santharāpetvā uddharaṇādīni
tika-vin05t:283_1: akatvā parikkhittassa ārāmassa parikkhepaṃ, aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:284_0: Tattha seyyā nāma bhisi cimilikā uttarattharaṇaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ taṭṭikā cammakhaṇḍo
tika-vin05t:284_1: nisīdanaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāroti dasavidhā. Tattha bhisīti mañcakabhisi
tika-vin05t:284_2: vā pīṭhakabhisi vā. Cimilikā nāma sudhādiparikammakatāya bhūmiyā vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:284_3: katā, taṃ heṭṭhā pattharitvā upari kaṭasārakaṃ pattharanti. Uttarattharaṇaṃ nāma
tika-vin05t:284_4: mañcapīṭhānaṃ upari attharitabbakapaccattharaṇaṃ. Bhūmattharaṇaṃ nāma bhūmiyaṃ attharitabbā
tika-vin05t:284_5: kaṭasārakādivikati. Taṭṭikā nāma tālapaṇṇehi vā vākehi vā katataṭṭikā. Cammakhaṇḍo
tika-vin05t:284_6: nāma sīhabyagghadīpitaracchacammādīsupi yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu hi senāsanaparibhoge
tika-vin05t:284_7: paṭikkhittacammaṃ na dissati, tasmā sīhabyagghacammādīnaṃ pariharaṇeyeva paṭikkhepo
tika-vin05t:284_8: veditabbo. Nisīdananti sadasaṃ veditabbaṃ. Paccattharaṇanti pāvāro kojavoti ettakameva
tika-vin05t:284_9: vuttaṃ. Tiṇasanthāroti yesaṃ kesañci tiṇānaṃ santhāro. Esa nayo paṇṇasanthārepi.
tika-vin05t:284_10: Evaṃ pana imaṃ dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ saṅghike vihāre santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā
tika-vin05t:284_11: pakkamantena āpucchitvā pakkamitabbaṃ, āpucchantena ca bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo,
tika-vin05t:284_12: tasmiṃ asati sāmaṇero, tasmiṃ asati ārāmiko, tasmiṃ asati yena vihāro kārito, so
tika-vin05t:284_13: vihārasāmiko, tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo, tasmimpi asati catūsu pāsāṇesu
tika-vin05t:284_14: mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā mañce avasesamañcapīṭhāni āropetvā upari bhisiādikaṃ dasavidhampi
tika-vin05t:284_15: seyyaṃ rāsiṃ katvā dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānāni pidahitvā
tika-vin05t:285_0: Sace pana senāsanaṃ ovassati, chadanatthañca tiṇaṃ vā iṭṭhakā vā ānītā honti, sace
tika-vin05t:285_1: ussahati, chādetabbaṃ. No ce sakkoti, yo okāso anovassako, tattha mañcapīṭhādīni
tika-vin05t:285_2: nikkhipitvā gantabbaṃ. Sace sabbampi ovassati, ussahantena antogāme upāsakānaṃ ghare
tika-vin05t:285_3: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace tepi “saṅghikaṃ nāma, bhante, bhāriyaṃ, aggidāhādīnaṃ bhāyāmā”ti
tika-vin05t:285_4: na sampaṭicchanti, abbhokāsepi pāsāṇānaṃ upari mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva
tika-vin05t:285_5: nikkhipitvā tiṇehi ca paṇṇehi ca paṭicchādetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Yañhi tattha aṅgamattampi
tika-vin05t:285_6: avasissati, taṃ aññesaṃ tattha āgatabhikkhūnaṃ upakāraṃ bhavissatīti. Uddharitvā
tika-vin05t:285_7: gacchantena pana mañcapīṭhakavāṭaṃ sabbaṃ apanetvā saṃharitvā cīvaravaṃse laggetvāva
tika-vin05t:285_8: gantabbaṃ. Pacchā āgantvā vasanakabhikkhunāpi puna mañcapīṭhaṃ ṭhapayitvā gacchantena
tika-vin05t:285_9: tatheva kātabbaṃ. Antokuṭṭato seyyaṃ bahikuṭṭe paññapetvā vasantena gamanakāle puna
tika-vin05t:285_10: gahitaṭṭhāneyeva paṭisāmetabbaṃ. Uparipāsādato oropetvā heṭṭhāpāsāde vasantassapi
tika-vin05t:285_11: eseva nayo. Rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā bahigamanakāle puna gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:286_0: 83. Senāsanesu pana ayaṃ āpucchitabbānāpucchitabbavinicchayo – yā tāva bhūmiyaṃ dīghasālā
tika-vin05t:286_1: vā paṇṇasālā vā hoti, yaṃ vā rukkhatthambhesu katagehaṃ upacikānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:286_2: hoti, tato pakkamantena tāva āpucchitvāva pakkamitabbaṃ. Tasmiñhi katipayāni divasāni
tika-vin05t:286_3: ajaggiyamāne vammikāva santiṭṭhanti. Yaṃ pana pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu
tika-vin05t:286_4: vā katasenāsanaṃ siluccayaleṇaṃ vā sudhālittasenāsanaṃ vā, yattha yattha upacikāsaṅkā
tika-vin05t:286_5: natthi, tato pakkamantassa āpucchitvāpi anāpucchitvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭati, āpucchanaṃ
tika-vin05t:286_6: pana vattaṃ. Sace tādisepi senāsane ekena passena upacikā ārohanti, āpucchitvāva
tika-vin05t:286_7: gantabbaṃ. Yo pana āgantuko bhikkhu saṅghikasenāsanaṃ gahetvāva santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anuvattanto
tika-vin05t:286_8: attano senāsanaṃ aggahetvā vasati, yāva so na gaṇhāti, tāva taṃ senāsanaṃ purimabhikkhusseva
tika-vin05t:286_9: palibodho. Yadā pana so senāsanaṃ gahetvā attano issariyena vasati, tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t:286_10: āgantukasseva palibodho. Sace ubhopi vibhajitvā gaṇhanti, ubhinnampi palibodho.
tika-vin05t:287_0: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ – sace dve tayo ekato hutvā paññapenti, gamanakāle sabbehi
tika-vin05t:287_1: āpucchitabbaṃ. Tesu ce paṭhamaṃ gacchanto “pacchimo jaggissatī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:287_2: vaṭṭati, pacchimassa ābhogena mutti natthi. Bahū ekaṃ pesetvā santharāpenti, gamanakāle
tika-vin05t:287_3: sabbehi vā āpucchitabbaṃ, ekaṃ vā pesetvā āpucchitabbaṃ. Aññato mañcapīṭhādīni ānetvā
tika-vin05t:287_4: aññatra vasitvā gamanakāle tattheva netabbāni. Sace aññato ānetvā vasamānassa añño
tika-vin05t:287_5: vuḍḍhataro āgacchati, na paṭibāhitabbo, “mayā, bhante, aññāvāsato ānītaṃ, pākatikaṃ
tika-vin05t:287_6: kareyyāthā”ti vattabbaṃ. Tena “evaṃ karissāmī”ti sampaṭicchite itarassa gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:287_7: Evaṃ aññattha haritvāpi saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa hi naṭṭhaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:287_8: vā corehi vā haṭaṃ gīvā neva hoti, puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa pana gīvā
tika-vin05t:287_9: hoti. Aññassa mañcapīṭhaṃ pana saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena vā paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin05t:287_10: naṭṭhaṃ gīvāyeva. Antovihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā “ajjeva āgantvā paṭijaggissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:287_11: evaṃ sāpekkho nadīpāraṃ gāmantaraṃ vā gantvā yatthassa gamanacittaṃ uppannaṃ, tattheva
tika-vin05t:287_12: ṭhito kañci pesetvā āpucchati, nadīpūrarājacorādīsu vā kenaci palibodho hoti upadduto,
tika-vin05t:288_0: Vihārassa upacāre pana upaṭṭhānasālāya vā maṇḍape vā rukkhamūle vā seyyaṃ santharitvā
tika-vin05t:288_1: vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddharati na uddharāpeti anāpucchaṃ vā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:288_2: dukkaṭaṃ. Vuttappakārañhi dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ antogabbhādimhi guttaṭṭhāne paññapetvā
tika-vin05t:288_3: gacchantassa yasmā seyyāpi senāsanampi upacikāhi palujjati, vammikarāsiyeva hoti,
tika-vin05t:288_4: tasmā pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Bahi pana upaṭṭhānasālādīsu paññapetvā gacchantassa seyyāmattameva
tika-vin05t:288_5: nasseyya ṭhānassa aguttatāya, na senāsanaṃ, tasmā ettha dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Mañcapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:288_6: pana yasmā na sakkā sahasā upacikāhi khāyituṃ, tasmā taṃ vihārepi santharitvā gacchantassa
tika-vin05t:288_7: dukkaṭaṃ. Vihārassūpacāre upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ maṇḍape rukkhamūlepi santharitvā pakkamantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin05t:289_0: 84. “Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse
tika-vin05t:289_1: santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya na uddharāpeyya anāpucchaṃ
tika-vin05t:289_2: vā gaccheyya, pācittiya”nti vacanato saṅghikāni pana mañcapīṭhādīni cattāri ajjhokāse
tika-vin05t:289_3: santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā uddharaṇādīni akatvā “ajjeva āgamissāmī”ti gacchantassapi
tika-vin05t:289_4: thāmamajjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātātikkame pācittiyaṃ. Ettha kocchaṃ nāma vākamayaṃ
tika-vin05t:289_5: vā usīramayaṃ vā muñjamayaṃ vā pabbajamayaṃ vā heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthataṃ majjhe
tika-vin05t:289_6: saṃkhittaṃ paṇavasaṇṭhānaṃ katvā baddhaṃ. Taṃ kira majjhe sīhabyagghacammaparikkhittampi
tika-vin05t:289_7: karonti, akappiyacammaṃ nāmettha natthi. Senāsanañhi sovaṇṇamayampi vaṭṭati, tasmā taṃ mahagghaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:290_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭha māse avassikasaṅkete maṇḍape vā rukkhamūle vā yattha
tika-vin05t:290_1: kākā vā kulalā vā na ūhadanti, tattha senāsanaṃ nikkhipitu”nti vacanato pana vassikavassānamāsāti
tika-vin05t:290_2: evaṃ apaññāte cattāro hemantike, cattāro gimhiketi aṭṭha māse sākhāmaṇḍape vā padaramaṇḍape
tika-vin05t:290_3: vā rukkhamūle vā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati. Yasmiṃ pana kākā vā kulalā vā aññe vā sakuntā
tika-vin05t:290_4: dhuvanivāsena kulāvake katvā vasanti, tassa rukkhassa mūle na nikkhipitabbaṃ. “Aṭṭha
tika-vin05t:290_5: māse”ti vacanato yesu janapadesu vassakāle na vassati, tesu cattāro māse nikkhipituṃ
tika-vin05t:290_6: na vaṭṭatiyeva. “Avassikasaṅkete”ti vacanato yattha hemante devo vassati, tattha
tika-vin05t:290_7: hemantepi ajjhokāse nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati. Gimhe pana sabbattha vigatavalāhakaṃ
tika-vin05t:290_8: visuddhaṃ nataṃ hoti, evarūpe kāle kenacideva karaṇīyena ajjhokāse mañcapīṭhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:291_0: 85. Abbhokāsikenapi vattaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Tassa hi sace puggalikamañcako atthi, tattheva
tika-vin05t:291_1: sayitabbaṃ. Saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantena vettena vā vākena vā vītamañcako gahetabbo, tasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:291_2: asati purāṇamañcako gahetabbo, tasmiṃ asati navavāyimo vā onaddhako vā gahetabbo.
tika-vin05t:291_3: Gahetvā pana “ahaṃ ukkaṭṭharukkhamūliko ukkaṭṭhaabbhokāsiko”ti cīvarakuṭimpi akatvā
tika-vin05t:291_4: asamaye ajjhokāse vā rukkhamūle vā paññapetvā nipajjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana catugguṇenapi
tika-vin05t:291_5: cīvarena katā kuṭi atementaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti, sattāhavaddalikādīni bhavanti,
tika-vin05t:291_6: bhikkhuno kāyānugatikattā vaṭṭati. Araññe paṇṇakuṭīsu vasantānaṃ sīlasampadāya pasannacittā
tika-vin05t:291_7: manussā navaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ denti “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti, vasitvā gacchantehi
tika-vin05t:291_8: sāmantavihāre sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ pesetvā gantabbaṃ, sabhāgānaṃ abhāvena anovassake
tika-vin05t:291_9: nikkhipitvā gantabbaṃ, anovassake asati rukkhe laggetvā gantabbaṃ. Cetiyaṅgaṇe sammajjaniṃ
tika-vin05t:291_10: gahetvā bhojanasālaṅgaṇaṃ vā uposathāgāraṅgaṇaṃ vā pariveṇadivāṭṭhānaaggisālādīsu
tika-vin05t:291_11: vā aññataraṃ sammajjitvā dhovitvā puna sammajjanimāḷakeyeva ṭhapetabbā. Uposathāgārādīsu
tika-vin05t:291_12: aññatarasmiṃ gahetvā avasesāni sammajjantassapi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:292_0: Yo pana bhikkhācāramaggaṃ sammajjanto gantukāmo hoti, tena sammajjitvā sace antarāmagge
tika-vin05t:292_1: sālā atthi, tattha ṭhapetabbā. Sace natthi, valāhakānaṃ anuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin05t:292_2: “yāvāhaṃ gāmato nikkhamāmi, tāva na vassissatī”ti jānantena yattha katthaci nikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:292_3: puna paccāgacchantena pākatikaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbā. “Sace vassissatīti jānanto ajjhokāse
tika-vin05t:292_4: ṭhapeti, dukkaṭa”nti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sace pana tatra tatreva sammajjanatthāya
tika-vin05t:292_5: sammajjanī nikkhittā hoti, taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā tatra tatreva nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:292_6: āsanasālaṃ sammajjantena vattaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Tatridaṃ vattaṃ – majjhato paṭṭhāya pādaṭṭhānābhimukhā
tika-vin05t:292_7: vālikā haritabbā, kacavaraṃ hatthehi gahetvā bahi chaḍḍetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:293_0: 86. Sace vuttappakāraṃ catubbidhampi saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ ajjhokāse vā rukkhamūle
tika-vin05t:293_1: vā maṇḍape vā anupasampannena santharāpeti, yena santharāpitaṃ, tassa palibodho.
tika-vin05t:293_2: Sace pana upasampannena santharāpeti, yena santhataṃ, tassa palibodho. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo
tika-vin05t:293_3: – thero bhojanasālāyaṃ bhattakiccaṃ katvā daharaṃ āṇāpeti “gaccha divāṭṭhāne mañcapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:293_4: paññapehī”ti. So tathā katvā nisinno, thero yathāruci vicaritvā tattha gantvā thavikaṃ
tika-vin05t:293_5: vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā ṭhapeti, tato paṭṭhāya therassa palibodho. Nisīditvā sayaṃ gacchanto
tika-vin05t:293_6: neva uddharati na uddharāpeti, leḍḍupātātikkame pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana thero tattha
tika-vin05t:293_7: thavikaṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā aṭṭhapetvā caṅkamantova daharaṃ “gaccha tva”nti bhaṇati,
tika-vin05t:293_8: tena “idaṃ, bhante, mañcapīṭha”nti ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace thero vattaṃ jānāti, “tvaṃ
tika-vin05t:293_9: gaccha, ahaṃ pākatikaṃ karissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace bālo hoti anuggahitavatto, “gaccha,
tika-vin05t:293_10: mā idha tiṭṭha, neva nisīdituṃ na nipajjituṃ demī”ti daharaṃ tajjetiyeva. Daharena
tika-vin05t:293_11: “bhante, sukhaṃ sayathā”ti kappaṃ labhitvā vanditvā gantabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ gate therasseva
tika-vin05t:294_0: Atha pana āṇattikkhaṇeyeva daharo “mayhaṃ bhaṇḍe bhaṇḍadhovanādi kiñci karaṇīyaṃ
tika-vin05t:294_1: atthī”ti vadati, thero pana taṃ “paññapetvā gacchāhī”ti vatvā bhojanasālato nikkhamitvā
tika-vin05t:294_2: aññattha gacchati, pāduddhārena kāretabbo. Sace tattheva gantvā nisīdati, purimanayeneva
tika-vin05t:294_3: cassa leḍḍupātātikkame āpatti. Sace pana thero sāmaṇeraṃ āṇāpeti, sāmaṇere tattha
tika-vin05t:294_4: mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā nisinnepi bhojanasālato aññattha gacchanto pāduddhārena kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:294_5: Gantvā nisinno puna gamanakāle leḍḍupātātikkame āpattiyā kāretabbo. Sace pana āṇāpento
tika-vin05t:294_6: “mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā tattheva nisīdā”ti āṇāpeti, yatricchati, tatra gantvā āgantuṃ
tika-vin05t:294_7: labhati. Sayaṃ pana pākatikaṃ akatvā gacchantassa leḍḍupātātikkame pācittiyaṃ. Antarasannipāte
tika-vin05t:294_8: mañcapīṭhādīni paññapetvā nisinnehi gamanakāle ārāmikānaṃ “idaṃ paṭisāmethā”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:295_0: 87. Mahādhammassavanaṃ nāma hoti, tattha uposathāgāratopi bhojanasālatopi āharitvā
tika-vin05t:295_1: mañcapīṭhāni paññapenti, āvāsikānaṃyeva palibodho. Sace āgantukā “idaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyassa,
tika-vin05t:295_2: idaṃ ācariyassā”ti gaṇhanti, tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ palibodho. Gamanakāle pākatikaṃ
tika-vin05t:295_3: akatvā leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamantānaṃ āpatti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “yāva aññe na
tika-vin05t:295_4: nisīdanti, tāva yehi paññattaṃ, tesaṃ bhāro, aññesu āgantvā nisinnesu nisinnakānaṃ
tika-vin05t:295_5: bhāro. Sace te anuddharitvā vā anuddharāpetvā vā gacchanti, dukkaṭaṃ. Kasmā? Anāṇattiyā
tika-vin05t:295_6: paññapitattā”ti. Dhammāsane paññatte yāva ussārako vā dhammakathiko vā nāgacchati,
tika-vin05t:295_7: tāva paññāpakānaṃ palibodho. Tasmiṃ āgantvā nisinne tassa palibodho. Sakalaṃ ahorattaṃ
tika-vin05t:295_8: dhammassavanaṃ hoti, añño ussārako vā dhammakathiko vā uṭṭhāti, añño nisīdati, yo
tika-vin05t:295_9: yo āgantvā nisīdati, tassa tasseva bhāro. Uṭṭhahantena pana “idamāsanaṃ tumhākaṃ
tika-vin05t:295_10: bhāro”ti vatvā gantabbaṃ. Sacepi itarasmiṃ anāgate paṭhamaṃ nisinno uṭṭhāya gacchati,
tika-vin05t:295_11: tasmiñca antoupacāraṭṭheyeva itaro āgantvā nisīdati, uṭṭhāya gato āpattiyā na kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:295_12: Sace pana itarasmiṃ anāgateyeva paṭhamaṃ nisinno uṭṭhāyāsanā leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamati,
tika-vin05t:295_13: āpattiyā kāretabbo. “Sabbattha leḍḍupātātikkame paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapāde
tika-vin05t:296_0: 88. Sace pana vuttappakārasenāsanato aññaṃ saṅghikaṃ cimilikaṃ vā uttarattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:296_1: vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā taṭṭikaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā pādapuñchaniṃ vā phalakapīṭhaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:296_2: ajjhokāse santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddharati na uddharāpeti
tika-vin05t:296_3: anāpucchaṃ vā gacchati, dukkaṭaṃ. Ādhārakaṃ pattapidhānakaṃ pādakaṭhalikaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ
tika-vin05t:296_4: bījanipattakaṃ yaṃ kiñci dārubhaṇḍaṃ antamaso pānīyauḷuṅkaṃ pānīyasaṅkhaṃ ajjhokāse
tika-vin05t:296_5: nikkhipitvā gacchantassapi dukkaṭaṃ. Ajjhokāse rajanaṃ pacitvā rajanabhājanaṃ rajanauḷuṅko
tika-vin05t:296_6: rajanadoṇikāti sabbaṃ aggisālāya paṭisāmetabbaṃ. Sace aggisālā natthi, anovassake
tika-vin05t:296_7: pabbhāre nikkhipitabbaṃ. Tasmimpi asati yattha olokentā bhikkhū passanti, tādise
tika-vin05t:296_8: ṭhāne ṭhapetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Aññapuggalike pana mañcapīṭhādisenāsanepi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin05t:296_9: Ettha pana “yasmiṃ vissāsaggāho na ruhati, tassa santake dukkaṭaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana vissāsaggāho
tika-vin05t:296_10: ruhati, tassa santakaṃ attano puggalikameva hotī”ti mahāpaccariyādīsu vuttaṃ. Attano
tika-vin05t:296_11: puggalike pana anāpattiyeva. Yo bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hoti, attano
tika-vin05t:296_12: palibodhaṃ viya maññati, tathārūpaṃ anāpucchitvā gacchantassapi anāpatti. Yo pana
tika-vin05t:296_13: ātape otāpento “āgantvā uddharissāmī”ti gacchati, tassapi anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:301_0: 89. Kālikānipi cattārīti ettha yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikanti
tika-vin05t:301_1: imāni cattāri kālikāni veditabbāni. Tattha purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:301_2: yaṃ kiñci khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāva majjhanhikasaṅkhato kālo, tāva paribhuñjitabbato
tika-vin05t:301_3: yāvakālikaṃ. Saddhiṃ anulomapānehi aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānaṃ yāva rattiyā pacchimayāmasaṅkhāto
tika-vin05t:301_4: yāmo, tāva paribhuñjitabbato yāmo kālo assāti yāmakālikaṃ. Sappiādi pañcavidhaṃ bhesajjaṃ
tika-vin05t:301_5: paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ nidhetabbato sattāho kālo assāti sattāhakālikaṃ. Ṭhapetvā udakaṃ
tika-vin05t:301_6: avasesaṃ sabbampi paṭiggahitaṃ yāvajīvaṃ pariharitvā sati paccaye paribhuñjitabbato
tika-vin05t:302_0: 90. Tattha yāvakālikesu bhojanīyaṃ nāma odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsanti. Pañca
tika-vin05t:302_1: bhojanāni yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-vin05t:302_2: Ettha pana yaṃ tāva sakkhalimodakādi pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇamayaṃ khādanīyaṃ, tattha vattabbameva
tika-vin05t:302_3: natthi. Yampi vanamūlādippabhedaṃ āmisagatikaṃ hoti. Seyyathidaṃ – mūlakhādanīyaṃ
tika-vin05t:303_0: Tattha pana āmisagatikasallakkhaṇatthaṃ idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ – mūlakhādanīye
tika-vin05t:303_1: tāva mūlakamūlaṃ khārakamūlaṃ caccumūlaṃ tambakamūlaṃ taṇḍuleyyakamūlaṃ vatthuleyyakamūlaṃ
tika-vin05t:303_2: vajakalimūlaṃ jajjharimūlanti evamādīni sūpeyyapaṇṇamūlāni āmisagatikāni. Ettha ca
tika-vin05t:303_3: vajakalimūle jaraṭṭhaṃ chinditvā chaḍḍenti, taṃ yāvajīvikaṃ hoti. Aññampi evarūpaṃ
tika-vin05t:303_4: eteneva nayena veditabbaṃ. Mūlakakhārakajajjharimūlānaṃ pana jaraṭṭhānipi āmisagatikānevāti
tika-vin05t:304_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, mūlāni bhesajjāni haliddiṃ siṅgiveraṃ vacaṃ vacattaṃ ativisaṃ
tika-vin05t:304_1: kaṭukarohiṇiṃ usīraṃ bhaddamuttakaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni
tika-vin05t:304_2: neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti –
tika-vin05t:305_0: Vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikāni. Tesaṃ cūḷapañcamūlaṃ mahāpañcamūlantiādinā nayena gaṇiyamānānaṃ
tika-vin05t:305_1: gaṇanāya anto natthi, khādanīyatthañca bhojanīyatthañca apharaṇabhāvoyeva panetesaṃ
tika-vin05t:305_2: lakkhaṇaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ kiñci mūlaṃ tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ
tika-vin05t:305_3: khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharati, taṃ yāvakālikaṃ, itaraṃ yāvajīvikanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:305_4: Subahuṃ vatvāpi hi imasmiṃyeva lakkhaṇe ṭhātabbaṃ. Nāmasaññāsu pana vuccamānāsu taṃ
tika-vin05t:305_5: taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva hoti, tasmā nāmasaññāya ādaraṃ akatvā lakkhaṇameva
tika-vin05t:305_6: dassitaṃ. Yathā ca mūle, evaṃ kandādīsupi lakkhaṇaṃ dassayissāma, tasseva vasena
tika-vin05t:305_7: vinicchayo veditabbo. Yañca taṃ pāḷiyaṃ haliddādi aṭṭhavidhaṃ vuttaṃ, tassa khandhatacapupphaphalādi
tika-vin05t:306_0: Kandakhādanīye duvidho kando dīgho ca bhisakiṃsukakandādi, vaṭṭo ca uppalakaserukakandādi,
tika-vin05t:306_1: yaṃ gaṇṭhītipi vadanti. Tattha sabbesaṃ kandānaṃ jiṇṇajaraṭṭhaṭṭhānañca challi ca
tika-vin05t:306_2: sukhumamūlāni ca yāvajīvikāni, taruṇo pana sukhakhādanīyo sālakalyāṇipotakakando
tika-vin05t:306_3: kiṃsukapotakakando ambāṭakakando ketakakando māluvakando bhisasaṅkhāto padumapuṇḍarīkakando
tika-vin05t:306_4: piṇḍālumasāluādayo ca khīravallikando āluvakando siggukando tālakando nīluppalarattuppalakumudasogandhikānaṃ
tika-vin05t:306_5: kandā kadalikando veḷukando kaserukakandoti evamādayo tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
tika-vin05t:306_6: manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañca bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakakandā yāvakālikā. Khīravallikando
tika-vin05t:306_7: adhoto yāvajīviko, dhoto yāvakāliko. Khīrakākolijīvikausabhakalasuṇādikandā pana
tika-vin05t:306_8: yāvajīvikā. Te pāḷiyaṃ “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ mūlabhesajjasaṅgaheneva saṅgahitā.
tika-vin05t:307_0: Muḷālakhādanīye padumamuḷālaṃ puṇḍarīkamuḷālaṃ mūlasadisaṃyeva. Erakamuḷālaṃ kandulamuḷālanti
tika-vin05t:307_1: evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca
tika-vin05t:307_3: pana yāvajīvikaṃ. Taṃ sabbampi pāḷiyaṃ “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti
tika-vin05t:308_1: kaḷīrasaṅkhātā matthakā, veṇukaḷīro naḷakaḷīro ucchukaḷīro mūlakakaḷīro sāsapakaḷīro
tika-vin05t:308_2: satāvarikaḷīro sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ kaḷīrāti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
tika-vin05t:308_3: manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇako rukkhavalliādīnaṃ matthako yāvakāliko,
tika-vin05t:309_1: daṇḍakakhandhāti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:309_2: bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇako khandho yāvakāliko, uppalajātīnaṃ paṇṇadaṇḍako padumajātīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:309_3: sabbopi daṇḍako karavindadaṇḍādayo ca avasesasabbakhandhā yāvajīvikā.
tika-vin05t:310: Tacakhādanīye ucchutacova eko yāvakāliko, sopi saraso, seso sabbo yāvajīviko. Tesaṃ pana matthakakhandhatacānaṃ tiṇṇampi pāḷiyaṃ kasāvabhesajjena saṅgaho veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:311_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kasāvāni bhesajjāni nimbakasāvaṃ kuṭajakasāvaṃ paṭolakasāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:311_1: phaggavakasāvaṃ nattamālakasāvaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi kasāvāni bhesajjāni neva
tika-vin05t:311_2: khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti.
tika-vin05t:312: Ettha hi etesampi saṅgaho sijjhati. Vuttakasāvāni ca sabbakappiyānīti veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:313_0: Pattakhādanīye mūlakaṃ khārako caccu tambako taṇḍuleyyako papunnāgo vatthuleyyako
tika-vin05t:313_1: vajakali jajjhari sellu siggu kāsamaddako ummācīnamuggo māso rājamāso ṭhapetvā mahānipphāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:313_2: avasesanipphāvo aggimantho sunisannako setavaraṇo nāḷikā bhūmiyaṃ jātaloṇīti etesaṃ
tika-vin05t:313_3: pattāni, aññāni ca evarūpāni tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañca
tika-vin05t:313_4: bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakāni pattāni ekaṃsena yāvakālikāni, yā panaññā mahānakhapiṭṭhimattapaṇṇā
tika-vin05t:313_5: loṇirukkhe ca gacche ca ārohati, tassā pattaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ. Brahmipattañca yāvakālikanti
tika-vin05t:313_6: dīpavāsino vadanti. Ambapallavaṃ yāvakālikaṃ, asokapallavaṃ pana yāvajīvikaṃ. Yāni caññāni pāḷiyaṃ –
tika-vin05t:314_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṇṇāni bhesajjāni nimbapaṇṇaṃ kuṭajapaṇṇaṃ paṭolapaṇṇaṃ sulasipaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:314_1: kappāsapaṇṇaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi paṇṇāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:315_0: Vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikāni. Na kevalañca paṇṇāni, tesaṃ pupphaphalānipi. Yāvajīvikapaṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin05t:315_1: pana phaggavapaṇṇaṃ ajjukapaṇṇaṃ phaṇijjakapaṇṇaṃ tambūlapaṇṇaṃ paduminipaṇṇanti
tika-vin05t:316_0: Pupphakhādanīye mūlakapupphaṃ khārakapupphaṃ caccupupphaṃ tambakapupphaṃ vajakalipupphaṃ
tika-vin05t:316_2: taruṇapupphāni setavaraṇapupphaṃ siggupupphaṃ uppalapadumajātikānaṃ pupphānaṃ kaṇṇikāmattaṃ
tika-vin05t:316_3: agandhipupphaṃ karīrapupphaṃ jīvantī pupphanti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
tika-vin05t:316_5: pana pupphaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ, tassa gaṇanāya anto natthi. Pāḷiyaṃ panassa kasāvabhesajjena saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:317_1: phalāni, yāni loke tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:317_2: bhojanīyatthañca pharanti, sabbāni tāni yāvakālikāni, nāmagaṇanavasena tesaṃ na sakkā
tika-vin05t:318_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, phalāni bhesajjāni bilaṅgaṃ pippaliṃ marīcaṃ harītakaṃ vibhītakaṃ
tika-vin05t:318_1: āmalakaṃ goṭṭhaphalaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi phalāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye
tika-vin05t:318_2: khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti –
tika-vin05t:319: Vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikāni. Tesampi aparipakkāni acchivabimbavaraṇaketakakāsmarīādīnaṃ phalāni jātiphalaṃ kaṭukaphalaṃ eḷā takkolanti evaṃ nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-vin05t:320_0: Aṭṭhikhādanīye labujaṭṭhi panasaṭṭhi ambāṭakaṭṭhi sālaṭṭhi khajjūrīketakatimbarūsakānaṃ
tika-vin05t:320_1: taruṇaphalaṭṭhi tintiṇikaṭṭhi bimbaphalaṭṭhi uppalapadumajātīnaṃ pokkharaṭṭhīti evamādīni
tika-vin05t:320_2: tesu tesu janapadesu manussānaṃ pakatiāhāravasena khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca
tika-vin05t:320_3: pharaṇakāni aṭṭhīni yāvakālikāni, madhukaṭṭhi punnāgaṭṭhi harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīni siddhatthakaṭṭhi
tika-vin05t:320_4: rājikaṭṭhīti evamādīni aṭṭhīni yāvajīvikāni. Tesaṃ pāḷiyaṃ phalabhesajjeneva saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:321_0: Piṭṭhakhādanīye sattannaṃ tāva dhaññānaṃ dhaññānulomānaṃ aparaṇṇānañca piṭṭhaṃ panasapiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:321_2: evamādīni tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca
tika-vin05t:321_3: pharaṇakāni piṭṭhāni yāvakālikāni, adhotakaṃ tālapiṭṭhaṃ khīravallipiṭṭhaṃ assagandhādipiṭṭhāni
tika-vin05t:321_4: ca yāvajīvikāni. Tesaṃ pāḷiyaṃ kasāvehi mūlaphalehi ca saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:323: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, jatūni bhesajjāni hiṅguṃ hiṅgujatuṃ hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ takaṃ takapattiṃ takapaṇṇiṃ sajjulasaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi jatūni bhesajjānī”ti –
tika-vin05t:324_0: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttā niyyāsā yāvajīvikā. Tattha yevāpanakavasena saṅgahitānaṃ ambaniyyāso
tika-vin05t:324_1: kaṇikāraniyyāsoti evaṃ nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ. Evaṃ imesu mūlakhādanīyādīsu
tika-vin05t:324_2: yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikaṃ, sabbampi imasmiṃ atthe avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāmāti saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:325_0: 91. Yāmakālikesu pana aṭṭha pānāni nāma ambapānaṃ jambupānaṃ cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ
tika-vin05t:325_1: madhukapānaṃ muddikapānaṃ sālūkapānaṃ phārusakapānanti imāni aṭṭha pānāni. Tattha
tika-vin05t:325_2: ambapānanti āmehi vā pakkehi vā ambehi katapānaṃ. Tattha āmehi karontena ambataruṇāni
tika-vin05t:325_3: bhinditvā udake pakkhipitvā ātape ādiccapākena pacitvā parissāvetvā tadahupaṭiggahitakehi
tika-vin05t:325_4: madhusakkārakappūrādīhi yojetvā kātabbaṃ, evaṃ kataṃ purebhattameva kappati. Anupasampannehi
tika-vin05t:325_5: kataṃ labhitvā pana purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogenapi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:325_6: pacchābhattaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭati. Esa nayo sabbapānesu.
tika-vin05t:325_7: Jambupānanti jambuphalehi katapānaṃ. Cocapānanti aṭṭhikakadaliphalehi katapānaṃ.
tika-vin05t:325_8: Mocapānanti anaṭṭhikehi kadaliphalehi katapānaṃ. Madhukapānanti madhukānaṃ jātirasena
tika-vin05t:325_9: katapānaṃ. Taṃ pana udakasambhinnaṃ vaṭṭati, suddhaṃ na vaṭṭati. Muddikapānanti muddikā
tika-vin05t:325_10: udake madditvā ambapānaṃ viya katapānaṃ. Sālūkapānanti rattuppalanīluppalādīnaṃ sālūke
tika-vin05t:325_11: madditvā katapānaṃ. Phārusakapānanti phārusakaphalehi ambapānaṃ viya katapānaṃ. Imāni
tika-vin05t:325_12: aṭṭha pānāni sītānipi ādiccapākānipi vaṭṭanti, aggipākāni na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:326_1: Tāni kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ na vuttāni, atha kho kappiyaṃ anulomenti, tasmā kappanti. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:326_2: bhikkhave, sabbaṃ phalarasaṃ ṭhapetvā dhaññaphalarasa”nti vuttattā ṭhapetvā sānulomadhaññaphalarasaṃ
tika-vin05t:326_3: aññaṃ phalapānaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ natthi, sabbaṃ yāmakālikameva. Tattha sānulomadhaññaphalaraso
tika-vin05t:326_5: navannañca mahāphalānaṃ sabbesañca pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇānaṃ anulomadhaññānaṃ raso yāvakāliko,
tika-vin05t:326_6: tasmā pacchābhattaṃ na vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ pattarasaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t:326_7: ḍākarasa”nti vuttattā pakkaḍākarasaṃ ṭhapetvā yāvakālikapattānampi sītodakena madditvā
tika-vin05t:326_8: kataraso vā ādiccapāko vā vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ puppharasaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t:326_9: madhukapuppharasa”nti vuttattā madhukapuppharasaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbopi puppharaso vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:327_0: 92. Sattāhakālikaṃ nāma sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitanti imāni pañca bhesajjāni.
tika-vin05t:327_1: Tattha sappi nāma gosappi vā ajikāsappi vā mahiṃsasappi vā yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati,
tika-vin05t:327_2: tesaṃ sappi. Navanītaṃ nāma tesaṃyeva navanītaṃ. Telaṃ nāma tilatelaṃ sāsapatelaṃ
tika-vin05t:327_3: madhukatelaṃ eraṇḍatelaṃ vasātelaṃ. Madhu nāma makkhikāmadhu. Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā
tika-vin05t:327_4: nibbattaṃ. Yāvajīvikaṃ pana heṭṭhā yāvakālike mūlakhādanīyādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:328_0: 93. Tattha aruṇodaye paṭiggahitaṃ yāvakālikaṃ satakkhattumpi nidahitvā yāva kālo
tika-vin05t:328_1: nātikkamati, tāva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, yāmakālikaṃ ekaṃ ahorattaṃ, sattāhakālikaṃ
tika-vin05t:328_2: sattarattaṃ, itaraṃ sati paccaye yāvajīvampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin05t:328_3: ekarattaṃ vītināmitaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ajjhoharitukāmatāya
tika-vin05t:328_4: gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe tāva dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhoharato pana ekamekasmiṃ ajjhohāre sannidhipaccayā
tika-vin05t:328_5: pācittiyaṃ. Sacepi patto duddhoto hoti, yaṃ aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa lekhā paññāyati,
tika-vin05t:328_6: gaṇṭhikapattassa vā gaṇṭhikantare sneho paviṭṭho hoti, so uṇhe otāpentassa paggharati,
tika-vin05t:328_7: uṇhayāguyā vā gahitāya sandissati, tādise pattepi punadivase bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:328_8: tasmā pattaṃ dhovitvā puna tattha acchodakaṃ vā āsiñcitvā aṅguliyā vā ghaṃsitvā nisnehabhāvo
tika-vin05t:328_9: jānitabbo. Sace hi udake vā snehabhāvo, patte vā aṅgulilekhā paññāyati, duddhoto
tika-vin05t:328_10: hoti, telavaṇṇapatte pana aṅgulilekhā paññāyati, sā abbohārikā. Yampi bhikkhū nirapekkhā
tika-vin05t:328_11: sāmaṇerānaṃ pariccajanti, tañce sāmaṇerā nidahitvā denti, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin05t:328_12: apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase na vaṭṭati. Tato hi ekasitthampi ajjhoharato pācittiyameva.
tika-vin05t:328_13: Akappiyamaṃsesu manussamaṃse thullaccayena saddhiṃ pācittiyaṃ, avasesesu dukkaṭena saddhiṃ.
tika-vin05t:329_0: Yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye ajjhoharato pācittiyaṃ, āhāratthāya ajjhoharato dukkaṭena
tika-vin05t:329_1: saddhiṃ pācittiyaṃ. Sace pavārito hutvā anatirittakataṃ ajjhoharati, pakatiāmise
tika-vin05t:329_2: dve pācittiyāni, manussamaṃse thullaccayena saddhiṃ dve, sesaakappiyamaṃse dukkaṭena
tika-vin05t:329_3: saddhiṃ. Yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dve, nirāmisena ekameva.
tika-vin05t:329_4: Āhāratthāya ajjhoharato vikappadvayepi dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhati. Sace vikāle ajjhoharati,
tika-vin05t:329_5: pakatibhojane sannidhipaccayā ca vikālabhojanapaccayā ca dve pācittiyāni, akappiyamaṃse
tika-vin05t:329_6: thullaccayaṃ dukkaṭañca vaḍḍhati. Yāmakālike vikālapaccayā anāpatti. Anatirittapaccayā
tika-vin05t:330_0: Sattāhakālikaṃ pana yāvajīvikañca āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhato paṭiggaṇhanapaccayā tāva
tika-vin05t:330_1: dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhoharato pana sace nirāmisaṃ hoti, ajjhohāre dukkaṭaṃ. Atha āmisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:331_0: 94. Sattāhakālikesu pana sappiādīsu ayaṃ vinicchayo – sappi tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin05t:331_1: tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi nirāmisampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t:331_2: sattāhaṃ nirāmisaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Sattāhātikkame sace ekabhājane ṭhapitaṃ, ekaṃ
tika-vin05t:331_3: nissaggiyaṃ. Sace bahūsu, vatthugaṇanāya nissaggiyāni. Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin05t:331_4: nirāmisameva vaṭṭati, purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ
tika-vin05t:331_5: ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati, abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbaṃ. Sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti anajjhoharaṇīyataṃ
tika-vin05t:331_6: āpannattā. Sace anupasampanno purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena sappiṃ katvā deti,
tika-vin05t:331_7: purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, sace sayaṃ karoti, sattāhampi nirāmisameva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:331_8: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena yena kenaci katasappi sattāhampi nirāmisameva
tika-vin05t:331_9: vaṭṭati, uggahitakena kate pubbe vuttasuddhasappinayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo. Purebhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:331_10: paṭiggahitakhīrena vā dadhinā vā katasappi anupasampannena kataṃ sāmisampi tadahupurebhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:332_0: 95. Navanītaṃ tāpentassa hi sāmaṃpāko na hoti, sāmaṃpakkena pana tena saddhiṃ āmisaṃ
tika-vin05t:332_1: na vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya ca na vaṭṭatiyeva. Sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti
tika-vin05t:332_2: savatthukassa paṭiggahitattā. Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakehi kataṃ pana abbhañjanādīsu
tika-vin05t:332_3: upanetabbaṃ. Purebhattampi ca uggahitakehi kataṃ, ubhayesampi sattāhātikkame anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:332_4: Esa nayo akappiyamaṃsasappimhi. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yattha pāḷiyaṃ āgatasappinā nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:332_5: tattha iminā dukkaṭaṃ. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā manussasappi ca
tika-vin05t:332_6: navanītañca paṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ duppaṭikkhittaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu anuññātattā. Parato
tika-vin05t:332_7: cassa vinicchayopi āgacchissati. Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanavanītampi purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin05t:332_8: tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya nirāmisameva. Sattāhātikkame
tika-vin05t:332_9: nānābhājanesu ṭhapite bhājanagaṇanāya, ekabhājanepi amissetvā piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ṭhapite
tika-vin05t:332_10: piṇḍagaṇanāya nissaggiyāni. Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ sappinayena veditabbaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin05t:332_11: pana dadhiguḷikāyopi takkabindūnipi honti, tasmā dhotaṃ vaṭṭatīti upaḍḍhattherā āhaṃsu.
tika-vin05t:332_12: Mahāsivatthero pana “bhagavatā anuññātakālato paṭṭhāya takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū”ti
tika-vin05t:332_13: āha. Tasmā navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena dhovitvā dadhitakkamakkhikākipillikādīni apanetvā
tika-vin05t:332_14: paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Pacitvā sappiṃ katvā paribhuñjitukāmena adhotampi paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin05t:332_15: vaṭṭati. Yaṃ tattha dadhigataṃ vā takkagataṃ vā, taṃ khayaṃ gamissati. Ettāvatā hi
tika-vin05t:332_16: savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo. Āmisena saddhiṃ pakkattā
tika-vin05t:332_17: pana tasmimpi kukkuccāyanti kukkuccakā. Idāni uggahetvā ṭhapitanavanīte ca purebhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:332_18: khīradadhīni paṭiggahetvā katanavanīte ca pacchābhattaṃ tāni paṭiggahetvā katanavanīte
tika-vin05t:332_19: ca uggahitakehi katanavanīte ca akappiyamaṃsanavanīte ca sabbo āpattānāpattiparibhogāparibhoganayo
tika-vin05t:332_20: sappimhi vuttakkameneva gahetabbo. Telabhikkhāya paviṭṭhānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ tattheva
tika-vin05t:332_21: sappimpi navanītampi pakkatelampi apakkatelampi ākiranti. Tattha takkadadhibindūnipi
tika-vin05t:332_22: bhattasitthānipi taṇḍulakaṇāpi makkhikādayopi honti, ādiccapākaṃ katvā parissāvetvā
tika-vin05t:332_23: gahitaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ hoti. Paṭiggahetvā ca ṭhapitabhesajjehi saddhiṃ pacitvā natthupānampi
tika-vin05t:332_24: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace vaddalisamaye lajjī sāmaṇero yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo
tika-vin05t:332_25: na paccanti, evaṃ aggimhi vilīyāpetvā parissāvetvā puna pacitvā deti, purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:333_0: 96. Telesu tilatelaṃ tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:333_1: pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya nirāmisameva vaṭṭati. Sattāhātikkame tassa bhājanagaṇanāya
tika-vin05t:333_2: nissaggiyabhāvo veditabbo. Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:333_3: uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati, sīsamakkhanādīsu upanetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:333_4: sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti. Purebhattaṃ tile paṭiggahetvā katatelaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi
tika-vin05t:333_5: vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ hoti, sīsamakkhanādīsu upanetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:333_6: sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti. Pacchābhattaṃ tile paṭiggahetvā katatelaṃ anajjhoharaṇīyameva
tika-vin05t:333_8: Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā uggahitakatilehi katatelepi eseva nayo. Purebhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:333_9: paṭiggahitatile bhajjitvā vā tilapiṭṭhaṃ vā sedetvā uṇhodakena vā temetvā katatelaṃ
tika-vin05t:333_10: sace anupasampannena kataṃ, purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, attanā kataṃ nibbaṭṭitattā
tika-vin05t:333_11: purebhattaṃ nirāmisaṃ vaṭṭati, sāmaṃpakkattā sāmisaṃ na vaṭṭati. Savatthukapaṭiggahitattā
tika-vin05t:333_12: pana pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya ubhayampi anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ, sīsamakkhanādīsu upanetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:333_13: sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti. Yadi pana appaṃ uṇhodakaṃ hoti abbhukkiraṇamattaṃ, abbohārikaṃ
tika-vin05t:333_14: hoti sāmaṃpākagaṇanaṃ na gacchati. Sāsapatelādīsupi avatthukapaṭiggahitesu avatthukatilatele
tika-vin05t:334_0: Sace pana purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitānaṃ sāsapādīnaṃ cuṇṇehi ādiccapākena sakkā telaṃ
tika-vin05t:334_1: kātuṃ, taṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya nirāmisameva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:334_2: sattāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ. Yasmā pana sāsapamadhukacuṇṇāni sedetvā eraṇḍakaṭṭhīni
tika-vin05t:334_3: ca bhajjitvā eva telaṃ karonti, tasmā etesaṃ telaṃ anupasampannehi kataṃ purebhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:334_4: sāmisampi vaṭṭati, vatthūnaṃ yāvajīvikattā pana savatthukapaṭiggahaṇe doso natthi.
tika-vin05t:334_5: Attanā kataṃ sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogeneva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Uggahitakehi kataṃ
tika-vin05t:334_6: anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ, bāhiraparibhoge vaṭṭati, sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti. Telakaraṇatthāya
tika-vin05t:334_7: sāsapamadhukaeraṇḍakaṭṭhīni paṭiggahetvā katatelaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ, dutiyadivase kataṃ
tika-vin05t:334_8: chāhaṃ vaṭṭati, tatiyadivase kataṃ pañcāhaṃ vaṭṭati, catuttha, pañcama, chaṭṭha,
tika-vin05t:334_9: sattamadivase kataṃ tadaheva vaṭṭati. Sace yāva aruṇassa uggamanā tiṭṭhati, nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:334_10: aṭṭhamadivase kataṃ anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ, anissaggiyattā pana bāhiraparibhoge vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:334_11: Sacepi na karoti, telatthāya gahitasāsapādīnaṃ sattāhātikkame dukkaṭameva. Pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:334_12: pana anāgatāni aññānipi nāḷikeranimbakosambakaramandādīnaṃ telāni atthi, tāni paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin05t:334_13: sattāhaṃ atikkāmayato dukkaṭaṃ hoti. Ayametesu viseso – sesaṃ yāvakālikavatthuṃ yāvajīvikavatthuñca
tika-vin05t:335_0: Vasātelaṃ nāma “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañca vasāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ
tika-vin05t:335_1: sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasa”nti evaṃ anuññātavasānaṃ telaṃ. Ettha ca “acchavasa”nti
tika-vin05t:335_2: vacanena ṭhapetvā manussavasaṃ sabbesaṃ akappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasā anuññātā. Macchaggahaṇena
tika-vin05t:335_3: ca susukāpi gahitā honti, vāḷamacchattā pana visuṃ vuttaṃ. Macchādiggahaṇena cettha
tika-vin05t:335_4: sabbesampi kappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasā anuññātā. Maṃsesu hi dasa manussahatthiassasunakhaahisīhabyagghadīpiacchataracchānaṃ
tika-vin05t:335_5: maṃsāni akappiyāni, vasāsu ekā manussavasā. Khīrādīsu akappiyaṃ nāma natthi. Anupasampannehi
tika-vin05t:335_6: kataṃ nibbaṭṭitaṃ vasātelaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:335_7: pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana tattha sukhumarajasadisaṃ
tika-vin05t:335_8: maṃsaṃ vā nhāru vā aṭṭhi vā lohitaṃ vā hoti, taṃ abbohārikaṃ. Sace pana vasaṃ paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin05t:335_9: sayaṃ karoti, purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā pacitvā parissāvetvā sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena
tika-vin05t:335_10: paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Nirāmisaparibhogañhi sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle
tika-vin05t:335_11: nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti. Tatrāpi abbohārikaṃ abbohārikameva,
tika-vin05t:335_12: pacchābhattaṃ pana paṭiggahetuṃ vā kātuṃ vā na vaṭṭatiyeva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:336_0: “Vikāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin05t:336_1: āpatti tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ vikāle
tika-vin05t:336_2: saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Kāle ce, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:336_3: paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin05t:336_4: Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin05t:337_0: Upatissattheraṃ pana antevāsikā pucchiṃsu “bhante, sappinavanītavasāni ekato pacitvā
tika-vin05t:337_1: nibbaṭṭitāni vaṭṭanti, na vaṭṭantī”ti? “Na vaṭṭanti, āvuso”ti. Thero kirettha pakkatelakasaṭe
tika-vin05t:337_2: viya kukkuccāyati. Tato naṃ uttari pucchiṃsu “bhante, navanīte dadhiguḷikā vā takkabindu
tika-vin05t:337_3: vā hoti, etaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Etampi, āvuso, na vaṭṭatī”ti. Tato naṃ āhaṃsu “bhante,
tika-vin05t:337_4: ekato pacitvā ekato saṃsaṭṭhāni tejavantāni honti, rogaṃ niggaṇhantī”ti. “Sādhāvuso”ti
tika-vin05t:337_5: thero sampaṭicchi. Mahāsumatthero panāha “kappiyamaṃsavasāva sāmisaparibhoge vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:337_6: itarā nirāmisaparibhoge vaṭṭatī”ti. Mahāpadumatthero pana “idaṃ ki”nti paṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:337_8: yāguṃ pivanti, sā tejussadattā rogaṃ niggaṇhātī”ti vatvā “vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
tika-vin05t:338_0: 97. Madhu nāma madhukarīhi madhumakkhikāhi khuddakamakkhikāhi bhamaramakkhikāhi ca
tika-vin05t:338_1: kataṃ madhu. Taṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:338_2: pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogameva vaṭṭati, sattāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:338_3: Sace silesasadisaṃ mahāmadhuṃ khaṇḍaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ, itaraṃ vā nānābhājanesu, vatthugaṇanāya
tika-vin05t:338_4: nissaggiyāni. Sace ekameva khaṇḍaṃ, ekabhājane vā itaraṃ, ekameva nissaggiyaṃ. Uggahitakaṃ
tika-vin05t:338_5: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, arumakkhanādīsu upanetabbaṃ. Madhupaṭalaṃ vā madhusitthakaṃ
tika-vin05t:338_6: vā sace madhunā amakkhitaṃ parisuddhaṃ, yāvajīvikaṃ, madhumakkhitaṃ pana madhugatikameva.
tika-vin05t:338_7: Cīrikā nāma sapakkhā dīghamakkhikā tumbaḷanāmikā ca aṭṭhipakkhikā kāḷamahābhamarā
tika-vin05t:338_8: honti, tesaṃ āsayesu niyyāsasadisaṃ madhu hoti, taṃ yāvajīvikaṃ.
tika-vin05t:339_0: 98. Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchurasaṃ upādāya apakkā vā avatthukapakkā vā sabbāpi avatthukā
tika-vin05t:339_1: ucchuvikati. Taṃ phāṇitaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:339_2: pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati, sattāhātikkame vatthugaṇanāya
tika-vin05t:339_3: nissaggiyaṃ. Bahū piṇḍā cuṇṇe katvā ekabhājane pakkhittā honti ghanasannivesā, ekameva
tika-vin05t:339_4: nissaggiyaṃ. Uggahitakaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, gharadhūpanādīsu upanetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:339_5: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitena aparissāvitaucchurasena kataphāṇitaṃ sace anupasampannena
tika-vin05t:339_6: kataṃ, sāmisampi vaṭṭati, sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t:339_7: pana savatthukapaṭiggahitattā anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ, sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti. Pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:339_9: Esa nayo ucchuṃ paṭiggahetvā kataphāṇitepi. Purebhattaṃ pana parissāvitapaṭiggahitena
tika-vin05t:339_10: kataṃ sace anupasampannena kataṃ, purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t:339_11: sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva. Sayaṃkataṃ purebhattampi nirāmisameva, pacchābhattaṃ parissāvitapaṭiggahitena
tika-vin05t:339_12: kataṃ pana nirāmisameva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭati. Uggahitakataṃ vuttanayameva. “Jhāmaucchuphāṇitaṃ
tika-vin05t:339_13: vā koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitaṃ vā purebhattameva vaṭṭatī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin05t:339_14: pana “etaṃ savatthukapakkaṃ vaṭṭati, no vaṭṭatī”ti pucchaṃ katvā “ucchuphāṇitaṃ pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:339_15: no vaṭṭanakaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ. Sītodakena kataṃ madhukapupphaphāṇitaṃ
tika-vin05t:339_16: purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:339_17: sattāhātikkame vatthugaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ, khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ madhukaphāṇitaṃ
tika-vin05t:339_18: yāvakālikaṃ. Khaṇḍasakkharaṃ pana khīrajallikaṃ apanetvā sodhenti, tasmā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:340_0: 99. Madhukapupphaṃ pana purebhattampi allaṃ vaṭṭati. Bhajjitampi vaṭṭati, bhajjitvā
tika-vin05t:340_1: tilādīhi missaṃ vā amissaṃ vā katvā koṭṭitaṃ vaṭṭati. Yadi pana taṃ gahetvā merayatthāya
tika-vin05t:340_2: yojenti, yojitaṃ bījato paṭṭhāya na vaṭṭati. Kadalīkhajjūrīambalabujapanasaciñcādīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:340_3: sabbesaṃ yāvakālikaphalānaṃ phāṇitaṃ yāvakālikameva. Maricapakkehi phāṇitaṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:340_4: taṃ yāvajīvikaṃ. Evaṃ yathāvuttāni sattāhakālikāni sappiādīni pañca “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:340_5: pañca bhesajjānī”ti bhesajjanāmena anuññātattā bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā mā vā, āhāratthaṃ
tika-vin05t:340_6: pharituṃ samatthānipi paṭiggahetvā tadahupurebhattaṃ yathāsukhaṃ, pacchābhattato
tika-vin05t:340_7: paṭṭhāya sati paccaye vuttanayena sattāhaṃ paribhuñjitabbāni, sattāhātikkame pana
tika-vin05t:340_8: bhesajjasikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Sacepi sāsapamattaṃ hoti, sakiṃ vā aṅguliyā
tika-vin05t:340_9: gahetvā jivhāya sāyanamattaṃ, nissajjitabbameva pācittiyañca desetabbaṃ. Nissaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:340_10: paṭilabhitvā na ajjhoharitabbaṃ, na kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, kāyo vā
tika-vin05t:340_11: kāye aru vā na makkhetabbaṃ. Tehi makkhitāni kāsāvakattarayaṭṭhiupāhanapādakaṭhalikamañcapīṭhādīnipi
tika-vin05t:340_13: mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Kasāve pana pakkhipitvā dvāravātapānakavāṭāni makkhetabbānī”ti
tika-vin05t:340_14: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Padīpe vā kāḷavaṇṇe vā upanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Aññena pana bhikkhunā
tika-vin05t:340_15: kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na ajjhoharitabbaṃ. “Anāpatti antosattāhaṃ
tika-vin05t:340_16: adhiṭṭhetī”ti vacanato pana sattāhabbhantare sappiñca telañca vasañca muddhani telaṃ
tika-vin05t:340_17: vā abbhañjanaṃ vā madhuṃ arumakkhanaṃ phāṇitaṃ gharadhūpanaṃ adhiṭṭheti anāpatti,
tika-vin05t:340_18: neva nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Sace adhiṭṭhitatelaṃ anadhiṭṭhitatelabhājane ākiritukāmo hoti,
tika-vin05t:340_19: bhājane ce sukhumaṃ chiddaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ telaṃ purāṇatelena ajjhottharīyati,
tika-vin05t:340_20: puna adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Atha mahāmukhaṃ hoti, sahasāva bahu telaṃ pavisitvā purāṇatelaṃ
tika-vin05t:340_21: ajjhottharati, puna adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. Adhiṭṭhitagatikameva hi taṃ hoti. Etena
tika-vin05t:341_0: Sace pana sattāhātikkantaṃ anupasampannassa pariccajitvā deti, puna tena attano santakaṃ
tika-vin05t:341_1: katvā dinnaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace hi so abhisaṅkharitvā vā anabhisaṅkharitvā
tika-vin05t:341_2: vā tassa bhikkhuno natthukammatthaṃ dadeyya, gahetvā natthukammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:341_3: bālo hoti, dātuṃ na jānāti, aññena bhikkhunā vattabbo “atthi te sāmaṇera tela”nti?
tika-vin05t:341_4: “Āma, bhante, atthī”ti. Āhara therassa bhesajjaṃ karissāmāti. Evampi vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin05t:341_5: dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti, sattāhātikkame dvinnampi anāpatti,
tika-vin05t:341_6: paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭati. Sace yena paṭiggahitaṃ, so itaraṃ bhaṇati “āvuso,
tika-vin05t:341_7: imaṃ telaṃ sattāhamattaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti, so ca paribhogaṃ na karoti, kassa
tika-vin05t:341_8: āpatti? Na kassaci. Kasmā? Yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena vissajjitattā, itarassa appaṭiggahitattā.
tika-vin05t:342_0: 100. Imesu pana catūsu kālikesu yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikanti idameva dvayaṃ antovutthakañceva
tika-vin05t:342_1: sannidhikārakañca hoti, sattāhakālikañca yāvajīvikañca akappiyakuṭiyaṃ nikkhipitumpi
tika-vin05t:342_2: vaṭṭati, sannidhimpi na janeti. Yāvakālikaṃ pana attanā saddhiṃ sambhinnarasāni tīṇipi
tika-vin05t:342_3: yāmakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti. Yāmakālikaṃ dvepi sattāhakālikādīni attano
tika-vin05t:342_4: sabhāvaṃ upaneti, sattāhakālikampi attanā saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ attano sabhāvaññeva
tika-vin05t:342_5: upaneti, tasmā yāvakālikena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sambhinnarasaṃ
tika-vin05t:342_6: sesakālikattayaṃ tadahupurebhattameva vaṭṭati. Yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ pana itaradvayaṃ
tika-vin05t:342_7: tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭati. Sattāhakālikena pana tadahupaṭiggahitena
tika-vin05t:342_8: saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ
tika-vin05t:342_9: kappati. Dvīhapaṭiggahitena chāhaṃ. Tīhapaṭiggahitena pañcāhaṃ…pe… sattāhapaṭiggahitena
tika-vin05t:343_0: Sace pana ekato paṭiggahitānipi cattāri kālikāni sambhinnarasāni na honti, tassa
tika-vin05t:343_1: tasseva kālassa vasena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭanti. Sace hi challimpi anapanetvā sakaleneva
tika-vin05t:343_2: nāḷikeraphalena saddhiṃ ambapānādipānakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ hoti, nāḷikeraṃ apanetvā taṃ
tika-vin05t:343_3: vikālepi kappati. Upari sappipiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā sītalapāyāsaṃ denti, yaṃ pāyāsena asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:343_4: sappi, taṃ apanetvā sattāhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Thaddhamadhuphāṇitādīsupi eseva
tika-vin05t:343_5: nayo. Takkolajātiphalādīhi alaṅkaritvā piṇḍapātaṃ denti, tāni uddharitvā dhovitvā
tika-vin05t:343_6: yāvajīvaṃ paribhuñjitabbāni. Yāguyaṃ pakkhipitvā dinnasiṅgiverādīsupi telādīsu pakkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:343_7: dinnalaṭṭhimadhukādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ asambhinnarasaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ ekato
tika-vin05t:343_8: paṭiggahitampi yathā suddhaṃ hoti, tathā dhovitvā tacchetvā vā tassa tassa kālassa
tika-vin05t:343_9: vasena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace sambhinnarasaṃ hoti saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:347_0: 101. Kappiyācatubhūmiyoti ettha “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, catasso kappiyabhūmiyo ussāvanantikaṃ
tika-vin05t:347_1: gonisādikaṃ gahapatiṃ sammuti”nti vacanato ussāvanantikā gonisādikā gahapati sammutīti
tika-vin05t:347_2: imā catasso kappiyabhūmiyo veditabbā. Tattha ussāvanantikā tāva evaṃ kātabbā – yo
tika-vin05t:347_3: thambhānaṃ vā upari bhittipāde vā nikhanitvā vihāro karīyati, tassa heṭṭhā thambhapaṭicchakā
tika-vin05t:347_4: pāsāṇā bhūmigatikā eva. Paṭhamatthambhaṃ pana paṭhamabhittipādaṃ vā patiṭṭhāpentehi
tika-vin05t:347_5: bahūhi samparivāretvā “kappiyakuṭiṃ karoma, kappiyakuṭiṃ karomā”ti vācaṃ nicchārentehi
