tika-vin05t:444_3: pabbājetabbo. Andhoti jaccandho vuccati. Mūgoti yassa vacībhedo na pavattati, yassapi
tika-vin05t:444_4: pavattati, saraṇagamanaṃ pana paripuṇṇaṃ bhāsituṃ na sakkoti, tādisaṃ mammanampi
tika-vin05t:444_5: pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yo pana saraṇagamanamattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ bhāsituṃ sakkoti, taṃ
tika-vin05t:444_6: pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Badhiroti yo sabbena sabbaṃ na suṇāti. Yo pana mahāsaddaṃ suṇāti,
tika-vin05t:444_7: taṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Andhamūgādayo ubhayadosavasena vuttā. Yesañca pabbajjā paṭikkhittā,
tika-vin05t:444_8: upasampadāpi tesaṃ paṭikkhittāva. Sace pana ne saṅgho upasampādeti, sabbepi sūpasampannā,
tika-vin05t:444_9: kārakasaṅgho pana ācariyupajjhāyā ca āpattito na muccanti.
tika-vin05t:445_0: 135. Paṇḍako ubhatobyañjanako theyyasaṃvāsako titthiyapakkantako tiracchānagato mātughātako
tika-vin05t:445_1: pitughātako arahantaghātako lohituppādako saṅghabhedako bhikkhunīdūsakoti ime pana
tika-vin05t:445_2: ekādasa puggalā “paṇḍako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno
tika-vin05t:445_3: nāsetabbo”ti ādivacanato abhabbā, neva nesaṃ pabbajjā, na upasampadā ca ruhati, tasmā
tika-vin05t:445_4: na pabbājetabbā na upasampādetabbā, jānitvā pabbājento upasampādento ca dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin05t:445_5: āpajjati. Ajānitvāpi pabbājitā upasampāditā ca jānitvā liṅganāsanāya nāsetabbā.
tika-vin05t:446_0: Tattha paṇḍakoti āsittapaṇḍako usūyapaṇḍako opakkamikapaṇḍako pakkhapaṇḍako napuṃsakapaṇḍakoti
tika-vin05t:446_1: pañca paṇḍakā. Tesu yassa paresaṃ aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gahetvā asucinā āsittassa pariḷāho
tika-vin05t:446_2: vūpasammati, ayaṃ āsittapaṇḍako. Yassa paresaṃ ajjhācāraṃ passato usūyāya uppannāya
tika-vin05t:446_3: pariḷāho vūpasammati, ayaṃ usūyapaṇḍako. Yassa upakkamena bījāni apanītāni, ayaṃ
tika-vin05t:446_4: opakkamikapaṇḍako. Ekacco pana akusalavipākānubhāvena kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti, juṇhapakkhe
tika-vin05t:446_5: panassa pariḷāho vūpasammati, ayaṃ pakkhapaṇḍako. Yo pana paṭisandhiyaṃyeva abhāvako
tika-vin05t:446_6: uppanno, ayaṃ na puṃsakapaṇḍako. Tesu āsittapaṇḍakassa ca usūyapaṇḍakassa ca pabbajjā
tika-vin05t:446_7: na vāritā, itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vāritā. “Tesupi pakkhapaṇḍakassa yasmiṃ pakkhe paṇḍako
tika-vin05t:446_8: hoti, tasmiṃyevassa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritā”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:447_1: ca ubhatobyañjanamassa atthīti ubhatobyañjanako. So duvidho hoti itthiubhatobyañjanako
tika-vin05t:447_2: purisaubhatobyañjanakoti. Tattha itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthinimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:447_3: purisanimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ. Purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisanimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ, itthinimittaṃ
tika-vin05t:447_4: paṭicchannaṃ. Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthīsu purisattaṃ karontassa itthinimittaṃ
tika-vin05t:447_5: paṭicchannaṃ hoti, purisanimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisānaṃ itthibhāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:447_6: upagacchantassa purisanimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti, itthinimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Itthiubhatobyañjanako
tika-vin05t:447_7: sayañca gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parañca gaṇhāpeti, purisaubhatobyañjanako pana sayaṃ na
tika-vin05t:447_8: gaṇhāti, paraṃ pana gaṇhāpetīti idametesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ. Imassa pana duvidhassapi
tika-vin05t:447_9: ubhatobyañjanakassa neva pabbajjā atthi, na upasampadā.
tika-vin05t:448_0: 137. Theyyasaṃvāsakoti tayo theyyasaṃvāsakā liṅgatthenako saṃvāsatthenako ubhayatthenakoti.
tika-vin05t:448_1: Tattha yo sayaṃ pabbajitvā vihāraṃ gantvā na bhikkhuvassāni gaṇeti, na yathāvuḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin05t:448_2: vandanaṃ sādiyati, na āsanena paṭibāhati, na uposathapavāraṇādīsu sandissati, ayaṃ
tika-vin05t:448_3: liṅgamattasseva thenitattā liṅgatthenako nāma. Yo pana bhikkhūhi pabbājito sāmaṇero
tika-vin05t:448_4: samāno videsaṃ gantvā “ahaṃ dasavasso vā vīsativasso vā”ti musā vatvā bhikkhuvassāni
tika-vin05t:448_5: gaṇeti, yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati, āsanena paṭibāhati, uposathapavaāraṇādīsu
tika-vin05t:448_6: sandissati, ayaṃ saṃvāsamattasseva thenitattā saṃvāsatthenako nāma. Bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko
tika-vin05t:448_7: hi sabbopi kiriyabhedo imasmiṃ atthe “saṃvāso”ti veditabbo. Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya “na
tika-vin05t:448_8: maṃ koci jānātī”ti puna evaṃ paṭipajjantepi eseva nayo. Yo pana sayaṃ pabbajitvā
tika-vin05t:448_9: vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhuvassāni gaṇeti, yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati, āsanena paṭibāhati,
tika-vin05t:448_10: uposathapavāraṇādīsu sandissati, ayaṃ liṅgassa ceva saṃvāsassa ca thenitattā ubhayatthenako
tika-vin05t:448_11: nāma. Ayaṃ tividhopi theyyasaṃvāsako anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno
tika-vin05t:448_12: nāsetabbo, puna pabbajjaṃ yācantopi na pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin05t:449: 138. Ettha ca asammohatthaṃ idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:453: Theyyasaṃvāsako nāma, tāva esa na vuccatī”ti. ;
tika-vin05t:454_0: Tatrāyaṃ vitthāranayo – idhekaccassa rājā kuddho hoti, so “evaṃ me sotthi bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin05t:454_1: sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā palāyati. Taṃ disvā rañño ārocenti, rājā “sace pabbajito,
tika-vin05t:454_2: na taṃ labbhā kiñci kātu”nti tasmiṃ kodhaṃ paṭivineti. So “vūpasantaṃ me rājabhaya”nti
tika-vin05t:454_3: saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgato pabbājetabbo. Athāpi “sāsanaṃ
tika-vin05t:454_4: nissāya mayā jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ, handa dāni ahaṃ pabbajāmī”ti uppannasaṃvego teneva
tika-vin05t:454_5: liṅgena āgantvā āgantukavattaṃ na sādiyati, bhikkhūhi puṭṭho vā apuṭṭho vā yathābhūtamattānaṃ
tika-vin05t:454_6: āvikatvā pabbajjaṃ yācati, liṅgaṃ apanetvā pabbājetabbo. Sace pana so vattaṃ sādiyati,
tika-vin05t:454_7: pabbajitālayaṃ dasseti, sabbaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ vidhiṃ paṭipajjati,
tika-vin05t:455_0: Idha panekacco dubbhikkhe jīvituṃ asakkonto sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni
tika-vin05t:455_1: bhuñjanto dubbhikkhe vītivatte saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgatoti
tika-vin05t:456_0: Aparo mahākantāraṃ nittharitukāmo hoti, satthavāho ca pabbajite gahetvā gacchati.
tika-vin05t:456_1: So “evaṃ maṃ satthavāho gahetvā gamissatī”ti sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā satthavāhena
tika-vin05t:456_2: saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā khemantaṃ patvā saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ
tika-vin05t:457_0: Aparo rogabhaye uppanne jīvituṃ asakkonto sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni
tika-vin05t:457_1: bhuñjanto rogabhaye vūpasante saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgatoti
tika-vin05t:458_0: Aparassa eko veriko kuddho hoti, ghātetukāmo naṃ vicarati. So “evaṃ me sotthi bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin05t:458_1: sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā palāyati. Veriko “kuhiṃ so”ti pariyesanto “pabbajitvā palāto”ti
tika-vin05t:458_2: sutvā “sace pabbajito, na taṃ labbhā kiñci kātu”nti tasmiṃ kodhaṃ paṭivineti. So
tika-vin05t:458_3: “vūpasantaṃ me veribhaya”nti saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgatoti
tika-vin05t:459_0: Aparo ñātikulaṃ gantvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya gihī hutvā “imāni cīvarāni idha nassissanti,
tika-vin05t:459_1: sacepi imāni gahetvā vihāraṃ gamissāmi, antarāmagge maṃ ‘coro’ti gahessanti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
tika-vin05t:459_2: kāyaparihāriyāni katvā gaccheyya”nti cīvarāharaṇatthaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca
tika-vin05t:459_3: vihāraṃ gacchati. Taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā sāmaṇerā ca daharā ca abbhuggacchanti,
tika-vin05t:459_4: vattaṃ dassenti. So na sādiyati, yathābhūtamattānaṃ āvikaroti. Sace bhikkhū “na dāni
tika-vin05t:459_5: mayaṃ taṃ muñcissāmā”ti balakkārena pabbājetukāmā honti, kāsāyāni apanetvā puna pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin05t:459_6: Sace pana “nayime maṃ hīnāyāvattabhāvaṃ jānantī”ti taṃyeva bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānitvā
tika-vin05t:459_7: sabbaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ vidhiṃ paṭipajjati, ayaṃ na pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin05t:460_0: Aparo mahāsāmaṇero ñātikulaṃ gantvā uppabbajitvā kammantānuṭṭhānena ubbāḷho puna
tika-vin05t:460_1: “dāni ahaṃ sāmaṇero bhavissāmi, theropi me uppabbajitabhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti tadeva
tika-vin05t:460_2: pattacīvaraṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gacchati, tamatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na āroceti, sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:460_3: paṭijānāti, ayaṃ theyyasaṃvāsakoyeva, pabbajjaṃ na labhati. Sacepissa liṅgaggahaṇakāle
tika-vin05t:460_4: evaṃ hoti “nāhaṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”ti, vihārañca gato āroceti, gahaṇeneva theyyasaṃvāsako.
tika-vin05t:460_5: Athāpissa gahaṇakāle “ācikkhissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, vihārañca gantvā “kuhiṃ
tika-vin05t:460_6: tvaṃ, āvuso, gato”ti vutto “na dāni maṃ ime jānantī”ti vañcetvā nācikkhati, “nācikkhissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:460_7: saha dhuranikkhepena ayampi theyyasaṃvāsakova. Sace panassa gahaṇakālepi “ācikkhissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:460_8: hoti, vihāraṃ gantvāpi ācikkhati, ayaṃ puna pabbajjaṃ labhati.
tika-vin05t:461_0: Aparo daharasāmaṇero mahanto vā pana abyatto. So purimanayeneva uppabbajitvā ghare
tika-vin05t:461_1: vacchakagorakkhaṇādīni kammāni kātuṃ na icchati. Tamenaṃ ñātakā tāniyeva kāsāyāni
tika-vin05t:461_2: acchādetvā thālakaṃ vā pattaṃ vā hatthe datvā “gaccha, samaṇova hohī”ti gharā nīharanti.
tika-vin05t:461_3: So vihāraṃ gacchati, neva naṃ bhikkhū jānanti “ayaṃ uppabbajitvā puna sayameva pabbajito”ti,
tika-vin05t:461_4: nāpi sayaṃ jānāti “yo evaṃ pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī”ti. Sace pana
tika-vin05t:461_5: taṃ paripuṇṇavassaṃ upasampādenti, sūpasampanno. Sace pana anupasampannakāleyeva
tika-vin05t:461_6: vinayavinicchaye vattamāne suṇāti “yo evaṃ pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī”ti,
tika-vin05t:461_7: tena “mayā evaṃ kata”nti bhikkhūnaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Evaṃ puna pabbajjaṃ labhati. Sace
tika-vin05t:461_8: pana “dāni na maṃ koci jānātī”ti nāroceti, dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteyeva theyyasaṃvāsako.
tika-vin05t:462_0: Bhikkhu sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya liṅgaṃ anapanetvā dussīlakammaṃ katvā vā akatvā vā puna
tika-vin05t:462_1: sabbaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ vidhiṃ paṭipajjati, theyyasaṃvāsako hoti.
tika-vin05t:462_2: Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya saliṅge ṭhito methunaṃ paṭisevitvā vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ vidhiṃ
tika-vin05t:462_3: āpajjanto theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti, pabbajjāmattaṃ labhati. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-vin05t:463_0: Eko bhikkhu kāsāye saussāhova odātaṃ nivāsetvā methunaṃ paṭisevitvā puna kāsāyāni
tika-vin05t:463_1: nivāsetvā vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ vidhiṃ āpajjati, ayampi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti, pabbajjāmattaṃ
tika-vin05t:463_2: labhati. Sace pana kāsāye dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā odātaṃ nivāsetvā methunaṃ paṭisevitvā
tika-vin05t:463_3: puna kāsāyāni nivāsetvā vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ vidhiṃ āpajjati, theyyasaṃvāsako hoti.
tika-vin05t:463_5: na hoti. Sacepi kāsāye saussāhova kāsāyāni apanetvā methunaṃ paṭisevitvā puna kāsāyāni
tika-vin05t:463_6: nivāseti, neva theyyasaṃvāsako hoti. Sace pana kāsāye dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā naggo vā
tika-vin05t:463_7: odātavattho vā methunasevanādīhi assamaṇo hutvā kāsāyaṃ nivāseti, theyyasaṃvāsako hoti.
tika-vin05t:464_0: Sace gihibhāvaṃ patthayamāno kāsāyaṃ ovaṭṭikaṃ katvā aññena vā ākārena gihinivāsanena
tika-vin05t:464_1: nivāseti “sobhati nu kho me gihiliṅgaṃ, na sobhatī”ti vīmaṃsanatthaṃ, rakkhati tāva.
tika-vin05t:464_2: “Sobhatī”ti sampaṭicchitvā pana puna liṅgaṃ sādiyanto theyyasaṃvāsako hoti. Odātaṃ
tika-vin05t:464_3: nivāsetvā vīmaṃsanasampaṭicchanesupi eseva nayo. Sace pana nivatthakāsāvassa upari
tika-vin05t:464_4: odātaṃ nivāsetvā vīmaṃsati vā sampaṭicchati vā, rakkhatiyeva. Bhikkhuniyāpi eseva
tika-vin05t:464_5: nayo. Sāpi gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānā sace kāsāyaṃ gihinivāsanaṃ nivāseti “sobhati nu
tika-vin05t:464_6: kho me gihiliṅgaṃ, na sobhatī”ti vīmaṃsanatthaṃ, rakkhatiyeva. Sace “sobhatī”ti sampaṭicchati,
tika-vin05t:464_7: na rakkhati. Odātaṃ nivāsetvā vīmaṃsanasampaṭicchanesupi eseva nayo. Nivatthakāsāyassa
tika-vin05t:464_8: pana upari odātaṃ nivāsetvā vīmaṃsatu vā sampaṭicchatu vā, rakkhatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:465_0: Sace koci vuḍḍhapabbajito vassāni agaṇetvā pāḷiyampi aṭṭhatvā ekapassena gantvā mahāpeḷādīsu
tika-vin05t:465_1: kaṭacchunā ukkhitte bhattapiṇḍe pattaṃ upanāmetvā seno viya maṃsapesiṃ gahetvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:465_2: theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti, bhikkhuvassāni pana gaṇetvā gaṇhanto theyyasaṃvāsako hoti.
tika-vin05t:465_3: Sayaṃ sāmaṇerova sāmaṇerapaṭipāṭiyā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhanto theyyasaṃvāsako
tika-vin05t:465_4: na hoti. Bhikkhu bhikkhupaṭipāṭiyā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:466_0: 139. Titthiyapakkantakoti titthiyesu pakkanto paviṭṭhoti titthiyapakkantako, sopi
tika-vin05t:466_1: na pabbājetabbo. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – upasampanno bhikkhu “titthiyo bhavissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:466_2: saliṅgeneva tesaṃ upassayaṃ gacchati, padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ, tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte
tika-vin05t:466_3: titthiyapakkantako hoti. Yopi sayameva “titthiyo bhavissa”nti kusacīrādīni nivāseti,
tika-vin05t:466_4: titthiyapakkantako hotiyeva. Yo pana naggo nahāyanto attānaṃ oloketvā “sobhati me
tika-vin05t:466_5: ājīvakabhāvo, ājīvako bhavissa”nti kāsāyāni anādāya naggo ājīvakānaṃ upassayaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin05t:466_6: padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ. Sace panassa antarāmagge hirottappaṃ uppajjati, dukkaṭāni
tika-vin05t:466_7: desetvā muccati. Tesaṃ upassayaṃ gantvāpi tehi vā ovadito attanā vā “imesaṃ pabbajjā
tika-vin05t:466_8: atidukkhā”ti disvā nivattantopi muccatiyeva. Sace pana “kiṃ tumhākaṃ pabbajjāya ukkaṭṭha”nti
tika-vin05t:466_10: vā vattāni ādiyati, morapiñchādīni vā nivāseti, tesaṃ liṅgaṃ gaṇhāti, “ayaṃ pabbajjā
tika-vin05t:466_11: seṭṭhā”ti seṭṭhabhāvaṃ vā upagacchati, na muccati, titthiyapakkantako hoti. Sace
tika-vin05t:466_12: pana “sobhati nu kho me titthiyapabbajjā, nanu kho sobhatī”ti vīmaṃsanatthaṃ kusacīrādīni
tika-vin05t:466_13: vā nivāseti, jaṭaṃ vā bandhati, khārikājaṃ vā ādiyati, yāva na sampaṭicchati laddhiṃ,
tika-vin05t:466_14: tāva rakkhati, sampaṭicchitamatte titthiyapakkantako hoti. Acchinnacīvaro pana kusacīrādīni
tika-vin05t:466_15: nivāsento rājabhayādīhi vā titthiyaliṅgaṃ gaṇhanto laddhiyā abhāvena neva titthiyapakkantako
tika-vin05t:466_16: hoti. “Ayañca titthiyapakkantako nāma upasampannabhikkhunā kathito, tasmā sāmaṇero
tika-vin05t:466_17: saliṅgena titthiyāyatanaṃ gatopi puna pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhatī”ti kurundiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:466_18: vuttaṃ. Purimo pana theyyasaṃvāsako anupasampannena kathito, tasmā upasampanno kūṭavassaṃ
tika-vin05t:466_19: gaṇentopi assamaṇo na hoti. Liṅge saussāho pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā bhikkhuvassādīni gaṇhantopi
tika-vin05t:467_0: 140. Tiracchānagatoti nāgo vā hotu supaṇṇamāṇavakādīnaṃ vā aññataro antamaso sakkaṃ
tika-vin05t:467_1: devarājānaṃ upādāya yo koci amanussajātiyo, sabbova imasmiṃ atthe “tiracchānagato”ti
tika-vin05t:467_2: veditabbo. So ca neva upasampādetabbo na pabbājetabbo, upasampannopi nāsetabbo.
tika-vin05t:468_0: 141. Mātughātakādīsu pana yena manussitthibhūtā janikā mātā sayampi manussajātikeneva
tika-vin05t:468_1: sabhā sañcicca jīvitā voropitā, ayaṃ ānantariyena mātughātakakammena mātughātako.
tika-vin05t:468_2: Etassa pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca paṭikkhittā. Yena pana manussitthibhūtāpi ajanikā
tika-vin05t:468_3: posāvanikā mātā vā cūḷamātā vā janikāpi vā na manussitthibhūtā mātā ghātitā, tassa
tika-vin05t:468_4: pabbajjā na vāritā, na ca ānantariko hoti. Yena sayaṃ tiracchānabhūtena manussitthibhūtā
tika-vin05t:468_5: mātā ghātitā, sopi ānantariko na hoti, tiracchānagatattā panassa pabbajjā paṭikkhittā.
tika-vin05t:468_6: Pitughātakepi eseva nayo. Sacepi hi vesiyā putto hoti, “ayaṃ me pitā”ti na jānāti,
tika-vin05t:468_7: yassa sambhavena nibbatto, so ce anena ghātito, pitughātakotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin05t:469_0: Arahantaghātakopi manussaarahantavaseneva veditabbo. Manussajātiyañhi antamaso apabbajitampi
tika-vin05t:469_1: khīṇāsavaṃ dārakaṃ vā dārikaṃ vā sañcicca jīvitā voropento arahantaghātakova hoti,
tika-vin05t:469_2: ānantariyañca phusati, pabbajjā cassa vāritā. Amanussajātikaṃ pana arahantaṃ manussajātikaṃ
tika-vin05t:469_3: vā avasesaṃ ariyapuggalaṃ ghātetvā ānantariko na hoti, pabbajjāpissa na vāritā, kammaṃ
tika-vin05t:469_4: pana balavaṃ hoti. Tiracchāno manussaarahantampi ghātetvā ānantariko na hoti, kammaṃ
tika-vin05t:470_0: Yo pana devadatto viya duṭṭhacittena vadhakacittena tathāgatassa jīvamānakasarīre
tika-vin05t:470_1: khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeti, ayaṃ lohituppādako nāma. Etassa
tika-vin05t:470_2: pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca vāritā. Yo pana rogavūpasamatthaṃ jīvako viya satthena
tika-vin05t:470_3: phāletvā pūtimaṃsalohitaṃ haritvā phāsukaṃ karoti, bahuṃ so puññaṃ pasavatīti.
tika-vin05t:471: Yo devadatto viya sāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ katvā catunnaṃ kammānaṃ aññataravasena saṅghaṃ bhindati, ayaṃ saṅghabhedako nāma. Etassa pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca vāritā.
tika-vin05t:472_0: Yo pana pakatattaṃ bhikkhuniṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ dūseti, ayaṃ bhikkhunīdūsako
tika-vin05t:472_1: nāma. Etassa pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca vāritā. Yo pana kāyasaṃsaggena sīlavināsaṃ
tika-vin05t:472_2: pāpeti, tassa pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca na vāritā. Balakkārena odātavatthavasanaṃ
tika-vin05t:472_3: katvā anicchamānaṃyeva dūsentopi bhikkhunīdūsakoyeva, balakkārena pana odātavatthavasanaṃ
tika-vin05t:472_4: katvā icchamānaṃ dūsento bhikkhunīdūsako na hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā gihibhāve sampaṭicchi
tika-vin05t:472_5: tamatteyeva sā abhikkhunī hoti. Sakiṃsīlavipannaṃ pacchā dūsento sikkhamānasāmaṇerīsu
tika-vin05t:472_6: ca vippaṭipajjanto neva bhikkhunīdūsako hoti, pabbajjampi upasampadampi labhati.
tika-vin05t:473_0: 142. Ūnavīsativassassa pana upasampadāyeva paṭikkhittā, na pabbajjā, tasmā paṭisandhiggahaṇato
tika-vin05t:473_1: paṭṭhāya paripuṇṇavīsativasso upasampādetabbo. Gabbhavīsopi hi paripuṇṇavīsativassotveva
tika-vin05t:474: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mātukucchismiṃ paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, tadupādāya sāvassa jāti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gabbhavīsaṃ upasampādetu”nti.
tika-vin05t:475_0: Tattha yo dvādasa māse mātukucchismiṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya jāto, so tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t:475_1: yāva ekūnavīsatime vasse mahāpavāraṇā, taṃ atikkamitvā pāṭipade upasampādetabbo.
tika-vin05t:475_2: Etenupāyena hāyanavaḍḍhanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Porāṇakattherā pana ekūnavīsativassaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ
tika-vin05t:475_3: nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma pāṭipadadivase upasampādenti. Kasmā? Ekasmiṃ vasse
tika-vin05t:475_4: cha cātuddasikauposathā honti, iti vīsatiyā vassesu cattāro māsā parihāyanti, rājāno
tika-vin05t:475_5: tatiye tatiye gasse vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhanti, iti aṭṭhārasavassesu cha māsā vaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin05t:475_6: tato uposathavasena parihīne cattāro māse apanetvā dve māsā avasesā honti, te dve
tika-vin05t:475_7: māse gahetvā vīsati vassāni paripuṇṇāni hontīti nikkaṅkhā hutvā nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ
tika-vin05t:476_0: Ettha pana yo pavāretvā vīsativasso bhavissati, taṃ sandhāya “ekūnavīsativassa”nti
tika-vin05t:476_1: vuttaṃ. Tasmā yo mātukucchismiṃ dvādasa māse vasi, so ekavīsativasso hoti. Yo satta
tika-vin05t:476_2: māse vasi, so sattamāsādhikavīsativasso. Chamāsajāto pana na jīvati, ūnavīsativassaṃ
tika-vin05t:476_3: pana “paripuṇṇavīsativasso”ti saññāya upasampādentassa anāpatti, puggalo pana anupasampannova
tika-vin05t:476_4: hoti. Sace pana so dasavassaccayena aññaṃ upasampādeti, tañce muñcitvā gaṇo pūrati,
tika-vin05t:476_5: sūpasampanno. Sopi ca yāva na jānāti, tāvassa neva saggantarāyo na mokkhantarāyo,
tika-vin05t:477_0: 143. Iti imehi pabbajjādosehi virahitopi “na, bhikkhave, ananuññāto mātāpitūhi putto
tika-vin05t:477_1: pabbājetabbo”ti vacanato mātāpitūhi ananuññāto na pabbājetabbo. Tattha mātāpitūhīti
tika-vin05t:477_2: janake sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sace dvepi atthi, dvepi āpucchitabbā. Sace pitā mato hoti
tika-vin05t:477_3: mātā vā, yo jīvati, so āpucchi tabbo, pabbajitāpi āpucchitabbāva. Āpucchantena sayaṃ
tika-vin05t:477_4: vā gantvā āpucchitabbaṃ, añño vā pesetabbo. So eva vā pesetabbo “gaccha mātāpitaro
tika-vin05t:477_5: āpucchitvā ehī”ti. Sace “anuññātomhī”ti vadati, saddahantena pabbājetabbo. Pitā sayaṃ
tika-vin05t:477_6: pabbajito puttampi pabbājetukāmo hoti, mātaraṃ āpucchitvā pabbājetu. Mātā vā dhītaraṃ
tika-vin05t:477_7: pabbājetukāmā pitaraṃ āpucchitvāva pabbājetu. Pitā puttadārena anatthiko palāyi,
tika-vin05t:477_8: mātā “imaṃ pabbajethā”ti puttaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ deti, “pitāssa kuhi”nti vutte “cittakeḷiṃ
tika-vin05t:477_9: kīḷituṃ palāto”ti vadati, taṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Mātā kenaci purisena saddhiṃ palātā
tika-vin05t:477_10: hoti, pitā pana “pabbājethā”ti vadati, etthāpi eseva nayo. Pitā vippavuttho hoti,
tika-vin05t:477_11: mātā puttaṃ “pabbājethā”ti anujānāti, “pitāssa kuhi”nti vutte “kiṃ tumhākaṃ pitarā,
tika-vin05t:477_12: ahaṃ jānissāmī”ti vadati, pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:478_0: Mātāpitaro matā, dārako cūḷamātādīnaṃ santike saṃvaddho, tasmiṃ pabbājiyamāne ñātakā
tika-vin05t:478_1: kalahaṃ vā karonti khiyyanti vā, tasmā vivādupacchedanatthaṃ āpucchitvā pabbājetabbo,
tika-vin05t:478_2: anāpucchitvā pabbājentassa pana āpatti natthi. Daharakāle gahetvā posakā mātāpitaro
tika-vin05t:478_3: nāma honti, tesupi eseva nayo. Putto attānaṃ nissāya jīvati, na mātāpitaro. Sacepi
tika-vin05t:478_4: rājā hoti, āpucchitvāva pabbājetabbo. Mātāpitūhi anuññāto pabbajitvā puna vibbhamati,
tika-vin05t:478_5: sacepi satakkhattuṃ pabbajitvā vibbhamati, āgatāgatakāle punappunaṃ āpucchitvāva
tika-vin05t:478_6: pabbājetabbo. Sacepi evaṃ vadanti “ayaṃ vibbhamitvā gehaṃ āgato, amhākaṃ kammaṃ na
tika-vin05t:478_7: karoti, pabbajitvā tumhākaṃ vattaṃ na pūreti, natthi imassa āpucchanakiccaṃ, āgatāgataṃ
tika-vin05t:478_8: naṃ pabbājeyyāthā”ti, evaṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ puna anāpucchāpi pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:479_0: Yopi daharakāleyeva “ayaṃ tumhākaṃ dinno, yadā icchatha, tadā pabbājeyyāthā”ti evaṃ
tika-vin05t:479_1: dinno hoti, sopi āgatāgato puna anāpucchitvāva pabbājetabbo. Yaṃ pana daharakāleyeva
tika-vin05t:479_2: “imaṃ, bhante, pabbājeyyāthā”ti anujānitvā pacchā vuḍḍhippattakāle nānujānanti, ayaṃ
tika-vin05t:479_3: na anāpucchā pabbājetabbo. Eko mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā “pabbājetha ma”nti āgacchati,
tika-vin05t:479_4: “āpucchitvā ehī”ti ca vutto “nāhaṃ gacchāmi, sace maṃ na pabbājetha, vihāraṃ vā jhāpemi,
tika-vin05t:479_5: satthena vā tumhe paharāmi, tumhākaṃ ñātakānaṃ vā upaṭṭhākānaṃ vā ārāmacchedanādīhi
tika-vin05t:479_6: anatthaṃ uppādemi, rukkhā vā patitvā marāmi, coramajjhaṃ vā pavisāmi, desantaraṃ
tika-vin05t:479_7: vā gacchāmī”ti vadati, taṃ tasseva rakkhaṇatthāya pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace panassa
tika-vin05t:479_8: mātāpitaro āgantvā “kasmā amhākaṃ puttaṃ pabbājayitthā”ti vadanti, tesaṃ tamatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:479_9: ārocetvā “rakkhaṇatthāya naṃ pabbājayimha, paññāyatha tumhe puttenā”ti vattabbā.
tika-vin05t:479_10: “Rukkhā patissāmī”ti abhiruhitvā pana hatthapāde muñcantaṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:480_0: Eko videsaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācati, āpucchitvā ce gato, pabbājetabbo. No ce, daharabhikkhuṃ
tika-vin05t:480_1: pesetvā āpucchāpetvā pabbājetabbo. Atidūrañce hoti, pabbājetvāpi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
tika-vin05t:480_2: pesetvā dassetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kurundiyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sace dūraṃ hoti, maggo ca mahākantāro,
tika-vin05t:480_3: ‘gantvā āpucchissāmī’ti pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Sace pana mātāpitūnaṃ bahū puttā honti,
tika-vin05t:480_4: evañca vadanti “bhante, etesaṃ dārakānaṃ yaṃ icchatha, taṃ pabbājeyyāthā”ti, dārake
tika-vin05t:480_5: vīmaṃsitvā yaṃ icchati, so pabbājetabbo. Sacepi sakalena kulena vā gāmena vā anuññāto
tika-vin05t:480_6: hoti “bhante, imasmiṃ kule vā gāme vā yaṃ icchatha, taṃ pabbājeyyāthā”ti, yaṃ icchati, so pabbājetabboti.
tika-vin05t:481_0: 144. Evaṃ pabbajjādosavirahitaṃ mātāpitūhi anuññātaṃ pabbājentenapi ca sace acchinnakeso
tika-vin05t:481_1: hoti, ekasīmāyañca aññepi bhikkhū atthi, kesacchedanatthāya bhaṇḍukammaṃ āpucchitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:481_2: Tatrāyaṃ āpucchanavidhi – sīmāpariyāpanne bhikkhū sannipātetvā pabbajjāpekkhaṃ tattha
tika-vin05t:481_3: netvā “saṅghaṃ, bhante, imassa dārakassa bhaṇḍukammaṃ āpucchāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ vā
tika-vin05t:481_4: dvikkhattuṃ vā sakiṃ vā vattabbaṃ. Ettha ca “imassa dārakassa bhaṇḍukammaṃ āpucchāmī”tipi
tika-vin05t:481_6: vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Sace sabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, dasa vā vīsati vā tiṃsaṃ vā bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:481_7: vasantīti paricchedo paññāyati, tesaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ vā nisinnokāsaṃ vā gantvāpi purimanayeneva
tika-vin05t:481_8: āpucchitabbaṃ. Pabbajjāpekkhaṃ vināva daharabhikkhū vā sāmaṇere vā pesetvāpi “eko,
tika-vin05t:481_9: bhante, pabbajjāpekkho atthi, tassa bhaṇḍukammaṃ āpucchāmā”tiādinā nayena āpucchāpetuṃ
tika-vin05t:481_10: vaṭṭati. Sace keci bhikkhū senāsanaṃ vā gumbādīni vā pavisitvā niddāyanti vā samaṇadhammaṃ
tika-vin05t:481_11: vā karonti, āpucchakā ca pariyesantāpi adisvā “sabbe āpucchitā amhehī”ti saññino
tika-vin05t:481_12: honti, pabbajjā nāma lahukakammaṃ, tasmā pabbajito supabbajito, pabbājentassapi anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:482_0: Sace pana vihāro mahā hoti anekabhikkhusahassāvāso, sabbe bhikkhū sannipātāpetumpi
tika-vin05t:482_1: dukkaraṃ, pageva paṭipāṭiyā āpucchituṃ, khaṇḍasīmāya vā ṭhatvā nadīsamuddādīni vā
tika-vin05t:482_2: gantvā pabbājetabbo. Yo pana navamuṇḍo vā hoti vibbhantako vā nigaṇṭhādīsu aññataro
tika-vin05t:482_3: vā dvaṅgulakeso vā ūnadvaṅgulakeso vā, tassa kesacchedanakiccaṃ natthi, tasmā bhaṇḍukammaṃ
tika-vin05t:482_4: anāpucchitvāpi tādisaṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dvaṅgulātirittakeso pana yo hoti antamaso
tika-vin05t:483_0: 145. Evaṃ āpucchitvā pabbājentena ca paripuṇṇapattacīvarova pabbājetabbo. Sace tassa
tika-vin05t:483_1: natthi, yācitakenapi pattacīvarena pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati, sabhāgaṭṭhāne vissāsena gahetvāpi
tika-vin05t:483_2: pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana apakkaṃ pattaṃ cīvarūpagāni ca vatthāni gahetvā āgato
tika-vin05t:483_3: hoti, yāva patto paccati, cīvarāni ca karīyanti, tāva vihāre vasantassa anāmaṭṭhapiṇḍapātaṃ
tika-vin05t:483_4: dātuṃ vaṭṭati, thālakesu bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Purebhattaṃ sāmaṇerabhāgasamako āmisabhāgo
tika-vin05t:483_5: dātuṃ vaṭṭati, senāsanaggāho pana salākabhattauddesabhattanimantanādīni ca na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:483_7: Sace gilāno hoti, bhesajjamassa kātuṃ vaṭṭati, sāmaṇerassa viya sabbaṃ paṭijagganakammaṃ.
tika-vin05t:483_8: Upasampadāpekkhaṃ pana yācitakena pattacīvarena upasampādetuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:483_9: yācitakena pattacīvarena upasampādetabbo, yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:483_10: vuttaṃ. Tasmā so paripuṇṇapattacīvaroyeva upasampādetabbo. Sace tassa natthi, ācariyupajjhāyā
tika-vin05t:483_11: cassa dātukāmā honti, aññe vā bhikkhū nirapekkhehi nissajjitvā adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:483_12: dātabbaṃ. Yācitakena pana pattena vā cīvarena vā upasampādentasseva āpatti hoti,
tika-vin05t:484_0: 146. Paripuṇṇapattacīvaraṃ pabbājentenapi sace okāso hoti, sayaṃ pabbājetabbo. Sace
tika-vin05t:484_1: uddesaparipucchādīhi byāvaṭo hoti, okāsaṃ na labhati, eko daharabhikkhu vattabbo
tika-vin05t:484_2: “etaṃ pabbājehī”ti. Avuttopi ce daharabhikkhu upajjhāyaṃ uddissa pabbājeti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:484_3: Sace daharabhikkhu natthi, sāmaṇeropi vattabbo “etaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ netvā pabbājetvā
tika-vin05t:484_4: kāsāyāni acchādetvā ehī”ti. Saraṇāni pana sayaṃ dātabbāni. Evaṃ bhikkhunāva pabbājito
tika-vin05t:484_5: hoti. Purisañhi bhikkhuto añño pabbājetuṃ na labhati, mātugāmaṃ bhikkhunīto añño,
tika-vin05t:484_6: sāmaṇero pana sāmaṇerī vā āṇattiyā kāsāyāni dātuṃ labhanti, kesoropanaṃ yena kenaci kataṃ sukataṃ.
tika-vin05t:485_0: Sace pana bhabbarūpo hoti sahetuko ñāto yasassī kulaputto, okāsaṃ katvāpi sayameva
tika-vin05t:485_1: pabbājetabbo, “mattikāmuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā nahāyitvā āgacchāhī”ti ca na pana vissajjetabbo.
tika-vin05t:485_2: Pabbajitukāmānañhi paṭhamaṃ balavaussāho hoti, pacchā pana kāsāyāni ca kesaharaṇasatthakañca
tika-vin05t:485_3: disvā utrasanti, ettoyeva palāyanti, tasmā sayameva nahānatitthaṃ netvā sace nātidaharo,
tika-vin05t:485_4: “nahāhī”ti vattabbo, kesā panassa sayameva mattikaṃ gahetvā dhovitabbā. Daharakumārako
tika-vin05t:485_5: pana sayaṃ udakaṃ otaritvā gomayamattikāhi ghaṃsitvā nahāpetabbo. Sacepissa kacchu
tika-vin05t:485_6: vā piḷakā vā honti, yathā mātā puttaṃ na jigucchati, evamevaṃ ajigucchantena sādhukaṃ
tika-vin05t:485_7: hatthapādato ca sīsato ca paṭṭhāya ghaṃsitvā ghaṃsitvā nahāpetabbo. Kasmā? Ettakena
tika-vin05t:485_8: hi upakārena kulaputtā ācariyupajjhāyesu ca sāsane ca balavasinehā tibbagāravā anivattidhammā
tika-vin05t:485_9: honti, uppannaṃ anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā therabhāvaṃ pāpuṇanti, kataññukatavedino honti.
tika-vin05t:486_0: Evaṃ nahāpanakāle pana kesamassuṃ oropanakāle vā “tvaṃ ñāto yasassī, idāni mayaṃ
tika-vin05t:486_1: taṃ nissāya paccayehi na kilamissāmā”ti na vattabbo, aññāpi aniyyānikakathā na vattabbā,
tika-vin05t:486_2: atha khvassa “āvuso, suṭṭhu upadhārehi, satiṃ upaṭṭhāpehī”ti vatvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:486_4: nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ vā pākaṭaṃ karontena ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace hi so pubbe madditasaṅkhāro
tika-vin05t:486_5: hoti bhāvitabhāvano kaṇṭakavedhāpekkho viya paripakkagaṇḍo sūriyuggamanāpekkhaṃ viya
tika-vin05t:486_6: ca pariṇatapadumaṃ, athassa āraddhamatte kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikāre indāsani viya pabbate
tika-vin05t:486_7: kilesapabbate cuṇṇayamānaṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattati, khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin05t:486_8: Ye hi keci khuragge arahattaṃ pattā, sabbe te evarūpaṃ savanaṃ labhitvā kalyāṇamittena
tika-vin05t:486_9: ācariyena dinnanayaṃ nissāya, no anissāya. Tasmāssa āditova evarūpī kathā kathetabbāti.
tika-vin05t:487_0: Kesesu pana oropitesu haliddicuṇṇena vā gandhacuṇṇena vā sīsañca sarīrañca ubbaṭṭetvā
tika-vin05t:487_1: gihigandhaṃ apanetvā kāsāyāni tikkhattuṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā sakiṃ vā paṭiggāhāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:487_2: Athāpissa hatthe adatvā ācariyo vā upajjhāyo vā sayameva acchādeti, vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin05t:487_3: aññaṃ daharaṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā āṇāpeti “āvuso, etāni kāsāyāni gahetvā
tika-vin05t:487_4: etaṃ acchādehī”ti, taññeva vā āṇāpeti “etāni gahetvā acchādehī”ti, sabbaṃ taṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:487_5: sabbaṃ tena bhikkhunāva dinnaṃ hoti. Yaṃ pana nivāsanaṃ vā pārupanaṃ vā anāṇattiyā
tika-vin05t:487_6: nivāseti vā pārupati vā, taṃ apanetvā puna dātabbaṃ. Bhikkhunā hi sahatthena vā āṇattiyā
tika-vin05t:487_7: vā dinnameva kāsāyaṃ vaṭṭati, adinnaṃ na vaṭṭati. Sacepi tasseva santakaṃ hoti, ko
tika-vin05t:488_0: 147. Evaṃ pana dinnāni kāsāyāni acchādāpetvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā ye tattha
tika-vin05t:488_1: sannipatitā bhikkhū, tesaṃ pāde vandāpetvā atha saraṇagahaṇatthaṃ ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā
tika-vin05t:488_2: añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā “evaṃ vadehī”ti vattabbo, “yamahaṃ vadāmi, taṃ vadehī”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin05t:488_3: Athassa upajjhāyena vā ācariyena vā “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”tiādinā nayena saraṇāni
tika-vin05t:488_4: dātabbāni yathāvuttapaṭipāṭiyāva, na uppaṭipāṭiyā. Sace hi ekapadampi ekakkharampi
tika-vin05t:488_5: uppaṭipāṭiyā deti, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃyeva vā tikkhattuṃ datvā puna itaresu ekekaṃ tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin05t:489_0: Imañca pana saraṇagamanupasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā anuññātaupasampadā ekatosuddhiyā
tika-vin05t:489_1: vaṭṭati, sāmaṇerapabbajjā pana ubhatosuddhiyāva vaṭṭati, no ekatosuddhiyā. Tasmā
tika-vin05t:489_2: upasampadāya sace ācariyo ñattidosañceva kammavācādosañca vajjetvā kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:489_3: sukataṃ hoti. Pabbajjāya pana imāni tīṇi saraṇāni bu-kāra dha-kārādīnaṃ byañjanānaṃ
tika-vin05t:489_4: ṭhānakaraṇasampadaṃ ahāpentena ācariyenapi antevāsikenapi vattabbāni. Sace ācariyo
tika-vin05t:489_5: vattuṃ sakkoti, antevāsiko na sakkoti, antevāsiko vā sakkoti, ācariyo na sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:489_6: ubhopi vā na sakkonti, na vaṭṭati. Sace pana ubhopi sakkonti, vaṭṭati. Imāni ca pana
tika-vin05t:489_7: dadamānena “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti evaṃ ekasambandhāni anunāsikantāni vā katvā
tika-vin05t:489_8: dātabbāni, “buddhama saraṇama gacchāmī”ti evaṃ vicchinditvā makārantāni vā katvā
tika-vin05t:489_9: dātabbāni. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nāmaṃ sāvetvā ‘ahaṃ, bhante, buddharakkhito yāvajīvaṃ
tika-vin05t:489_10: buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ ekaṭṭhakathāyampi natthi, pāḷiyampi na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:489_11: tesaṃ rucimattameva, tasmā na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi tathā avadantassa saraṇaṃ kuppati.
tika-vin05t:490: 148. Sace panesa gatimā hoti paṇḍitajātiko, athassa tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne sikkhāpadāni uddisitabbāni. Kathaṃ? Yathā bhagavatā uddiṭṭhāni. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:491_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṃ dasa sikkhāpadāni, tesu ca sāmaṇerehi sikkhituṃ.
tika-vin05t:491_1: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, adinnādānā veramaṇi, abrahmacariyā veramaṇi, musāvādā veramaṇi,
tika-vin05t:491_2: surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, vikālabhojanā veramaṇi, naccagītavādita visūkadassanā
tika-vin05t:491_3: veramaṇi, mālāgandha vilepana dhāraṇa maṇḍana vibhūsanaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, uccāsayanamahāsayanā
tika-vin05t:492_0: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ahaṃ, bhante, itthannāmo yāvajīvaṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin05t:492_1: samādiyāmī”ti evaṃ saraṇadānaṃ viya sikkhāpadadānampi vuttaṃ, taṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na
tika-vin05t:492_2: aṭṭhakathāsu atthi, tasmā yathāpāḷiyāva uddisitabbāni. Pabbajjā hi saraṇagamaneheva
tika-vin05t:492_3: siddhā, sikkhāpadāni pana kevalaṃ sikkhāpadapūraṇatthaṃ jānitabbāni, tasmā pāḷiyā
tika-vin05t:492_4: āgatanayeneva uggahetuṃ asakkontassa yāya kāyaci bhāsāya atthavasenapi ācikkhituṃ
tika-vin05t:492_5: vaṭṭati. Yāva pana attanā sikkhitabbasikkhāpadāni na jānāti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṭṭhānanisajjādīsu
tika-vin05t:492_6: pānabhojanādividhimhi ca na kusalo hoti, tāva bhojanasālaṃ vā salākabhājanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:492_7: vā aññaṃ vā tathārūpaṭṭhānaṃ na pesetabbo, santikāvacaroyeva kātabbo, bāladārako
tika-vin05t:492_8: viya paṭipajjitabbo, sabbamassa kappiyākappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ, nivāsanapārupanādīsu
tika-vin05t:493_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dasahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nāsetuṃ. Pāṇātipātī hoti,
tika-vin05t:493_1: adinnādāyī hoti, abrahmacārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, majjapāyī hoti, buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:493_2: bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, micchādiṭṭhiko hoti,
tika-vin05t:494: Evaṃ vuttāni dasa nāsanaṅgāni ārakā parivajjetvā ābhisamācārikaṃ paripūrentena dasavidhe sīle sādhukaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:495_0: 149. Yo pana pāṇātipātādīsu dasasu nāsanaṅgesu ekampi kammaṃ karoti, so liṅganāsanāya
tika-vin05t:495_1: nāsetabbo. Tīsu hi nāsanāsu liṅganāsanāyeva idhādhippetā. Yathā ca bhikkhūnaṃ pāṇātipātādīsu
tika-vin05t:495_2: tā tā āpattiyo honti, na tathā sāmaṇerānaṃ. Sāmaṇero hi kuntha kipillikampi māretvā
tika-vin05t:495_3: maṅgulaṇḍakampi bhinditvā nāsetabbataṃyeva pāpuṇāti, tāvadevassa saraṇagamanāni ca
tika-vin05t:495_4: upajjhāyaggahaṇañca senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhanti, saṅghalābhaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin05t:495_5: liṅgamattameva ekaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti. So sace ākiṇṇadosova hoti, āyatiṃ saṃvare na
tika-vin05t:495_6: tiṭṭhati, nikkaḍḍhitabbo. Atha sahasā virajjhitvā “duṭṭhu mayā kata”nti puna saṃvare
tika-vin05t:495_7: ṭhātukāmo hoti, liṅganāsanakiccaṃ natthi, yathānivatthapārutasseva saraṇāni dātabbāni,
tika-vin05t:495_8: upajjhāyo dātabbo. Sikkhāpadāni pana saraṇagamaneneva ijjhanti. Sāmaṇerānañhi saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-vin05t:495_9: bhikkhūnaṃ upasampadakammavācāsadisaṃ, tasmā bhikkhūnaṃ viya catupārisuddhisīlaṃ
tika-vin05t:495_10: imināpi dasa sīlāni samādinnāneva honti, evaṃ santepi daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ āyatiṃ saṃvare
tika-vin05t:495_11: patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ puna dātabbāni. Sace purimikāya puna saraṇāni gahitāni, pacchimikāya
tika-vin05t:495_12: vassāvāsikaṃ lacchati. Sace pacchimikāya gahitāni, saṅghena apaloketvā lābho dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:495_13: Adinnādāne tiṇasalākamattenapi vatthunā, abrahmacariye tīsu maggesu yattha katthaci
tika-vin05t:495_14: vippaṭipattiyā, musāvāde hasādhippāyatāyapi musā bhaṇite assamaṇo hoti, nāsetabbataṃ
tika-vin05t:495_15: āpajjati, majjapāne pana bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya majjaṃ pivantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:495_16: Sāmaṇero jānitvā pivantova sīlabhedaṃ āpajjati, na ajānitvā. Yāni panassa itarāni
tika-vin05t:495_17: pañca sikkhāpadāni, etesu bhinnesu na nāsetabbo, daṇḍakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sikkhāpade
tika-vin05t:495_18: pana puna dinnepi adinnepi vaṭṭati, daṇḍakammena pana pīḷetvā āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhapanatthāya dātabbameva.
tika-vin05t:496_0: Avaṇṇabhāsane pana “arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādīnaṃ paṭipakkhavasena buddhassa vā
tika-vin05t:496_2: saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto ratanattayaṃ nindanto garahanto ācariyupajjhāyādīhi
tika-vin05t:496_3: “mā evaṃ avacā”ti avaṇṇabhāsane ādīnavaṃ dassetvā nivāretabbo. “Sace yāvatatiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:496_4: vuccamāno na oramati, kaṇṭakanāsanāya nāsetabbo”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:496_5: pana “sace evaṃ vuccamāno taṃ laddhiṃ nissajjati, daṇḍakammaṃ kāretvā accayaṃ desāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:496_6: Sace na nissajjati, tatheva ādāya paggayha tiṭṭhati, liṅganāsanāya nāsetabbo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:496_7: taṃ yuttaṃ. Ayameva hi nāsanā idhādhippetāti. Micchādiṭṭhikepi eseva nayo. Sassatucchedānañhi
tika-vin05t:496_8: aññataradiṭṭhiko sace ācariyādīhi ovadiyamāno nissajjati, daṇḍakammaṃ kāretvā accayaṃ
tika-vin05t:496_9: desāpetabbo, apaṭinissajjantova nāsetabbo. Bhikkhunīdūsako cettha kāmaṃ abrahmacāriggahaṇena
tika-vin05t:496_10: gahitova, abrahmacāriṃ pana āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhātukāmaṃ saraṇāni datvā upasampādetuṃ
tika-vin05t:496_11: vaṭṭati. Bhikkhunīdūsako āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhātukāmopi pabbajjampi na labhati, pageva
tika-vin05t:496_12: upasampadanti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “bhikkhunīdūsako”ti idaṃ visuṃ dasamaṃ aṅgaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:497_0: 150. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-vin05t:497_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ alābhāya parisakkati, bhikkhūnaṃ anatthāya parisakkati, bhikkhūnaṃ avāsāya
tika-vin05t:497_2: parisakkati, bhikkhū akkosati, paribhāsati, bhikkhū bhikkhūhi bhedetī”ti “vacanato
tika-vin05t:497_3: pana imāni pañca aṅgāni, sikkhāpadesu ca pacchimāni vikālabhojanādīni pañcāti dasa
tika-vin05t:497_5: yattha vā vasati, yattha vā paṭikkamati, tattha āvaraṇaṃ kātu”nti vacanato yattha
tika-vin05t:497_6: vasati vā pavisati vā, tattha āvaraṇaṃ kātabbaṃ “mā idha pavisā”ti. Ubhayenapi attano
tika-vin05t:497_7: pariveṇañca vassaggena pattasenāsanañca vuttaṃ. Tasmā na sabbo saṅghārāmo āvaraṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:497_8: kātabbo, karonto ca dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati “na, bhikkhave, sabbo saṅghārāmo āvaraṇaṃ kātabbo,
tika-vin05t:497_9: yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā. Na ca mukhadvāriko āhāro āvaraṇaṃ kātabbo,
tika-vin05t:497_10: karonto ca dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati “na, bhikkhave, mukhadvāriko āhāro āvaraṇaṃ kātabbo,
tika-vin05t:497_11: yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā. Tasmā “ajja mā khāda mā bhuñjā”ti vadatopi
tika-vin05t:497_12: “āhārampi nivāressāmī”ti pattacīvaraṃ anto nikkhipatopi sabbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ. Anācārassa
tika-vin05t:497_13: pana dubbacasāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammaṃ katvā yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā pattacīvaraṃ vā dassetvā
tika-vin05t:497_14: “ettake nāma daṇḍakamme āhaṭe idaṃ lacchasī”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Bhagavatā hi āvaraṇameva
tika-vin05t:497_16: āharāpanampi kātabba”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā tampi kātabbaṃ, tañca kho “oramissati viramissatī”ti
tika-vin05t:497_18: karomī”ti ca uṇhapāsāṇe vā nipajjāpetuṃ pāsāṇiṭṭhakādīni vā sīse nikkhipāpetuṃ udakaṃ
tika-vin05t:498_0: Upajjhāyaṃ anāpucchāpi daṇḍakammaṃ na kāretabbaṃ “na, bhikkhave, upajjhāyaṃ anāpucchā
tika-vin05t:498_1: āvaraṇaṃ kātabbaṃ, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato. Ettha pana “tumhākaṃ
tika-vin05t:498_2: sāmaṇerassa ayaṃ nāma aparādho, daṇḍakammamassa karothā”ti tikkhattuṃ vutte sace
tika-vin05t:498_3: so upajjhāyo daṇḍakammaṃ na karoti, sayaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sacepi ādito upajjhāyo vadati
tika-vin05t:498_4: “mayhaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ dose sati tumhe daṇḍakammaṃ karothā”ti, kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Yathā
tika-vin05t:498_5: ca sāmaṇerānaṃ, evaṃ saddhivihārikantevāsikānampi daṇḍakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, aññesaṃ
tika-vin05t:498_6: pana parisā na apalāḷetabbā, apalāḷento dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati “na, bhikkhave, aññassa
tika-vin05t:498_7: parisā apalāḷetabbā, yo apalāḷeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato. Tasmā “tumhākaṃ
tika-vin05t:498_8: pattaṃ dema, cīvaraṃ demā”ti attano upaṭṭhānakaraṇatthaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā sāmaṇerā vā
tika-vin05t:498_9: hontu upasampannā vā, antamaso dussīlabhikkhussapi parassa parisabhūte bhinditvā
tika-vin05t:498_10: gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati, ādīnavaṃ pana vattuṃ vaṭṭati “tayā nahāyituṃ āgatena gūthamakkhanaṃ
tika-vin05t:498_11: viya kataṃ dussīlaṃ nissāya viharantenā”ti. Sace so sayameva jānitvā upajjhaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:502_0: 151. Nissayoti ettha pana ayaṃ nissayo nāma kena dātabbo, kena na dātabbo, kassa
tika-vin05t:502_1: dātabbo, kassa na dātabbo, kathaṃ gahito hoti, kathaṃ paṭippassambhati, nissāya kena
tika-vin05t:502_2: vasitabbaṃ, kena ca na vasitabbanti? Tattha kena dātabbo, kena na dātabboti ettha
tika-vin05t:502_3: tāva “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena
tika-vin05t:502_4: vā upasampādetuṃ, nissayaṃ dātu”nti ca vacanato yo byatto hoti paṭibalo upasampadāya
tika-vin05t:502_5: dasavasso vā atirekadasavasso vā, tena dātabbo, itarena na dātabbo. Sace deti, dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin05t:503_0: Ettha ca “byatto”ti iminā parisupaṭṭhāpakabahussuto veditabbo. Parisupaṭṭhāpakena
tika-vin05t:503_1: hi sabbantimena paricchedena parisaṃ abhivinaye vinetuṃ dve vibhaṅgā paguṇā vācuggatā
tika-vin05t:503_2: kātabbā, asakkontena tīhi janehi saddhiṃ parivattanakkhamā kātabbā, kammākammañca
tika-vin05t:503_3: khandhakavattañca uggahetabbaṃ, parisāya pana abhidhamme vinayanatthaṃ sace majjhimabhāṇako
tika-vin05t:503_4: hoti, mūlapaṇṇāsako uggahetabbo, dīghabhāṇakena mahāvaggo, saṃyuttabhāṇakena heṭṭhimā
tika-vin05t:503_5: vā tayo vaggā mahāvaggo vā, aṅguttarabhāṇakena heṭṭhā vā upari vā upaḍḍhanikāyo uggahetabbo,
tika-vin05t:503_6: asakkontena tikanipātato paṭṭhāya uggahetumpi vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “ekaṃ
tika-vin05t:503_7: gaṇhantena catukkanipātaṃ vā pañcakanipātaṃ vā uggahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Jātakabhāṇakena
tika-vin05t:503_8: sāṭṭhakathaṃ jātakaṃ uggahetabbaṃ, tato oraṃ na vaṭṭati. “Dhammapadampi saha vatthunā
tika-vin05t:503_9: uggahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tato tato samuccayaṃ katvā mūlapaṇṇāsakamattaṃ
tika-vin05t:503_10: vaṭṭati, “na vaṭṭatī”ti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ, itarāsu vicāraṇāyeva natthi.
tika-vin05t:503_11: Abhidhamme kiñci gahetabbanti na vuttaṃ. Yassa pana sāṭṭhakathampi vinayapiṭakaṃ
tika-vin05t:503_12: abhidhammapiṭakañca paguṇaṃ, suttante ca vuttappakāro gantho natthi, parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ
tika-vin05t:503_13: na labhati. Yena pana suttantato ca vinayato ca vuttappamāṇo gantho uggahito, ayaṃ
tika-vin05t:503_14: parisupaṭṭhāko bahussutova hoti, disāpāmokkho yenakāmaṃgamo parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ
tika-vin05t:504: Yo pana antevāsino vā saddhivihārikassa vā gilānassa sakkoti upaṭṭhānādīni kātuṃ, ayaṃ idha “paṭibalo”ti adhippeto. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ –
tika-vin05t:505_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo
tika-vin05t:505_1: dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Na asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti,
tika-vin05t:505_2: na asekkhena samādhikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na asekkhena paññākkhandhena samannāgato
tika-vin05t:505_3: hoti, na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena
tika-vin05t:505_4: samannāgato hoti. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:505_5: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:506_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:506_1: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Attanā na asekkhena sīlakkhandhena
tika-vin05t:506_2: samannāgato hoti, na paraṃ asekkhe sīlakkhandhe samādapetā. Attanā na asekkhena samādhikkhandhena
tika-vin05t:506_3: samannāgato hoti, na paraṃ asekkhe samādhikkhandhe samādapetā. Attanā na asekkhena
tika-vin05t:506_4: paññākkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na paraṃ asekkhe paññākkhandhe samādapetā. Attanā
tika-vin05t:506_5: na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na paraṃ asekkhe vimuttikkhandhe
tika-vin05t:506_6: samādapetā. Attanā na asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na
tika-vin05t:506_7: paraṃ asekkhe vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhe samādapetā. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi
tika-vin05t:506_8: samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:507_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:507_1: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī
tika-vin05t:507_2: hoti, kusīto hoti, muṭṭhassati hoti. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena
tika-vin05t:507_3: bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:508_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:508_1: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre
tika-vin05t:508_2: ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti, appassuto hoti, duppañño hoti.
tika-vin05t:508_3: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ, na
tika-vin05t:509_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:509_1: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Na paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṃ vā saddhivihāriṃ
tika-vin05t:509_2: vā gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā, anabhirataṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ
tika-vin05t:509_3: vā, uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ, āpattiṃ na jānāti, āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:509_4: na jānāti. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:509_5: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:510_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:510_1: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Na paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṃ vā saddhivihāriṃ
tika-vin05t:510_2: vā ābhisamācārikāya sikkhāya sikkhāpetuṃ, ādibrahmacariyakāya sikkhāya vinetuṃ, abhidhamme
tika-vin05t:510_3: vinetuṃ, abhivinaye vinetuṃ, uppannaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ dhammato vivecetuṃ. Imehi kho,
tika-vin05t:510_4: bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo,
tika-vin05t:511_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:511_1: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Āpattiṃ na jānāti, anāpattiṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin05t:511_2: lahukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni
tika-vin05t:511_3: vitthārena na svāgatāni honti na suvibhattāni na suppavattīni na suvinicchitāni suttaso
tika-vin05t:511_4: anubyañjanaso. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:511_5: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:512_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:512_1: na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Āpattiṃ na jānāti, anāpattiṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin05t:512_2: lahukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ūnadasavasso hoti. Imehi kho,
tika-vin05t:512_3: bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo,
tika-vin05t:513_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena
tika-vin05t:513_1: vā upasampādetuṃ, nissayaṃ dātu”nti ca evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttasseva upajjhāyācariyalakkhaṇassa
tika-vin05t:514_0: Tattha kiñci ayuttavasena paṭikkhittaṃ, kiñci āpattiaṅgavasena. Tathā hi “na asekkhena
tika-vin05t:514_1: sīlakkhandhenā”ti ca “attanā na asekkhenā”ti ca “assaddho”ti ca ādīsu tīsu pañcakesu
tika-vin05t:514_2: ayuttavasena paṭikkhepo kato, na āpattiaṅgavasena. Yo hi asekkhehi sīlakkhandhādīhi
tika-vin05t:514_3: asamannāgato pare ca tattha samādapetuṃ asakkonto assaddhiyādidosayuttova hutvā parisaṃ
tika-vin05t:514_4: pariharati, tassa parisā sīlādīhi pariyāyatiyeva na vaḍḍhati, tasmā “tena na upasampādetabba”ntiādi
tika-vin05t:514_5: ayuttavasena vuttaṃ, na āpattiaṅgavasena. Na hi khīṇāsavasseva upajjhācariyabhāvo
tika-vin05t:514_6: bhagavatā anuññāto, yadi tasseva anuññāto abhavissa, “sace upajjhāyassa anabhirati
tika-vin05t:514_7: uppannā hotī”tiādiṃ na vadeyya, yasmā pana khīṇāsavassa parisā sīlādīhi na parihāyati,
tika-vin05t:514_8: tasmā “pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:515_0: Adhisīle sīlavipannotiādīsu pārājikañca saṅghādisesañca āpanno adhisīle sīlavipanno
tika-vin05t:515_1: nāma. Itare pañcāpattikkhandhe āpanno ajjhācāre ācāravipanno nāma. Sammādiṭṭhiṃ pahāya
tika-vin05t:515_2: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno nāma. Yattakaṃ sutaṃ
tika-vin05t:515_3: parisaṃ pariharantassa icchitabbaṃ, tena virahitattā appassuto. Yaṃ tena jānitabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:515_4: āpattādi, tassa ajānanato duppañño. Imasmiṃ pañcake purimāni tīṇi padāni ayuttavasena
tika-vin05t:516_0: Āpattiṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ nāma mayā kata”nti vutte “imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ ayaṃ āpanno”ti
tika-vin05t:516_1: na jānāti. Vuṭṭhānaṃ na jānātīti “vuṭṭhānagāminito vā desanāgāminito vā āpattito
tika-vin05t:516_2: evaṃ nāma vuṭṭhānaṃ hotī”ti na jānāti. Imasmiñhi pañcake purimāni dve padāni ayuttavasena
tika-vin05t:517_0: Ābhisamācārikāya sikkhāyāti khandhakavatte vinetuṃ na paṭibalo hotīti attho. Ādibrahmacariyakāyāti
tika-vin05t:517_1: sekkhapaṇṇattiyaṃ vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti attho. Abhidhammeti nāmarūpaparicchede vinetuṃ
tika-vin05t:517_2: na paṭibaloti attho. Abhivinayeti sakale vinayapiṭake vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti attho.
tika-vin05t:517_3: Vinetuṃ na paṭibaloti ca sabbattha sikkhāpetuṃ na sakkotīti attho. Dhammato vivecetunti
tika-vin05t:517_4: dhammena kāraṇena vissajjāpetuṃ. Imasmiṃ pañcake sabbapadesu āpatti.
tika-vin05t:518_0: “Āpattiṃ na jānātī”tiādipañcakasmiṃ vitthārenāti ubhatovibhaṅgena saddhiṃ. Na svāgatānīti
tika-vin05t:518_1: na suṭṭhu āgatāni. Suvibhattānīti suṭṭhu vibhattāni padapaccābhaṭṭhasaṅkaradosaraatāni.
tika-vin05t:518_2: Suppavattīnīti paguṇāni vācuggatāni suvinicchitāni. Suttasoti khandhakaparivārato
tika-vin05t:518_4: ca suvinicchitāni akhaṇḍāni aviparītakkharāni. Etena aṭṭhakathā dīpitā. Aṭṭhakathāto
tika-vin05t:518_5: hi esa vinicchayo hotīti. Imasmiṃ pañcakepi sabbapadesu āpatti. Ūnadasavassapariyosānapañcakepi
tika-vin05t:518_6: eseva nayo. Iti ādito tayo pañcakā, catutthe tīṇi padāni, pañcame dve padānīti sabbepi
tika-vin05t:518_7: cattāro pañcakā ayuttavasena vuttā, catutthe pañcake dve padāni, pañcame tīṇi, chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamā
tika-vin05t:518_8: tayo pañcakāti sabbepi cattāro pañcakā āpattiaṅgavasena vuttā.
tika-vin05t:519_0: Sukkapakkhe pana vuttavipariyāyena “pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā
tika-vin05t:519_1: upasampādetabbaṃ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. Asekkhena sīlakkhandhena
tika-vin05t:519_2: samannāgato hotī”tiādinā aṭṭha pañcakā āgatāyeva. Tattha sabbattheva anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:520_0: 152. Kassa dātabbo, kassa na dātabboti ettha pana yo lajjī hoti, tassa dātabbo. Itarassa
tika-vin05t:520_1: na dātabbo “na, bhikkhave, alajjīnaṃ nissayo dātabbo, yo dadeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:520_2: vacanato. Nissāya vasantenapi alajjī nissāya na vasitabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:520_3: alajjīnaṃ nissāya vatthabbaṃ, yo vaseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. Ettha ca alajjīnanti
tika-vin05t:520_4: upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ, alajjipuggale nissāya na vasitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā
tika-vin05t:520_5: navaṃ ṭhānaṃ gatena “ehi, bhikkhu, nissayaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vuccamānenapi catūhapañcāhaṃ
tika-vin05t:520_6: nissayadāyakassa lajjibhāvaṃ upaparikkhitvā nissayo gahetabbo. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:520_7: catūhapañcāhaṃ āgametuṃ yāva bhikkhusabhāgataṃ jānāmī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Sace “thero lajjī”ti
tika-vin05t:520_8: bhikkhūnaṃ santike sutvā āgatadivaseyeva gahetukāmo hoti, thero pana “āgamehi tāva,
tika-vin05t:520_9: vasanto jānissasī”ti katipāhaṃ ācāraṃ upaparikkhitvā nissayaṃ deti, vaṭṭati, pakatiyā
tika-vin05t:520_10: nissayagahaṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatena pana tadaheva gahetabbo, ekadivasampi parihāro natthi.
tika-vin05t:520_11: Sace paṭhamayāme ācariyassa okāso natthi, okāsaṃ alabhanto “paccūsasamaye gahessāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:520_12: sayati, aruṇaṃ uggatampi na jānāti, anāpatti. Sace pana “gaṇhissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ akatvā
tika-vin05t:520_13: sayati, aruṇuggamane dukkaṭaṃ. Agatapubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ gatena dve tīṇi divasāni vasitvā
tika-vin05t:520_14: gantukāmena anissitena vasitabbaṃ. “Sattāhaṃ vasissāmī”ti ālayaṃ karontena pana nissayo
tika-vin05t:520_15: gahetabbo. Sace thero “kiṃ sattāhaṃ vasantassa nissayenā”ti vadati, paṭikkhittakālato
tika-vin05t:521_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, addhānamaggappaṭipannena bhikkhunā nissayaṃ alabhamānena anissitena
tika-vin05t:521_1: vatthu”nti vacanato pana addhānamaggappaṭipanno sace attanā saddhiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannaṃ
tika-vin05t:521_2: nissayadāyakaṃ na labhati, evaṃ nissayaṃ alabhamānena anissitena bahūnipi divasāni
tika-vin05t:521_3: gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pubbe nissayaṃ gahetvā vutthapubbaṃ kiñci āvāsaṃ pavisati, ekarattaṃ
tika-vin05t:521_4: vasantenapi nissayo gahetabbo. Antarāmagge vissamanto vā satthaṃ vā pariyesanto katipāhaṃ
tika-vin05t:521_5: vasati, anāpatti. Antovasse pana nibaddhavāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ, nissayo ca gahetabbo.
tika-vin05t:521_6: Nāvāya gacchantassa pana vassāne āgatepi nissayaṃ alabhantassa anāpatti. Sace antarāmagge
tika-vin05t:521_7: gilāno hoti, nissayaṃ alabhamānena anissitena vasituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:522_0: Gilānupaṭṭhākopi gilānena yāciyamāno anissito eva vasituṃ labhati. Vuttañhetaṃ “anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:522_1: bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā nissayaṃ alabhamānena anissitena vatthuṃ, anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:522_2: bhikkhave, gilānupaṭṭhākena bhikkhunā nissayaṃ alabhamānena yāciyamānena anissitena
tika-vin05t:522_3: vatthu”nti. Sace pana “yācāhi ma”nti vuccamānopi gilāno mānena na yācati, gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:523_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āraññikena bhikkhunā phāsuvihāraṃ sallakkhentena nissayaṃ
tika-vin05t:523_1: alabhamānena anissitena vatthuṃ ‘yadā patirūpo nissayadāyako āgacchissati, tadā tassa
tika-vin05t:523_2: nissāya vasissāmī”’ti vacanato pana yattha vasantassa samathavipassanānaṃ paṭilābhavasena
tika-vin05t:523_3: phāsu hoti, tādisaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ sallakkhentena nissayaṃ alabhamānena anissitena
tika-vin05t:523_4: vatthabbaṃ. Imañca pana parihāraṃ neva sotāpanno, na sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahanto labhanti,
tika-vin05t:523_5: na thāmagatassa samādhino vā vipassanāya vā lābhī, vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāne pana bālaputhujjane
tika-vin05t:523_6: kathāva natthi. Yassa kho pana samatho vā vipassanā vā taruṇā hoti, ayaṃ imaṃ parihāraṃ
tika-vin05t:523_7: labhati, pavāraṇāsaṅgahopi etasseva anuññāto. Tasmā iminā puggalena ācariye pavāretvā
tika-vin05t:523_8: gatepi “yadā patirūponissayadāyako āgacchissati, taṃ nissāya vasissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ
tika-vin05t:523_9: katvā puna yāva āsāḷhīpuṇṇamā, tāva anissitena vatthuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana āsāḷhīmāse
tika-vin05t:523_10: ācariyo nāgacchati, yattha nissayo labbhati, tattha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:524_0: 153. Kathaṃ gahito hotīti ettha upajjhāyassa santike tāva upajjhaṃ gaṇhantena ekaṃsaṃ
tika-vin05t:524_1: uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “upajjhāyo
tika-vin05t:524_2: me, bhante, hohī”ti tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ saddhivihārikena vutte sace upajjhāyo
tika-vin05t:524_4: vā kāyena viññāpeti, vācāya viññāpeti, kāyena vācāya viññāpeti, gahito hoti upajjhāyo.
tika-vin05t:524_5: Idameva hettha upajjhāyaggahaṇaṃ, yadidaṃ upajjhāyassa imesu pañcasu padesu yassa
tika-vin05t:524_6: kassaci padassa vācāya sāvanaṃ kāyena vā atthaviññāpananti. Keci pana “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchanaṃ
tika-vin05t:524_7: sandhāya vadanti, na taṃ pamāṇaṃ. Āyācanadānamattena hi gahito hoti upajjhāyo, na
tika-vin05t:524_8: ettha sampaṭicchanaṃ aṅgaṃ. Saddhivihārikenapi na kevalaṃ “iminā me padena upajjhāyo
tika-vin05t:524_9: gahito”ti ñātuṃ vaṭṭati, “ajjatagge dāni thero mayhaṃ bhāro, ahampi therassa bhāro”ti
tika-vin05t:525_1: upajjhāyamhi pitucittaṃ upaṭṭhapessati, evaṃ te aññamaññaṃ sagāravā sappatissā sabhāgavuttino
tika-vin05t:525_2: viharantā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjissantī”ti.
tika-vin05t:526_0: Ācariyassa santike nissayaggahaṇepi ayameva vinicchayo. Ayaṃ panettha viseso – ācariyassa
tika-vin05t:526_1: santike nissayaṃ gaṇhantena ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā “ācariyo me, bhante, hohi, āyasmato
tika-vin05t:526_2: nissāya vacchāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ, sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-vin05t:527: 154. Kathaṃ paṭippassambhatīti ettha tāva upajjhāyamhā pañcahākārehi nissayapaṭippassaddhi veditabbā, ācariyamhā chahi ākārehi. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:528_0: “Pañcimā, bhikkhave, nissayapaṭippassaddhiyo upajjhāyamhā. Upajjhāyo pakkanto vā
tika-vin05t:528_1: hoti, vibbhanto vā, kālakato vā, pakkhasaṅkanto vā, āṇattiyeva pañcamī. Imā kho,
tika-vin05t:529_0: Chayimā, bhikkhave, nissayapaṭippassaddhiyo ācariyamhā. Ācariyo pakkanto vā hoti,
tika-vin05t:529_1: vibbhanto vā, kālakato vā, pakkhasaṅkanto vā, āṇattiyeva pañcamī, upajjhāyena vā
tika-vin05t:529_2: samodhānagato hoti. Imā kho, bhikkhave, cha nissayapaṭippassaddhiyo ācariyamhā”ti.
tika-vin05t:530_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – pakkantoti disaṃ gato. Evaṃ gate ca pana tasmiṃ sace vihāre
tika-vin05t:530_1: nissayadāyako atthi, yassa santike aññadāpi nissayo vā gahitapubbo hoti, yo vā ekasambhogaparibhogo,
tika-vin05t:530_2: tassa santike nissayo gahetabbo, ekadivasampi parihāro natthi. Sace tādiso natthi,
tika-vin05t:530_3: añño lajjī pesalo atthi, tassa pesalabhāvaṃ jānantena tadaheva nissayo yācitabbo.
tika-vin05t:530_4: Sace deti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. Atha pana “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo lahuṃ āgamissatī”ti pucchati,
tika-vin05t:530_5: upajjhāyena ce tathā vuttaṃ, “āma, bhante”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace vadati “tena hi upajjhāyassa
tika-vin05t:530_6: āgamanaṃ āgamethā”ti, vaṭṭati. Atha panassa pakatiyā pesalabhāvaṃ na jānāti, cattāri
tika-vin05t:530_7: pañca divasāni tassa bhikkhussa sabhāgataṃ oloketvā okāsaṃ kāretvā nissayo gahetabbo.
tika-vin05t:530_8: Sace pana vihāre nissayadāyako natthi, upajjhāyo ca “ahaṃ katipāhena āgamissāmi,
tika-vin05t:530_9: mā ukkaṇṭhitthā”ti vatvā gato, yāva āgamanā parihāro labbhati, athāpi naṃ tattha
tika-vin05t:530_10: manussā paricchinnakālato uttaripi pañca vā dasa vā divasāni vāsentiyeva, tena vihāraṃ
tika-vin05t:530_11: pavatti pesetabbā “daharā mā ukkaṇṭhantu, ahaṃ asukadivasaṃ nāma āgamissāmī”ti, evampi
tika-vin05t:530_12: parihāro labbhati. Atha āgacchato antarāmagge nadīpūrena vā corādīhi vā upaddavo
tika-vin05t:530_13: hoti, thero udakosakkanaṃ vā āgameti, sahāye vā pariyesati, taṃ ce pavattiṃ daharā
tika-vin05t:530_14: suṇanti, yāva āgamanā parihāro labbhati. Sace pana so “idhevāhaṃ vasissāmī”ti pahiṇati,
tika-vin05t:530_15: parihāro natthi. Yattha nissayo labbhati, tattha gantabbaṃ. Vibbhante pana kālakate
tika-vin05t:530_16: pakkhasaṅkante vā ekadivasampi parihāro natthi, yattha nissayo labbhati, tattha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:531_0: Āṇattīti pana nissayapaṇāmanā vuccati, tasmā “paṇāmemi ta”nti vā “mā idha paṭikkamī”ti
tika-vin05t:531_1: vā “nīhara te pattacīvara”nti vā “nāhaṃ tayā upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vāti iminā pāḷinayena
tika-vin05t:531_2: “mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchī”tiādinā pāḷimuttakanayena vā yo nissayapaṇāmanāya
tika-vin05t:531_3: paṇāmito hoti, tena upajjhāyo khamāpetabbo. Sace āditova na khamati, daṇḍakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:531_4: āharitvā tikkhattuṃ tāva sayameva khamāpetabbo. No ce khamati, tasmiṃ vihāre mahāthere
tika-vin05t:531_5: gahetvā khamāpetabbo. No ce khamati, sāmantavihāre bhikkhū gahetvā khamāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:531_6: Sace evampi na khamati, aññattha gantvā upajjhāyassa sabhāgānaṃ santike vasitabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:531_7: “appeva nāma ‘sabhāgānaṃ me santike vasatī’ti ñatvāpi khameyyā”ti. Sace evampi na
tika-vin05t:531_8: khamati, tatreva vasitabbaṃ. Tatra ce dubbhikkhādidosena na sakkā hoti vasituṃ, taṃyeva
tika-vin05t:531_9: vihāraṃ āgantvā aññassa santike nissayaṃ gahetvā vasituṃ vaṭṭati. Ayamāṇattiyaṃ vinicchayo.
tika-vin05t:532_0: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhīsu ācariyo pakkanto vā hotīti ettha koci ācariyo
tika-vin05t:532_1: āpucchitvā pakkamati, koci anāpucchitvā, antevāsikopi evameva. Tatra sace antevāsiko
tika-vin05t:532_2: ācariyaṃ āpucchati “asukaṃ nāma, bhante, ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ icchāmi kenacideva karaṇīyenā”ti,
tika-vin05t:532_3: ācariyena ca “kadā gamissasī”ti vutto “sāyanhe vā rattiṃ vā uṭṭhahitvā gamissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:532_4: vadati, ācariyopi “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati, taṃ khaṇaṃyeva nissayo paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin05t:532_5: Sace pana “bhante, asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gantukāmomhī”ti vutte ācariyo “asukasmiṃ nāma
tika-vin05t:532_6: gāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchā jānissasī”ti vadati, so ca “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati, tato
tika-vin05t:532_7: ce gato sugato. Sace pana na gacchati, nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Athāpi “gacchāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:532_8: vutte ācariyena “mā tāva gaccha, rattiṃ mantetvā jānissāmā”ti vutto mantetvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:532_9: sugato. No ce gacchati, nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Ācariyaṃ anāpucchā pakkamantassa
tika-vin05t:532_10: pana upacārasīmātikkame nissayo paṭippassambhati, antoupacārasīmato paṭinivattantassa
tika-vin05t:532_11: na paṭippassambhati. Sace pana ācariyo antevāsikaṃ āpucchati “āvuso, asukaṃ nāma
tika-vin05t:532_12: ṭhānaṃ gamissāmī”ti, antevāsikena ca “kadā”ti vutte “sāyanhe vā rattibhāge vā”ti
tika-vin05t:532_13: vadati, antevāsikopi “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati, taṃ khaṇaṃyeva nissayo paṭippassambhati,
tika-vin05t:532_14: sace pana ācariyo “sve piṇḍāya caritvā gamissāmī”ti vadati, itaro ca “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchati,
tika-vin05t:532_15: ekadivasaṃ tāva nissayo na paṭippassambhati, punadivase paṭippassaddho hoti. “Asukasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:532_16: nāma gāme piṇḍāya caritvā jānissāmi mama gamanaṃ vā agamanaṃ vā”ti vatvā pana sace
tika-vin05t:532_17: na gacchati, nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Athāpi “gacchāmī”ti vutte antevāsikena
tika-vin05t:532_18: “mā tāva gacchatha, rattiṃ mantetvā jānissathā”ti vutto mantetvāpi na gacchati, nissayo
tika-vin05t:532_19: na paṭippassambhati. Sace ubhopi ācariyantevāsikā kenacideva karaṇīyena bahisīmaṃ
tika-vin05t:532_20: gacchanti, tato ce ācariyo gamiyacitte uppanne anāpucchāva gantvā dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ
tika-vin05t:532_21: antoyeva nivattati, nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Sace dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā nivattati,
tika-vin05t:532_22: paṭippassaddho hoti. Ācariyupajjhāyā dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ vihāre vasanti,
tika-vin05t:532_23: nissayo paṭippassambhati. Ācariye vibbhante kālakate pakkhasaṅkante ca taṃ khaṇaṃyeva paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin05t:533_0: Āṇattiyaṃ pana ācariyo muñcitukāmova hutvā nissayapaṇāmanāya paṇāmeti, antevāsiko
tika-vin05t:533_1: ca “kiñcāpi maṃ ācariyo paṇāmeti, atha kho hadayena muduko”ti sālayo hoti, nissayo
tika-vin05t:533_2: na paṭippassambhati. Sacepi āriyo sālayo, antevāsiko nirālayo “na dāni imaṃ nissāya
tika-vin05t:533_3: vasissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati, evampi na paṭippassambhati. Ubhinnaṃ sālayabhāve
tika-vin05t:533_4: pana na paṭippassambhatiyeva, ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepena paṭippassambhati, paṇāmitena
tika-vin05t:533_5: daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā tikkhattuṃ khamāpetabbo. No ce khamati, upajjhāye vuttanayena
tika-vin05t:533_6: paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Yathāpaññattaṃ pana ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ paripūrentaṃ adhimattapemādipañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ
tika-vin05t:533_7: antevāsikaṃ saddhivihārikaṃ vā paṇāmentassa dukkaṭaṃ, itaraṃ apaṇāmentassapi dukkaṭameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:534: “Na, bhikkhave, sammāvattanto paṇāmetabbo, yo paṇāmeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Na ca, bhikkhave, asammāvattanto na paṇāmetabbo, yo na paṇāmeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin05t:535_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ antevāsikaṃ apaṇāmento ācariyo sātisāro
tika-vin05t:535_1: hoti, paṇāmento anatisāro hoti. Ācariyamhi nādhimattaṃ pemaṃ hoti, nādhimatto pasādo
tika-vin05t:535_2: hoti, nādhimattā hirī hoti, nādhimatto gāravo hoti, nādhimattā bhāvanā hoti. Imehi
tika-vin05t:535_3: kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ antevāsikaṃ apaṇāmento ācariyo sātisāro
tika-vin05t:536_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ saddhivihārikaṃ apaṇāmento upajjhāyo sātisāro
tika-vin05t:536_1: hoti, paṇāmento anatisāro hoti. Upajjhāyamhi nādhimattaṃ pemaṃ hoti, nādhimatto pasādo
tika-vin05t:536_2: hoti, nādhimattā hirī hoti, nādhimatto gāravo hoti, nādhimattā bhāvanā hoti. Imehi
tika-vin05t:536_3: kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ saddhivihārikaṃ apaṇāmento upajjhāyo sātisāro
tika-vin05t:537: Tattha nādhimattaṃ pemaṃ hotīti upajjhāyamhi adhimattaṃ gehassitapemaṃ na hoti. Nādhimattā bhāvanā hotīti adhimattā mettābhāvanā na hotīti attho.
tika-vin05t:538_0: Upajjhāyena vā samodhānagatoti ettha dassanasavanavasena samodhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:538_1: hi ācariyaṃ nissāya vasanto saddhivihāriko ekavihāre cetiyaṃ vā vandantaṃ, ekagāme
tika-vin05t:538_2: vā piṇḍāya carantaṃ upajjhāyaṃ passati, nissayo paṭippassambhati. Upajjhāyo passati,
tika-vin05t:538_3: saddhivihāriko na passati, na paṭippassambhati. Maggappaṭipannaṃ vā ākāsena vā gacchantaṃ
tika-vin05t:538_4: upajjhāyaṃ disvā dūrattā “bhikkhū”ti jānāti, “upajjhāyo”ti na jānāti, na paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin05t:538_5: Sace jānāti, paṭippassambhati. Uparipāsāde upajjhāyo vasati, heṭṭhā saddhivihāriko,
tika-vin05t:538_6: taṃ adisvāva yāguṃ pivitvā paṭikkamati, āsanasālāya vā nisinnaṃ adisvāva ekamante
tika-vin05t:538_7: bhuñjitvā pakkamati, dhammassavanamaṇḍape vā nisinnampi taṃ adisvāva dhammaṃ sutvā
tika-vin05t:538_8: pakkamati, nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Evaṃ tāva dassanavasena samodhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:538_9: Savanavasena pana sace upajjhāyassa vihāre vā antaraghare vā dhammaṃ vā kathentassa
tika-vin05t:538_10: anumodanaṃ vā karontassa saddaṃ sutvā “upajjhāyassa me saddo”ti sañjānāti, nissayo
tika-vin05t:538_11: paṭippassambhati, asañjānantassa na paṭippassambhati. Ayaṃ samodhāne vinicchayo.
tika-vin05t:539_0: 155. Nissāya kena vasitabbaṃ, kena na vasitabbanti ettha pana “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:539_1: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena pañca vassāni nissāya vatthuṃ, abyattena yāvajīva”nti
tika-vin05t:539_2: vacanato yo abyatto hoti, tena yāvajīvaṃ nissāyeva vasitabbaṃ. Sacāyaṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ
tika-vin05t:539_3: ācariyaṃ na labhati, upasampadāya saṭṭhivasso vā sattativasso vā hoti, navakatarassapi
tika-vin05t:539_4: byattassa santike ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ācariyo me, āvuso, hoti,
tika-vin05t:539_5: āyasmato nissāya vacchāmī”ti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vatvā nissayo gahetabbova. Gāmappavesanaṃ
tika-vin05t:539_6: āpucchantenapi ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchāmi ācariyā”ti
tika-vin05t:540_0: Yo pana byatto hoti upasampadāya pañcavasso, tena anissitena vatthuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā
tika-vin05t:540_1: nissayamuccanakena upasampadāya pañcavassena sabbantimena paricchedena dve mātikā
tika-vin05t:540_2: paguṇā vācuggatā kattabbā, pakkhadivasesu dhammassavanatthāya suttantato cattāro
tika-vin05t:540_3: bhāṇavārā, sampattānaṃ parisānaṃ parikathanatthāya andhakavinda mahārāhulovāda ambaṭṭha
tika-vin05t:540_4: sadiso eko kathāmaggo, saṅghabhattamaṅgalāmaṅgalesu anumodanatthāya tisso anumodanā,
tika-vin05t:540_6: vā vipassanāvasena vā arahattapariyosānamekaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, ettakaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:540_7: Ettāvatā hi ayaṃ bahussuto hoti cātuddiso, yattha katthaci attano issariyena vasituṃ
tika-vin05t:541_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ. Na
tika-vin05t:541_1: asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na asekkhena samādhikkhandhena… na asekkhena
tika-vin05t:541_2: paññākkhandhena… na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena… na asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena
tika-vin05t:541_3: samannāgato hoti. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:542_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:542_1: Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, muṭṭhassati hoti. Imehi
tika-vin05t:542_2: kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:543_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:543_1: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno
tika-vin05t:543_2: hoti, appassuto hoti, duppañño hoti. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena
tika-vin05t:544_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:544_1: Āpattiṃ na jānāti, anāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:544_2: na jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni honti na suvibhattāni
tika-vin05t:544_3: na suppavattīni na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi
tika-vin05t:545_0: “Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:545_1: Āpattiṃ na jānāti, anāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:545_2: na jānāti, ūnapañcavasso hoti. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā
tika-vin05t:545_3: na anissitena vatthabba”nti. Etthāpi purimanayeneva ayuttavasena āpattiaṅgavasena
tika-vin05t:546_0: Bālānaṃ pana abyattānaṃ disaṃgamikānaṃ antevāsikasaddhivihārikānaṃ anuññā na dātabbā.
tika-vin05t:546_1: Sace denti, ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Te ce ananuññātā gacchanti, tesampi dukkaṭaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:547_0: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, sambahulā bhikkhū bālā abyattā disaṃgamikā ācariyupajjhāye
tika-vin05t:547_1: āpucchanti. Te, bhikkhave, ācariyupajjhāyehi pucchitabbā “kahaṃ gamissatha, kena
tika-vin05t:547_2: saddhiṃ gamissathā”ti. Te ce, bhikkhave, bālā abyattā aññe bāle abyatte apadiseyyuṃ.
tika-vin05t:547_3: Na, bhikkhave, ācariyupajjhāyehi anujānitabbā, anujāneyyuṃ ce, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin05t:547_4: Te ce, bhikkhave, bālā abyattā ananuññātā ācariyupajjhāyehi gaccheyyuṃ ce, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
tika-vin05t:551_0: 156. Sīmāti ettha sīmā nāmesā baddhasīmā abaddhasīmāti duvidhā hoti. Tattha ekādasa
tika-vin05t:551_1: vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā tividhasampattiyuttā nimittena nimittaṃ bandhitvā sammatā
tika-vin05t:551_2: sīmā baddhasīmā nāma. Atikhuddakā, atimahatī, khaṇḍanimittā, chāyānimittā, animittā,
tika-vin05t:551_3: bahisīme ṭhitasammatā, nadiyā sammatā, samudde sammatā, jātassare sammatā, sīmāya
tika-vin05t:551_4: sīmaṃ sambhindantena sammatā, sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatāti imehi ekādasahi
tika-vin05t:551_5: ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjantīti vacanato etā vipattisīmāyo nāma.
tika-vin05t:552_0: Tattha atikhuddakā nāma yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkonti. Atimahatī
tika-vin05t:552_1: nāma yā kesaggamattenapi tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvā sammatā. Khaṇḍanimittā nāma aghaṭitanimittā
tika-vin05t:552_2: vuccati. Puratthimāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkamena dakkhiṇāya disāya pacchimāya
tika-vin05t:552_3: uttarāya disāya kittetvā puna puratthimāya disāya pubbakittitaṃ paṭikittetvā ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin05t:552_4: vaṭṭati, evaṃ akhaṇḍanimittā hoti. Sace pana anukkamena āharitvā uttarāya disāya
tika-vin05t:552_5: nimittaṃ kittetvā tattheva ṭhapeti, khaṇḍanimittā hoti. Aparāpi khaṇḍanimittā nāma
tika-vin05t:552_6: yā animittupagaṃ tacasārarukkhaṃ vā khāṇukaṃ vā paṃsupuñjaṃ vā vālukapuñjaṃ vā aññataraṃ
tika-vin05t:552_7: antarā ekanimittaṃ katvā sammatā. Chāyānimittā nāma pabbatachāyādīnaṃ yaṃ kiñci chāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:552_8: nimittaṃ katvā sammatā. Animittā nāma sabbena sabbaṃ nimittāni akittetvā sammatā.
tika-vin05t:552_9: Bahisīme ṭhitasammatā nāma nimittāni kittetvā nimittānaṃ bahi ṭhitena sammatā. Nadiyā,
tika-vin05t:552_10: samudde, jātassare sammatā nāma etesu nadiādīsu sammatā. Sā hi evaṃ sammatāpi “sabbā,
tika-vin05t:552_11: bhikkhave, nadī asīmā, sabbo samuddo asīmo, sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti vacanato asammatāva
tika-vin05t:552_12: hoti. Sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindantena sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ sambhindantena
tika-vin05t:552_13: sammatā. Sace hi porāṇakassa vihārassa puratthimāya disāya ambo ceva jambu cāti dve
tika-vin05t:552_14: rukkhā aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapā honti, tesu ambassa pacchimadisābhāge jambu, vihārasīmā
tika-vin05t:552_15: ca jambuṃ antokatvā ambaṃ kittetvā baddhā hoti. Atha pacchā tassa vihārassa puratthimāya
tika-vin05t:552_16: disāya vihāre kate sīmaṃ bandhantā bhikkhū taṃ ambaṃ antokatvā jambuṃ kittetvā bandhanti,
tika-vin05t:552_17: sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhinnā hoti. Tasmā sace paṭhamataraṃ katassa vihārassa sīmā asammatā
tika-vin05t:552_18: hoti, sīmāya upacāro ṭhapetabbo. Sace sammatā hoti, pacchimakoṭiyā hatthamattā sīmantarikā
tika-vin05t:552_20: vuttaṃ. Ekarukkhopi ca dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ nimittaṃ hoti. So pana vaḍḍhanto sīmasaṅkaraṃ
tika-vin05t:552_21: karoti, tasmā na kātabbo. Sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā nāma attano sīmāya
tika-vin05t:552_22: paresaṃ sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā. Sace hi paresaṃ baddhasīmaṃ sakalaṃ vā tassā
tika-vin05t:552_23: padesaṃ vā antokatvā attano sīmaṃ sammannanti, sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharitā nāma hoti.
tika-vin05t:552_24: Bhikkhunīnaṃ pana sīmaṃ ajjhottharitvā antopi bhikkhūnaṃ sīmaṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:552_25: Bhikkhunīnampi bhikkhūnaṃ sīmāya eseva nayo. Na hi te aññamaññassa kamme gaṇapūrakā
tika-vin05t:552_26: honti, na kammavācaṃ vaggaṃ karonti. Iti imā ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā sīmā sammannitabbā.
tika-vin05t:553_1: ca yuttā. Tattha nimittasampattiyā yuttā nāma pabbatanimittaṃ pāsāṇanimittaṃ vananimittaṃ
tika-vin05t:553_2: rukkhanimittaṃ magganimittaṃ vammikanimittaṃ nadīnimittaṃ udakanimittanti evaṃ vuttesu
tika-vin05t:553_3: aṭṭhasu nimittesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge yathāladdhāni nimittupagāni nimittāni “puratthimāya
tika-vin05t:553_4: disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ. Pabbato, bhante. Eso pabbato nimitta”ntiādinā nayena sammā kittetvā sammatā.
tika-vin05t:554_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – vinayadharena pucchitabbaṃ “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti?
tika-vin05t:554_1: “Pabbato, bhante”ti. Idaṃ pana upasampanno vā ācikkhatu anupasampanno vā, vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:554_2: Puna vinayadharena “eso pabbato nimitta”nti evaṃ nimittaṃ kittetabbaṃ, “etaṃ pabbataṃ
tika-vin05t:554_3: nimittaṃ karoma, karissāma, nimittaṃ kato, nimittaṃ hotu, hoti, bhavissatī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin05t:554_4: pana kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pāsāṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Puratthimāya disāya, puratthimāya
tika-vin05t:554_5: anudisāya, dakkhiṇāya disāya, dakkhiṇāya anudisāya, pacchimāya disāya, pacchimāya
tika-vin05t:554_6: anudisāya, uttarāya disāya, uttarāya anudisāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Udakaṃ, bhante. Etaṃ
tika-vin05t:554_7: udakaṃ nimittanti kittetabbaṃ. Ettha pana aṭṭhapetvā puna “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ
tika-vin05t:554_8: nimittaṃ? Pabbato, bhante. Eso pabbato nimitta”nti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ kittitanimittaṃ
tika-vin05t:554_9: kittetvāva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Evañhi nimittena nimittaṃ ghaṭitaṃ hoti, nimittāni sakiṃ
tika-vin05t:554_10: kittitānipi kittitāneva honti. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “tikkhattuṃ sīmamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin05t:555_0: 158. Idāni nimittupagāni pabbatādīni veditabbāni – tividho pabbato suddhapaṃsupabbato
tika-vin05t:555_1: suddhapāsāṇapabbato ubhayamissakoti. So tividhopi vaṭṭati, vālikarāsi pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:555_2: Itaropi hatthippamāṇato omakataro na vaṭṭati, hatthippamāṇato paṭṭhāya sineruppamāṇopi
tika-vin05t:555_3: vaṭṭati. Sace catūsu disāsu cattāro tīsu vā tayo pabbatā honti, catūhi vā tīhi vā
tika-vin05t:555_4: pabbatanimittehi sammannitumpi vaṭṭati, dvīhi pana nimittehi ekena vā sammannituṃ
tika-vin05t:555_5: na vaṭṭati. Ito paresu pāsāṇanimittādīsupi eseva nayo. Tasmā pabbatanimittaṃ karontena
tika-vin05t:555_6: pucchitabbaṃ “ekābaddho, na ekābaddho”ti. Sace ekābaddho hoti, na kātabbo. Tañhi
tika-vin05t:555_7: catūsu vā aṭṭhasu vā disāsu kittentenapi ekameva nimittaṃ kittitaṃ hoti, tasmā yo
tika-vin05t:555_8: evaṃ cakkasaṇṭhānena vihārampi parikkhipitvā ṭhito pabbato, taṃ ekadisāya kittetvā
tika-vin05t:555_9: aññāsu disāsu taṃ bahiddhā katvā anto aññāni nimittāni kittetabbāni. Sace pabbatassa
tika-vin05t:555_10: tatiyabhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ vā antosīmāya kattukāmā honti, pabbataṃ akittetvā yattakaṃ
tika-vin05t:555_11: padesaṃ anto kattukāmā, tassa parato tasmiṃyeva pabbate jātarukkhavammikādīsu aññataraṃ
tika-vin05t:555_12: nimittaṃ kittetabbaṃ. Sace ekayojanadviyojanappamāṇaṃ sabbaṃ pabbataṃ anto kattukāmā
tika-vin05t:555_13: honti, pabbatassa parato bhūmiyaṃ jātarukkhavammikādīni nimittāni kittetabbāni.
tika-vin05t:556_0: Pāsāṇanimitte ayaguḷopi pāsāṇasaṅkhyameva gacchati, tasmā yo koci pāsāṇo vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:556_1: Pamāṇato pana hatthippamāṇo pabbatasaṅkhyaṃ gato, tasmā so na vaṭṭati, mahāgoṇamahāmahiṃsappamāṇo
tika-vin05t:556_2: pana vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhimaparicchedena dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇo vaṭṭati, tato khuddakataro
tika-vin05t:556_3: iṭṭhakā vā mahantīpi na vaṭṭati, animittupagapāsāṇānaṃ rāsipi na vaṭṭati, pageva
tika-vin05t:556_4: paṃsuvālukarāsi. Bhūmisamo khalamaṇḍalasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇo vā bhūmito khāṇuko viya
tika-vin05t:556_5: uṭṭhitapāsāṇo vā hoti, sopi pamāṇupago ce, vaṭṭati. Piṭṭhipāsāṇo atimahantopi pāsāṇasaṅkhyameva
tika-vin05t:556_6: gacchati, tasmā sace mahato piṭṭhipāsāṇassa ekappadesaṃ antosīmāya kattukāmā honti,
tika-vin05t:556_7: taṃ akittetvā tassupari añño pāsāṇo kittetabbo. Sace piṭṭhipāsāṇupari vihāraṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:556_8: vihāramajjhena vā piṭṭhipāsāṇo vinivijjhitvā gacchati, evarūpo piṭṭhipāsāṇo na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:556_9: Sace hi taṃ kittenti, nimittassa upari vihāro hoti, nimittañca nāma bahisīmāya hoti,
tika-vin05t:556_10: vihāropi bahisīmāyaṃ āpajjati. Vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitapiṭṭhipāsāṇo ekattha kittetvā
tika-vin05t:557_0: Vananimitte tiṇavanaṃ vā tacasāratālanāḷikerādirukkhavanaṃ vā na vaṭṭati, antosārānaṃ
tika-vin05t:557_1: pana sākasālādīnaṃ antosāramissakānaṃ vā rukkhānaṃ vanaṃ vaṭṭati, tañca kho heṭṭhimaparicchedena
tika-vin05t:557_2: catupañcarukkhamattampi, tato oraṃ na vaṭṭati, paraṃ yojanasatikampi vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin05t:557_3: pana vanamajjhe vihāraṃ karonti, vanaṃ na kittetabbaṃ. Ekadesaṃ antosīmāya kātukāmehipi
tika-vin05t:557_4: vanaṃ akittetvā tattha rukkhapāsāṇādayo kittetabbā. Vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitavanaṃ
tika-vin05t:558_0: Rukkhanimitte tacasāro tālanāḷikerādirukkho na vaṭṭati, antosāro jīvamānako antamaso
tika-vin05t:558_1: ubbedhato aṭṭhaṅgulo pariṇāhato sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇopi vaṭṭati. Tato oraṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:558_2: paraṃ dvādasayojano suppatiṭṭhitanigrodhopi vaṭṭati. Vaṃsanaḷakasarāvādīsu bījaṃ
tika-vin05t:558_3: ropetvā vaḍḍhāpito pamāṇupagopi na vaṭṭati, tato apanetvā pana taṃ khaṇampi bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:558_4: ropetvā koṭṭhakaṃ katvā udakaṃ āsiñcitvā kittetuṃ vaṭṭati. Navamūlasākhāniggamanaṃ
tika-vin05t:558_5: akāraṇaṃ, khandhaṃ chinditvā ropite pana etaṃ yujjati. Kittentena ca “rukkho”tipi
tika-vin05t:558_7: ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:559_0: Magganimitte araññakhettanadītaḷākamaggādayo na vaṭṭanti, jaṅghamaggo vā sakaṭamaggo
tika-vin05t:559_1: vā vaṭṭati. Yo nibbijjhitvā dve tīṇi gāmantarāni gacchati, yo pana jaṅghamaggasakaṭamaggato
tika-vin05t:559_2: okkamitvā puna sakaṭamaggameva otarati, ye vā jaṅghamaggasakaṭamaggā avaḷañjā, te
tika-vin05t:559_3: na vaṭṭanti, jaṅghasatthasakaṭasatthehi vaḷañjiyamānāyeva vaṭṭanti. Sace dve maggā
tika-vin05t:559_4: nikkhamitvā pacchā sakaṭadhuramiva ekībhavanti, dvedhā bhinnaṭṭhāne vā sambandhaṭṭhāne
tika-vin05t:559_5: vā sakiṃ kittetvā puna na kittetabbā. Ekābaddhanimittañhetaṃ hoti. Sace vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:559_6: cattāro maggā catūsu disāsu gacchanti, majjhe ekaṃ kittetvā aparaṃ kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:559_7: Ekābaddhanimittañhetaṃ. Koṇaṃ nibbijjhitvā gataṃ pana parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:559_8: Vihāramajjhena nibbijjhitvā gatamaggo pana na kittetabbo, kittite nimittassa upari
tika-vin05t:559_9: vihāro hoti. Sace sakaṭamaggassa antimacakkamaggaṃ nimittaṃ karonti, maggo bahisīmāya
tika-vin05t:559_10: hoti, sace bāhiracakkamaggaṃ nimittaṃ karonti, bāhiracakkamaggo bahisīmāya hoti,
tika-vin05t:559_11: sesaṃ antosīmaṃ bhajati. Maggaṃ kittentena “maggo pantho patho pajjo”tiādīsu dasasu
tika-vin05t:559_12: yena kenaci nāmena ca kittetuṃ vaṭṭati, parikhāsaṇṭhānena vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā gatamaggo
tika-vin05t:559_13: ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:560_0: Vammikanimitte heṭṭhimaparicchedena taṃ divasaṃ jāto aṭṭhaṅgulubbedho govisāṇappamāṇopi
tika-vin05t:560_1: vammiko vaṭṭati, tato oraṃ na vaṭṭati. Paraṃ himavantapabbatasadisopi vaṭṭati, vihāraṃ
tika-vin05t:560_2: parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ pana ekābaddhaṃ ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:561_0: Nadīnimitte yassā dhammikānaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ anupañcāhanti
tika-vin05t:561_1: evaṃ deve vassante valāhakesu vigatamattesu sotaṃ pacchijjati, ayaṃ nadīsaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin05t:561_2: na gacchati. Yassā pana īdise suvuṭṭhikāle vassānassa cātumāse sotaṃ na pacchijjati,
