tika-vin05t:856_2: atthi, te tattha vasitvā pavāraṇāya āgantvā attano pattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ gaṇhantū”ti
tika-vin05t:856_3: vadanti, tesu ye tattha vasitvā pavāraṇāya āgacchanti, tesaṃ apaloketvā vassāvāsikaṃ
tika-vin05t:856_4: dātabbaṃ. Sādiyantāpi hi teneva vassāvāsikassa sāmino, khīyantāpi ca āvāsikā neva
tika-vin05t:856_5: adātuṃ labhanti. Kurundiyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “katikavattaṃ kātabbaṃ ‘sabbesaṃ no idha
tika-vin05t:856_6: yāgubhattaṃ nappahoti, sabhāgaṭṭhāne vasitvā āgacchatha, tumhākaṃ pattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ
tika-vin05t:856_7: labhissathā’ti. Tañce eko paṭibāhati, supaṭibāhitaṃ. No ce paṭibāhati, katikā sukatā.
tika-vin05t:856_8: Pacchā tesaṃ tattha vasitvā āgatānaṃ apaloketvā dātabbaṃ, apalokanakāle paṭibāhituṃ
tika-vin05t:856_9: na labbhatī”ti. Punapi vuttaṃ “sace vassūpagatesu ekaccānaṃ vassāvāsike apāpuṇante
tika-vin05t:856_10: bhikkhū katikaṃ karonti ‘chinnavassānaṃ vassāvāsikañca idāni uppajjanakavassāvāsikañca
tika-vin05t:856_11: imesaṃ dātuṃ ruccatī’ti, evaṃ katikāya katāya gāhitasadisameva hoti, uppannuppannaṃ
tika-vin05t:856_12: tesameva dātabba”nti. Temāsaṃ pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā vihāramaggacetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇāni
tika-vin05t:856_13: jaggitvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ siñcitvā pakkantopi vibbhantopi vassāvāsikaṃ labhatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:856_14: Bhatiniviṭṭhañhi tena kataṃ, saṅghikaṃ pana apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitaṃ antovasse
tika-vin05t:856_15: vibbhantopi labhateva, paccayavasena gāhitaṃ pana na labhatīti vadanti.
tika-vin05t:857_0: Sace vuṭṭhavasso disaṃgamiko bhikkhu āvāsikassa hatthato kiñcideva kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:857_1: gahetvā “asukakule mayhaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ pattaṃ, taṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā gataṭṭhāne vibbhamati,
tika-vin05t:857_2: vassāvāsikaṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti. Sace pana manusse sammukhā sampaṭicchāpetvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:857_3: labhati. “Idaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ amhākaṃ senāsane vutthabhikkhuno demā”ti vutte yassa
tika-vin05t:857_4: gāhitaṃ, tasseva hoti. Sace pana senāsanasāmikassa piyakamyatāya puttadhītādayo bahūni
tika-vin05t:857_5: vatthāni āharitvā “amhākaṃ senāsane demā”ti denti, tattha vassūpagatassa ekameva
tika-vin05t:857_6: vatthaṃ dātabbaṃ, sesāni saṅghikāni honti. Vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya gāhetabbāni, ṭhitikāya
tika-vin05t:857_7: asati therāsanato paṭṭhāya gāhetabbāni. Senāsane vassūpagataṃ bhikkhuṃ nissāya uppannena
tika-vin05t:857_8: cittappasādena bahūni vatthāni āharitvā “senāsanassa demā”ti dinnesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:857_9: Sace pana pādamūle ṭhapetvā “etassa bhikkhuno demā”ti vadanti, tasseva honti.
tika-vin05t:858_0: Ekassa gehe dve vassāvāsikāni, paṭhamabhāgo sāmaṇerassa gāhito hoti, dutiyo therāsane.
tika-vin05t:858_1: So ekaṃ dasahatthaṃ, ekaṃ aṭṭhahatthaṃ sāṭakaṃ peseti “vassāvāsikaṃ pattabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:858_2: dethā”ti, vicinitvā varabhāgaṃ sāmaṇerassa datvā anubhāgo therāsane dātabbo. Sace
tika-vin05t:858_3: pana ubhopi gharaṃ netvā bhojetvā sayameva pādamūle ṭhapeti, yaṃ yassa dinnaṃ, tadeva
tika-vin05t:858_4: tassa hoti. Ito paraṃ mahāpaccariyaṃ āgatanayo hoti – ekassa ghare daharasāmaṇerassa
tika-vin05t:858_5: vassāvāsikaṃ pāpuṇāti, so ce pucchati “amhākaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ kassa patta”nti, “sāmaṇerassā”ti
tika-vin05t:858_6: avatvā “dānakāle jānissasī”ti vatvā dānadivase ekaṃ mahātheraṃ pesetvā nīharāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:858_7: Sace yassa vassāvāsikaṃ pattaṃ, so vibbhamati vā kālaṃ vā karoti, manussā ce pucchanti
tika-vin05t:858_8: “kassa amhākaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ patta”nti, tesaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace te vadanti
tika-vin05t:858_9: “tumhākaṃ demā”ti, tassa bhikkhuno pāpuṇāti. Atha saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā denti,
tika-vin05t:858_10: saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā pāpuṇāti. Sace vassūpagatā suddhapaṃsukūlikāyeva honti, ānetvā
tika-vin05t:858_11: dinnaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ senāsanaparikkhāraṃ vā katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ, bimbohanādīni vā kātabbānīti.
tika-vin05t:861: 222. Ayamaparopi utukāle antarāmuttako nāma senāsanaggāho veditabbo. Divasavasena hi tividho senāsanaggāho purimako pacchimako antarāmuttakoti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:862_0: “Tayome, bhikkhave, senāsanaggāhā, purimako pacchimako antarāmuttako. Aparajjugatāya
tika-vin05t:862_1: āsāḷhiyā purimako gāhetabbo, māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā pacchimako gāhetabbo, aparajjugatāya
tika-vin05t:863_0: Etesu tīsu senāsanaggāhesu purimako pacchimako cāti ime dve gāhā thāvarā, antarāmuttako
tika-vin05t:863_1: pana senāsanapaṭijagganatthaṃ bhagavatā anuññāto. Tathā hi ekasmiṃ vihāre mahālābhaṃ
tika-vin05t:863_2: senāsanaṃ hoti, senāsanasāmikā vassūpagataṃ bhikkhuṃ sabbapaccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin05t:863_3: pavāretvā gamanakāle bahuṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ denti, mahātherā dūratova āgantvā vassūpanāyikadivase
tika-vin05t:863_4: taṃ gahetvā phāsuṃ vasitvā vuṭṭhavassā lābhaṃ gaṇhitvā pakkamanti. Āvāsikā “mayaṃ
tika-vin05t:863_5: etthuppannaṃ lābhaṃ na labhāma, niccaṃ āgantukamahātherāva labhanti, teyeva naṃ āgantvā
tika-vin05t:863_6: paṭijaggissantī”ti palujjantampi na olokenti. Bhagavā tassa paṭijagganatthaṃ “aparajjugatāya
tika-vin05t:863_7: pavāraṇāya āyatiṃ vassāvāsatthāya antarāmuttako gāhetabbo”ti āha.
tika-vin05t:864_0: Taṃ gāhentena saṅghatthero vattabbo “bhante, antarāmuttakasenāsanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
tika-vin05t:864_1: Sace gaṇhāti, dātabbaṃ. No ce, eteneva upāyena anutheraṃ ādiṃ katvā yo gaṇhāti, tassa
tika-vin05t:864_2: antamaso sāmaṇerassapi dātabbaṃ. Tena taṃ senāsanaṃ aṭṭha māse paṭijaggitabbaṃ, chadanabhittibhūmīsu
tika-vin05t:864_3: yaṃ kiñci khaṇḍaṃ vā phullaṃ vā hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ paṭisaṅkharitabbaṃ. Uddesaparipucchādīhi
tika-vin05t:864_4: divasaṃ khepetvā rattiṃ tattha vasituṃ vaṭṭati, rattiṃ pariveṇe vasitvā tattha divasaṃ
tika-vin05t:864_5: khepetumpi vaṭṭati, rattindivaṃ tattheva vasitumpi vaṭṭati, utukāle āgatānaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:864_6: na paṭibāhitabbaṃ. Vassūpanāyikadivase pana sampatte sace saṅghatthero “mayhaṃ idaṃ
tika-vin05t:864_7: pana senāsanaṃ dethā”ti vadati, na labhati. “Bhante, idaṃ antarāmuttakaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin05t:864_8: ekena bhikkhunā paṭijaggita”nti vatvā na dātabbaṃ, aṭṭha māse paṭijaggitabhikkhusseva
tika-vin05t:864_9: gāhitaṃ hoti. Yasmiṃ pana senāsane ekasaṃvacchare dvikkhattuṃ paccaye denti chamāsaccayena
tika-vin05t:864_10: chamāsaccayena, taṃ antarāmuttakaṃ na gāhetabbaṃ. Yasmiṃ vā tikkhattuṃ denti catumāsaccayena
tika-vin05t:864_11: catumāsaccayena, yasmiṃ vā catukkhattuṃ denti temāsaccayena temāsaccayena, taṃ antarāmuttakaṃ
tika-vin05t:864_12: na gāhetabbaṃ. Paccayeneva hi taṃ paṭijagganaṃ labhissati. Yasmiṃ pana ekasaṃvacchare
tika-vin05t:864_13: sakideva bahū paccaye denti, etaṃ antarāmuttakaṃ gāhetabbanti.
tika-vin05t:865_0: 223. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, akataṃ vā vihāraṃ vippakataṃ vā navakammaṃ dātuṃ, khuddake
tika-vin05t:865_1: vihāre kammaṃ oloketvā chappañcavassikaṃ navakammaṃ dātuṃ, aḍḍhayoge kammaṃ oloketvā
tika-vin05t:865_2: sattaṭṭhavassikaṃ navakammaṃ dātuṃ, mahallake vihāre pāsāde vā kammaṃ oloketvā dasadvādasavassikaṃ
tika-vin05t:865_3: navakammaṃ dātu”nti vacanato akataṃ vippakataṃ vā senāsanaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno apalokanena
tika-vin05t:865_4: vā kammavācāya vā sāvetvā navakammaṃ katvā vasituṃ yathāvuttakālaparicchedavasena
tika-vin05t:865_5: dātabbaṃ. Navakammiko bhikkhu antovasse taṃ āvāsaṃ labhati, utukāle paṭibāhituṃ na
tika-vin05t:865_6: labhati. Laddhanavakammena pana bhikkhunā vāsipharasunikhādanādīni gahetvā sayaṃ
tika-vin05t:865_7: na kātabbaṃ, katākataṃ jānitabbaṃ. Sace so āvāso jīrati, āvāsasāmikassa vā tassa
tika-vin05t:865_8: vaṃse uppannassa vā kassaci kathetabbaṃ “āvāso te nassati, jaggatha etaṃ āvāsa”nti.
tika-vin05t:865_9: Sace so na sakkoti, bhikkhūhi ñātīhi vā upaṭṭhākehi vā samādāpetvā jaggitabbo. Sace
tika-vin05t:865_10: tepi na sakkonti, saṅghikena paccayena jaggitabbo, tasmimpi asati ekaṃ āvāsaṃ vissajjetvā
tika-vin05t:865_11: avasesā jaggitabbā, bahū vissajjetvā ekaṃ saṇṭhapetumpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:866: Dubbhikkhe bhikkhūsu pakkantesu sabbe āvāsā nassanti, tasmā ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā āvāse vissajjetvā tato yāgubhattacīvarādīni paribhuñjantehi sesāvāsā jaggitabbāyeva.
tika-vin05t:867_0: Kurundiyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “saṅghike paccaye asati eko bhikkhu ‘tuyhaṃ ekamañcaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:867_1: gahetvā jaggāhī’ti vattabbo. Sace bahutaraṃ icchati, tibhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:867_2: datvāpi jaggāpetabbaṃ. Atha thambhamattamevettha avasiṭṭhaṃ, bahukammaṃ kātabbanti
tika-vin05t:867_3: na icchati, ‘tuyhaṃ puggalikameva katvā jaggāhī’ti dātabbaṃ. Evampi hi ‘saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:867_4: bhaṇḍakaṭhapanaṭṭhānañca navakānañca vasanaṭṭhānaṃ labhissatī’ti jaggāpetabbo. Evaṃ
tika-vin05t:867_5: jaggito pana tasmiṃ jīvante puggaliko hoti, mate saṅghikova. Sace saddhivihārikānaṃ
tika-vin05t:867_6: dātukāmo hoti, kammaṃ oloketvā tibhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ vā puggalikaṃ katvā jaggāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:867_7: Evañhi saddhivihārikānaṃ dātuṃ labhati. Evaṃ jagganake pana asati ekaṃ āvāsaṃ vissajjetvātiādinā
tika-vin05t:867_8: nayena jaggāpetabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Idampi ca aññaṃ tattheva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:868_0: Dve bhikkhū saṅghikabhūmiṃ gahetvā sodhetvā saṅghikasenāsanaṃ karonti, yena sā bhūmi
tika-vin05t:868_1: paṭhamaṃ gahitā, so sāmī. Ubhopi puggalikaṃ karonti, soyeva sāmī. So saṅghikaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:868_2: itaro puggalikaṃ karoti, aññaṃ ce bahu senāsanaṭṭhānaṃ atthi, puggalikaṃ karontopi
tika-vin05t:868_3: na vāretabbo. Aññasmiṃ pana tādise patirūpe ṭhāne asati taṃ paṭibāhitvā saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin05t:868_4: karonteneva kātabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana tassa tattha vayakammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ dātabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:868_5: pana katāvāse vā āvāsakaraṇaṭṭhāne vā chāyūpagaphalūpagā rukkhā honti, apaloketvā
tika-vin05t:868_6: hāretabbā. Puggalikā ce honti, sāmikā āpucchitabbā. No ce denti, yāvatatiyakaṃ āpucchitvā
tika-vin05t:869_0: 224. Yo pana saṅghikaṃ vallimattampi aggahetvā āharimena upakaraṇena saṅghikāya bhūmiyā
tika-vin05t:869_1: puggalikavihāraṃ kāreti, upaḍḍhaṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti, upaḍḍhaṃ puggalikaṃ. Pāsādo ce
tika-vin05t:869_2: hoti, heṭṭhāpāsādo saṅghiko, upari puggaliko. Sace yo heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ icchati, heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ
tika-vin05t:869_3: tassa hoti. Atha heṭṭhā ca upari ca icchati, ubhayattha upaḍḍhaṃ labhati. Dve senāsanāni
tika-vin05t:869_4: kāreti, ekaṃ saṅghikaṃ, ekaṃ puggalikaṃ. Sace vihāre uṭṭhitena dabbasambhārena kāreti,
tika-vin05t:869_5: tibhāgaṃ labhati. Sace akataṭṭhāne cayaṃ vā pamukhaṃ vā karoti bahikuṭṭe, upaḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin05t:869_6: saṅghassa, upaḍḍhaṃ tassa. Atha mahantaṃ visamaṃ pūretvā apade padaṃ dassetvā kataṃ
tika-vin05t:870_0: Sace bhikkhu saṅghikavihārato gopānasiādīni gahetvā aññasmiṃ saṅghikāvāse yojeti,
tika-vin05t:870_1: suyojitāni. Puggalikāvāse yojentehi pana mūlaṃ vā dātabbaṃ, paṭipākatikaṃ vā kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:870_2: Chaḍḍitavihārato mañcapīṭhādīni theyyacittena gaṇhanto uddhāreyeva bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:870_3: “Puna āvāsikakāle dassāmī”ti gahetvā saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:870_4: sunaṭṭhaṃ, jiṇṇaṃ sujiṇṇaṃ. Arogaṃ ce, pākatikaṃ kātabbaṃ, puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin05t:870_5: naṭṭhaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā gīvā hoti. Tato dvāravātapānādīni saṅghikāvāse vā puggalikāvāse
tika-vin05t:870_6: vā yojitāni, paṭidātabbāniyeva. Sace koci saṅghiko vihāro undriyati, yaṃ tattha mañcapīṭhādikaṃ,
tika-vin05t:870_7: taṃ guttatthāya aññatra harituṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā aññatra haritvā saṅghikaparibhogena
tika-vin05t:870_8: paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ sunaṭṭhaṃ, jiṇṇaṃ sujiṇṇaṃ. Sace arogaṃ, tasmiṃ vihāre paṭisaṅkhate
tika-vin05t:870_9: puna pākatikaṃ kātabbaṃ. Puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjato naṭṭhaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā gīvā
tika-vin05t:870_10: hoti, tasmiṃ paṭisaṅkhate dātabbameva. Ayaṃ senāsanaggāhakathā.
tika-vin05t:871_1: bhikkhunā cīvarakammaṃ karontassa “sūciṃ dehī”ti vadato ekā dīghā, ekā rassāti dve
tika-vin05t:871_2: sūciyo dātabbā. “Avibhattaṃ saṅghikabhaṇḍa”nti pucchitabbakiccaṃ natthi. Pipphalatthikassa
tika-vin05t:871_3: eko pipphalako, kantāraṃ paṭipajjitukāmassa upāhanayugaḷaṃ, kāyabandhanatthikassa
tika-vin05t:871_4: kāyabandhanaṃ, “aṃsabaddhako me jiṇṇo”ti āgatassa aṃsabaddhako, parissāvanatthikassa
tika-vin05t:871_5: parissāvanaṃ dātabbaṃ, dhammakaraṇatthikassa dhammakaraṇo. Sace paṭṭako na hoti,
tika-vin05t:871_6: dhammakaraṇo paṭṭakena saddhiṃ dātabbo. “Āgantukapattaṃ āropessāmī”ti yācantassa
tika-vin05t:871_7: kusiyā ca aḍḍhakusiyā ca pahonakaṃ dātabbaṃ. “Maṇḍalaṃ nappahotī”ti āgatassa maṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin05t:871_8: ekaṃ dātabbaṃ, aḍḍhamaṇḍalāni dve dātabbāni, dve maṇḍalāni yācantassa na dātabbāni.
tika-vin05t:871_9: Anuvātaparibhaṇḍatthikassa ekassa cīvarassa pahonakaṃ dātabbaṃ, sappinavanītādiatthikassa
tika-vin05t:871_10: gilānassa ekaṃ bhesajjaṃ nāḷimattaṃ katvā tato tatiyakoṭṭhāso dātabbo. Evaṃ tīṇi
tika-vin05t:871_11: divasāni datvā nāḷiyā paripuṇṇāya catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya saṅghaṃ āpucchitvā dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:871_12: guḷapiṇḍepi ekadivasaṃ tatiyabhāgo dātabbo. Evaṃ tīhi divasehi niṭṭhite piṇḍe tato
tika-vin05t:871_13: paraṃ saṅghaṃ āpucchitvā dātabbaṃ. Sammannitvā ṭhapitayāgubhājakādīhi ca bhājanīyaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:871_14: āgatamanussānaṃ anāpucchitvāva upaḍḍhabhāgo dātabbo. Asammatehi pana apaloketvā dātabboti.
tika-vin05t:872_0: Saṅghassa santakaṃ sammatena vā āṇattehi vā ārāmikādīhi dīyamānaṃ, gihīnañca santakaṃ
tika-vin05t:872_1: sāmikena vā āṇattena vā dīyamānaṃ “aparassa bhāgaṃ dehī”ti asantaṃ puggalaṃ vatvā
tika-vin05t:872_2: gaṇhato bhaṇḍādeyyaṃ. Aññena dīyamānaṃ gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Asammatena
tika-vin05t:872_3: vā anāṇattena vā dīyamāne “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā
tika-vin05t:872_4: gaṇhanto uddhāreyeva bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Itarehi dīyamānaṃ evaṃ gaṇhato bhaṇḍādeyyaṃ
tika-vin05t:872_5: sāmikena pana “imassa dehī”ti dāpitaṃ vā sayaṃ dinnaṃ vā sudinnanti ayaṃ sabbaṭṭhakathāvinicchayato sāro.
tika-vin05t:873_0: Piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassapi odanapaṭivīso antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitasseva gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:873_1: Yadi pana dāyakā “bahiupacārasīmaṭṭhānampi, bhante, gaṇhatha, āgantvā paribhuñjissantī”ti
tika-vin05t:879_0: 226. Kathinanti ettha pana kathinaṃ attharituṃ ke labhanti, ke na labhanti? Gaṇanavasena
tika-vin05t:879_1: tāva pacchimakoṭiyā pañca janā labhanti, uddhaṃ satasahassampi, pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-vin05t:879_2: na labhanti. Vuṭṭhavassavasena purimikāya vassaṃ upagantvā paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāritā
tika-vin05t:879_3: labhanti. Chinnavassā vā pacchimikāya upagatā vā na labhanti. “Aññasmiṃ vihāre vuṭṭhavassāpi
tika-vin05t:879_4: na labhantī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Purimikāya upagatānaṃ pana sabbe gaṇapūrakā
tika-vin05t:879_5: honti, ānisaṃsaṃ na labhanti, ānisaṃso itaresaṃyeva hoti. Sace purimikāya upagatā
tika-vin05t:879_6: cattāro vā honti tayo vā dve vā eko vā, itare gaṇapūrake katvā kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:879_7: Atha cattāro bhikkhū upagatā, eko paripuṇṇavasso sāmaṇero, so ce pacchimikāya upasampajjati,
tika-vin05t:879_8: gaṇapūrako ceva hoti ānisaṃsañca labhati. Tayo bhikkhū dve sāmaṇerā, dve bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:879_9: tayo sāmaṇerā, eko bhikkhu cattāro sāmaṇerāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sace purimikāya
tika-vin05t:879_10: upagatā kathinatthārakusalā na honti, atthārakusalā khandhakabhāṇakattherā pariyesitvā
tika-vin05t:879_11: ānetabbā. Kammavācaṃ sāvetvā kathinaṃ attharāpetvā dānañca bhuñjitvā gamissanti,
tika-vin05t:880_0: Kathinaṃ kena dinnaṃ vaṭṭati? Yena kenaci devena vā manussena vā pañcannaṃ vā sahadhammikānaṃ
tika-vin05t:880_1: aññatarena dinnaṃ vaṭṭati. Kathinadāyakassa vattaṃ atthi, sace so taṃ ajānanto pucchati
tika-vin05t:880_2: – “bhante, kathaṃ kathinaṃ dātabba”nti, tassa evaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ
tika-vin05t:880_3: aññatarappahonakaṃ sūriyuggamanasamaye vatthaṃ ‘kathinacīvaraṃ demā’ti dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:880_4: Tassa parikammatthaṃ ettakā nāma sūciyo, ettakaṃ suttaṃ, ettakaṃ rajanaṃ, parikammaṃ
tika-vin05t:880_5: karontānaṃ ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāgubhattañca dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:881_0: Kathinatthārakenapi dhammena samena uppannaṃ kathinaṃ attharantena vattaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:881_1: Tantavāyagehato hi ābhatasantāneneva khalimakkhitasāṭako na vaṭṭati, malīnasāṭakopi
tika-vin05t:881_2: na vaṭṭati, tasmā kathinatthārasāṭakaṃ labhitvā suṭṭhu dhovitvā sūciādīni cīvarakammūpakaraṇāni
tika-vin05t:881_3: sajjetvā bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ tadaheva sibbitvā niṭṭhitasūcikammaṃ rajitvā kappabinduṃ
tika-vin05t:881_4: datvā kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ. Sace tasmiṃ anatthateyeva aññaṃ kathinasāṭakaṃ āharati,
tika-vin05t:881_5: aññāni ca bahūni kathinānisaṃsavatthāni deti, yo ānisaṃsaṃ bahuṃ deti, tassa santakena
tika-vin05t:881_6: attharitabbaṃ. Itaro tathā tathā ovaditvā saññāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:882_0: Kathinaṃ pana kena attharitabbaṃ? Yassa saṅgho kathinacīvaraṃ deti. Saṅghena pana
tika-vin05t:882_1: kassa dātabbaṃ? Yo jiṇṇacīvaro hoti. Sace bahū jiṇṇacīvarā, vuḍḍhassa dātabbaṃ. Vuḍḍhesupi
tika-vin05t:882_2: yo mahāpariso tadaheva cīvaraṃ katvā attharituṃ sakkoti, tassa dātabbaṃ. Sace vuḍḍho
tika-vin05t:882_3: na sakkoti, navakataro sakkoti, tassa dātabbaṃ. Apica saṅghena mahātherassa saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin05t:882_4: kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā “tumhe, bhante, gaṇhatha, mayaṃ katvā dassāmā”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:882_5: Tīsu cīvaresu yaṃ jiṇṇaṃ hoti, tadatthāya dātabbaṃ. Pakatiyā dupaṭṭacīvarassa dupaṭṭatthāyeva
tika-vin05t:882_6: dātabbaṃ. Sacepissa ekapaṭṭacīvaraṃ ghanaṃ hoti, kathinasāṭakā ca pelavā, sāruppatthāya
tika-vin05t:882_7: dupaṭṭappahonakameva dātabbaṃ, “ahaṃ alabhanto ekapaṭṭaṃ pārupāmī”ti vadantassapi
tika-vin05t:882_8: dupaṭṭaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Yo pana lobhapakatiko hoti, tassa na dātabbaṃ. Tenapi “kathinaṃ
tika-vin05t:882_9: attharitvā pacchā visibbitvā dve cīvarāni karissāmī”ti na gahetabbaṃ. Yassa pana dīyati, tassa –
tika-vin05t:883_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ, yadi saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:883_1: pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharituṃ, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:884_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ
tika-vin05t:884_1: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinaṃ attharituṃ, yassāyasmato khamati imassa kathinadussassa
tika-vin05t:884_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dānaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:885: “Dinnaṃ idaṃ saṅghena kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kathinaṃ attharituṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:887_0: Evaṃ dinne pana kathine sace taṃ kathinadussaṃ niṭṭhitaparikammameva hoti, iccetaṃ
tika-vin05t:887_1: kusalaṃ. No ce niṭṭhitaparikammaṃ hoti, “ahaṃ thero”ti vā “bahussuto”ti vā ekenapi
tika-vin05t:887_2: akātuṃ na labbhati, sabbeheva sannipatitvā dhovanasibbanarajanāni niṭṭhāpetabbāni.
tika-vin05t:887_3: Idañhi kathinavattaṃ nāma buddhappasatthaṃ. Atīte padumuttaropi bhagavā kathinavattaṃ
tika-vin05t:887_4: akāsi. Tassa kira aggasāvako sujātatthero nāma kathinaṃ gaṇhi. Taṃ satthā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā
tika-vin05t:888_0: Katapariyositaṃ pana kathinaṃ gahetvā atthārakena bhikkhunā sace saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ
tika-vin05t:888_1: attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇikā saṅghāṭi paccuddharitabbā, navā saṅghāṭi adhiṭṭhātabbā,
tika-vin05t:888_2: “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā. Sace uttarāsaṅgena kathinaṃ
tika-vin05t:888_3: attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇako uttarāsaṅgo paccuddharitabbo, navo uttarāsaṅgo adhiṭṭhātabbo,
tika-vin05t:888_4: “iminā uttarāsaṅgena kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā. Sace antaravāsakena
tika-vin05t:888_5: kathinaṃ attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇako antaravāsako paccuddharitabbo, navo antaravāsako
tika-vin05t:888_6: adhiṭṭhātabbo, “iminā antaravāsakena kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā.
tika-vin05t:889_0: Tena kathinatthārakena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā
tika-vin05t:889_1: añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “atthataṃ, bhante, saṅghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko
tika-vin05t:889_2: kathinatthāro, anumodathā”ti. Tehi anumodakehi bhikkhūhi ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā
tika-vin05t:889_3: añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “atthataṃ, āvuso, saṅghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko
tika-vin05t:889_4: kathinatthāro, anumodāmā”ti. Tena kathinatthārakena bhikkhunā sambahule bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin05t:889_5: ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “atthataṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:889_6: saṅghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodathā”ti. Tehi anumodakehi bhikkhūhi
tika-vin05t:889_7: ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “atthataṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:889_8: saṅghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodāmā”ti. Tena kathinatthārakena
tika-vin05t:889_9: bhikkhunā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā
tika-vin05t:889_10: evamassa vacanīyo “atthataṃ, āvuso, saṅghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodāhī”ti.
tika-vin05t:889_11: Tena anumodakena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa
tika-vin05t:889_12: vacanīyo “atthataṃ, āvuso, saṅghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:889_13: Evaṃ sabbesaṃ atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthataṃ
tika-vin05t:889_14: hoti kathinaṃ atthārakassa ca anumodakassa cā”ti. Punapi vuttaṃ “na saṅgho kathinaṃ
tika-vin05t:889_15: attharati, na gaṇo kathinaṃ attharati, puggalo kathinaṃ attharati, saṅghassa anumodanāya
tika-vin05t:889_16: gaṇassa anumodanāya puggalassa attharāya saṅghassa atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, gaṇassa
tika-vin05t:889_17: atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, puggalassa atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti.
tika-vin05t:890_0: Evaṃ atthate pana kathine sace kathinacīvarena saddhiṃ ābhataṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dāyakā “yena
tika-vin05t:890_1: amhākaṃ kathinaṃ gahitaṃ, tasseva demā”ti denti, bhikkhusaṅgho anissaro. Atha avicāretvāva
tika-vin05t:890_2: datvā gacchanti, bhikkhusaṅgho issaro. Tasmā sace kathinatthārakassa sesacīvarānipi
tika-vin05t:890_3: dubbalāni honti, saṅghena apaloketvā tesampi atthāya vatthāni dātabbāni, kammavācā
tika-vin05t:890_4: pana ekāyeva vaṭṭati. Avasesakathinānisaṃse balavavatthāni vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya dātabbāni,
tika-vin05t:890_5: ṭhitikāya abhāve therāsanato paṭṭhāya dātabbāni, garubhaṇḍaṃ na bhājetabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:890_6: pana ekasīmāya bahū vihārā honti, sabbehi bhikkhūhi sannipātāpetvā ekattha kathinaṃ
tika-vin05t:890_7: attharitabbaṃ, visuṃ visuṃ attharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:891_0: “Atthatakathinānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, pañca kappissanti, anāmantacāro asamādānacāro gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin05t:891_1: yāvadatthacīvaraṃ yo ca tattha cīvaruppādo. So nesaṃ bhavissatī”ti vacanato atthatakathinānaṃ
tika-vin05t:891_2: bhikkhūnaṃ anāmantacārādayo pana pañcānisaṃsā labbhanti. Tattha anāmantacāroti anāmantetvā
tika-vin05t:891_3: caraṇaṃ, yāva kathinaṃ na uddharīyati, tāva cārittasikkhāpadena anāpattīti vuttaṃ
tika-vin05t:891_4: hoti. Asamādānacāroti cīvaraṃ asamādāya caraṇaṃ, cīvaravippavāsoti attho. Gaṇabhojananti
tika-vin05t:891_5: gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadena anāpatti vuttā. Yāvadatthacīvaranti yāvatā cīvarena attho,
tika-vin05t:891_6: tāvatakaṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Yo ca tattha cīvaruppādoti tattha
tika-vin05t:891_7: kathinatthatasīmāya matakacīvaraṃ vā hotu saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ vā saṅghikena tatruppādena
tika-vin05t:891_8: ābhataṃ vā, yena kenaci ākārena yaṃ saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ uppajjati, taṃ tesaṃ bhavissatīti attho.
tika-vin05t:895_0: 227. Garubhaṇḍānīti ettha “pañcimāni, bhikkhave, avissajjiyāni na vissajjetabbāni
tika-vin05t:895_1: saṅghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā, vissajjitānipi avissajjitāni honti, yo vissajjeyya,
tika-vin05t:895_2: āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādinā nayena dassitāni ārāmo ārāmavatthu, vihāro vihāravatthu,
tika-vin05t:895_3: mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohanaṃ, lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṃ lohavārako lohakaṭāhaṃ vāsi
tika-vin05t:895_4: pharasu kuṭhārī kudālo nikhādanaṃ, valli veḷu muñjaṃ pabbajaṃ tiṇaṃ mattikā dārubhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:896_0: Tattha ārāmo nāma pupphārāmo vā phalārāmo vā. Ārāmavatthu nāma tesaṃyeva ārāmānaṃ
tika-vin05t:896_1: atthāya paricchinditvā ṭhapitokāso, tesu vā ārāmesu vinaṭṭhesu tesaṃ porāṇakabhūmibhāgo.
tika-vin05t:896_2: Vihāro nāma yaṃ kiñci pāsādādi senāsanaṃ. Vihāravatthu nāma tassa patiṭṭhānokāso.
tika-vin05t:896_3: Mañco nāma masārako bundikābaddho kuḷīrapādako āhaccapādakoti imesaṃ catunnaṃ mañcānaṃ
tika-vin05t:896_4: aññataro. Pīṭhaṃ nāma masārakādīnaṃyeva catunnaṃ pīṭhānaṃ aññataraṃ. Bhisi nāma uṇṇabhisiādīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:896_5: pañcannaṃ aññatarā. Bimbohanaṃ nāma rukkhatūlalatātūlapoṭakītūlānaṃ aññataraṃ. Lohakumbhī
tika-vin05t:896_6: nāma kāḷalohena vā tambalohena vā yena kenaci lohena katakumbhī. Lohabhāṇakādīsupi
tika-vin05t:896_7: eseva nayo. Ettha pana bhāṇakanti arañjaro vuccati. Vārakoti ghaṭo. Kaṭāhaṃ kaṭāhameva.
tika-vin05t:896_8: Vāsiādīsu valliādīsu ca duviññeyyaṃ nāma natthi. Pañcāti ca rāsivasena vuttaṃ, sarūpavasena
tika-vin05t:901: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayakathā – idañhi sabbampi garubhaṇḍaṃ senāsanakkhandhake “avissajjiya”nti vuttaṃ, kīṭāgirivatthusmiṃ “avebhaṅgiya”nti dassitaṃ, parivāre pana –
tika-vin05t:906: Āgataṃ. Tasmā mūlacchejjavasena avissajjiyañca avebhaṅgiyañca, parivattanavasena pana vissajjentassa paribhuñjantassa ca anāpattīti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:907_0: 228. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – idaṃ tāva pañcavidhampi cīvarapiṇḍapātabhesajjatthāya
tika-vin05t:907_1: upanetuṃ na vaṭṭati, thāvarena ca thāvaraṃ, garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍaṃ parivattetuṃ
tika-vin05t:907_2: vaṭṭati. Thāvare pana khettaṃ vatthu taḷākaṃ mātikāti evarūpaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa vicāretuṃ
tika-vin05t:907_3: vā sampaṭicchituṃ vā adhivāsetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati, kappiyakārakeheva vicāritato kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:907_4: vaṭṭati. Ārāmena pana ārāmaṃ ārāmavatthuṃ vihāraṃ vihāravatthunti imāni cattāripi
tika-vin05t:908_0: Tatrāyaṃ parivattananayo – saṅghassa nāḷikerārāmo dūre hoti, kappiyakārakā bahutaraṃ
tika-vin05t:908_1: khādanti, yampi na khādanti, tato sakaṭavetanaṃ datvā appameva āharanti, aññesaṃ
tika-vin05t:908_2: pana tassa ārāmassa avidūre gāmavāsīnaṃ manussānaṃ vihārassa samīpe ārāmo hoti, te
tika-vin05t:908_3: saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sakena ārāmena taṃ ārāmaṃ yācanti, saṅghena “ruccati saṅghassā”ti
tika-vin05t:908_4: apaloketvā sampaṭicchitabbo. Sacepi bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhasahassaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ pañca
tika-vin05t:908_5: satāni, “tumhākaṃ ārāmo khuddako”ti na vattabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi hi ayaṃ khuddako, atha
tika-vin05t:908_6: kho itarato bahutaraṃ āyaṃ deti. Sacepi samakameva deti, evampi icchiticchitakkhaṇe
tika-vin05t:908_7: paribhuñjituṃ sakkāti gahetabbameva. Sace pana manussānaṃ bahutarā rukkhā honti,
tika-vin05t:908_8: “nanu tumhākaṃ bahutarā rukkhā”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace “atirekaṃ amhākaṃ puññaṃ hotu,
tika-vin05t:908_9: saṅghassa demā”ti vadanti, jānāpetvā sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino,
tika-vin05t:908_10: manussānaṃ rukkhā na tāva phalaṃ gaṇhanti, kiñcāpi na gaṇhanti, “na cirena gaṇhissantī”ti
tika-vin05t:908_11: sampaṭicchitabbameva. Manussānaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino, bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhā na tāva phalaṃ
tika-vin05t:908_12: gaṇhanti, “nanu tumhākaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace “gaṇhatha, bhante,
tika-vin05t:908_13: amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissatī”ti denti, jānāpetvā sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ ārāmena
tika-vin05t:908_14: ārāmo parivattetabbo. Eteneva nayena ārāmavatthupi vihāropi vihāravatthupi ārāmena
tika-vin05t:908_15: parivattetabbaṃ, ārāmavatthunā ca mahantena vā khuddakena vā ārāmaārāmavatthuvihāravihāravatthūni.
tika-vin05t:909_0: Kathaṃ vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo? Saṅghassa antogāme gehaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ
tika-vin05t:909_1: vihāramajjhe pāsādo hoti, ubhopi agghena samakā, sace manussā tena pāsādena taṃ gehaṃ
tika-vin05t:909_2: yācanti, sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūnaṃ ce mahagghataraṃ gehaṃ hoti, “mahagghataraṃ
tika-vin05t:909_3: amhākaṃ geha”nti vutte ca “kiñcāpi mahagghataraṃ pabbajitānaṃ asāruppaṃ, na sakkā
tika-vin05t:909_4: tattha pabbajitehi vasituṃ, idaṃ pana sāruppaṃ, gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, evampi sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin05t:909_5: vaṭṭati. Sace pana manussānaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti, “nanu tumhākaṃ gehaṃ mahaggha”nti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:909_6: “Hotu, bhante, amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissati, gaṇhathā”ti vutte pana sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:909_7: Evampi vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo. Eteneva nayena vihāravatthupi ārāmopi ārāmavatthupi
tika-vin05t:909_8: vihārena parivattetabbaṃ, vihāravatthunā ca mahagghena vā appagghena vā vihāravihāravatthuārāmaārāmavatthūni.
tika-vin05t:910_0: Garubhaṇḍena garubhaṇḍaparivattane pana mañcapīṭhaṃ mahantaṃ vā hotu khuddakaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:910_1: antamaso caturaṅgulapādakaṃ gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:910_2: dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Sacepi rājarājamahāmattādayo ekappahāreneva
tika-vin05t:910_3: mañcasataṃ vā mañcasahassaṃ vā denti, sabbe kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbā, sampaṭicchitvā
tika-vin05t:910_5: dātabbā. Atirekamañce bhaṇḍāgārādīsu paññapetvā pattacīvaraṃ nikkhipitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:910_6: Bahisīmāya “saṅghassa demā”ti dinnamañco saṅghattherassa vasanaṭṭhāne dātabbo. Tattha
tika-vin05t:910_7: ce bahū mañcā honti, mañcena kammaṃ natthi. Yassa vasanaṭṭhāne kammaṃ atthi, tattha
tika-vin05t:910_8: “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti dātabbo. Mahagghena satagghanakena vā sahassagghanakena
tika-vin05t:910_9: vā mañcena aññaṃ mañcasataṃ labhati, parivattetvā gahetabbaṃ. Na kevalaṃ mañcena
tika-vin05t:910_11: vaṭṭanti. Esa nayo pīṭhabhisibimbohanesupi. Etesu pana akappiyaṃ na paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:910_12: kappiyaṃ saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Akappiyaṃ vā mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:910_13: parivattetvā vuttavatthūni gahetabbāni. Agarubhaṇḍupagaṃ pana bhisibimbohanaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin05t:911_0: 229. Lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṃ lohakaṭāhanti imāni tīṇi mahantāni vā hontu khuddakāni
tika-vin05t:911_1: vā, antamaso pasatamattaudakagaṇhanakānipi garubhaṇḍāniyeva. Lohavārako pana kāḷalohatambalohavaṭṭalohakaṃsalohānaṃ
tika-vin05t:911_2: yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādagaṇhanako bhājetabbo. Pādo ca nāma magadhanāḷiyā
tika-vin05t:911_3: pañcanāḷimattaṃ gaṇhāti, tato atirekagaṇhanako garubhaṇḍaṃ. Imāni tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni
tika-vin05t:911_5: khuddakāni vā mahantāni vā sabbāni garubhaṇḍāni. Patto ayathālakaṃ tambalohathālakanti
tika-vin05t:911_6: imāni pana bhājanīyāni. Kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā
tika-vin05t:911_7: vā vaṭṭati, puggalikaparibhogena na vaṭṭati. Kaṃsalohādibhājanaṃ saṅghassa dinnampi
tika-vin05t:911_8: hi pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭati, gihivikaṭanīhāreneva paribhuñjitabbanti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:912_0: Ṭhapetvā pana bhājanavikatiṃ aññasmimpi kappiyalohabhaṇḍe añjanī añjanisalākā kaṇṇamalaharaṇī
tika-vin05t:912_1: sūci paṇṇasūci khuddako pipphalako khuddakaṃ ārakaṇṭakaṃ kuñcikā tāḷaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi
tika-vin05t:912_2: vedhako natthudānaṃ bhiṇḍivālo lohakūṭo lohakutti lohaguḷo lohapiṇḍi lohacakkalikaṃ
tika-vin05t:912_4: pana aññāni vā bhitticchadanakavāṭādīsu upanetabbāni antamaso lohakhilakaṃ upādāya
tika-vin05t:912_5: sabbāni lohabhaṇḍāni garubhaṇḍāniyeva honti, attanā laddhānipi pariharitvā puggalikaparibhogena
tika-vin05t:912_6: na paribhuñjitabbāni, saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti. Tipubhaṇḍepi
tika-vin05t:913_0: Ghaṭako pana telabhājanaṃ vā pādagaṇhanakato atirekameva garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suvaṇṇarajatahārakūṭajātiphalikabhājanāni
tika-vin05t:913_1: gihivikaṭānipi na vaṭṭanti, pageva saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena vā.
tika-vin05t:913_2: Senāsanaparibhoge pana āmāsampi anāmāsampi sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:914_0: Vāsiādīsu yāya vāsiyā ṭhapetvā dantakaṭṭhacchedanaṃ vā ucchutacchanaṃ vā aññaṃ mahākammaṃ
tika-vin05t:914_1: kātuṃ na sakkā, ayaṃ bhājanīyā. Tato mahantatarā yena kenaci ākārena katā vāsi garubhaṇḍameva.
tika-vin05t:914_2: Pharasu pana antamaso vejjānaṃ sirāvedhanapharasupi garubhaṇḍameva. Kuṭhāriyaṃ pharasusadisoyeva
tika-vin05t:914_3: vinicchayo. Yā pana āvudhasaṅkhepena katā, ayaṃ anāmāsā. Kudālo antamaso caturaṅgulamattopi
tika-vin05t:914_4: garubhaṇḍameva. Nikhādanaṃ caturassamukhaṃ vā hotu doṇimukhaṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā ujukaṃ
tika-vin05t:914_5: vā, antamaso sammuñjanīdaṇḍakavedhanampi daṇḍabaddhaṃ ce, garubhaṇḍameva. Sammuñjanīdaṇḍakhaṇanakaṃ
tika-vin05t:914_6: pana adaṇḍakaṃ phalamattameva. Yaṃ sakkā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharituṃ, taṃ
tika-vin05t:914_7: bhājanīyaṃ. Sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. Yehi manussehi vihāre vāsiādīni
tika-vin05t:914_8: dinnāni honti, te ce ghare daḍḍhe vā corehi vā vilutte “detha no, bhante, upakaraṇe,
tika-vin05t:914_9: puna pākatike karissāmā”ti vadanti, dātabbā. Sace āharanti, na vāretabbā, anāharantāpi na codetabbā.
tika-vin05t:915_1: sabbāni lohamayaupakaraṇāni saṅghe dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍāni. Tipukoṭṭakasuvaṇṇakāracammakāraupakaraṇesupi
tika-vin05t:915_2: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tipukoṭṭakaupakaraṇesupi tipucchedanakasatthakaṃ,
tika-vin05t:915_4: imāni bhājanīyabhaṇḍāni. Nahāpitatunnakāraupakaraṇesupi ṭhapetvā mahākattariṃ mahāsaṇḍāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:916_0: Valliādīsu vettavalliādikā yā kāci aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tatthajātakā
tika-vin05t:916_1: vā rakkhitagopitā garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, sā saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate sace atirekā
tika-vin05t:916_2: hoti, puggalikakammepi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Arakkhitā pana garubhaṇḍameva na hoti. Suttamakacivākanāḷikerahīracammamayā
tika-vin05t:916_3: rajjukā vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikerahīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā ekavaṭṭā vā dvivaṭṭā
tika-vin05t:916_4: vā saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suttaṃ pana avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ makacivākanāḷikerahīrā
tika-vin05t:916_5: ca bhājanīyā. Yehi panetāni rajjukayottādīni dinnāni honti, te attano karaṇīyena
tika-vin05t:917_0: Yo koci antamaso aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍakamattopi veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako
tika-vin05t:917_1: vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ, sopi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atireko puggalikakamme
tika-vin05t:917_2: ca dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Pādagaṇhanakatelanāḷi pana kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanadaṇḍako chattadaṇḍako
tika-vin05t:917_3: chattasalākāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ. Daḍḍhagehamanussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na
tika-vin05t:917_4: vāretabbā. Rakkhitagopitaṃ veḷuṃ gaṇhantena samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā thāvaraṃ antamaso
tika-vin05t:917_5: taṃagghanakavallikāyapi phātikammaṃ katvā gahetabbo, phātikammaṃ akatvā gaṇhantena
tika-vin05t:917_6: tattheva vaḷañjetabbo. Gamanakāle saṅghike āvāse ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ, asatiyā gahetvā
tika-vin05t:917_7: gatena pahiṇitvā dātabbo. Desantaragatena sampattavihāro saṅghikāvāse ṭhapetabbo.
tika-vin05t:918_0: Tiṇanti muñjañca pabbajañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ yaṃ kiñci tiṇaṃ. Yattha pana tiṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:918_1: natthi, tattha paṇṇehi chādenti, tasmā paṇṇampi tiṇeneva saṅgahitaṃ. Iti muñjādīsu
tika-vin05t:918_2: yaṃ kiñci muṭṭhippamāṇaṃ tiṇaṃ tālapaṇṇādīsu ca ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ
tika-vin05t:918_3: vā bahārāme saṅghassa tiṇavatthuto jātatiṇaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:918_4: tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati, daḍḍhagehamanussā
tika-vin05t:918_5: gahetvā gacchantā na vāretabbā. Aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopi rittapotthako garubhaṇḍameva.
tika-vin05t:919_0: Mattikā pakatimattikā vā hotu pañcavaṇṇā vā sudhā vā sajjurasakaṅguṭṭhasilesādīsu
tika-vin05t:919_1: vā yaṃ kiñci dullabhaṭṭhāne ānetvā dinnaṃ tatthajātakaṃ vā, rakkhitagopitaṃ tālaphalapakkamattaṃ
tika-vin05t:919_2: garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca niṭṭhite atirekaṃ puggalikakamme
tika-vin05t:919_3: ca dātuṃ vaṭṭati, hiṅguhiṅgulakaharitālamanosilañjanāni pana bhājanīyabhaṇḍāni.
tika-vin05t:920_0: Dārubhaṇḍe “yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattopi dārubhaṇḍako dārudullabhaṭṭhāne saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:920_1: dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito, ayaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hotī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:920_2: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sabbampi dāruveḷucammapāsāṇādivikatiṃ dārubhaṇḍena saṅgaṇhitvā
tika-vin05t:920_3: āsandikato paṭṭhāya dārubhaṇḍe vinicchayo vutto. Tatrāyaṃ nayo – āsandiko sattaṅgo
tika-vin05t:920_4: bhaddapīṭhaṃ pīṭhikā ekapādakapīṭhaṃ āmaṇḍakavaṇṭakapīṭhaṃ phalakaṃ kocchaṃ palālapīṭhanti
tika-vin05t:920_5: imesu tāva yaṃ kiñci khuddakaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ vā, saṅghassa dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:920_6: hoti. Palālapīṭhena cettha kadalipattādipīṭhānipi saṅgahitāni. Byagghacammaonaddhampi
tika-vin05t:920_7: vāḷarūpaparikkhittaṃ ratanaparisibbitaṃ kocchaṃ garubhaṇḍameva, vaṅkaphalakaṃ dīghaphalakaṃ
tika-vin05t:920_9: daṇḍamuggaro ambaṇaṃ rajanadoṇi udakapaṭicchako dārumayo vā dantamayo vā veḷumayo
tika-vin05t:920_10: vā sapādakopi apādakopi samuggo mañjūsā pādagaṇhanakato atirekappamāṇo karaṇḍo udakadoṇi
tika-vin05t:920_11: udakakaṭāhaṃ uḷuṅko kaṭacchu pānīyasarāvaṃ pānīyasaṅkhoti etesupi yaṃ kiñci saṅghe
tika-vin05t:920_12: dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. Saṅkhathālakaṃ pana bhājanīyaṃ, tathā dārumayo udakatumbo.
tika-vin05t:921_0: Pādakathalikamaṇḍalaṃ dārumayaṃ vā hotu coḷapaṇṇādimayaṃ vā, sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin05t:921_1: Ādhārako pattapidhānaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ bījanī caṅkoṭakaṃ pacchi yaṭṭhisammuñjanī muṭṭhisammuñjanīti
tika-vin05t:921_2: etesupi yaṃ kiñci khuddakaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ vā, dāruveḷupaṇṇacammādīsu yena kenaci
tika-vin05t:921_3: kataṃ garubhaṇḍameva. Thambhatulāsopānaphalakādīsu dārumayaṃ vā pāsāṇamayaṃ vā yaṃ
tika-vin05t:921_4: kiñci gehasambhārarūpaṃ yo koci kaṭasārako yaṃ kiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ yaṃ kiñci akappiyacammaṃ,
tika-vin05t:921_5: sabbaṃ saṅghe dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ, bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakacammaṃ pana
tika-vin05t:921_6: paccattharaṇagatikaṃ hoti, tampi garubhaṇḍameva. Kappiyacammāni bhājanīyāni. Kurundiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:922_0: Udukkhalaṃ musalaṃ suppaṃ nisadaṃ nisadapoto pāsāṇadoṇi pāsāṇakaṭāhaṃ turivemabhastādi
tika-vin05t:922_1: sabbaṃ pesakārādibhaṇḍaṃ sabbaṃ kasibhaṇḍaṃ sabbaṃ cakkayuttakaṃ yānaṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
tika-vin05t:922_2: Mañcapādo mañcaaṭanī pīṭhapādo pīṭhaaṭanī vāsipharasuādīnaṃ daṇḍāti etesu yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin05t:922_3: vippakatatacchanakammaṃ aniṭṭhitameva bhājanīyaṃ, tacchitamaṭṭhaṃ pana garubhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:922_4: hoti. Anuññātavāsiyā pana daṇḍo chattamuṭṭhipaṇṇaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanā araṇisahitaṃ
tika-vin05t:922_5: dhammakaraṇo pādagaṇhanakato anatirittaṃ āmalakatumbaṃ āmalakaghaṭo lābukatumbaṃ
tika-vin05t:922_6: lābughaṭo visāṇakatumbanti sabbamevetaṃ bhājanīyaṃ, tato mahantataraṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin05t:922_7: Hatthidanto vā yaṃ kiñci visāṇaṃ vā atacchitaṃ yathāgatameva bhājanīyaṃ. Tehi katamañcapādādīsu
tika-vin05t:922_8: purimasadisoyeva vinicchayo. Tacchitaniṭṭhitopi hiṅgukaraṇḍako gaṇṭhikā vidho añjanī
tika-vin05t:923_0: Mattikābhaṇḍe sabbaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ghaṭapīṭharādikulālabhājanaṃ pattakaṭāhaṃ
tika-vin05t:923_1: aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ dhūmadānaṃ dīparukkhako dīpakapallikā cayaniṭṭhakā chadaniṭṭhakā thūpikāti
tika-vin05t:923_2: saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ, pādagaṇhanakato anatirittappamāṇo pana
tika-vin05t:923_3: ghaṭako pattaṃ thālakaṃ kañcanako kuṇḍikāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ. Yathā ca
tika-vin05t:923_4: mattikābhaṇḍe, evaṃ lohabhaṇḍepi kuṇḍikā bhājanīyakoṭṭhāsameva bhajatīti ayamettha anupubbikathā.
tika-vin05t:927_0: 230. Codanādivinicchayoti ettha pana codetuṃ ko labhati, ko na labhati? Dubbalacodakavacanaṃ
tika-vin05t:927_1: tāva gahetvā koci na labhati. Dubbalacodako nāma sambahulesu kathāsallāpena nisinnesu
tika-vin05t:927_2: eko ekaṃ ārabbha anodissakaṃ katvā pārājikavatthuṃ katheti, añño taṃ sutvā itarassa
tika-vin05t:927_3: gantvā āroceti, so taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tvaṃ kira maṃ idañcidañca vadasī”ti bhaṇati,
tika-vin05t:927_4: so “nāhaṃ evarūpaṃ jānāmi, kathāpavattiyaṃ pana mayā anodissakaṃ katvā vuttamatthi.
tika-vin05t:927_5: Sace ahaṃ tava imaṃ dukkhuppattiṃ jāneyyaṃ, ettakampi na katheyya”nti. Ayaṃ dubbalacodako.
tika-vin05t:927_6: Tassetaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ gahetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ koci codetuṃ na labhati, etaṃ pana aggahetvā
tika-vin05t:927_7: sīlasampanno bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ vā, sīlasampannā ca bhikkhunī bhikkhunīmeva
tika-vin05t:927_8: codetuṃ labhatīti mahāpadumatthero āha. Mahāsumatthero pana “pañcapi sahadhammikā
tika-vin05t:927_9: labhantī”ti āha. Godattatthero “na koci na labhatī”ti vatvā “bhikkhussa sutvā codeti,
tika-vin05t:927_10: bhikkhuniyā sutvā…pe… titthiyasāvakānaṃ sutvā codetī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ āhari. Tiṇṇampi
tika-vin05t:928_0: Ayaṃ pana codanā nāma diṭṭhacodanā sutacodanā parisaṅkitacodanāti tividhā hoti. Aparāpi
tika-vin05t:928_1: catubbidhā hoti sīlavipatticodanā ācāravipatticodanā diṭṭhivipatticodanā ājīvavipatticodanāti.
tika-vin05t:928_2: Tattha garukānaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ vasena sīlavipatticodanā veditabbā, avasesānaṃ
tika-vin05t:928_4: ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vasena ājīvavipatticodanā veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:929_0: Aparāpi catubbidhā hoti vatthusandassanā āpattisandassanā saṃvāsapaṭikkhepo sāmīcipaṭikkhepoti.
tika-vin05t:929_1: Tattha vatthusandassanā nāma “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi, adinnaṃ ādiyi, manussaṃ
tika-vin05t:929_2: ghātayittha, abhūtaṃ ārocayitthā”ti evaṃ pavattā. Āpattisandassanā nāma “tvaṃ methunadhammapārājikāpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:929_3: āpanno”tievamādinayappavattā. Saṃvāsapaṭikkhepo nāma “natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho
tika-vin05t:929_4: vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti evaṃ pavatto. Sāmīcipaṭikkhepo nāma abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaañjalīkammabījanādikammānaṃ
tika-vin05t:929_5: akaraṇaṃ. Taṃ paṭipāṭiyā vandanādīni karonto ekassa akatvā sesānaṃ karaṇakāle veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:929_6: Ettāvatāpi codanā nāma hoti. Yāgubhattādinā pana yaṃ icchati, taṃ āpucchati, na tāvatā codanā hoti.
tika-vin05t:930_1: ekaṃ dhammika”ntiādiṃ katvā yāva dasa adhammikāni pātimokkhaṭṭhapanāni, dasa dhammikānīti
tika-vin05t:930_2: evaṃ adhammikā pañcapaññāsa, dhammikā pañcapaññāsāti dasuttarasataṃ codanā vuttā.
tika-vin05t:930_3: Tā diṭṭhena codentassa dasuttarasataṃ, sutena codentassa dasuttarasataṃ, parisaṅkāya
tika-vin05t:930_4: codentassa dasuttarasatanti tiṃsādhikāni tīṇi satāni honti. Tāni kāyena codentassa,
tika-vin05t:930_5: vācāya codentassa, kāyavācāya codentassāti tiguṇāni katāni navutādhikāni nava satāni
tika-vin05t:930_6: honti. Tāni attanā codentassapi parena codāpentassapi tattakānevāti vīsatiūnāni dve
tika-vin05t:930_7: sahassāni honti. Puna diṭṭhādibhede samūlikāmūlikavasena anekasahassā codanā hontīti veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:931_0: 231. Vuttappabhedāsu pana imāsu codanāsu yāya kāyaci codanāya vasena saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin05t:931_1: osaṭe vatthusmiṃ cuditakacodakā vattabbā “tumhe amhākaṃ vinicchayena tuṭṭhā bhavissathā”ti.
tika-vin05t:931_2: Sace “bhavissāmā”ti vadanti, saṅghena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Atha pana
tika-vin05t:931_3: “vinicchinatha tāva, bhante, sace amhākaṃ khamissati, gaṇhissāmā”ti vadanti, “cetiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:931_4: tāva vandathā”tiādīni vatvā dīghasuttaṃ katvā vissajjitabbaṃ. Te ce cirarattaṃ kilantā
tika-vin05t:931_5: pakkantaparisā upacchinnapakkhā hutvā puna yācanti, yāvatatiyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā yadā
tika-vin05t:931_6: nimmadā honti, tadā nesaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitabbaṃ. Vinicchinantehi ca sace alajjussannā
tika-vin05t:931_7: hoti parisā, ubbāhikāya taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitabbaṃ. Sace bālussannā hoti parisā,
tika-vin05t:931_8: “tumhākaṃ sabhāge vinayadhare pariyesathā”ti vinayadhare pariyesāpetvā yena dhammena
tika-vin05t:931_9: yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:932_0: Tattha ca dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu. Vinayoti codanā ceva sāraṇā ca. Satthusāsananti
tika-vin05t:932_1: ñattisampadā ca anussāvanasampadā ca. Tasmā codakena vatthusmiṃ ārocite cuditako
tika-vin05t:932_2: pucchitabbo “santametaṃ, no”ti. Evaṃ vatthuṃ upaparikkhitvā bhūtena vatthunā codetvā
tika-vin05t:932_3: sāretvā ñattisampadāya ca anussāvanasampadāya ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:932_4: Tatra ce alajjī lajjiṃ codeti, so ca alajjī bālo hoti abyatto, nāssa nayo dātabbo,
tika-vin05t:932_5: evaṃ pana vattabbo “kimhi naṃ codesī”ti. Addhā so vakkhati “kimidaṃ, bhante, kimhi
tika-vin05t:932_6: naṃ nāmā”ti. “Tvaṃ kimhi nampi na jānāsi, na yuttaṃ tayā evarūpena bālena paraṃ codetu”nti
tika-vin05t:932_7: uyyojetabbo, nāssa anuyogo dātabbo. Sace pana so alajjī paṇḍito hoti byatto, diṭṭhena
tika-vin05t:932_8: vā sutena vā ajjhottharitvā sampādetuṃ sakkoti, etassa anuyogaṃ datvā lajjisseva
tika-vin05t:933_0: Sace lajjī alajjiṃ codeti, so ca lajjī bālo hoti abyatto, na sakkoti anuyogaṃ dātuṃ,
tika-vin05t:933_1: tassa nayo dātabbo “kimhi naṃ codesi sīlavipattiyā vā ācāravipattiādīsu vā ekissā”ti.
tika-vin05t:933_2: Kasmā pana imasseva evaṃ nayo dātabbo, na itarassāti, nanu na yuttaṃ vinayadharānaṃ
tika-vin05t:933_3: agatigamananti? Na yuttameva. Idaṃ pana agatigamanaṃ na hoti, dhammānuggaho nāma
tika-vin05t:933_4: eso. Alajjiniggahatthāya hi lajjipaggahatthāya ca sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ. Tatra alajjī
tika-vin05t:933_5: nayaṃ labhitvā ajjhottharanto ehiti, lajjī pana nayaṃ labhitvā diṭṭhe diṭṭhasantānena
tika-vin05t:933_6: sute sutasantānena patiṭṭhāya kathessati, tasmā tassa dhammānuggaho vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin05t:933_7: pana so lajjī paṇḍito hoti byatto, patiṭṭhāya katheti, alajjī ca “etampi natthi,
tika-vin05t:933_8: etampi natthī”ti paṭiññaṃ na deti, alajjissa paṭiññāya eva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:934_0: Tadatthadīpanatthañca idaṃ vatthu veditabbaṃ – tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero kira lohapāsādassa
tika-vin05t:934_1: heṭṭhā bhikkhūnaṃ vinayaṃ kathetvā sāyanhasamaye vuṭṭhāti, tassa vuṭṭhānasamaye dve
tika-vin05t:934_2: attapaccatthikā kathaṃ pavattesuṃ. Eko “etampi natthi, etampi natthī”ti paṭiññaṃ
tika-vin05t:934_3: na deti, atha appāvasese paṭhamayāme therassa tasmiṃ puggale “ayaṃ patiṭṭhāya katheti,
tika-vin05t:934_4: ayaṃ pana paṭiññaṃ na deti, bahūni ca vatthūni osaṭāni, addhā etaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin05t:934_5: asuddhaladdhi uppannā. Tato bījanīdaṇḍakena pādakathalikāya saññaṃ datvā “ahaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:934_6: vinicchinituṃ ananucchaviko, aññena vinicchināpehī”ti āha. “Kasmā, bhante”ti? Thero
tika-vin05t:934_7: tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Cuditakapuggalassa kāye ḍāho uṭṭhito, tato so theraṃ vanditvā
tika-vin05t:934_8: “bhante, vinicchinituṃ anurūpena vinayadharena nāma tumhādiseneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:934_9: codakena ca īdiseneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā setakāni nivāsetvā “ciraṃ kilamitāttha
tika-vin05t:935_0: Evaṃ lajjinā codiyamāno alajjī bahūsupi vatthūsu uppannesu paṭiññaṃ na deti, so neva
tika-vin05t:935_1: “suddho”ti vattabbo, na “asuddho”ti, jīvamatako nāma āmakapūtiko nāma cesa. Sace
tika-vin05t:935_2: panassa aññampi tādisaṃ vatthu uppajjati, na vinicchinitabbaṃ, tathā nāsitako bhavissati.
tika-vin05t:935_3: Sace pana alajjīyeva alajjiṃ codeti, so vattabbo “āvuso, tava vacanenāyaṃ kiṃ sakkā
tika-vin05t:935_4: vattu”nti. Itarampi tatheva vatvā “ubhopi ekasambhogaparibhogā hutvā jīvathā”ti uyyojetabbā.
tika-vin05t:935_5: Sīlatthāya nesaṃ vinicchayo na kātabbo, pattacīvarapariveṇādiatthāya pana patirūpaṃ
tika-vin05t:936_0: Atha lajjī lajjiṃ codeti, vivādo ca nesaṃ kismiñcideva appamattako hoti, saññāpetvā
tika-vin05t:936_1: “mā evaṃ karothā”ti accayaṃ desāpetvā uyyojetabbā. Atha panettha cuditakena sahasā
tika-vin05t:936_2: viraddhaṃ hoti, ādito paṭṭhāya alajjī nāma natthi. So ca pakkhānurakkhaṇatthāya paṭiññaṃ
tika-vin05t:936_3: na deti, “mayaṃ saddahāma, mayaṃ saddahāmā”ti bahū uṭṭhahanti, so tesaṃ paṭiññāya
tika-vin05t:936_4: ekavāraṃ dvevāraṃ suddho hotu, atha pana viraddhakālato paṭṭhāya ṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t:937_0: 232. Adinnādānavatthuṃ vinicchinantena pana pañcavīsati avahārā sādhukaṃ sallakkhetabbā.
tika-vin05t:937_1: Tesu ca kusalena vinayadharena otiṇṇaṃ vatthuṃ sahasā avinicchinitvāva pañca ṭhānāni
tika-vin05t:940_0: Tattha vatthunti bhaṇḍaṃ. Avahārakena hi “mayā idaṃ nāma avahaṭa”nti vuttepi āpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:940_1: anāropetvāva taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ “sasāmikaṃ vā asāmikaṃ vā”ti upaparikkhitabbaṃ. Sasāmikepi
tika-vin05t:940_2: sāmikānaṃ sālayabhāvo vā nirālayabhāvo vā upaparikkhitabbo. Sace tesaṃ sālayakāle
tika-vin05t:940_3: avahaṭaṃ, bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā āpatti kātabbā. Sace nirālayakāle, pārājikena na kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:940_4: Bhaṇḍasāmikesu pana bhaṇḍaṃ āharāpentesu bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ. Ayamettha sāmīci.
tika-vin05t:941_0: Imassa panatthassa dīpanatthamidaṃ vatthu – bhātiyarājakāle kira mahācetiyapūjāya
tika-vin05t:941_1: dakkhiṇadisato eko bhikkhu sattahatthaṃ paṇḍukāsāvaṃ aṃse karitvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ pāvisi.
tika-vin05t:941_2: Taṅkhaṇameva ca rājāpi cetiyavandanatthaṃ āgato. Tato ussāraṇāya vattamānāya mahājanasammaddo
tika-vin05t:941_3: ahosi. Atha so bhikkhu janasammaddapīḷito aṃsato patantaṃ kāsāvaṃ adisvāva nikkhanto,
tika-vin05t:941_4: nikkhamitvā kāsāvaṃ apassanto “ko īdise janasammadde kāsāvaṃ lacchati, na dāni taṃ
tika-vin05t:941_5: mayha”nti dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā gato. Athañño bhikkhu pacchā āgacchanto taṃ kāsāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:941_6: disvā theyyacittena gahetvā puna vippaṭisārī hutvā “assamaṇo dānimhi, vibbhamissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:942_0: Tena samayena cūḷasumanatthero nāma sabbapariyattidharo vinayācariyapāmokkho mahāvihāre
tika-vin05t:942_1: paṭivasati. So bhikkhu theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā okāsaṃ kāretvā attano kukkuccaṃ
tika-vin05t:942_2: pucchi. Thero tena bhaṭṭhe janakāye pacchā āgantvā gahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “atthi dāni
tika-vin05t:942_3: ettha okāso”ti cintetvā āha “sace kāsāvasāmikaṃ bhikkhuṃ āneyyāsi, sakkā bhaveyya
tika-vin05t:942_4: tava patiṭṭhā kātu”nti. Kathāhaṃ, bhante, taṃ dakkhissāmīti. Tahiṃ tahiṃ gantvā olokehīti.
tika-vin05t:942_5: So pañcapi mahāvihāre oloketvā neva addakkhi. Tato naṃ thero pucchi “katarāya disāya
tika-vin05t:942_6: bahū bhikkhū āgacchantī”ti? “Dakkhiṇadisāya, bhante”ti. Tena hi kāsāvaṃ dīghato ca
tika-vin05t:942_7: tiriyañca minitvā ṭhapehi, ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇadisāya vihārapaṭipāṭiyā vicinitvā taṃ
tika-vin05t:942_8: bhikkhuṃ ānehīti. So tathā katvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā therassa santikaṃ ānesi. Thero
tika-vin05t:942_9: pucchi “tavedaṃ kāsāva”nti? “Āma, bhante”ti. Kuhiṃ te pātitanti? So sabbaṃ ācikkhi.
tika-vin05t:942_10: Thero tena kataṃ dhuranikkhepaṃ sutvā itaraṃ pucchi “tayā idaṃ kuhiṃ disvā gahita”nti?
tika-vin05t:942_11: Sopi sabbaṃ ārocesi. Tato taṃ thero āha “sace te suddhacittena gahitaṃ abhavissa,
tika-vin05t:942_12: anāpattiyeva te assa, theyyacittena pana gahitattā dukkaṭaṃ āpannosi, taṃ desetvā
tika-vin05t:942_13: anāpattiko hoti, idañca kāsāvaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā etasseva bhikkhuno dehī”ti.
tika-vin05t:942_14: So bhikkhu amateneva abhisitto varamassāsappatto ahosi. Evaṃ vatthu oloketabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:943_0: Kāloti avahārakālo. Tadeva hi bhaṇḍaṃ kadāci appagghaṃ hoti, kadāci mahagghaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin05t:943_1: taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ kāle avahaṭaṃ, tasmiṃyeva kāle yo tassa aggho hoti, tena agghena
tika-vin05t:944_0: Desoti avahāradeso. Tañhi bhaṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ dese avahaṭaṃ, tasmiṃyeva dese yo tassa
tika-vin05t:944_1: aggho hoti, tena agghena āpatti kāretabbā. Bhaṇḍuṭṭhānadese hi bhaṇḍaṃ appagghaṃ
tika-vin05t:945_0: Imassapi ca atthassa dīpanatthamidaṃ vatthu – antarasamudde kira eko bhikkhu susaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:945_1: nāḷikeraṃ labhitvā bhamaṃ āropetvā saṅkhathālakasadisaṃ manoramaṃ pānīyathālakaṃ
tika-vin05t:945_2: katvā tattheva ṭhapetvā cetiyagiriṃ agamāsi. Añño bhikkhu antarasamuddaṃ gantvā tasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:945_3: vihāre paṭivasanto taṃ thālakaṃ disvā theyyacittena gahetvā cetiyagirimeva āgato.
tika-vin05t:945_4: Tassa tattha yāguṃ pivantassa taṃ thālakaṃ disvā thālakasāmiko bhikkhu āha “kuto
tika-vin05t:945_5: te idaṃ laddha”nti. Antarasamuddato me ānītanti. So taṃ “netaṃ tava santakaṃ, theyyāya
tika-vin05t:945_6: te gahita”nti saṅghamajjhaṃ ākaḍḍhi. Tattha ca vinicchayaṃ alabhitvā mahāvihāraṃ
tika-vin05t:945_7: agamiṃsu, tattha ca bheriṃ paharāpetvā mahācetiyasamīpe sannipātaṃ katvā vinicchayaṃ
tika-vin05t:946_0: Tasmiñca sannipāte ābhidhammikagodattatthero nāma vinayakusalo hoti, so evamāha “iminā
tika-vin05t:946_1: idaṃ thālakaṃ kuhiṃ avahaṭa”nti? “Antarasamudde avahaṭa”nti. Tattha taṃ kiṃ agghatīti.
tika-vin05t:946_2: Na kiñci agghati. Tatra hi nāḷikeraṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ khāditvā kapālaṃ chaḍḍeti,
tika-vin05t:946_3: dāruatthaṃ pana pharatīti. Imassa bhikkhuno ettha hatthakammaṃ kiṃ agghatīti? Māsakaṃ
tika-vin05t:946_4: vā ūnamāsakaṃ vāti. Atthi pana katthaci sammāsambuddhena māsake vā ūnamāsake vā pārājikaṃ
tika-vin05t:946_5: paññattanti. Evaṃ vutte “sādhu sādhu, sukathitaṃ suvinicchita”nti ekasādhukāro ahosi.
tika-vin05t:946_6: Tena ca samayena bhātiyarājāpi cetiyavandanatthaṃ nagarato nikkhanto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā
tika-vin05t:946_7: “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā sabbaṃ paṭipāṭiyā sutvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi “mayi sante
tika-vin05t:946_8: bhikkhūnampi bhikkhunīnampi gihīnampi adhikaraṇaṃ ābhidhammikagodattattherena vinicchitaṃ
tika-vin05t:946_9: suvinicchitaṃ, tassa vinicchaye atiṭṭhamānaṃ rājāṇāya ṭhapemī”ti. Evaṃ deso oloketabbo.
tika-vin05t:947_0: Agghoti bhaṇḍaggho. Navabhaṇḍassa hi yo aggho hoti, so pacchā parihāyati. Yathā navadhoto
tika-vin05t:947_1: patto aṭṭha vā dasa vā agghati, so pacchā bhinno vā chiddo vā āṇigaṇṭhikāhato vā
tika-vin05t:947_2: appaggho hoti, tasmā na sabbadā bhaṇḍaṃ pakatiaggheneva kātabbanti. Evaṃ aggho oloketabbo.
tika-vin05t:948_0: Paribhogoti bhaṇḍaparibhogo. Paribhogenapi hi vāsiādibhaṇḍassa aggho parihāyati.
tika-vin05t:948_1: Tasmā evaṃ upaparikkhitabbaṃ – sace koci kassaci pādagghanakaṃ vāsiṃ harati, tatra
tika-vin05t:948_2: vāsisāmiko pucchitabbo “tayā ayaṃ vāsi kittakena kītā”ti? “Pādena, bhante”ti. Kiṃ
tika-vin05t:948_3: pana te kiṇitvāva ṭhapitā, udāhu naṃ vaḷañjesīti? Sace vadati “ekadivasaṃ me dantakaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:948_4: vā rajanachalli vā pattapacanakadāru vā chinnaṃ, ghaṃsitvā vā nisitā”ti, athassa
tika-vin05t:948_5: porāṇako aggho bhaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathā ca vāsiyā, evaṃ añjaniyā vā añjanisalākāya
tika-vin05t:948_6: vā kuñcikāya vā palālena vā thusehi vā iṭṭhakacuṇṇena vā ekavāraṃ ghaṃsitvā dhovitamattenapi
tika-vin05t:948_7: aggho bhassati. Tipumaṇḍalassa makaradantacchedanenapi parimajjanamattenapi, udakasāṭakassa
tika-vin05t:948_8: sakiṃ nivāsanapārupanenapi paribhogasīsena aṃse vā sīse vā ṭhapanamattenapi, taṇḍulādīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:948_9: papphoṭanenapi tato ekaṃ vā dve vā apanayanenapi antamaso ekaṃ pāsāṇasakkharaṃ uddharitvā
tika-vin05t:948_10: chaḍḍitamattenapi, sappitelādīnaṃ bhājanantarapaavattanenapi antamaso tato makkhikaṃ
tika-vin05t:948_11: vā kipillikaṃ vā uddharitvā chaḍḍitamattenapi, guḷapiṇḍakassa madhurabhāvajānanatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:948_12: nakhena vijjhitvā aṇumattaṃ gahitamattenapi aggho bhassati. Tasmā yaṃ kiñci pādagghanakaṃ
tika-vin05t:948_13: vuttanayeneva sāmikehi paribhogena ūnaṃ kataṃ hoti, na taṃ avahaṭo bhikkhu pārājikena
tika-vin05t:949: Evaṃ imāni tulayitvā pañca ṭhānāni dhāreyya atthaṃ vicakkhaṇo, āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā garukaṃ vā lahukaṃ vā āpattiṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapeyyāti. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā –
tika-vin05t:950: “Sikkhāpadaṃ samaṃ tena, aññaṃ kiñci na vijjati;
tika-vin05t:959: Vīmaṃsitvātha viññūhi, saṃsanditvā ca taṃ vade.
tika-vin05t:963: Aggiṃ viya ca sampassaṃ, nāmaseyya vicakkhaṇo”ti. ;
tika-vin05t:964_0: 233. Uttarimanussadhammārocanaṃ vinicchinantena pana “kiṃ te adhigataṃ. Kinti te
tika-vin05t:964_1: adhigataṃ, kadā te adhigataṃ, kattha te adhigataṃ, katame te kilesā pahīnā, katamesaṃ
tika-vin05t:964_2: tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti imāni cha ṭhānāni visodhetabbāni. Sace hi koci bhikkhu uttarimanussadhammādhigamaṃ
tika-vin05t:964_3: byākareyya, na so ettāvatā sakkāro kātabbo, imesaṃ pana channaṃ ṭhānānaṃ sodhanatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:964_4: evaṃ vattabbo “kiṃ te adhigataṃ, kiṃ jhānaṃ udāhu vimokkhādīsu aññatara”nti. Yo hi
tika-vin05t:964_5: yena adhigato dhammo, so tassa pākaṭo hoti. Sace “idaṃ nāma me adhigata”nti vadati,
tika-vin05t:964_6: tato “kinti te adhigata”nti pucchitabbo, “aniccalakkhaṇādīsu kiṃ dhuraṃ katvā aṭṭhatiṃsāya
tika-vin05t:964_7: vā ārammaṇesu rūpārūpaajjhattabahiddhādibhedesu vā dhammesu kena mukhena abhinivisitvā”ti.
tika-vin05t:964_8: Yo hi yassābhiniveso, so tassa pākaṭo hoti. Sace “ayaṃ nāma me abhiniveso, evaṃ mayā
tika-vin05t:964_9: adhigata”nti vadati, tato “kadā te adhigata”nti pucchitabbo, “kiṃ pubbaṇhe, udāhu
tika-vin05t:964_10: majjhanhikādīsu aññatarasmiṃ kāle”ti. Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatakālo pākaṭo hoti.
tika-vin05t:964_11: Sace “amukasmiṃ nāma kāle adhigaka”nti vadati, tato “kattha te adhigata”nti pucchitabbo,
tika-vin05t:964_12: “kiṃ divāṭṭhāne, udāhu rattiṭṭhānādīsu aññatarasmiṃ okāse”ti. Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatokāso
tika-vin05t:964_13: pākaṭo hoti. Sace “amukasmiṃ nāma me okāse adhigata”nti vadati, tato “katame te kilesā
tika-vin05t:964_14: pahīnā”ti pucchitabbo, “kiṃ paṭhamamaggavajjhā, udāhu dutiyādimaggavajjhā”ti. Sabbesañhi
tika-vin05t:964_15: attanā adhigatamaggena pahīnā kilesā pākaṭā honti.
tika-vin05t:965_0: Sace “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti vadati, tato “katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti
tika-vin05t:965_1: pucchitabbo, “kiṃ sotāpattimaggassa, udāhu sakadāgāmimaggādīsu aññatarassā”ti. Sabbesañhi
tika-vin05t:965_2: attanā adhigatadhammo pākaṭo hoti. Sace “imesaṃ nāmāhaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:965_3: ettāvatāpissa vacanaṃ na saddhātabbaṃ. Bahussutā hi uggahaparipucchākusalā bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:965_4: imāni cha ṭhānāni sodhetuṃ sakkonti, imassa pana bhikkhuno āgamanapaṭipadā sodhetabbā.
tika-vin05t:965_5: Yadi āgamanapaṭipadā na sujjhati, “imāya paṭipadāya lokuttaradhammo nāma na labbhatī”ti
tika-vin05t:965_6: apanetabbo. Yadi panassa āgamanapaṭipadā sujjhati, dīgharattaṃ tīsu sikkhāsu appamatto
tika-vin05t:965_7: jāgariyamanuyutto catūsu paccayesu alaggo ākāse pāṇisamena cetasā viharatīti paññāyati,
tika-vin05t:965_8: tassa bhikkhuno byākaraṇaṃ paṭipadāya saddhiṃ saṃsandati. “Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṃ
tika-vin05t:965_9: yamunodakena saṃsandati sameti, evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī
tika-vin05t:965_10: paṭipadā, saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti vuttasadisaṃ hoti. Apica kho na ettakenapi
tika-vin05t:965_11: sakkāro kātabbo. Kasmā? Ekaccassa hi puthujjanassapi sato khīṇāsavassa paṭipattisadisā
tika-vin05t:965_12: paṭipatti hoti, tasmā so bhikkhu tehi tehi upāyehi uttāsetabbo. Khīṇāsavassa nāma
tika-vin05t:965_13: asaniyāpi matthake patamānāya bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā na hoti, puthujjanassa
tika-vin05t:966_0: Tatrimāni vatthūni – dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero kira ekaṃ piṇḍapātikaṃ pariggahetuṃ
tika-vin05t:966_1: asakkonto daharassa saññaṃ adāsi. So taṃ nahāyamānaṃ kalyāṇīnadīmukhadvāre nimujjitvā
tika-vin05t:966_2: pāde aggahesi. Piṇḍapātiko “kumbhīlo”ti saññāya mahāsaddamakāsi, tadā naṃ “puthujjano”ti jāniṃsu.
tika-vin05t:967_0: Candamukhatissarājakāle pana mahāvihāre saṅghatthero khīṇāsavo dubbalacakkhuko vihāreyeva
tika-vin05t:967_1: acchati. Rājā “theraṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti bhikkhūsu bhikkhācāraṃ gatesu appasaddo
tika-vin05t:967_2: upasaṅkamitvā sappo viya pāde aggahesi. Thero silāthambho viya niccalo hutvā “ko
tika-vin05t:967_3: etthā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ, bhante, tisso”ti? “Sugandhaṃ vāyasi no tissā”ti. Evaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhayaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin05t:968_0: Ekacco pana puthujjanopi atisūro hoti nibbhayo. So rajanīyena ārammaṇena pariggaṇhitabbo.
tika-vin05t:968_1: Vasabharājāpi ekaṃ theraṃ pariggaṇhamāno ghare nisīdāpetvā tassa santike badarasāḷavaṃ
tika-vin05t:968_2: maddamāno nisīdi. Mahātherassa kheḷo calito, therassa puthujjanabhāvo āvibhūto. Khīṇāsavassa
tika-vin05t:968_3: hi rasataṇhā nāma suppahīnā, dibbesupi rasesu nikanti nāma na hoti, tasmā imehi upāyehi
tika-vin05t:968_4: pariggahetvā sacassa bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā rasataṇhā vā uppajjati, “na ca tvaṃ
tika-vin05t:968_5: arahā”ti apanetabbo. Sace pana abhīru acchambhī anutrāsī hutvā sīho viya nisīdati,
tika-vin05t:968_6: dibbārammaṇepi nikantiṃ na janeti, ayaṃ bhikkhu sampannaveyyākaraṇo samantā rājarājamahāmattādīhi
tika-vin05t:968_7: pesitaṃ sakkāraṃ arahatīti veditabbo. Evaṃ tāva uttarimanussadhammārocanaṃ vinicchinitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:969: 234. Sakale pana vinayavinicchaye kosallaṃ patthayantena catubbidho vinayo jānitabbo.
tika-vin05t:972_0: Katamaṃ catubbidhaṃ? Suttaṃ suttānulomaṃ ācariyavādaṃ attanomatinti. Yaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin05t:972_1: vuttaṃ “āhaccapadena kho, mahārāja, rasena ācariyavaṃsena adhippāyā”ti. Ettha hi
tika-vin05t:972_2: āhaccapadanti suttaṃ adhippetaṃ. Rasoti suttānulomaṃ. Ācariyavaṃsoti ācariyavādo.
tika-vin05t:974: Suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā. Ye bhagavatā evaṃ vuttā –
tika-vin05t:975_0: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ, tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi,
tika-vin05t:975_1: kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo na kappati. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti
tika-vin05t:975_2: appaṭikkhittaṃ, tañce kappiyaṃ anulometi, akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappati. Yaṃ,
tika-vin05t:975_3: bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ, taṃ ce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:975_4: paṭibāhati, taṃ vo na kappati. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ,
tika-vin05t:975_5: tañce kappiyaṃ anulometi, akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:976: Ācariyavādo nāma dhammasaṅgāhakehi pañcahi arahantasatehi ṭhapitā pāḷivinimuttā okkantavinicchayappavattā aṭṭhakathātanti.
tika-vin05t:977: Attanomati nāma suttasuttānulomaācariyavāde muñcitvā anumānena attano anubuddhiyā nayaggāhena upaṭṭhitākārakathanaṃ.
tika-vin05t:978_0: Apica suttantābhidhammavinayaṭṭhakathāsu āgato sabbopi theravādo attanomati nāma.
tika-vin05t:978_1: Taṃ pana attanomatiṃ gahetvā kathentena na daḷhaggāhaṃ gahetvā voharitabbaṃ, kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:978_2: sallakkhetvā atthena pāḷiṃ, pāḷiyā ca atthaṃ saṃsanditvā kathetabbaṃ, attanomati
tika-vin05t:978_3: ācariyavāde otāretabbā. Sace tattha otarati ceva sameti ca, gahetabbā. Sace neva
tika-vin05t:978_4: otarati na sameti, na gahetabbā. Ayañhi attanomati nāma sabbadubbalā, attanomatito
tika-vin05t:979: Ācariyavādopi suttānulome otāretabbo. Tattha otaranto samento eva gahetabbo, itaro na gahetabbo. Ācariyavādato hi suttānulomaṃ balavataraṃ.
tika-vin05t:980_0: Suttānulomampi sutte otāretabbaṃ. Tattha otarantaṃ samentameva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ
tika-vin05t:980_1: na gahetabbaṃ. Suttānulomato hi suttameva balavataraṃ. Suttañhi appaṭivattiyaṃ kārakasaṅghasadisaṃ
tika-vin05t:980_2: buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadisaṃ. Tasmā yadā dve bhikkhū sākacchanti, sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin05t:980_3: katheti, paravādī suttānulomaṃ. Tehi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvā suttānulomaṃ
tika-vin05t:980_4: sutte otāretabbaṃ. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbaṃ, no ce, na gahetabbaṃ, suttasmiṃyeva
tika-vin05t:980_5: ṭhātabbaṃ. Athāyaṃ suttaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro ācariyavādaṃ. Tehipi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ
tika-vin05t:980_6: vā garahaṃ vā akatvā ācariyavādo sutte otāretabbo. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbo.
tika-vin05t:980_7: Anotaranto asamento ca gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo, suttasmiṃyeva ṭhātabbaṃ. Athāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:980_8: suttaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro attanomatiṃ. Tehipi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:980_9: akatvā attanomati sutte otāretabbā. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbā, no ce, na gahetabbā,
tika-vin05t:981_0: Athāyaṃ suttānulomaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttaṃ, suttānulome otāretabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:981_1: otarati sameti, tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyati, gahetabbaṃ, no ce tathā
tika-vin05t:981_2: paññāyati, na otarati na sameti, bāhirakasuttaṃ vā hoti siloko vā aññaṃ vā gārayhasuttaṃ
tika-vin05t:981_3: guḷhavessantaraguḷhavinayavedallādīnaṃ aññatarato ābhataṃ, na gahetabbaṃ, suttānulomasmiṃyeva
tika-vin05t:981_4: ṭhātabbaṃ. Athāyaṃ suttānulomaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro ācariyavādaṃ. Ācariyavādo suttānulome
tika-vin05t:981_5: otāretabbo. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbo. No ce, na gahetabbo, suttānulomeyeva
tika-vin05t:981_6: ṭhātabbaṃ. Athāyaṃ suttānulomaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro attanomatiṃ. Attanomati suttānulome
tika-vin05t:981_7: otāretabbā. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbā. No ce, na gahetabbā, suttānulomeyeva ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:982_0: Athāyaṃ ācariyavādaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttaṃ. Suttaṃ ācariyavāde otāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:982_1: Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbaṃ. Itaraṃ gārayhasuttaṃ na gahetabbaṃ, ācariyavādeyeva
tika-vin05t:982_2: ṭhātabbaṃ. Athāyaṃ ācariyavādaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttānulomaṃ. Suttānulomaṃ
tika-vin05t:982_3: ācariyavāde otāretabbaṃ. Otarantaṃ samentameva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ na gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:982_4: ācariyavādeyeva ṭhātabbaṃ. Athāyaṃ ācariyavādaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro attanomatiṃ.
tika-vin05t:982_5: Attanomati ācariyavāde otāretabbā. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbā. No ce, na gahetabbā,
tika-vin05t:983_0: Atha panāyaṃ attanomatiṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttaṃ. Suttaṃ attanomatiyaṃ otāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:983_1: Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbaṃ. Itaraṃ gārayhasuttaṃ na gahetabbaṃ, attanomatiyameva
tika-vin05t:983_2: ṭhātabbaṃ. Athāyaṃ attanomatiṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttānulomaṃ. Suttānulomaṃ attanomatiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:983_3: otāretabbaṃ. Otarantaṃ samentameva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ na gahetabbaṃ, attanomatiyameva
tika-vin05t:983_4: ṭhātabbaṃ. Athāyaṃ attanomatiṃ gahetvā katheti, paro ācariyavādaṃ. Ācariyavādo attanomatiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:983_5: otāretabbo. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbo. Itaro gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo,
tika-vin05t:983_6: attanomatiyameva ṭhātabbaṃ, attano gahaṇameva baliyaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sabbaṭṭhānesu ca
tika-vin05t:983_7: khepo vā garahā vā na kātabbāti.
tika-vin05t:984_0: Atha panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā katheti, paro akappiyanti, sutte ca suttānulome ca
tika-vin05t:984_1: otāretabbaṃ. Sace kappiyaṃ hoti, kappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Sace akappiyaṃ, akappiye ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:984_2: Athāyaṃ tassa kappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti,
tika-vin05t:984_3: paro kāraṇaṃ na vindati, kappiyeva ṭhātabbaṃ. Atha paro tassa akappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ
tika-vin05t:984_4: suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti, anena attano gahaṇanti katvā daḷhaṃ
tika-vin05t:984_5: ādāya na ṭhātabbaṃ, “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā akappiye eva ṭhātabbaṃ. Atha dvinnampi
tika-vin05t:984_6: kāraṇacchāyā dissati, paṭikkhittabhāvoyeva sādhu, akappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Vinayañhi patvā
tika-vin05t:984_7: kappiyākappiyavicāraṇaṃ āgamma rundhitabbaṃ, gāḷhaṃ kattabbaṃ, sotaṃ pacchinditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:985_0: Atha panāyaṃ akappiyanti gahetvā katheti, paro kappiyanti, sutte ca suttānulome ca
tika-vin05t:985_1: otāretabbaṃ. Sace kappiyaṃ hoti, kappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Sace akappiyaṃ, akappiye ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:985_2: Athāyaṃ bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehi akappiyabhāvaṃ dasseti, paro kāraṇaṃ na vindati,
tika-vin05t:985_3: akappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Atha paro bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehi kappiyabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin05t:985_4: ayaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vindati, kappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Atha dvinnampi kāraṇacchāyā dissati,
tika-vin05t:985_5: attano gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbaṃ. Yathā cāyaṃ kappiyākappiye akappiyakappiye ca vinicchayo
tika-vin05t:985_6: vutto, evaṃ anāpattiāpattivāde āpattānāpattivāde ca, lahukagarukāpattivāde garukalahukāpattivāde
tika-vin05t:985_7: cāpi vinicchayo veditabbo. Nāmamatteyeva hi ettha nānaṃ, yojanānaye nānaṃ natthi,
tika-vin05t:986_1: atirekakāraṇaṃ labhati, tassa vāde ṭhātabbaṃ, sabbaso pana kāraṇavinicchayaṃ alabhantena
tika-vin05t:986_2: suttaṃ na jahitabbaṃ, suttasmiṃyeva ṭhātabbanti. Evaṃ sakalavinayavinicchaye kosallaṃ
tika-vin05t:987_0: Imañca pana catubbidhaṃ vinayaṃ ñatvāpi vinayadharena puggalena tilakkhaṇasamannāgatena
tika-vin05t:987_1: bhavitabbaṃ. Tīṇi hi vinayadharassa lakkhaṇāni icchitabbāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Suttañcassa
tika-vin05t:987_2: svāgataṃ hoti suppavatti suvinicchitaṃ suttato anubyañjanasoti idamekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:987_3: Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hoti asaṃhīroti idaṃ dutiyaṃ. Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa
tika-vin05t:987_4: suggahitā hoti sumanasikatā sūpadhāritāti idaṃ tatiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:988_0: Tattha suttaṃ nāma sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ. Tadassa svāgataṃ hotīti suṭṭhu āgataṃ.
tika-vin05t:988_1: Suppavattīti suṭṭhu pavattaṃ paguṇaṃ vācuggataṃ. Suvinicchitaṃ suttaso anubyañjanasoti
tika-vin05t:988_2: pāḷito ca paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto ca suvinicchitaṃ hoti kaṅkhāchedanaṃ katvā
tika-vin05t:988_3: uggahitaṃ. Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hotīti vinaye lajjibhāvena patiṭṭhito hoti. Alajjī
tika-vin05t:988_4: hi bahussutopi samāno lābhagarukatāya tantiṃ visaṃvādetvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ
tika-vin05t:988_5: dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ upaddavaṃ karoti, saṅghabhedampi saṅgharājimpi uppādeti.
tika-vin05t:988_6: Lajjī pana kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva
tika-vin05t:988_7: dīpeti, satthusāsanaṃ garukaṃ katvā ṭhapeti. Tathā hi pubbe mahātherā tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin05t:988_8: vācaṃ nicchāresuṃ “anāgate lajjī rakkhissati, lajjī rakkhissati, lajjī rakkhissatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:988_9: Evaṃ yo lajjī, so vinayaṃ avijahanto avokkamanto lajjibhāveneva vinaye ṭhito hoti suppatiṭṭhitoti.
tika-vin05t:989_0: Asaṃhīroti saṃhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhato vā uparito vā padapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin05t:989_1: vā pucchiyamāno vitthunati vipphandati santiṭṭhituṃ na sakkoti, yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati,
tika-vin05t:989_2: taṃ taṃ anujānāti, sakavādaṃ chaḍḍetvā paravādaṃ gaṇhāti. Yo pana pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:989_3: vā heṭṭhupariyena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno na vitthunati na vipphandati,
tika-vin05t:989_4: ekekalomaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya “evaṃ mayaṃ vadāma, evaṃ no ācariyā vadantī”ti
tika-vin05t:989_5: vissajjeti, yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya
tika-vin05t:989_6: parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ agacchanto tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati “asaṃhīro”ti.
tika-vin05t:990_0: Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hotīti theraparamparā vaṃsaparamparā assa
tika-vin05t:990_1: suṭṭhu gahitā hoti. Sumanasikatāti suṭṭhu manasikatā, āvajjitamatte ujjalitapadīpo
tika-vin05t:990_2: viya hoti. Sūpadhāritāti suṭṭhu upadhāritā pubbāparānusandhito atthato kāraṇato ca
tika-vin05t:990_3: upadhāritā. Attanomatiṃ pahāya ācariyasuddhiyā vattā hoti, “mayhaṃ ācariyo asukācariyassa
tika-vin05t:990_4: santike uggaṇhi, so asukassā”ti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ theravādaṅgaṃ haritvā
tika-vin05t:990_5: yāva upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhīti pāpetvā ṭhapeti, tatopi āharitvā
tika-vin05t:990_6: upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhi, dāsakatthero attano upajjhāyassa upālittherassa,
tika-vin05t:990_7: soṇatthero attano upajjhāyassa dāsakattherassa, siggavatthero attano upajjhāyassa
tika-vin05t:990_8: soṇattherassa, moggaliputtatissatthero attano upajjhāyassa siggavattherassa caṇḍavajjittherassa
tika-vin05t:990_9: cāti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ theravādaṅgaṃ āharitvā attano ācariyaṃ pāpetvā
tika-vin05t:990_10: ṭhapeti. Evaṃ uggahitā hi ācariyaparamparā suggahitā hoti. Evaṃ asakkontena pana
tika-vin05t:990_11: avassaṃ dve tayo parivaṭṭā uggahetabbā. Sabbapacchimena hi nayena yathā ācariyo ācariyācariyo
tika-vin05t:990_12: ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti, tathā ñātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:991_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatena vinayadharena vatthuvinicchayatthaṃ sannipatite
tika-vin05t:991_1: saṅghe otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe sahasā avinicchinitvāva
tika-vin05t:991_2: cha ṭhānāni oloketabbāni. Katamāni cha? Vatthu oloketabbaṃ, mātikā oloketabbā, padabhājanīyaṃ
tika-vin05t:991_3: oloketabbaṃ, tikaparicchedo oloketabbo, antarāpatti oloketabbā, anāpatti oloketabbāti.
tika-vin05t:992_0: Vatthuṃ olokentopi hi “tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbaṃ, na tveva naggena
tika-vin05t:992_1: āgantabbaṃ, yo āgaccheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ ekaccaṃ āpattiṃ passati, so
tika-vin05t:992_2: taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:993: Mātikaṃ olokentopi “sampajānamusāvāde pācittiya”ntiādinā nayena pañcannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpattiṃ passati, so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:994_0: Padabhājanīyaṃ olokentopi “akkhayite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa.
tika-vin05t:994_1: Yebhuyyena khayite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādinā
tika-vin05t:994_2: nayena sattannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpattiṃ passati, so padabhājanīyato suttaṃ ānetvā
tika-vin05t:995: Tikaparicchedaṃ olokentopi tikasaṅghādisesaṃ vā tikapācittiyaṃ vā tikadukkaṭaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpattiṃ tikaparicchede passati, so tato suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:996: Antarāpattiṃ olokentopi “paṭilātaṃ ukkhipati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ yā sikkhāpadantaresu antarāpatti hoti, taṃ passati, so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:997_0: Anāpattiṃ olokentopi “anāpatti bhikkhu asādiyantassa, atheyyacittassa, na maraṇādhippāyassa,
tika-vin05t:997_1: anullapanādhippāyassa, na mocanādhippāyassa asañcicca asatiyā ajānantassā”ti evaṃ
tika-vin05t:997_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade niddiṭṭhaṃ anāpattiṃ passati, so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:998_0: Yo hi bhikkhu catubbidhavinayakovido tilakkhaṇasampanno imāni cha ṭhānāni oloketvā
tika-vin05t:998_1: adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati, tassa vinicchayo appaṭivattiyo buddhena sayaṃ nisīditvā
tika-vin05t:998_2: vinicchitasadiso hoti. Taṃ ce evaṃ vinicchayakusalaṃ bhikkhuṃ koci katasikkhāpadavītikkamo
tika-vin05t:998_3: bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā attano kukkuccaṃ puccheyya, tena sādhukaṃ sallakkhetvā sace
tika-vin05t:998_4: anāpatti hoti, “anāpattī”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace pana āpatti hoti, sā desanāgāminī ce,
tika-vin05t:998_6: pārājikacchāyā dissati, “pārājikāpattī”ti na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Methunadhammavītikkamo
tika-vin05t:998_7: hi uttarimanussadhammavītikkamo ca oḷāriko, adinnādānamanaussaviggahavītikkamā pana
tika-vin05t:998_8: sukhumā cittalahukā. Te sukhumeneva āpajjati, sukhumena rakkhati, tasmā visesena
tika-vin05t:998_9: taṃvatthukaṃ kukkuccaṃ pucchiyamāno “āpattī”ti avatvā sacassa ācariyo dharati, tato
tika-vin05t:998_10: tena so bhikkhu “amhākaṃ ācariyaṃ pucchā”ti pesetabbo. Sace so puna āgantvā “tumhākaṃ
tika-vin05t:998_11: ācariyo suttato nayato oloketvā ‘satekiccho’ti maṃ āhā”ti vadati, tato tena so “sādhu
tika-vin05t:998_12: suṭṭhu yaṃ ācariyo bhaṇati, taṃ karohī”ti vattabbo. Atha panassa ācariyo natthi,
tika-vin05t:998_13: saddhiṃ uggahitatthero pana atthi, tassa santikaṃ pesetabbo “amhehi saha uggahitatthero
tika-vin05t:998_14: gaṇapāmokkho, taṃ gantvā pucchā”ti. Tenapi “satekiccho”ti vinicchite “sādhu suṭṭhu
tika-vin05t:998_15: tassa vacanaṃ karohī”ti vattabbo. Atha tassa saddhiṃ uggahitattheropi natthi, antevāsiko
tika-vin05t:998_16: paṇḍito atthi, tassa santikaṃ pesetabbo “asukadaharaṃ gantvā pucchā”ti. Tenapi “satekiccho”ti
tika-vin05t:998_17: vinicchite “sādhu suṭṭhu tassa vacanaṃ karohī”ti vattabbo. Atha daharassapi pārājikacchāyāva
tika-vin05t:998_18: upaṭṭhāti, tenapi “pārājikosī”ti na vattabbo. Dullabho hi buddhuppādo, tato dullabhatarā
tika-vin05t:998_19: pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca. Evaṃ pana vattabbo “vivittaṃ okāsaṃ sammajjitvā divāvihāraṃ
tika-vin05t:998_20: nisīditvā sīlāni visodhetvā dvattiṃsākāraṃ tāva manasikarohī”ti. Sace tassa arogaṃ
tika-vin05t:998_21: sīlaṃ, kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayati, saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, upacārappanāppattaṃ
tika-vin05t:998_22: viya cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, divasaṃ atikkantampi na jānāti, so divasātikkame upaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:998_23: āgato evaṃ vattabbo “kīdisā te cittappavattī”ti. Ārocitāya ca cittapavattiyā vattabbo
tika-vin05t:999_0: Yassa pana sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti, tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayati, patodābhitunnaṃ viya
tika-vin05t:999_1: cittaṃ vikampati, vippaṭisāragginā ḍayhati, tattapāsāṇe nisinno viya taṅkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin05t:999_2: vuṭṭhāti. So āgato “kā te cittapavattī”ti pucchitabbo. Ārocitāya cittapavattiyā “natthi
tika-vin05t:999_3: loke raho nāma pāpakammaṃ pakubbato. Sabbapaṭhamañhi pāpaṃ karonto attanā jānāti.
tika-vin05t:999_4: Athassa ārakkhadevatā paracittavidū samaṇabrāhmaṇā aññā ca devatā jānanti, tvaṃyeva
tika-vin05t:999_5: dāni tava sotthiṃ pariyesāhī”ti vattabbo. Evaṃ katavītikkameneva bhikkhunā sayameva
tika-vin05t:1000_0: 235. Idāni yā sā pubbe vuttappabhedā codanā, tassāyeva sampattivipattijānanatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:1000_1: ādimajjhapariyosānādīnaṃ vasena vinicchayo veditabbo. Seyyathidaṃ, codanāya ko ādi,
tika-vin05t:1000_2: kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ? Codanāya “ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo, karotu me āyasmā okāsa”nti
tika-vin05t:1000_3: evaṃ okāsakammaṃ ādi. Otiṇṇena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā vinicchayo majjhe. Āpattiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1000_4: vā anāpattiyaṃ vā patiṭṭhāpanena samatho pariyosānaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1001_0: Codanāya kati mūlāni, kati vatthūni, kati bhūmiyo? Codanāya dve mūlāni samūlikā vā
tika-vin05t:1001_1: amūlikā vā. Tīṇi vatthūni diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ parisaṅkitaṃ. Pañca bhūmiyo kālena vakkhāmi,
tika-vin05t:1001_2: no akālena, bhūtena vakkhāmi, no abhūtena, saṇhena vakkhāmi, no pharusena, atthasaṃhitena
tika-vin05t:1001_3: vakkhāmi, no anatthasaṃhitena, mettacitto vakkhāmi, no dosantaroti. Imāya ca pana
tika-vin05t:1001_4: codanāya codakena puggalena “parisuddhakāyasamācāro nu khomhī”tiādinā nayena upālipañcakesu
tika-vin05t:1001_5: vuttesu pannarasasu dhammesu patiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Cuditakena dvīsu dhammesu patiṭṭhātabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:1002_0: Anuvijjakena ca codako pucchitabbo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ codesi, kimhi
tika-vin05t:1002_1: naṃ codesi, sīlavipattiyā codesi, ācāravipattiyā codesi, diṭṭhivipattiyā codesī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1002_2: So ce evaṃ vadeyya “sīlavipattiyā vā codemi, ācāravipattiyā vā codemi, diṭṭhivipattiyā
tika-vin05t:1002_3: vā codemī”ti. So evamassa vacanīyo “jānāsi panāyasmā sīlavipattiṃ, jānāsi ācāravipattiṃ,
tika-vin05t:1002_4: jānāsi diṭṭhivipatti”nti. So ce evaṃ vadeyya “jānāmi kho ahaṃ, āvuso, sīlavipattiṃ,
tika-vin05t:1002_5: jānāmi ācāravipattiṃ, jānāmi diṭṭhivipatti”nti. So evamassa vacanīyo “katamā panāvuso,
tika-vin05t:1002_6: sīlavipatti, katamā ācāravipatti, katamā diṭṭhivipattī”ti? So ce evaṃ vadeyya “cattāri
tika-vin05t:1002_7: pārājikāni terasa saṅghādisesā, ayaṃ sīlavipatti. Thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1002_8: dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ, ayaṃ ācāravipatti. Micchādiṭṭhi antaggāhikā diṭṭhi, ayaṃ diṭṭhivipattī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1003_0: So evamassa vacanīyo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ codesi, diṭṭhena vā codesi,
tika-vin05t:1003_1: sutena vā codesi, parisaṅkāya vā codesī”ti. So ce evaṃ vadeyya “diṭṭhena vā codemi,
tika-vin05t:1003_2: sutena vā codemi, parisaṅkāya vā codemī”ti. So evamassa vacanīyo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1003_3: imaṃ bhikkhuṃ diṭṭhena codesi, kiṃ te diṭṭhaṃ, kinti te diṭṭhaṃ, kadā te diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1003_4: kattha te diṭṭhaṃ, pārājikaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho, saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho,
tika-vin05t:1003_5: thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho,
tika-vin05t:1003_6: kattha cāyaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, kattha ca tvaṃ karosi, kiñca tvaṃ karosi, kiṃ ayaṃ bhikkhu karotī”ti?
tika-vin05t:1004_0: So ce evaṃ vadeyya “na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ diṭṭhena codemi, apica sutena
tika-vin05t:1004_1: codemī”ti. So evamassa vacanīyo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ sutena codesi,
tika-vin05t:1004_2: kiṃ te sutaṃ, kinti te sutaṃ, kadā te sutaṃ, kattha te sutaṃ, pārājikaṃ ajjhāpannoti
tika-vin05t:1004_3: sutaṃ, saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpannoti sutaṃ, thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin05t:1004_4: dubbhāsitaṃ ajjhāpannoti sutaṃ, bhikkhussa sutaṃ, bhikkhuniyā sutaṃ, sikkhamānāya
tika-vin05t:1004_5: sutaṃ, sāmaṇerassa sutaṃ, sāmaṇeriyā sutaṃ, upāsakassa sutaṃ, upāsikāya sutaṃ, rājūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1004_6: sutaṃ, rājamahāmattānaṃ sutaṃ, titthiyānaṃ sutaṃ, titthiyasāvakānaṃ suta”nti.
tika-vin05t:1005_0: So ce evaṃ vadeyya “na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ sutena codemi, apica parisaṅkāya
tika-vin05t:1005_1: codemī”ti. So evamassa vacanīyo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ parisaṅkāya codesi,
tika-vin05t:1005_2: kiṃ parisaṅkasi, kinti parisaṅkasi, kadā parisaṅkasi, kattha parisaṅkasi? Pārājikaṃ
tika-vin05t:1005_3: dhammaṃ ajjhāpannoti parisaṅkasi, saṅghādisesaṃ thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1005_4: dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ajjhāpannoti parisaṅkasi, bhikkhussa sutvā parisaṅkasi, bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin05t:1006: Diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhena sameti, diṭṭhena saṃsandate diṭṭhaṃ;
tika-vin05t:1009: Sutaṃ sutena sameti, sutena saṃsandate sutaṃ;
tika-vin05t:1012: Mutaṃ mutena sameti, mutena saṃsandate mutaṃ;
tika-vin05t:1015: Paṭiññā lajjīsu katā, alajjīsu evaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin05t:1017_0: Apicettha saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamantena nīcacittena saṅgho upasaṅkamitabbo
tika-vin05t:1017_1: rajoharaṇasamena cittena, āsanakusalena bhavitabbaṃ nisajjakusalena, there bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:1017_2: anupakhajjantena nave bhikkhū āsanena appaṭibāhantena yathāpatirūpe āsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1017_3: anānākathikena bhavitabbaṃ atiracchānakathikena, sāmaṃ vā dhammo bhāsitabbo, paro
tika-vin05t:1017_4: vā ajjhesitabbo, ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo nātimaññitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1018_0: Saṅghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukāmena na upajjhāyo pucchitabbo,
tika-vin05t:1018_1: na ācariyo pucchitabbo, na saddhivihāriko pucchitabbo, na antevāsiko pucchitabbo,
