tika-vin05t:1018_2: na samānupajjhāyako pucchitabbo, na samānācariyako pucchitabbo, na jāti pucchitabbā,
tika-vin05t:1018_3: na nāmaṃ pucchitabbaṃ, na gottaṃ pucchitabbaṃ, na āgamo pucchitabbo, na kulapadeso
tika-vin05t:1018_4: pucchitabbo, na jātibhūmi pucchitabbā. Taṃ kiṃkāraṇā? Atrassa pemaṃ vā doso vā, peme
tika-vin05t:1018_5: vā sati dose vā chandāpi gaccheyya dosāpi gaccheyya mohāpi gaccheyya bhayāpi gaccheyyāti.
tika-vin05t:1019_0: Saṅghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukāmena saṅghagarukena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1019_1: no puggalagarukena, saddhammagarukena bhavitabbaṃ, no āmisagarukena, atthavasikena
tika-vin05t:1019_2: bhavitabbaṃ, no parisakappikena, kālena anuvijjitabbaṃ, no akālena, bhūtena anuvijjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1019_3: no abhūtena, saṇhena anuvijjitabbaṃ, no pharusena, atthasaṃhitena anuvijjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1019_4: no anatthasaṃhitena, mettacittena anuvijjitabbaṃ, no dosantarena, na upakaṇṇakajappinā
tika-vin05t:1019_5: bhavitabbaṃ, na jimhaṃ pekkhitabbaṃ, na akkhi nikhaṇitabbaṃ, na bhamukaṃ ukkhipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1019_6: na sīsaṃ ukkhipitabbaṃ, na hatthavikāro kātabbo, na hatthamuddā dassetabbā.
tika-vin05t:1020_0: Āsanakusalena bhavitabbaṃ nisajjakusalena, yugamattaṃ pekkhantena atthaṃ anuvidhiyantena
tika-vin05t:1020_1: sake āsane nisīditabbaṃ, na ca āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṃ, na vītihātabbaṃ, na kummaggo sevitabbo,
tika-vin05t:1020_2: na bāhāvikkhepakaṃ bhaṇitabbaṃ, aturitena bhavitabbaṃ asāhasikena, acaṇḍikatena bhavitabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:1020_3: vacanakkhamena, mettacittena bhavitabbaṃ hitānukampinā, kāruṇikena bhavitabbaṃ hitaparisakkinā,
tika-vin05t:1020_4: asamphappalāpinā bhavitabbaṃ pariyantabhāṇinā, averavasikena bhavitabbaṃ anasuruttena,
tika-vin05t:1020_5: attā pariggahetabbo, paro pariggahetabbo, codako pariggahetabbo, cuditako pariggahetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1020_6: adhammacodako pariggahetabbo, adhammacuditako pariggahetabbo, dhammacodako pariggahetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1020_7: dhammacuditako pariggahetabbo, vuttaṃ ahāpentena avuttaṃ appakāsentena otiṇṇāni padabyañjanāni
tika-vin05t:1020_8: sādhukaṃ uggahetvā paro paripucchitvā yathāpaṭiññāya kāretabbo, mando hāsetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1020_9: bhīru assāsetabbo, caṇḍo nisedhetabbo, asuci vibhāvetabbo, ujumaddavena na chandāgati
tika-vin05t:1020_10: gantabbā, na dosāgati gantabbā, na mohāgati gantabbā, na bhayāgati gantabbā, majjhattena
tika-vin05t:1020_11: bhavitabbaṃ dhammesu ca puggalesu ca, evañca pana anuvijjako anuvijjamāno satthu
tika-vin05t:1020_12: ceva sāsanakaro hoti, viññūnañca sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti.
tika-vin05t:1024_1: Tattha tividho parivāso paṭicchannaparivāso suddhantaparivāso samodhānaparivāsoti.
tika-vin05t:1024_2: Tesu paṭicchannaparivāso tāva yathāpaṭicchannāya āpattiyā dātabbo. Kassaci hi ekāhappaṭicchannā
tika-vin05t:1024_3: āpatti hoti, kassaci dvīhappaṭicchannā, kassaci ekāpatti hoti, kassaci dve tisso
tika-vin05t:1024_4: tatuttari vā. Tasmā paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ tāva paṭicchannabhāvo jānitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1024_5: Ayañhi āpatti nāma dasahākārehi paṭicchannā hoti.
tika-vin05t:1025_0: Tatrāyaṃ mātikā – āpatti ca hoti āpattisaññī ca, pakatatto ca hoti pakatattasaññī
tika-vin05t:1025_1: ca, anantarāyiko ca hoti anantarāyikasaññī ca, pahu ca hoti pahusaññī ca, chādetukāmo
tika-vin05t:1025_2: ca hoti chādeti cāti. Tattha āpatti ca hoti āpattisaññī cāti yaṃ āpanno, sā āpattiyeva
tika-vin05t:1025_3: hoti, sopi ca tattha āpattisaññīyeva. Iti jānanto chādeti, channā hoti, atha panāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1025_4: tattha anāpattisaññī, acchannā hoti. Anāpatti pana āpattisaññāyapi anāpattisaññāyapi
tika-vin05t:1025_5: chādentena acchāditāva hoti, lahukaṃ vā garukāti garukaṃ vā lahukāti chādeti, alajjipakkhe
tika-vin05t:1025_6: tiṭṭhati, āpatti pana acchannā hoti, garukaṃ lahukāti maññamāno deseti, neva desitā
tika-vin05t:1025_7: hoti, na channā, garukaṃ vā garukāti ñatvā chādeti, channā hoti, garukalahukabhāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:1025_8: na jānāti, āpattiṃ chādemīti chādeti, channāva hoti.
tika-vin05t:1026_0: Pakatattoti tividhaṃ ukkhepanīyakammaṃ akato. So ce pakatattasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin05t:1026_1: channā hoti. Atha “mayhaṃ saṅghena kammaṃ kata”nti apakatattasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin05t:1026_2: acchannā hoti. Apakatattena pana pakatattasaññinā vā apakatattasaññinā vā chāditāpi
tika-vin05t:1029: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1032_0: Anantarāyikoti yassa dasasu antarāyesu ekopi natthi, so ce anantarāyikasaññī hutvā
tika-vin05t:1032_1: chādeti, channā hoti. Sacepi so bhīrujātikatāya andhakāre amanussacaṇḍamigabhayena
tika-vin05t:1032_2: antarāyikasaññī hutvā chādeti, acchannāva hoti. Yassapi pabbatavihāre vasantassa
tika-vin05t:1032_3: kandaraṃ vā nadiṃ vā atikkamitvā ārocetabbaṃ hoti, antarāmagge ca caṇḍavāḷaamanussādibhayaṃ
tika-vin05t:1032_4: atthi, magge ajagarā nipajjanti, nadī pūrā hoti, etasmiṃ pana satiyeva antarāye antarāyikasaññī
tika-vin05t:1032_5: chādeti, acchannā hoti. Antarāyikassa pana antarāyikasaññāya chādayato acchannāva.
tika-vin05t:1033_0: Pahūti so sakkoti bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantuñceva ārocetuñca, so ce pahusaññī hutvā
tika-vin05t:1033_1: chādeti, channā hoti. Sacassa mukhe appamattako gaṇḍo vā hoti, hanukavāto vā vijjhati,
tika-vin05t:1033_2: danto vā rujjati, bhikkhā vā mandā laddhā hoti, tāvatakena pana neva vattuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:1033_3: na gantuṃ, apica kho “na sakkomī”ti saññī hoti, ayaṃ pahu hutvā appahusaññī nāma.
tika-vin05t:1033_4: Iminā chāditāpi acchāditā. Appahunā pana vattuṃ vā gantuṃ vā asamatthena pahusaññinā
tika-vin05t:1033_5: vā appahusaññinā vā chāditā hoti, acchāditāva.
tika-vin05t:1034_0: Chādetukāmo ca hoti chādeti cāti idaṃ uttānatthameva. Sace pana “chādessāmī”ti dhuranikkhepaṃ
tika-vin05t:1034_1: katvā purebhatte vā pacchābhatte vā paṭhamayāmādīsu vā lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā antoaruṇeyeva
tika-vin05t:1034_2: āroceti, ayaṃ chādetukāmo na chādeti nāma. Yassa pana abhikkhuke ṭhāne vasantassa
tika-vin05t:1034_3: āpajjitvā sabhāgassa bhikkhuno āgamanaṃ āgamentassa, sabhāgassa santikaṃ vā gacchantassa
tika-vin05t:1034_4: aḍḍhamāsopi māsopi atikkamati, ayaṃ na chādetukāmo chādeti nāma, ayampi acchannāva
tika-vin05t:1034_5: hoti. Yo pana āpannamattova aggiṃ akkantapuriso viya sahasā pakkamitvā sabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1034_6: gantvā āvikaroti, ayaṃ na chādetukāmova na chādeti nāma. Sace pana sabhāgaṃ disvāpi
tika-vin05t:1034_7: “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”ti lajjāya nāroceti, channāva hoti āpatti. Upajjhāyādibhāvo
tika-vin05t:1034_8: hi idha appamāṇaṃ, averisabhāgamattameva pamāṇaṃ. Tasmā averisabhāgassa santike ārocetabbā.
tika-vin05t:1034_9: Yo pana visabhāgo hoti sutvā pakāsetukāmo, evarūpassa upajjhāyassapi santike na ārocetabbā.
tika-vin05t:1035_0: Tattha purebhattaṃ vā āpattiṃ āpanno hotu pacchābhattaṃ vā divā vā rattiṃ vā, yāva
tika-vin05t:1035_1: aruṇaṃ na uggacchati, tāva ārocetabbaṃ. Uddhaste aruṇe paṭicchannā hoti, paṭicchādanapaccayā
tika-vin05t:1035_2: ca dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvikātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1035_3: Sace āvikaroti, āpatti āvikatā hoti, dukkaṭā pana na muccati. Tasmā suddhassa santike
tika-vin05t:1035_4: āvikātabbā. Āvikaronto ca “tuyhaṃ santike ekaṃ āpattiṃ āvikaromī”ti vā “ācikkhāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:1035_5: vā ārocemī”ti vā “mama ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpannabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti vā vadatu, “ekaṃ garukāpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1035_6: āvikaromī”tiādinā vā nayena vadatu, sabbehipi ākārehi appaṭicchannāva hotīti kurundiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1035_7: vuttaṃ. Sace pana “lahukāpattiṃ āvikaromī”tiādinā nayena vadati, paṭicchannāva hoti.
tika-vin05t:1035_8: Vatthuṃ āroceti, āpattiṃ āroceti, ubhayaṃ āroceti, tividhenapi ārocitāva hoti.
tika-vin05t:1036_0: 237. Iti imāni dasa kāraṇāni upaparikkhitvā paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ dentena paṭhamameva
tika-vin05t:1036_1: paṭicchannabhāvo jānitabbo, tato paṭicchannadivase ca āpattiyo ca sallakkhetvā sace
tika-vin05t:1036_2: ekāhappaṭicchannā hoti, “ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin05t:1036_3: ekāhappaṭicchanna”nti evaṃ yācāpetvā khandhake āgatanayeneva kammavācaṃ vatvā parivāso
tika-vin05t:1036_7: yojanā kātabbā. Tato yāva ekūnatiṃsatimo divaso, tāva “atirekapakkhapaṭicchanna”nti,
tika-vin05t:1036_9: temāsa…pe… atirekaekādasamāsapaṭicchanna”nti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā. Saṃvacchare puṇṇe
tika-vin05t:1036_11: evaṃ yāva “saṭṭhisaṃvaccharaṃ, atirekasaṭṭhisaṃvaccharapaṭicchanna”nti vā tato vā
tika-vin05t:1037_0: Sace pana dve tisso tatuttari vā āpattiyo honti, yathā “ekaṃ āpatti”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1037_1: “dve āpattiyo, tisso āpattiyo”ti vattabbaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana sataṃ vā hotu sahassaṃ
tika-vin05t:1037_2: vā, “sambahulā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Nānāvatthukāsupi “ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā
tika-vin05t:1037_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ, ekaṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ, ekaṃ duṭṭhullavācaṃ, ekaṃ
tika-vin05t:1037_4: attakāmaṃ, ekaṃ sañcarittaṃ, ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ gaṇanavasena vā “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1037_5: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukā ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1037_6: vatthukittanavasena vā “ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti
tika-vin05t:1037_7: evaṃ nāmamattavasena vā yojanā kātabbā. Tattha nāmaṃ duvidhaṃ sajātisādhāraṇaṃ sabbasādhāraṇañca.
tika-vin05t:1037_8: Tattha saṅghādisesoti sajātisādhāraṇaṃ. Āpattīti sabbasādhāraṇaṃ. Tasmā “sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1037_9: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇanāmavasenapi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1037_10: Idañhi parivāsādivinayakammaṃ vatthuvasena gottavasena nāmavasena āpattivasena ca kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1038_0: Tattha sukkavissaṭṭhīti vatthu ceva gottañca. Saṅghādisesoti nāmañceva āpatti ca.
tika-vin05t:1038_2: vatthu ceva gottañca gahitaṃ hoti. “Saṅghādiseso”ti vacanenapi “āpattiyo”ti vacanenapi
tika-vin05t:1038_3: nāmañceva āpatti ca gahitā hoti. Tasmā etesu yassa kassaci vasena kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1038_4: Idha pana sabbāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇavasena sambahulanayeneva ca sabbattha kammavācaṃ
tika-vin05t:1038_5: yojetvā dassayissāma. Ekañhi āpattiṃ āpajjitvā “sambahulā”ti vinayakammaṃ karontassapi
tika-vin05t:1038_6: vuṭṭhāti ekaṃ vinā sambahulānaṃ abhāvato. Sambahulā pana āpajjitvā “ekaṃ āpajji”nti
tika-vin05t:1038_7: karontassa na vuṭṭhāti, tasmā sambahulanayeneva yojayissāma. Seyyathidaṃ – paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1039_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1039_1: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1039_2: sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, dutiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1039_3: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1039_4: āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, tatiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1041_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1041_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācati, yadi
tika-vin05t:1041_2: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1042_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1042_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācati, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1042_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1042_3: deti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1042_4: ekāhaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1044: “Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāso, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1045: Evaṃ yo yo āpanno hoti, tassa tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1046: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca tena bhikkhunā māḷakasīmāyameva “parivāsaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vattaṃ samādātabbaṃ, samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetabbaṃ. Ārocentena ca –
tika-vin05t:1047_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1047_1: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1047_2: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasāmi, vediyāmahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1048: Evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Imañca atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci vācāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1049_0: Ārocetvā sace nikkhipitukāmo hoti, “parivāsaṃ nikkhipāmi, vattaṃ nikkhipāmī”ti nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1049_1: Ekapadenapi cettha nikkhitto hoti parivāso, dvīhi pana sunikkhittoyeva. Samādānepi
tika-vin05t:1049_2: eseva nayo. Nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Māḷakato bhikkhūsu
tika-vin05t:1049_3: nikkhantesu ekassapi santike nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati, māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena
tika-vin05t:1049_4: sahagacchantassa santike nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace sopi pakkanto, aññassa yassa māḷake
tika-vin05t:1049_5: nārocitaṃ, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ārocentena ca avasāne “vediyatīti maṃ āyasmā
tika-vin05t:1049_6: dhāretū”ti vattabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ ārocentena “āyasmantā dhārentū”ti, tiṇṇaṃ ārocentena
tika-vin05t:1049_7: “āyasmanto dhārentū”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace appabhikkhuko vihāro hoti, sabhāgā bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:1049_8: vasanti, vattaṃ anikkhipitvā vihāreyeva rattipariggaho kātabbo. Atha na sakkā sodhetuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1049_9: vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye ekena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ parikkhittassa
tika-vin05t:1049_10: vihārassa parikkhepato, aparikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte
tika-vin05t:1049_11: atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1049_12: antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayena vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbaṃ. Ārocentena sace navakataro
tika-vin05t:1049_13: hoti, “āvuso”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace vuḍḍhataro, “bhante”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace añño koci
tika-vin05t:1049_14: bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati, sace esa taṃ passati, saddaṃ
tika-vin05t:1049_15: vāssa suṇāti, ārocetabbaṃ, anārocentassa ratticchedo ceva vattabhedo ca. Atha dvādasahatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:1049_16: upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati, ratticchedo hotiyeva, vattabhedo pana
tika-vin05t:1049_17: natthi, uggate aruṇe vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace so bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena
tika-vin05t:1049_18: pakkanto hoti, yaṃ aññaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ passati, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Vihāraṃ
tika-vin05t:1049_19: gantvāpi yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nikkhittavattassa parihāro.
tika-vin05t:1050_0: 238. Evaṃ yattakāni divasāni āpatti paṭicchannā hoti, tattakāni tato adhikatarāni
tika-vin05t:1050_1: vā kukkuccavinodanatthāya parivasitvā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ samādiyitvā mānattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1050_2: yācitabbaṃ. Ayañhi vatte samādinne eva mānattāraho hoti nikkhittavattena parivutthattā.
tika-vin05t:1050_3: Anikkhittavattassa pana puna samādānakiccaṃ natthi. So hi paṭicchannadivasātikkameneva
tika-vin05t:1050_4: mānattāraho hoti, tasmā tassa mānattaṃ dātabbameva. Taṃ dentena –
tika-vin05t:1051_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1051_1: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1051_2: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante, parivutthaparivāso
tika-vin05t:1051_3: saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1051_4: bhante…pe… sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso, dutiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1051_5: ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante…pe… sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso,
tika-vin05t:1051_6: tatiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1053_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1053_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1053_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1053_3: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1053_4: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1053_5: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1054_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1054_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1054_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1054_3: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1054_4: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1054_5: ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa
tika-vin05t:1054_6: bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1054_7: so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1056: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1058: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca tena bhikkhunā māḷakasīmāyameva “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vattaṃ samādātabbaṃ, samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetabbaṃ. Ārocentena ca –
tika-vin05t:1059_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1059_1: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1059_2: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1059_3: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1059_4: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ mānattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1059_5: carāmi, vediyāmahaṃ bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti –
tika-vin05t:1060: Evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Imañca pana atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci vācāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1061_0: Ārocetvā sace nikkhipitukāmo hoti, “mānattaṃ nikkhipāmi, vattaṃ nikkhipāmī”ti saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin05t:1061_1: nikkhipitabbaṃ. Māḷakato bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu ekassapi santike nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1061_2: Māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena sahagacchantassa santike nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1061_3: Sace sopi pakkanto, aññassa yassa māḷake nārocitaṃ, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1061_4: Ārocentena pana avasāne “vediyatīti maṃ āyasmā dhāretū”ti vattabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ ārocentena
tika-vin05t:1061_5: “āyasmantā dhārentū”ti, tiṇṇaṃ ārocentena “āyasmanto dhārentū”ti vattabbaṃ. Nikkhittakālato
tika-vin05t:1061_6: paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Sace appabhikkhuko vihāro hoti, sabhāgā bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:1061_7: vasanti, vattaṃ anikkhipitvā antovihāreyeva rattiyo gaṇetabbā. Atha na sakkā sodhetuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1061_8: vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
tika-vin05t:1061_9: parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato, aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve
tika-vin05t:1061_10: leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne
tika-vin05t:1061_11: nisīditabbaṃ, antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayena vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbaṃ. Sace añño
tika-vin05t:1061_12: koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati, sace esa taṃ passati, saddaṃ
tika-vin05t:1061_13: vāssa suṇāti, ārocetabbaṃ. Anārocentassa ratticchedo ceva vattabhedo ca, atha dvādasahatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:1061_14: upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati, ratticchedo hoti eva, vattabhedo pana
tika-vin05t:1061_15: natthi. Ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā sesehi sati karaṇīye gantumpi
tika-vin05t:1061_16: vaṭṭati, aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa bhikkhussa santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace sopi
tika-vin05t:1061_17: kenaci kammena pure aruṇeyeva gacchati, aññaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1061_18: yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, tassa santike ārocetvā vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ayañca yasmā
tika-vin05t:1061_19: gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi, tenassa ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso
tika-vin05t:1061_20: vā vippavāso vā na hoti. Sace na kañci passati, vihāraṃ gantvāpi yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati,
tika-vin05t:1061_21: tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nikkhittavattassa parihāro.
tika-vin05t:1062_0: 239. Evaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ caritvā yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1062_1: tattha so bhikkhu abbhetabbo. Abbhentehi ca paṭhamaṃ abbhānāraho kātabbo. Ayañhi
tika-vin05t:1062_2: nikkhittavattattā pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhito, pakatattassa ca abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1062_3: tasmā vattaṃ samādāpetabbo, vatte samādinne abbhānāraho hoti. Tenapi vattaṃ samādiyitvā
tika-vin05t:1062_4: ārocetvā abbhānaṃ yācitabbaṃ. Anikkhittavattassa puna vattasamādānakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin05t:1062_5: So hi chārattātikkameneva abbhānāraho hoti, tasmā so abbhetabbo. Abbhentena ca –
tika-vin05t:1063_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1063_1: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1063_2: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1063_3: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1063_4: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1063_5: ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante…pe… sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto dutiyampi,
tika-vin05t:1063_6: bhante, saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante…pe… sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto tatiyampi, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1065_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1065_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1065_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1065_3: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1065_4: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1065_5: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, so ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:1065_6: pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1066_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1066_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1066_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1066_3: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1066_4: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1066_5: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, so ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin05t:1066_6: bhikkhuṃ abbheti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa.
tika-vin05t:1068: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1070: Evaṃ tāva ekāhappaṭicchannāya āpattiyā paṭicchannaparivāso mānattadānaṃ abbhānañca veditabbaṃ. Imināva nayena dvīhādipaṭicchannāsupi tadanurūpā kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1071: 240. Sace pana appaṭicchannā āpatti hoti, parivāsaṃ adatvā mānattameva datvā ciṇṇamānatto abbhetabbo. Kathaṃ? Mānattaṃ dentena tāva –
tika-vin05t:1072_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1072_1: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante…pe…
tika-vin05t:1072_2: dutiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1072_3: yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante…pe… tatiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1074_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1074_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati, yadi
tika-vin05t:1074_2: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1075_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1075_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1075_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1075_3: deti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1075_4: chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1077: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1079: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca vattasamādānaṃ vattanikkhepo mānattacaraṇañca sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1080_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1080_1: āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1080_2: āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ mānattaṃ carāmi, vediyāmahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1082: Ekassa dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā ārocentena paṭicchannamānatte vuttanayeneva ārocetabbaṃ. Ciṇṇamānatto ca yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho, tattha so abbhetabbo. Abbhentena ca –
tika-vin05t:1083_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1083_1: āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ

tika-vin05t:1083_3: yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante…pe… sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto dutiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmi.
tika-vin05t:1083_4: Ahaṃ, bhante…pe… sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto tatiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1085_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,

tika-vin05t:1085_3: adāsi, so ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1086_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1086_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1086_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1086_3: adāsi, so ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheti,
tika-vin05t:1086_4: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1088: Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1089: Evaṃ kammavācaṃ vatvā abbhetabbo. Evaṃ appaṭicchannāya āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1090_0: 241. Sace kassaci ekāpatti paṭicchannā hoti, ekā appaṭicchannā, tassa paṭicchannāya
tika-vin05t:1090_1: āpattiyā parivāsaṃ datvā parivutthaparivāsassa mānattaṃ dentena appaṭicchannāpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1090_2: paṭicchannāpattiyā samodhānetvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Kathaṃ? Sace paṭicchannāpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā hoti –
tika-vin05t:1091_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1091_1: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1091_2: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso, ahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1091_3: bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1091_4: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1093_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1093_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1093_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1093_3: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1093_4: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1093_5: mānattaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1093_6: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1094_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1094_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1094_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1094_3: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1094_4: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1094_5: mānattaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca
tika-vin05t:1094_6: appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1094_7: tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattassa
tika-vin05t:1094_8: dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1096_0: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca
tika-vin05t:1096_1: appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1098: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca vattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1099_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1099_1: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1099_2: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso, ahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1099_3: bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1099_4: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1099_5: tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca
tika-vin05t:1099_6: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ mānattaṃ carāmi, vediyāmahaṃ, bhante, vediyatīti
tika-vin05t:1101: Samādinnamānattena ca anūnaṃ katvā vuttanayena chārattaṃ mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ. Ciṇṇamānatto ca yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho, tattha so abbhetabbo. Abbhentena ca –
tika-vin05t:1102_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1102_1: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1102_2: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso, ahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1102_3: bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1102_4: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1102_5: tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca
tika-vin05t:1102_6: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante, ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1104_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1104_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1104_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1104_3: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1104_4: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1104_5: mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannāñca
tika-vin05t:1104_6: appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, so ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1104_7: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1105_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1105_1: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1105_2: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1105_3: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1105_4: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1105_5: mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca
tika-vin05t:1105_6: appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, so ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1105_7: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1105_8: abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1107: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1110_0: 242. Suddhantaparivāso samodhānaparivāsoti dve avasesā. Tattha suddhantaparivāso
tika-vin05t:1110_1: duvidho cūḷasuddhanto mahāsuddhantoti. Duvidhopi cesa rattiparicchedaṃ sakalaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1110_2: ekaccaṃ vā ajānantassa ca assarantassa ca tattha vematikassa ca dātabbo. Āpattipariyantaṃ
tika-vin05t:1110_3: pana “ettakā ahaṃ āpattiyo āpanno”ti jānātu vā mā vā, akāraṇametaṃ, tattha yo upasampadato
tika-vin05t:1110_4: paṭṭhāya anulomakkamena vā ārocitadivasato paṭṭhāya paṭilomakkamena vā “asukañca
tika-vin05t:1110_5: asukañca divasaṃ vā pakkhaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā tava suddhabhāvaṃ jānāsī”ti
tika-vin05t:1110_6: pucchiyamāno “āma, bhante, jānāmi, ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadati, tassa
tika-vin05t:1111_0: Taṃ gahetvā parivasantena yattakaṃ kālaṃ attano suddhiṃ jānāti, tattakaṃ apanetvā
tika-vin05t:1111_1: avasesaṃ māsaṃ vā dvemāsaṃ vā parivasitabbaṃ. Sace “māsamattaṃ asuddhomhī”ti sallakkhetvā
tika-vin05t:1111_2: aggahesi, parivasanto ca puna aññaṃ māsaṃ sarati, tampi māsaṃ parivasitabbameva,
tika-vin05t:1111_3: puna parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Atha “dvemāsaṃ asuddhomhī”ti sallakkhetvā aggahesi,
tika-vin05t:1111_4: parivasanto ca “māsamattamevāhaṃ asuddhomhī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti, māsameva parivasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1111_5: puna parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Ayañhi suddhantaparivāso nāma uddhampi ārohati, heṭṭhāpi
tika-vin05t:1111_6: orohati. Idamassa lakkhaṇaṃ. Aññasmiṃ pana āpattivuṭṭhāne idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ – yo appaṭicchannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1111_7: āpattiṃ “paṭicchannā”ti vinayakammaṃ karoti, tassāpatti vuṭṭhāti. Yo paṭicchannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1111_8: “appaṭicchannā”ti vinayakammaṃ karoti, tassa na vuṭṭhāti. Acirapaṭicchannaṃ “cirapaṭicchannā”ti
tika-vin05t:1111_9: karontassapi vuṭṭhāti, cirapaṭicchannaṃ “acirapaṭicchannā”ti karontassa na vuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin05t:1111_10: Ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā “sambahulā”ti karontassa vuṭṭhāti ekaṃ vinā sambahulānaṃ abhāvato.
tika-vin05t:1111_11: Sambahulā pana āpajjitvā “ekaṃ āpajji”nti karontassa na vuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin05t:1112_0: Yo pana yathāvuttena anulomapaṭilomanayena pucchiyamānopi rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti
tika-vin05t:1112_1: nassarati, vematiko vā hoti, tassa dinno suddhantaparivāso mahāsuddhantoti vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1112_2: Taṃ gahetvā gahitadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva upasampadadivaso, tāva rattiyo gaṇetvā parivasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1112_3: ayaṃ uddhaṃ nārohati, heṭṭhā pana orohati. Tasmā sace parivasanto rattiparicchede
tika-vin05t:1112_4: sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti “māso vā saṃvaccharo vā mayhaṃ āpannassā”ti, māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1113_0: Parivāsayācanadānalakkhaṇaṃ panettha evaṃ veditabbaṃ – tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin05t:1113_1: ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā
tika-vin05t:1114_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1114_1: rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi, rattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi,
tika-vin05t:1114_2: āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1117_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1117_1: āpajji, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarati,
tika-vin05t:1117_2: rattipariyantaṃ nassarati, āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, so
tika-vin05t:1117_3: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1117_4: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ dadeyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1118_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1118_1: āpajji, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarati,
tika-vin05t:1118_2: rattipariyantaṃ nassarati, āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, so
tika-vin05t:1118_3: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1118_4: tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ deti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1118_5: tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1120: “Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ. Suddhantaparivāso, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1122: Kammavācāpariyosāne vattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1123_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1123_1: rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi, rattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi,
tika-vin05t:1123_2: āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1123_3: suddhantaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1123_4: sohaṃ parivasāmi, vediyāmahaṃ, bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1124: Ekassa dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā ārocanaṃ vuttanayameva. Parivutthaparivāsassa mānattaṃ dentena –
tika-vin05t:1125_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1125_1: rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi, rattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi,
tika-vin05t:1125_2: āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1125_3: suddhantaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1125_4: sohaṃ, bhante, parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mārattaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1127_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1127_1: āpajji, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarati,
tika-vin05t:1127_2: rattipariyantaṃ nassarati, āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, so
tika-vin05t:1127_3: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1127_4: āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1127_5: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1127_6: tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1128_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1128_1: āpajji, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarati,
tika-vin05t:1128_2: rattipariyantaṃ nassarati, āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, so
tika-vin05t:1128_3: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1128_4: āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1128_5: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1128_6: mānattaṃ deti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1128_7: mānattassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1130: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1132: Kammavācāpariyosāne mānattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1133_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1133_1: rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi, rattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi,
tika-vin05t:1133_2: āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1133_3: suddhantaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1133_4: sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa
tika-vin05t:1133_5: me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ mānattaṃ carāmi, vediyāmahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1135: Ciṇṇamānatto ca yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho, tattha so bhikkhu abbhetabbo. Abbhentena ca –
tika-vin05t:1136_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1136_1: rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi, rattipariyantaṃ nassarāmi,
tika-vin05t:1136_2: āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1136_3: suddhantaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1136_4: sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa
tika-vin05t:1136_5: me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ bhante ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1138_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1138_1: āpajji, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarati,
tika-vin05t:1138_2: rattipariyantaṃ nassarati, āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, so
tika-vin05t:1138_3: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1138_4: āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1138_5: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1138_6: mānattaṃ adāsi, so ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1138_7: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1139_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1139_1: āpajji, āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, āpattipariyantaṃ nassarati,
tika-vin05t:1139_2: rattipariyantaṃ nassarati, āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante vematiko, so
tika-vin05t:1139_3: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1139_4: āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1139_5: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1139_6: mānattaṃ adāsi, so ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin05t:1139_7: abbheti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa
tika-vin05t:1141: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1144_0: 243. Samodhānaparivāso pana tividho hoti – odhānasamodhāno agghasamodhāno missakasamodhānoti.
tika-vin05t:1144_1: Tattha odhānasamodhāno nāma antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādentassa parivutthadivase
tika-vin05t:1144_2: odhunitvā makkhetvā purimāya āpattiyā mūladivasaparicchede pacchā āpannaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1145_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – yo paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ gahetvā parivasanto
tika-vin05t:1145_1: vā mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho vā anikkhittavatto aññaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1145_2: āpajjitvā purimāya āpattiyā samā vā ūnatarā vā rattiyo paṭicchādeti, tassa mūlāyapaṭikassanena
tika-vin05t:1145_3: te parivutthadivase ca mānattaciṇṇadivase ca sabbe odhunitvā adivase katvā pacchā
tika-vin05t:1145_4: āpannāpattiṃ mūlaāpattiyaṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabbo. Tena sace mūlāpatti pakkhapaṭicchannā,
tika-vin05t:1145_5: antarāpatti ūnakapakkhapaṭicchannā, puna pakkhameva parivāso parivasitabbo. Athāpi
tika-vin05t:1145_6: antarāpatti pakkhapaṭicchannāva, pakkhameva parivasitabbaṃ. Etenupāyena yāva saṭṭhivassapaṭicchannā
tika-vin05t:1145_7: mūlāpatti, tāva vinicchayo veditabbo. Saṭṭhivassānipi parivasitvā mānattāraho hutvāpi
tika-vin05t:1145_8: hi ekadivasaṃ antarāpattiṃ paṭicchādetvā puna saṭṭhivassāni parivāsāraho hoti. Evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1145_9: mānattacārikamānattārahakālepi āpannāya āpattiyā mūlāyapaṭikassane kate mānattaciṇṇadivasāpi
tika-vin05t:1145_10: parivāsavutthadivasāpi sabbe makkhitāva honti. Sace pana nikkhittavatto āpajjati,
tika-vin05t:1145_11: mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho nāma na hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā na so parivasanto āpanno, pakatattaṭṭhāne
tika-vin05t:1145_12: ṭhito āpanno, tasmā tassā āpattiyā visuṃ mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ. Sace paṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1146_0: “Sace pana antarāpatti mūlāpattito atirekapaṭicchannā hoti, tattha kiṃ kātabba”nti
tika-vin05t:1146_1: vutte mahāsumatthero āha “atekiccho ayaṃ puggalo, atekiccho nāma āvikārāpetvā vissajjetabbo”ti.
tika-vin05t:1146_2: Mahāpadumatthero panāha “kasmā atekiccho nāma, nanu ayaṃ samuccayakkhandhako nāma
tika-vin05t:1146_3: buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadiso, āpatti nāma paṭicchannā vā hotu appaṭicchannā vā samakaūnataraatirekapaṭicchannā
tika-vin05t:1146_4: vā, vinayadharassa kammavācaṃ yojetuṃ samatthabhāvoyevettha pamāṇaṃ, tasmā yā atirekapaṭicchannā
tika-vin05t:1146_5: hoti, taṃ mūlāpattiṃ katvā tattha itaraṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabbo”ti. Ayaṃ odhānasamodhāno nāma.
tika-vin05t:1147_0: Taṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā pacchā parivāso dātabbo. Sace koci bhikkhu
tika-vin05t:1147_1: pakkhapaṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasanto antarā anikkhittavattova puna pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1147_2: āpattiṃ āpajjati, tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā
tika-vin05t:1147_3: vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo –
tika-vin05t:1148_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1148_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1148_2: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1148_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1151_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1151_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1151_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1151_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, so
tika-vin05t:1151_4: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1151_5: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1152_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1152_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1152_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1152_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, so
tika-vin05t:1152_4: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1152_5: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1152_6: mūlāya paṭikassati, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1152_7: āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanā, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1154: “Paṭikassito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanā, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1156: Evañca samodhānaparivāso dātabbo. Tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā…pe… evamassa vacanīyo –
tika-vin05t:1157_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1157_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1157_2: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1157_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1157_4: pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ, taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1157_5: āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ antarā
tika-vin05t:1157_6: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1160_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1160_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1160_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1160_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, so
tika-vin05t:1160_4: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1160_5: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1160_6: mūlāya paṭikassi, so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1160_7: purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa
tika-vin05t:1160_8: bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu
tika-vin05t:1161_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1161_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1161_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1161_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, so
tika-vin05t:1161_4: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1161_5: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1161_6: mūlāya paṭikassi, so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1161_7: purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā
tika-vin05t:1161_8: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1161_9: deti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1161_10: pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa.
tika-vin05t:1163_0: “Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1163_1: purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāso, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1165: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca vattasamādānādi sabbaṃ pubbe vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1166_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1166_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1166_2: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1166_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1166_4: pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ, taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1166_5: āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1166_6: āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa
tika-vin05t:1166_7: me saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu
tika-vin05t:1166_8: samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasāmi, vediyāmahaṃ, bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti –
tika-vin05t:1169_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1169_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1169_2: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1169_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1169_4: pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ, taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1169_5: āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1169_6: āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa
tika-vin05t:1169_7: me saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu
tika-vin05t:1169_8: samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante, parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1171_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1171_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1171_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1171_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, so
tika-vin05t:1171_4: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1171_5: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1171_6: mūlāya paṭikassi, so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1171_7: purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā
tika-vin05t:1171_8: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1171_9: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1171_10: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1172_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1172_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1172_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1172_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, so
tika-vin05t:1172_4: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1172_5: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1172_6: mūlāya paṭikassi, so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1172_7: purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā
tika-vin05t:1172_8: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1172_9: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1172_10: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti, yassāyasmato
tika-vin05t:1172_11: khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1172_12: so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1174: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1176: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca mānattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1177_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1177_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ

tika-vin05t:1177_4: pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ, taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1177_5: āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1177_6: āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa
tika-vin05t:1177_7: me saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu
tika-vin05t:1177_8: samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1177_9: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1177_10: adāsi, sohaṃ mānattaṃ carāmi, vediyāmahaṃ bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti –
tika-vin05t:1180_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1180_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ

tika-vin05t:1180_4: pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ, taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ

tika-vin05t:1180_6: āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa
tika-vin05t:1180_7: me saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu
tika-vin05t:1180_8: samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1180_9: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ

tika-vin05t:1182_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,

tika-vin05t:1182_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1182_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, so
tika-vin05t:1182_4: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1182_5: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1182_6: mūlāya paṭikassi, so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1182_7: purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā
tika-vin05t:1182_8: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1182_9: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1182_10: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, so
tika-vin05t:1182_11: ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin05t:1183_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1183_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1183_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1183_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, so
tika-vin05t:1183_4: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1183_5: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1183_6: mūlāya paṭikassi, so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1183_7: purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā
tika-vin05t:1183_8: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1183_9: adāsi, so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1183_10: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, so
tika-vin05t:1183_11: ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheti, yassāyasmato
tika-vin05t:1183_12: khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1185: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1187_0: Sace mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho vā anikkhittavatto antarāpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1187_1: āpajjitvā paṭicchādeti, vuttanayeneva purimāpattiyā antarāpattiyā ca divasaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin05t:1187_2: sallakkhetvā tadanurūpāya kammavācāya mūlāya paṭikassitvā parivāsaṃ datvā parivutthaparivāsassa
tika-vin05t:1187_3: mānattaṃ datvā ciṇṇamānatto abbhetabbo. Sace pana paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasanto
tika-vin05t:1187_4: antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā na paṭicchādeti, tassa mūlāyapaṭikassanāyeva kātabbā, puna
tika-vin05t:1187_5: parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Mūlāyapaṭikassanena pana parivutthadivasānaṃ makkhitattā
tika-vin05t:1187_6: puna ādito paṭṭhāya parivasitabbaṃ. Parivutthaparivāsassa ca mūlāpattiyā antarāpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1187_7: samodhānetvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ, ciṇṇamānatto ca abbhetabbo. Kathaṃ? Mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1187_8: karontena tāva sace mūlāpatti pakkhapaṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1188_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1188_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1188_2: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1188_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ antarāsambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1190_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1190_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1190_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1190_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo, so saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1190_4: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:1190_5: pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1191_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1191_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1191_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1191_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo, so saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1191_4: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1191_5: itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati,
tika-vin05t:1191_6: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1191_7: mūlāyapaṭikassanā, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1193: “Paṭikassito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassanā khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1195: Evaṃ mūlāya paṭikassitena puna ādito paṭṭhāya parivasitabbaṃ. Parivasantena ca –
tika-vin05t:1196_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1196_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1196_2: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1196_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ paṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1196_4: mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ, taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1196_5: mūlāya paṭikassi, sohaṃ parivasāmi, vediyāmahaṃ, bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti –
tika-vin05t:1199_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1199_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1199_2: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1199_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1199_4: mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ, taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1199_5: mūlāya paṭikassi, sohaṃ, bhante, parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1201_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1201_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1201_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1201_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo, so saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1201_4: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci, taṃ saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1201_5: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, so parivutthaparivāso
tika-vin05t:1201_6: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1201_7: mānattaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1201_8: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1202_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1202_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1202_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1202_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo, so saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1202_4: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci, taṃ saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1202_5: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, so parivutthaparivāso
tika-vin05t:1202_6: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1202_7: mānattaṃ yācati, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca
tika-vin05t:1202_8: appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1202_9: tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattassa
tika-vin05t:1202_10: dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1204_0: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca
tika-vin05t:1204_1: appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1206: Kammavācāpariyosāne mānattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1207_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1207_1: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1207_2: āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1207_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1207_4: mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ, taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1207_5: mūlāya paṭikassi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca
tika-vin05t:1207_6: appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1207_7: paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ mānattaṃ carāmi,
tika-vin05t:1207_8: vediyāmahaṃ bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti –
tika-vin05t:1210_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ

tika-vin05t:1212_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,

tika-vin05t:1212_3: adāsi, so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo, so saṅghaṃ

tika-vin05t:1212_6: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1212_7: mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca

tika-vin05t:1212_9: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya, esā ñatti.

tika-vin05t:1213_9: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1213_10: abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1215: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1217_1: appaṭicchādentassa mūlāyapaṭikassanameva katvā mūlāpattiyā antarāpattiṃ samodhānetvā
tika-vin05t:1217_2: mānattaṃ datvā ciṇṇamānattassa abbhānaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ettha pana “sohaṃ parivasanto”ti
tika-vin05t:1217_3: āgataṭṭhāne “sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho”ti vā “sohaṃ mānattaṃ caranto”ti
tika-vin05t:1218_0: Sace pana appaṭicchannāya āpattiyā mānattaṃ caranto antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā na paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin05t:1218_1: so mūlāya paṭikassitvā antarāpattiyā puna mānattaṃ datvā ciṇṇamānatto abbhetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1219_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ

tika-vin05t:1235_6: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ

tika-vin05t:1240_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,

tika-vin05t:1240_5: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, so saṅghaṃ antarā
tika-vin05t:1240_6: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa

tika-vin05t:1241_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1241_1: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1241_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ

tika-vin05t:1241_4: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci, taṃ saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1241_5: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, so saṅghaṃ antarā
tika-vin05t:1241_6: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci, saṅgho itthannāmassa
tika-vin05t:1241_7: bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,

tika-vin05t:1241_9: khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1243: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1245_0: Abbhānārahakālepi antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā appaṭicchādentassa imināva nayena mūlāyapaṭikassanā
tika-vin05t:1245_1: mānattadānaṃ abbhānañca veditabbaṃ. Kevalaṃ panettha “mānattaṃ caranto”ti avatvā
tika-vin05t:1247_0: 244. Agghasamodhāno nāma sambahulāsu āpattīsu yā ekā vā dve vā tisso vā sambahulā
tika-vin05t:1247_1: vā āpattiyo sabbacirapaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena samodhāya tāsaṃ rattiparicchedavasena
tika-vin05t:1247_2: avasesānaṃ ūnatarapaṭicchannānaṃ āpattīnaṃ parivāso dīyati, ayaṃ vuccati agghasamodhāno.
tika-vin05t:1247_3: Yassa pana sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannā, aparampi sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāti
tika-vin05t:1247_4: evaṃ dasakkhattuṃ katvā āpattisahassaṃ divasasataṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti, tena kiṃ kātabbanti?
tika-vin05t:1247_5: Sabbā samodahitvā dasa divase parivasitabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekeneva dasāhena divasasatampi
tika-vin05t:1251_0: Tassa ārocanadānalakkhaṇaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ – sace kassaci bhikkhuno ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā
tika-vin05t:1251_1: hoti, ekā āpatti dvīhappaṭicchannā, ekā tīhapaṭicchannā, ekā catūhappaṭicchannā,
tika-vin05t:1251_2: ekā pañcāhappaṭicchannā, ekā chāhappaṭicchannā, ekā sattāhappaṭicchannā, ekā aṭṭhāhappaṭicchannā,
tika-vin05t:1251_3: ekā navāhappaṭicchannā, ekā dasāhappaṭicchannā hoti, tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin05t:1252_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo
tika-vin05t:1252_1: sambahulā āpattiyo dvīhappaṭicchannāyo…pe… sambahulā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1252_2: sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena
tika-vin05t:1255_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1255_1: āpajji sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe… sambahulā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1255_2: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1255_3: yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1255_4: yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ dadeyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1256_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1256_1: āpajji sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe… sambahulā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1256_2: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1256_3: yācati, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1256_4: tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1256_5: tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsassa
tika-vin05t:1256_6: dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1258: “Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāso, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1260: Kammavācāpariyosāne vattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –

tika-vin05t:1283_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ, ekaṃ

tika-vin05t:1283_2: ekaṃ vihārakāraṃ, ekaṃ duṭṭhadosaṃ, ekaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ, ekaṃ saṅghabhedakaṃ, ekaṃ
tika-vin05t:1283_3: saṅghabhedānuvattakaṃ, ekaṃ dubbacaṃ, ekaṃ kuladūsakaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1284: Tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā tadanurūpāya kammavācāya parivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1285_0: Ettha ca “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji nānāvatthukāyo”tipi “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1285_1: āpajji”itipi evaṃ pubbe vuttanayena vatthuvasenapi gottavasenapi nāmavasenapi āpattivasenapi
tika-vin05t:1285_2: yojetvā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva, tasmā na idha visuṃ kammavācaṃ yojetvā dassayissāma
tika-vin05t:1285_3: pubbe sabbāpattisādhāraṇaṃ katvā yojetvā dassitāya eva kammavācāya nānāvatthukāhipi
tika-vin05t:1287_0: 246. Sace koci bhikkhu parivasanto vibbhamati, sāmaṇero vā hoti, vibbhamantassa sāmaṇerassa
tika-vin05t:1287_1: ca parivāso na ruhati. So ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1287_2: yo parivāso dinno, sudinno, yo parivuttho, suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. Sacepi
tika-vin05t:1287_3: mānattāraho mānattaṃ caranto abbhānāraho vā vibbhamati, sāmaṇero vā hoti, so ce puna
tika-vin05t:1287_4: upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ, yo parivāso dinno, sudinno, yo
tika-vin05t:1287_5: parivuttho, suparivuttho, yaṃ mānattaṃ dinnaṃ, sudinnaṃ, yaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin05t:1288_0: Sace koci bhikkhu parivasanto ummattako hoti khittacitto vedanāṭṭo, ummattakassa
tika-vin05t:1288_1: khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ca parivāso na ruhati. So ce puna anummattako hoti akhittacitto
tika-vin05t:1288_2: avedanāṭṭo, tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ, yo parivāso dinno, sudinno, yo parivuttho,
tika-vin05t:1288_3: suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. Mānattārahādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:1289_0: Sace koci parivasanto ukkhittako hoti, ukkhittakassa parivāso na ruhati. Sace puna
tika-vin05t:1289_1: osārīyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ, yo parivāso dinno, sudinno, yo parivuttho,
tika-vin05t:1289_2: suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. Mānattārahādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:1290_0: Sace kassaci bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavati, tassa sāyeva upajjhā, sāyeva upasampadā,
tika-vin05t:1290_1: puna upajjhā na gahetabbā, upasampadā ca na kātabbā, bhikkhuupasampadato pabhuti
tika-vin05t:1290_2: yāva vassagaṇanā, sāyeva vassagaṇanā, na ito paṭṭhāya vassagaṇanā kātabbā. Appatirūpaṃ
tika-vin05t:1290_3: dānissā bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe vasituṃ, tasmā bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ
tika-vin05t:1290_4: vasitabbaṃ. Yā desanāgāminiyo vā vuṭṭhānagāminiyo vā āpattiyo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin05t:1290_5: sādhāraṇā, tāsaṃ bhikkhunīhi kātabbaṃ, vinayakammameva bhikkhunīnaṃ santike kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1290_6: Yā pana bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā sukkavissaṭṭhiādikā āpattiyo, tāhi āpattīhi
tika-vin05t:1290_7: anāpatti, liṅge parivatte tā āpattiyo vuṭṭhitāva honti, puna pakatiliṅge uppannepi
tika-vin05t:1290_8: tāhi āpattīhi tassa anāpattiyeva. Bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅge pātubhūtepi eseva nayo. Vuttañcetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1291_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti. Bhagavato
tika-vin05t:1291_1: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Anujānāmi bhikkhave taṃyeva upajjhaṃ, taṃyeva upasampadaṃ, tāniyeva
tika-vin05t:1291_2: vassāni bhikkhunīhi saṅgamituṃ, yā āpattiyo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇā, tā
tika-vin05t:1291_3: āpattiyo bhikkhunīnaṃ santike vuṭṭhātuṃ. Yā āpattiyo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā,
tika-vin05t:1292_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti. Bhagavato
tika-vin05t:1292_1: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Anujānāmi bhikkhave taṃyeva upajjhaṃ, taṃyeva upasampadaṃ, tāniyeva
tika-vin05t:1292_2: vassāni bhikkhūhi saṅgamituṃ, yā āpattiyo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇā, tā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1292_3: bhikkhūnaṃ santike vuṭṭhātuṃ. Yā āpattiyo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇā, tāhi
tika-vin05t:1293_0: 247. Ayaṃ panettha pāḷimuttakavinicchayo – imesu dvīsu liṅgesu purisaliṅgaṃ uttamaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1293_1: itthiliṅgaṃ hīnaṃ, tasmā purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena antaradhāyati, itthiliṅgaṃ
tika-vin05t:1293_2: dubbalakusalena patiṭṭhāti. Itthiliṅgaṃ pana antaradhāyantaṃ dubbalaakusalena antaradhāyati,
