tika-vin05t:1293_3: purisaliṅgaṃ balavakusalena patiṭṭhāti. Evaṃ ubhayampi akusalena antaradhāyati, kusalena paṭilabbhati.
tika-vin05t:1294_0: Tattha sace dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekato sajjhāyaṃ vā dhammasākacchaṃ vā katvā ekāgāre
tika-vin05t:1294_1: nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkantānaṃ ekassa itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavati, ubhinnampi sahaseyyāpatti
tika-vin05t:1294_2: hoti. So ce paṭibujjhitvā attano vippakāraṃ disvā dukkhī dummano rattibhāgeyeva itarassa
tika-vin05t:1294_3: āroceyya, tena samassāsetabbo “hotu mā cintayittha, vaṭṭasseveso doso, sammāsambuddhena
tika-vin05t:1294_4: dvāraṃ dinnaṃ, bhikkhu vā hotu bhikkhunī vā, anāvaṭo dhammo, avārito saggamaggo”ti.
tika-vin05t:1294_5: Samassāsetvā evaṃ vattabbaṃ “tumhehi bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati, atthi pana
tika-vin05t:1294_6: te kāci sandiṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo”ti. Sacassā honti tādisā bhikkhuniyo, “atthī”ti, no
tika-vin05t:1294_7: ce honti, “natthī”ti vatvā so bhikkhu vattabbo “mama saṅgahaṃ karotha, idāni maṃ
tika-vin05t:1294_8: paṭhamaṃ bhikkhunupassayaṃ nethā”ti. Tena bhikkhunā taṃ gahetvā tassā vā sandiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1294_9: attano vā sandiṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santikaṃ gantabbaṃ. Gacchantena ca na ekakena
tika-vin05t:1294_10: gantabbaṃ, catūhi pañcahi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ jotikañca kattaradaṇḍakañca gahetvā saṃvidahanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1294_11: parimocetvā “mayaṃ asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gacchāmā”ti gantabbaṃ. Sace bahigāme dūre vihāro
tika-vin05t:1294_13: gantvā tā bhikkhuniyo vattabbā “asukaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ jānāthā”ti? “Āma, ayyā”ti. Tassa
tika-vin05t:1294_14: itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, saṅgahaṃ dānissā karothāti. Tā ce “sādhu ayyā, idāni mayampi
tika-vin05t:1294_15: sajjhāyissāma, dhammaṃ sossāma, gacchatha tumhe”ti vatvā saṅgahaṃ karonti, ārādhikā
tika-vin05t:1294_16: ca honti saṅgāhikā lajjiniyo, tā kopetvā aññattha na gantabbaṃ. Gacchati ce, gāmantaranadīpārarattivippavāsagaṇaohīyanāpattīhi na muccati.
tika-vin05t:1295_0: Sace pana lajjiniyo honti, na saṅgāhikāyo, aññattha gantuṃ labbhati. Sacepi alajjiniyo
tika-vin05t:1295_1: honti, saṅgahaṃ pana karonti, tāpi pariccajitvā aññattha gantuṃ labbhati. Sace lajjiniyo
tika-vin05t:1295_2: ca saṅgāhikā ca, ñātikā na honti, āsannagāme pana aññā ñātikā honti paṭijagganikā,
tika-vin05t:1295_3: tāsampi santikaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Gantvā sace bhikkhubhāvepi nissayapaṭipanno,
tika-vin05t:1295_4: patirūpāya bhikkhuniyā santike nissayo gahetabbo, mātikā vā vinayo vā uggahito suggahito,
tika-vin05t:1295_5: puna uggaṇhanakāraṇaṃ natthi. Sace bhikkhubhāvepi parisāvacaro, tassa santikeyeva
tika-vin05t:1295_6: upasampannā sūpasampannā, aññassa santike nissayo gahetabbo. Pubbe taṃ nissāya vasantehipi
tika-vin05t:1295_7: aññassa santike nissayo gahetabbo. Paripuṇṇavassasāmaṇerenapi aññassa santike upajjhā gahetabbā.
tika-vin05t:1296_0: Yaṃ panassa bhikkhubhāve adhiṭṭhitaṃ ticīvarañca patto ca, taṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati,
tika-vin05t:1296_1: puna adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Saṅkaccikā ca udakasāṭikā ca gahetabbā. Yaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1296_2: atirekapatto vā vinayakammaṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti, tampi sabbaṃ vinayakammaṃ vijahati,
tika-vin05t:1296_3: puna kātabbaṃ. Paṭiggahitatelamadhuphāṇitādīnipi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahanti. Sace paṭiggahaṇato
tika-vin05t:1296_4: sattame divase liṅgaṃ parivattati, puna paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana bhikkhukāle
tika-vin05t:1296_5: aññassa bhikkhuno santakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ, taṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati. Yampi ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1296_6: sādhāraṇaṃ avibhajitvā ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ pakatatto rakkhati. Yaṃ pana vibhattaṃ etasseva
tika-vin05t:1296_7: santakaṃ, taṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Vuttañcetaṃ parivāre –
tika-vin05t:1297: “Telaṃ madhu phāṇitañcāpi sappiṃ, sāmaṃ gahetvā nikkhipeyya;
tika-vin05t:1298: Avītivatte sattāhe, sati paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti;
tika-vin05t:1300_0: Idañhi liṅgaparivattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma liṅgaparivattanena, kālakiriyāya,
tika-vin05t:1300_2: acchinditvā gahaṇena ca vijahati. Tasmā sacepi harītakakhaṇḍampi paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitamatthi,
tika-vin05t:1300_3: sabbamassa paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Bhikkhuvihāre pana yaṃ kiñcissā santakaṃ paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin05t:1300_4: vā appaṭiggahetvā vā ṭhapitaṃ, sabbassa sāva issarā, āharāpetvā gahetabbaṃ. Yaṃ panettha
tika-vin05t:1300_5: thāvaraṃ tassā santakaṃ senāsanaṃ vā uparopakā vā, te yassicchati, tassa dātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1300_6: Terasasu sammutīsu yā bhikkhukāle laddhā sammuti, sabbā paṭippassambhati, purimikāya
tika-vin05t:1300_7: senāsanaggāho paṭippassambhati. Sace pacchimikāya senāsane gahite liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1300_8: bhikkhusaṅgho cassā uppannalābhaṃ dātukāmo hoti, apaloketvā dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1301_0: Sace bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāya paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasantassa liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1301_1: puna pakkhamānattameva dātabbaṃ. Sace mānattaṃ carantassa parivattati, puna pakkhamānattameva
tika-vin05t:1301_2: dātabbaṃ. Sace ciṇṇamānattassa parivattati, bhikkhunīhi abbhānakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:1301_3: akusalavipāke parikkhīṇe pakkhamānattakāle punadeva liṅgaṃ parivattati, chārattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1301_4: mānattameva dātabbaṃ. Sace ciṇṇe pakkhamānatte parivattati, bhikkhūhi abbhānakammaṃ kātabbanti.
tika-vin05t:1302_0: Bhikkhuniyā liṅgaparivattanepi vuttanayeneva sabbo vinicchayo veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana
tika-vin05t:1302_1: viseso – sace bhikkhunikāle āpannā sañcarittāpatti paṭicchannā hoti, parivāsadānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1302_2: natthi, chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ. Sace pakkhamānattaṃ carantiyā liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1302_3: na tenattho, chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ. Sace ciṇṇamānattāya parivattati, puna
tika-vin05t:1302_4: mānattaṃ adatvā bhikkhūhi abbhetabbo. Atha bhikkhūhi mānatte adinne puna liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1302_5: bhikkhunīhi pakkhamānattameva dātabbaṃ. Atha chārattaṃ mānattaṃ carantassa puna parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1302_6: pakkhamānattameva dātabbaṃ. Ciṇṇamānattassa pana liṅgaparivatte jāte bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin05t:1302_7: abbhānakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Puna parivatte ca liṅge bhikkhunibhāve ṭhitāyapi yā āpattiyo
tika-vin05t:1303_0: 248. Ito paraṃ pārivāsikādīnaṃ vattaṃ dassayissāma – pārivāsikena bhikkhunā upajjhāyena
tika-vin05t:1303_1: hutvā na upasampādetabbaṃ, vattaṃ nikkhipitvā pana upasampādetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ācariyena
tika-vin05t:1303_2: hutvāpi kammavācā na sāvetabbā, aññasmiṃ asati vattaṃ nikkhipitvā sāvetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1303_3: Āgantukānaṃ nissayo na dātabbo. Yehipi pakatiyāva nissayo gahito, te vattabbā “ahaṃ
tika-vin05t:1303_4: vinayakammaṃ karomi, asukattherassa nāma santike nissayaṃ gaṇhatha, mayhaṃ vattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1303_5: mā karotha, mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchathā”ti. Sace evaṃ vuttepi karontiyeva, vāritakālato
tika-vin05t:1303_6: paṭṭhāya karontesupi anāpatti. Añño sāmaṇeropi na gahetabbo, upajjhaṃ datvā gahitasāmaṇeropi
tika-vin05t:1303_7: vattabbo “ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi, mayhaṃ vattaṃ mā karotha, mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1303_8: āpucchathā”ti. Sace evaṃ vuttepi karontiyeva, vāritakālato paṭṭhāya karontesupi anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1303_9: Na bhikkhunovādakasammuti sāditabbā, sammatenapi bhikkhuniyo na ovaditabbā, tasmā
tika-vin05t:1303_10: bhikkhusaṅghassa vattabbaṃ “bhante, ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi, bhikkhunovādakaṃ jānāthā”ti.
tika-vin05t:1303_11: Paṭibalassa vā bhikkhussa bhāro kātabbo. Āgatā bhikkhuniyo “saṅghassa santikaṃ gacchatha,
tika-vin05t:1303_12: saṅgho vo ovādadāyakaṃ jānissatī”ti vā “ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi, asukabhikkhussa
tika-vin05t:1303_13: nāma santikaṃ gacchatha, so vo ovādaṃ dassatī”ti vā vattabbā.
tika-vin05t:1304_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena parivāso dinno hoti, sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā, aññā vā tādisikā
tika-vin05t:1304_1: tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarā, kammaṃ na garahitabbaṃ, kammikā na garahitabbā, na pakatattassa
tika-vin05t:1304_2: bhikkhuno uposatho ṭhapetabbo, na pavāraṇā ṭhapetabbā, palibodhatthāya vā pakkosanatthāya
tika-vin05t:1304_3: vā savacanīyaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Palibodhatthāya hi karonto “ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ
tika-vin05t:1304_4: savacanīyaṃ karomi, imamhā āvāsā parampi mā pakkama, yāva na taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ
tika-vin05t:1304_5: hotī”ti evaṃ karoti, pakkosanatthāya karonto “ahaṃ taṃ savacanīyaṃ karomi, ehi mayā
tika-vin05t:1304_6: saddhiṃ vinayadharānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ gacchāhī”ti evaṃ karoti, tadubhayampi na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1304_7: Vihāre jeṭṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ na kātabbaṃ, pātimokkhuddesakena vā dhammajjhesakena vā na
tika-vin05t:1304_8: bhavitabbaṃ, napi terasasu sammutīsu ekasammutivasenapi issariyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1304_9: “karotu me āyasmā okāsaṃ, ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ pakatattassa okāso na kāretabbo,
tika-vin05t:1304_10: vatthunā vā āpattiyā vā na codetabbo, “ayaṃ te doso”ti na sāretabbo, bhikkhūhi aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin05t:1304_11: yojetvā kalaho na kāretabbo, saṅghattherena hutvā pakatattassa bhikkhuno purato na
tika-vin05t:1304_12: gantabbaṃ na nisīditabbaṃ, dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ muñcitvā ekakeneva gantabbañceva
tika-vin05t:1304_13: nisīditabbañca, yo hoti saṅghassa āsanapariyanto seyyāpariyanto vihārapariyanto, so tassa dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1305_0: Tattha āsanapariyanto nāma bhattaggādīsu saṅghanavakāsanaṃ, svassa dātabbo, tattha
tika-vin05t:1305_1: nisīditabbaṃ. Seyyāpariyanto nāma seyyānaṃ pariyanto sabbalāmakaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ. Ayañhi
tika-vin05t:1305_2: vassaggena attano pattaṭṭhāne seyyaṃ gahetuṃ na labhati, sabbabhikkhūhi vicinitvā
tika-vin05t:1305_3: gahitāvasesā maṅgulagūthabharitā vettalatādivinaddhā lāmakaseyyāvassa dātabbā. Yathā
tika-vin05t:1305_4: ca seyyā, evaṃ vasanaāvāsopi vassaggena attano pattaṭṭhāne tassa na vaṭṭati, sabbabhikkhūhi
tika-vin05t:1305_5: vicinitvā gahitāvasesā pana rajohatabhūmi jatukamūsikabharitā paṇṇasālā assa dātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1305_6: Sace pakatattā sabbe rukkhamūlikā abbhokāsikā ca honti, channaṃ na upenti, sabbepi
tika-vin05t:1305_7: etehi vissaṭṭhāvāsā nāma honti, tesu yaṃ icchati, taṃ labhati.
tika-vin05t:1306_0: Vassūpanāyikadivase paccayaṃ ekapasse ṭhatvā vassaggena gaṇhituṃ labhati, senāsanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1306_1: na labhati, nibaddhavassāvāsikaṃ senāsanaṃ gaṇhitu kāmena vattaṃ nikkhipitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1306_2: Ñātipavāritaṭṭhāne “ettake bhikkhū gahetvā āgacchathā”ti nimantitena “bhante, asukaṃ
tika-vin05t:1306_3: nāma kulaṃ bhikkhū nimantesi, etha, tattha gacchāmā”ti evaṃ saṃvidhāya bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1306_4: puresamaṇena vā pacchāsamaṇena vā hutvā kulāni na upasaṅkamitabbāni, “bhante, asukasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:1306_5: nāma gāme manussā bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ icchanti, sādhu vatassa, sace tesaṃ saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin05t:1306_6: kareyyāthā”ti evaṃ panassa vinayapariyāyena kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Āgatāgatānaṃ ārocetuṃ
tika-vin05t:1306_7: harāyamānena āraññikadhutaṅgaṃ na samādātabbaṃ. Yenapi pakatiyā samādinnaṃ, tena
tika-vin05t:1306_8: dutiyaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ, na ekakena vatthabbaṃ. Tathā
tika-vin05t:1306_9: bhattaggādīsu āsanapariyante nisajjāya harāyamānena piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgampi na samādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1306_10: Yo pana pakatiyāva piṇḍapātiko, tassa paṭisedho natthi, na ca tappaccayā piṇḍapāto
tika-vin05t:1306_11: nīharāpetabbo “mā maṃ jāniṃsū”ti. Nīhaṭabhatto hutvā vihāreyeva nisīditvā bhuñjanto
tika-vin05t:1306_12: “rattiyo gaṇayissāmi, gacchato me bhikkhuṃ disvā anārocentassa ratticchedo siyā”ti
tika-vin05t:1306_13: iminā kāraṇena piṇḍapāto na nīharāpetabbo, “mā maṃ ekabhikkhupi jānātū”ti ca iminā
tika-vin05t:1306_14: ajjhāsayena vihāre sāmaṇerehi pacāpetvā bhuñjitumpi na labhati, gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitabbameva.
tika-vin05t:1306_15: Gilānassa pana navakammaācariyupajjhāyakiccādipasutassa vā vihāreyeva acchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1307_0: Sacepi gāme anekasatā bhikkhū vicaranti, na sakkā hoti ārocetuṃ, gāmakāvāsaṃ gantvā
tika-vin05t:1307_1: sabhāgaṭṭhāne vasituṃ vaṭṭati. Yasmā “pārivāsikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā āgantukena
tika-vin05t:1307_2: ārocetabbaṃ, āgantukassa ārocetabbaṃ, uposathe ārocetabbaṃ, pavāraṇāya ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1307_3: sace gilāno hoti, dūtenapi ārocetabba”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā kañci vihāraṃ gatena āgantukena
tika-vin05t:1307_4: tattha bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Sace sabbe ekaṭṭhāne ṭhite passati, ekaṭṭhāne ṭhiteneva
tika-vin05t:1307_5: ārocetabbaṃ. Atha rukkhamūlādīsu visuṃ ṭhitā honti, tattha tattha gantvā ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1307_6: sañcicca anārocentassa ratticchedo ca hoti, vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ. Atha vicinanto
tika-vin05t:1307_7: ekacce na passati, ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1308_0: Āgantukassapi attano vasanavihāraṃ āgatassa ekassa vā bahūnaṃ vā vuttanayeneva ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1308_1: ratticchedavattabhedāpi cettha vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Sace āgantukā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā
tika-vin05t:1308_2: vā avissamitvā eva vā vihāramajjhena gacchanti, tesampi ārocetabbaṃ. Sace tassa ajānantasseva
tika-vin05t:1308_3: gacchanti, ayañca gatakāle jānāti, gantvā ārocetabbaṃ, sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1308_4: asakkontassa ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ. Yepi antovihāraṃ appavisitvā
tika-vin05t:1308_5: upacārasīmaṃ okkamitvā gacchanti, ayañca nesaṃ chattasaddaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1308_6: khipitasaddaṃ vā sutvā āgantukabhāvaṃ jānāti, gantvā ārocetabbaṃ, gatakāle jānantenapi
tika-vin05t:1308_7: anubandhitvā ārocetabbameva, sampāpuṇituṃ asakkontassa ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhede
tika-vin05t:1308_8: dukkaṭaṃ. Yopi rattiṃ āgantvā rattiṃyeva gacchati, sopissa ratticchedaṃ karoti, aññātattā
tika-vin05t:1308_9: pana vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ natthi. Sace ajānitvāva abbhānaṃ karoti, akatameva hotīti
tika-vin05t:1308_10: kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā adhikā rattiyo gahetvā kātabbaṃ. Ayaṃ apaṇṇakapaṭipadā.
tika-vin05t:1309_0: Nadīādīsu nāvāya gacchantampi paratīre ṭhitampi ākāse gacchantampi pabbatatalaaraññādīsu
tika-vin05t:1309_1: dūre ṭhitampi bhikkhuṃ disvā sace “bhikkhū”ti vavatthānaṃ atthi, nāvādīhi gantvā
tika-vin05t:1309_2: vā mahāsaddaṃ katvā vā vegena anubandhitvā vā ārocetabbaṃ, anārocentassa ratticchedo
tika-vin05t:1309_3: ceva vattabhede dukkaṭañca. Sace vāyamantopi sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:1309_4: ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ. Saṅghasenābhayatthero pana visayāvisayena
tika-vin05t:1309_5: katheti “visaye kira anārocentassa ratticchedo ceva vattabhede dukkaṭañca hoti, avisaye
tika-vin05t:1309_6: pana ubhayampi natthī”ti. Karavīkatissatthero “samaṇo ayanti vavatthānameva pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1309_7: Sacepi avisayo hoti, vattabhede dukkaṭameva natthi, ratticchedo pana hotiyevā”ti āha.
tika-vin05t:1310_0: Uposathadivase “uposathaṃ sampāpuṇissāmā”ti āgantukā bhikkhū āgacchanti, iddhiyā
tika-vin05t:1310_1: gacchantāpi uposathabhāvaṃ ñatvā otaritvā uposathaṃ karonti, tasmā āgantukasodhanatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:1310_2: uposathadivasepi ārocetabbaṃ. Pavāraṇāyapi eseva nayo. Gantuṃ asamatthena gilānena
tika-vin05t:1310_3: bhikkhuṃ pesetvā ārocāpetabbaṃ, anupasampannaṃ pesetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1311_0: Na pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sabhikkhukā āvāsā vā anāvāsā vā abhikkhuko nānāsaṃvāsakehi
tika-vin05t:1311_1: vā sabhikkhuko āvāso vā anāvāso vā gantabbo aññatra pakatattena aññatra antarāyā.
tika-vin05t:1311_2: Yattha hi ekopi bhikkhu natthi, tattha na vasitabbaṃ. Na hi tattha vuttharattiyo
tika-vin05t:1311_3: gaṇanūpikā honti. Dasavidhe antarāye pana sacepi rattiyo gaṇanūpikā na honti, antarāyato
tika-vin05t:1311_4: parimuccanatthāya gantabbameva. Tena vuttaṃ “aññatra antarāyā”ti. Nānāsaṃvāsakehi
tika-vin05t:1311_5: saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, tesaṃ anārocanepi ratticchedo natthi, abhikkhukāvāsasadisameva
tika-vin05t:1312_0: Na pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse
tika-vin05t:1312_1: vā vatthabbaṃ. Tattha āvāso nāma vasanatthāya katasenāsanaṃ. Anāvāso nāma cetiyagharaṃ
tika-vin05t:1312_2: bodhigharaṃ sammuñjanīaṭṭako dāruaṭṭako pānīyamāḷo vaccakuṭi dvārakoṭṭhakoti evamādi.
tika-vin05t:1312_3: “Etesu yattha katthaci ekacchanne chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānaparicchinne okāse ukkhittakova
tika-vin05t:1312_4: vasituṃ na labhati, pārivāsiko pana antoāvāseyeva na labhatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1312_5: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ avisesena “udakapātena vārita”nti vuttaṃ. Kurundiyaṃ pana “etesu
tika-vin05t:1312_6: ettakesu pañcavaṇṇacchadanabaddhaṭṭhānesu pārivāsikassa ca ukkhittakassa ca pakatattena
tika-vin05t:1312_7: saddhiṃ udakapātena vārita”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmā nānūpacārepi ekacchanne na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1312_8: Sace panettha tadahupasampannepi pakatatte paṭhamaṃ pavisitvā nipannepi saṭṭhivassikopi
tika-vin05t:1312_9: pārivāsiko pacchā pavisitvā jānanto nipajjati, ratticchedo ceva vattabhede dukkaṭañca,
tika-vin05t:1312_10: ajānantassa ratticchedova, na vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana tasmiṃ nisinne pacchā
tika-vin05t:1312_11: pakatatto pavisitvā nipajjati, pārivāsiko ca jānāti, ratticchedo ceva vattabhede
tika-vin05t:1312_12: dukkaṭañca. No ce jānāti, ratticchedova, na vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1313_0: Pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ tadahupasampannampi disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1313_1: vuṭṭhāya ca “ahaṃ iminā sukhanisinno vuṭṭhāpito”ti parammukhenapi na gantabbaṃ, “idaṃ
tika-vin05t:1313_2: ācariya āsanaṃ, ettha nisīdathā”ti evaṃ pakatatto bhikkhu āsanena nimantetabboyeva.
tika-vin05t:1313_3: Navakena pana “mahātheraṃ obaddhaṃ karomī”ti pārivāsikattherassa santikaṃ na gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1313_4: Pārivāsikena pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ na ekāsane nisīditabbaṃ, na nīce āsane
tika-vin05t:1313_5: nisinne ucce āsane nisīditabbaṃ, na chamāyaṃ nisinne āsane nisīditabbaṃ, dvādasahatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:1313_6: pana upacāraṃ muñcitvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati. Pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattena saddhiṃ
tika-vin05t:1313_7: na ekacaṅkame caṅkamitabbaṃ, na nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1313_8: na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabbaṃ. Ettha pana akataparicchedāya bhūmiyā
tika-vin05t:1313_9: caṅkamante paricchedaṃ katvā vālukaṃ ākiritvā ālambanaṃ yojetvā katacaṅkame nīcepi
tika-vin05t:1313_10: na caṅkamitabbaṃ, ko pana vādo iṭṭhakacayena sampanne vedikāparikkhitte. Sace pana
tika-vin05t:1313_11: pākāraparikkhitto hoti, dvārakoṭṭhakayutto pabbatantaravanantaragumbantaresu vā suppaṭicchanno,
tika-vin05t:1313_12: tādise caṅkame caṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati, appaṭicchannepi upacāraṃ muñcitvā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1314_0: Pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanārahena
tika-vin05t:1314_1: mānattārahena mānattacārikena abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ na ekacchanne āvāse
tika-vin05t:1314_2: vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṃ. Ettha pana sace vuḍḍhatare pārivāsike paṭhamaṃ nipanne
tika-vin05t:1314_3: itaro jānanto pacchā nipajjati, ratticchedo cassa hoti, vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ. Vuḍḍhatarassa
tika-vin05t:1314_4: pana ratticchedova, na vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ. Ajānitvā nipajjati, dvinnampi vattabhedo
tika-vin05t:1314_5: natthi, ratticchedo pana hoti. Atha navakapārivāsike paṭhamaṃ nipanne vuḍḍhataro
tika-vin05t:1314_6: pacchā nipajjati, navako ca jānāti, ratti cassa chijjati, vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin05t:1314_7: hoti. Vuḍḍhatarassa ratticchedova, na vattabhedo. No ce jānāti, dvinnampi vattabhedo
tika-vin05t:1314_8: natthi, ratticchedo pana hoti. Sace apacchāpurimaṃ nipajjanti, vuḍḍhatarassa ratticchedova,
tika-vin05t:1315_0: Dve pārivāsikā samavassā, eko paṭhamaṃ nipanno, eko jānantova pacchā nipajjati, ratti
tika-vin05t:1315_1: cassa chijjati, vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ nipannassa ratticchedova, na vattabhedo.
tika-vin05t:1315_2: Sace pacchā nipajjantopi na jānāti, dvinnampi vattabhedo natthi, ratticchedo pana
tika-vin05t:1315_3: hoti. Sace dvepi apacchāpurimaṃ nipajjanti, dvinnampi ratticchedoyeva, na vattabhedo.
tika-vin05t:1315_4: Sace hi dve pārivāsikā ekato vaseyyuṃ, te aññamaññassa ajjhācāraṃ ñatvā agāravā vā
tika-vin05t:1315_5: vippaṭisārino vā hutvā taṃ vā āpattiṃ āpajjeyyuṃ tato pāpiṭṭhataraṃ vā, vibbhameyyuṃ
tika-vin05t:1315_6: vā, tasmā nesaṃ sahaseyyā sabbapakārena paṭikkhittā. Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādayo cettha
tika-vin05t:1315_7: pārivāsikānaṃ pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti veditabbā. Tasmā pārivāsikena bhikkhunā mūlāyapaṭikassanārahena
tika-vin05t:1315_8: mānattārahena mānattacārikena abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ na ekāsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1315_9: na nīce āsane nisinne ucce āsane nisīditabbaṃ, na chamāya nisinne āsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1315_10: na ekacaṅkame caṅkamitabbaṃ, na nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1316_0: “Na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sāditabbaṃ pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1316_1: paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ āsanābhihāro seyyābhihāro pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1316_2: pādakathalikaṃ pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ, yo sādiyeyya, āpatti
tika-vin05t:1316_3: dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhapetvā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ avasesānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1316_4: antamaso mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādīnampi abhivādanādiṃ sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṃ, saddhivihārikānampi
tika-vin05t:1316_5: sādiyantassa dukkaṭameva. Tasmā te vattabbā “ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi, mayhaṃ vattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1316_6: mā karotha, mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchathā”ti. Sace saddhāpabbajitā kulaputtā “tumhe,
tika-vin05t:1316_7: bhante, tumhākaṃ vinayakammaṃ karothā”ti vatvā vattaṃ karonti, gāmappavesanampi āpucchantiyeva,
tika-vin05t:1317_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mithū yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1317_1: añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ āsanābhihāraṃ seyyābhihāraṃ pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakathalikaṃ
tika-vin05t:1317_2: pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ nahāne piṭṭhiparikamma”nti vacanato pana pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1317_3: aññamaññaṃ yo yo vuḍḍho, tena tena navakatarassa abhivādanādiṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1318_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañca yathāvuḍḍhaṃ uposathaṃ pavāraṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:1318_1: vassikasāṭikaṃ oṇojanaṃ bhatta”nti vacanato imāni uposathādīni pañca pakatattehipi
tika-vin05t:1318_2: saddhiṃ vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā pātimokkhe uddissamāne hatthapāse nisīdituṃ
tika-vin05t:1318_3: vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “pāḷiyā anisīditvā pāḷiṃ vihāya hatthapāsaṃ amuñcantena
tika-vin05t:1318_4: nisīditabba”nti vuttaṃ. Pārisuddhiuposathe kariyamāne saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā
tika-vin05t:1318_5: tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo. Pavāraṇāyapi saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne
tika-vin05t:1318_6: nisīditvā tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā pavāretabbaṃ. Saṅghena ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā
tika-vin05t:1318_7: bhājiyamānaṃ vassikasāṭikampi attano pattaṭṭhāne gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1319_0: Oṇojananti vissajjanaṃ vuccati. Sace hi pārivāsikassa dve tīṇi uddesabhattādīni pāpuṇanti,
tika-vin05t:1319_1: aññā cassa puggalikabhattapaccāsā hoti, tāni paṭipāṭiyā gahetvā “bhante, heṭṭhā gāhetha,
tika-vin05t:1319_2: ajja mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsā atthi, sveva gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā vissajjetabbāni. Evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1319_3: tāni punadivasesu gaṇhituṃ labhati. “Punadivase sabbapaṭhamaṃ tassa dātabba”nti kurundiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1319_4: vuttaṃ. Yadi pana na gaṇhāti na vissajjeti, punadivase na labhati. Idaṃ oṇojanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1319_5: nāma pārivāsikasseva odissa anuññātaṃ. Kasmā? Tassa hi saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisinnassa
tika-vin05t:1319_6: bhattagge yāgukhajjakādīni pāpuṇanti vā na vā, tasmā “so bhikkhāhārena mā kilamitthā”ti
tika-vin05t:1320_0: Bhattanti āgatāgatehi vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā gahetvā gantabbaṃ vihāre saṅghassa catussālabhattaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1320_1: Etaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ labhati, pāḷiyā pana gantuṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā na labhati, tasmā pāḷito
tika-vin05t:1320_2: osakkitvā hatthapāse ṭhitena hatthaṃ pasāretvā yathā seno nipatitvā gaṇhāti, evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1320_3: gaṇhitabbaṃ. Ārāmikasamaṇuddesehi āharāpetuṃ na labhati. Sace sayameva āharanti,
tika-vin05t:1320_4: vaṭṭati. Rañño mahāpeḷabhattepi eseva nayo. Catussālabhatte pana sace oṇojanaṃ kattukāmo
tika-vin05t:1320_5: hoti, attano atthāya ukkhitte piṇḍe “ajja me bhattaṃ atthi, sveva gaṇhissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1320_6: “Punadivase dve piṇḍe labhatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Uddesabhattādīnipi pāḷito
tika-vin05t:1320_7: osakkitvāva gahetabbāni, yattha pana nisīdāpetvā parivisanti, tattha sāmaṇerānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1320_8: jeṭṭhakena, bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghanavakena hutvā nisīditabbaṃ. Idaṃ pārivāsikavattaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1321_1: vattanti veditabbaṃ. Mānattacārikassa vatte pana “devasikaṃ ārocetabba”nti viseso.
tika-vin05t:1321_2: Ratticchedesu ca “tayo kho, upāli, pārivāsikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedā, sahavāso
tika-vin05t:1321_3: vippavāso anārocanā”ti vacanato yvāyaṃ “pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne”tiādinā
tika-vin05t:1321_4: nayena vutto sahavāso, yo ca ekasseva vāso, yā cāyaṃ āgantukādīnaṃ anārocanā, etesu
tika-vin05t:1321_5: tīsu ekenapi kāraṇena pārivāsikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedo hoti.
tika-vin05t:1322_0: Mānattacārikassa pana “cattāro kho, upāli, mānattacārikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedā,
tika-vin05t:1322_1: sahavāso, vippavāso, anārocanā, ūne gaṇe caraṇa”nti vacanato imesu catūsu kāraṇesu
tika-vin05t:1322_2: ekenapi ratticchedo hoti. Gaṇoti cettha cattāro vā atirekā vā. Tasmā sacepi tīhi
tika-vin05t:1326_0: 249. Kammākammanti ettha pana kammāni cattāri – apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1326_1: ñatticatutthakammanti. Imāni cattāri kammāni katihākārehi vipajjanti? Pañcahākārehi
tika-vin05t:1326_2: vipajjanti – vatthuto vā ñattito vā anussāvanato vā sīmato vā parisato vā.
tika-vin05t:1327_0: Kathaṃ vatthuto kammāni vipajjanti? Sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1327_1: adhammakammaṃ. Paṭipucchākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ apaṭipucchā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1327_2: Paṭiññāya karaṇīyaṃ kammaṃ apaṭiññāya karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Sativinayārahassa
tika-vin05t:1327_3: amūḷhavinayaṃ deti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Amūḷhavinayārahassa tassa pāpiyasikakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1327_4: karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Tassa pāpiyasikakammārahassa tajjanīyakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1327_5: karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Tajjanīyakammārahassa niyassakammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1327_6: vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Niyassakammārahassa pabbājanīyakammaṃ karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1327_9: adhammakammaṃ. Ukkhepanīyakammārahassa parivāsaṃ deti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1327_10: Parivāsārahassa mūlāya paṭikassati, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahassa
tika-vin05t:1327_11: mānattaṃ deti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Mānattārahaṃ abbheti, vatthuvipannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1327_12: adhammakammaṃ. Abbhānārahaṃ upasampādeti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Anuposathe
tika-vin05t:1327_13: uposathaṃ karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Apavāraṇāya pavāreti, vatthuvipannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1327_14: adhammakammaṃ. Paṇḍakaṃ upasampādeti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Theyyasaṃvāsakaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1327_17: puggalaṃ upasampādeti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ. Evaṃ vatthuto kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1328_0: Kathaṃ ñattito kammāni vipajjanti? Pañcahākārehi ñattito kammāni vipajjanti – vatthuṃ
tika-vin05t:1328_1: na parāmasati, saṅghaṃ na parāmasati, puggalaṃ na parāmasati, ñattiṃ na parāmasati,
tika-vin05t:1328_2: pacchā vā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti. Imehi pañcahākārehi ñattito kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1329_0: Kathaṃ anussāvanato kammāni vipajjanti? Pañcahākārehi anussāvanato kammāni vipajjanti
tika-vin05t:1329_1: – vatthuṃ na parāmasati, saṅghaṃ na parāmasati, puggalaṃ na parāmasati, sāvanaṃ hāpeti,
tika-vin05t:1329_2: akāle vā sāveti. Imehi pañcahākārehi anussāvanato kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1330_0: Kathaṃ sīmato kammāni vipajjanti? Ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjanti – atikhuddakaṃ
tika-vin05t:1330_1: sīmaṃ sammannati, atimahatiṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, khaṇḍanimittaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, chāyānimittaṃ
tika-vin05t:1330_2: sīmaṃ sammannati, animittaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, bahisīme ṭhito sīmaṃ sammannati, nadiyā
tika-vin05t:1330_3: sīmaṃ sammannati, samudde sīmaṃ sammannati, jātassare sīmaṃ sammannati, sīmāya sīmaṃ
tika-vin05t:1330_4: sambhindati, sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharati. Imehi ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1331_0: Kathaṃ parisato kammāni vipajjanti? Dvādasahi ākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjanti
tika-vin05t:1331_1: – catuvaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1331_2: chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti, catuvaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:1331_3: kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti,
tika-vin05t:1331_4: catuvaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1332_0: Pañcavaggakaraṇe kamme…pe… dasavaggakaraṇe kamme…pe… vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā
tika-vin05t:1332_1: bhikkhū kammappattā, te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā
tika-vin05t:1332_2: paṭikkosanti, vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti,
tika-vin05t:1332_3: chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti, vīsativaggakaraṇe
tika-vin05t:1332_4: kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti,
tika-vin05t:1332_5: sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti. Imehi dvādasahi ākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1333_0: Catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
tika-vin05t:1333_1: Yassa saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, so neva kammappatto nāpi chandāraho, apica kammāraho.
tika-vin05t:1333_2: Pañcavaggakaraṇe kamme pañca bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
tika-vin05t:1333_3: Yassa saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, so neva kammappatto nāpi chandāraho, apica kammāraho.
tika-vin05t:1333_4: Dasavaggakaraṇe kamme dasa bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
tika-vin05t:1333_5: Yassa saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, so neva kammappatto nāpi chandāraho, apica kammāraho.
tika-vin05t:1333_6: Vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme vīsati bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
tika-vin05t:1333_7: Yassa saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, so neva kammappatto nāpi chandāraho, apica kammāraho.
tika-vin05t:1334_0: 250. Apalokanakammaṃ kati ṭhānāni gacchati? Ñattikammaṃ, ñattidutiyakammaṃ, ñatticatutthakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1334_1: kati ṭhānāni gacchati? Apalokanakammaṃ pañca ṭhānāni gacchati. Ñattikammaṃ nava ṭhānāni
tika-vin05t:1334_2: gacchati. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchati. Ñatticatutthakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1335: Apalokanakammaṃ katamāni pañca ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ bhaṇḍukammaṃ brahmadaṇḍaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamaṃ. Apalokanakammaṃ imāni pañca ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1336_0: Ñattikammaṃ katamāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ uposathaṃ pavāraṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:1336_1: sammutiṃ dānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ paccukkaḍḍhanaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamaṃ. Ñattikammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1337_0: Ñattidutiyakammaṃ katamāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ sammutiṃ dānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1337_1: uddharaṇaṃ desanaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1338_0: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ katamāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ sammutiṃ
tika-vin05t:1338_1: dānaṃ niggahaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamaṃ. Ñatticatutthakammaṃ imāni
tika-vin05t:1338_2: satta ṭhānāni gacchati. Ayaṃ tāva pāḷinayo.
tika-vin05t:1339_0: 251. Ayaṃ panettha ādito paṭṭhāya vinicchayakathā – apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1339_1: sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin05t:1339_2: sāvetvā kattabbakammaṃ. Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā
tika-vin05t:1339_3: ekāya ñattiyā kattabbakammaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:1339_4: anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anussāvanāyāti evaṃ ñattidutiyāya anussāvanāya kattabbakammaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1339_5: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā
tika-vin05t:1339_6: tīhi ca anussāvanāhīti evaṃ ñatticatutthāhi tīhi anussāvanāhi kattabbakammaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1340_0: Tatra apalokanakammaṃ apaloketvāva kātabbaṃ, ñattikammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Ñattikammampi
tika-vin05t:1340_1: ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvāva kātabbaṃ, apalokanakammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1340_2: pana apaloketvā kātabbampi akātabbampi atthi. Tattha sīmāsammuti sīmāsamūhanaṃ kathinadānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1340_3: kathinuddhāro kuṭivatthudesanā vihāravatthudesanāti imāni chakammāni garukāni apaloketvā
tika-vin05t:1340_4: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ sāvetvāva kātabbāni. Avasesā terasa sammutiyo
tika-vin05t:1340_6: kātuṃ vaṭṭanti, ñattikammañatticatutthakammavasena pana na kātabbameva. “Ñatticatutthakammavasena
tika-vin05t:1340_7: kayiramānaṃ daḷhataraṃ hoti, tasmā kātabba”nti ekacce vadanti. Evaṃ pana sati kammasaṅkaro
tika-vin05t:1340_8: hoti, tasmā na kātabbanti paṭikkhittameva. Sace pana akkharaparihīnaṃ vā padaparihīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1340_9: vā duruttapadaṃ vā hoti, tassa sodhanatthaṃ punappunaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Idaṃ akuppakammassa
tika-vin05t:1340_10: daḷhīkammaṃ hoti, kuppakamme kammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Ñatticatutthakammaṃ ñattiñca
tika-vin05t:1340_11: tisso ca kammavācāyo sāvetvāva kātabbaṃ, apalokanakammādivasena na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1341_0: Sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammanti ettha pana
tika-vin05t:1341_1: atthi kammaṃ sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ, atthi kammaṃ asammukhākaraṇīyaṃ. Tattha asammukhākaraṇīyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1341_2: nāma dūtenūpasampadā, pattanikkujjanaṃ, pattukkujjanaṃ, ummattakassa bhikkhuno ummattakasammuti,
tika-vin05t:1341_3: sekkhānaṃ kulānaṃ sekkhasammuti, channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍo, devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1341_4: apasādanīyaṃ dassentassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbaṃ avandiyakammanti aṭṭhavidhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1341_5: hoti. Idaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi kammaṃ asammukhā kataṃ sukataṃ hoti akuppaṃ, sesāni sabbakammāni
tika-vin05t:1341_6: sammukhā eva kātabbāni. Saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatāti
tika-vin05t:1341_7: imaṃ catubbidhaṃ sammukhāvinayaṃ upanetvāva kātabbāni. Evaṃ katāni hi sukatāni honti,
tika-vin05t:1341_8: evaṃ akatāni panetāni imaṃ sammukhāvinayasaṅkhātaṃ vatthuṃ vinā katattā vatthuvipannāni
tika-vin05t:1341_9: nāma honti. Tena vuttaṃ “sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1341_10: adhammakamma”nti. Paṭipucchākaraṇīyādīsupi paṭipucchādikaraṇameva vatthu, taṃ vatthuṃ
tika-vin05t:1341_11: vinā katattā tesampi vatthuvipannatā veditabbā. Apica ūnavīsativassaṃ vā antimavatthuṃ
tika-vin05t:1341_12: ajjhāpannapubbaṃ vā ekādasasu vā abhabbapuggalesu aññataraṃ upasampādentassapi vatthuvipannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1341_13: adhammakammaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ vatthuto kammavipattiyaṃ vinicchayo.
tika-vin05t:1342_0: Ñattito vipattiyaṃ pana vatthuṃ na parāmasatīti yassa upasampadādikammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1342_1: taṃ na parāmasati, tassa nāmaṃ na gaṇhāti. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito
tika-vin05t:1342_2: āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1342_3: āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vadati. Evaṃ vatthuṃ na parāmasati.
tika-vin05t:1343_0: Saṅghaṃ na parāmasatīti saṅghassa nāmaṃ na gaṇhāti. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ
tika-vin05t:1343_1: dhammarakkhito”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito”ti vadati. Evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1344_0: Puggalaṃ na parāmasatīti yo upasampadāpekkhassa upajjhāyo, taṃ na parāmasati, tassa
tika-vin05t:1344_1: nāmaṃ na gaṇhāti. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa
tika-vin05t:1344_2: upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito upasampadāpekkho”ti
tika-vin05t:1345_0: Ñattiṃ na parāmasatīti sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiṃ na parāmasati, ñattidutiyakamme ñattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1345_1: aṭṭhapetvā dvikkhattuṃ kammavācāya eva anussāvanakammaṃ karoti, ñatticatutthakammepi
tika-vin05t:1345_2: ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā catukkhattuṃ kammavācāya eva anussāvanakammaṃ karoti. Evaṃ ñattiṃ na parāmasati.
tika-vin05t:1346_0: Pacchā vā ñattiṃ ṭhapetīti paṭhamaṃ kammavācāya anussāvanakammaṃ katvā “esā ñattī”ti
tika-vin05t:1346_1: vatvā “khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vadati. Evaṃ pacchā
tika-vin05t:1346_2: ñattiṃ ṭhapeti. Iti imehi pañcahākārehi ñattito kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1347_0: Anussāvanato vipattiyaṃ pana vatthuādīni tāva vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Evaṃ pana
tika-vin05t:1347_1: nesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ hoti – “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”ti paṭhamānussāvanāya vā “dutiyampi
tika-vin05t:1347_2: etamatthaṃ vadāmi…pe… tatiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi. Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”ti dutiyatatiyānussāvanāsu
tika-vin05t:1347_3: vā “ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu
tika-vin05t:1347_4: me, bhante, saṅgho, āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vadanto vatthuṃ na parāmasati nāma.
tika-vin05t:1347_5: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ dhammarakkhito”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, ayaṃ
tika-vin05t:1347_6: dhammarakkhito”ti vadanto saṅghaṃ na parāmasati nāma. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1347_7: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1347_8: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito upasampadāpekkho”ti vadanto puggalaṃ na parāmasati nāma.
tika-vin05t:1348_0: Sāvanaṃ hāpetīti sabbena sabbaṃ kammavācāya anussāvanaṃ na karoti, ñattidutiyakamme
tika-vin05t:1348_1: dvikkhattuṃ ñattimeva ṭhapeti, ñatticatutthakamme catukkhattuṃ ñattimeva ṭhapeti.
tika-vin05t:1348_2: Evaṃ sāvanaṃ hāpeti. Yopi ñattidutiyakamme ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā ekaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāvento
tika-vin05t:1348_3: akkharaṃ vā chaḍḍeti, padaṃ vā duruttaṃ karoti, ayampi sāvanaṃ hāpetiyeva. Ñatticatutthakamme
tika-vin05t:1348_4: pana ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā sakimeva vā dvikkhattuṃ vā kammavācāya anussāvanaṃ karontopi
tika-vin05t:1348_5: akkharaṃ vā padaṃ vā chaḍḍentopi duruttaṃ karontopi anussāvanaṃ hāpetiyevāti veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:1349: 252. “Duruttaṃ karotī”ti ettha pana ayaṃ vinicchayo. Yo hi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ vadati, ayaṃ duruttaṃ karoti nāma. Tasmā kammavācaṃ karontena bhikkhunā yvāyaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1351: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
tika-vin05t:1352_0: Vutto, ayaṃ suṭṭhu upalakkhetabbo. Ettha hi sithilaṃ nāma pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1352_1: Dhanitaṃ nāma tesveva dutiyacatutthaṃ. Dīghanti dīghena kālena vattabbaākārādi. Rassanti
tika-vin05t:1352_2: tato upaḍḍhakālena vattabbaakārādi. Garukanti dīghameva, yaṃ vā “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassa
tika-vin05t:1352_3: yassa nakkhamatī”ti evaṃ saṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati. Lahukanti rassameva, yaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1352_4: “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassa yassa na khamatī”ti evaṃ asaṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1352_5: Niggahitanti yaṃ karaṇāni niggahetvā avissajjetvā avivaṭena mukhena sānunāsikaṃ katvā
tika-vin05t:1352_6: vattabbaṃ. Sambandhanti yaṃ parapadena sambandhitvā “tuṇhissā”ti vā “tuṇhassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1352_7: vā vuccati. Vavatthitanti yaṃ parapadena asambandhaṃ katvā vicchinditvā “tuṇhī assā”ti
tika-vin05t:1352_8: vā “tuṇha assā”ti vā vuccati. Vimuttanti yaṃ karaṇāni aniggahetvā vissajjetvā vivaṭena
tika-vin05t:1353_0: Tattha “suṇātu me”ti vattabbe ta-kārassa tha-kāraṃ katvā “suṇāthu me”ti vacanaṃ sithilassa
tika-vin05t:1353_1: dhanitakaraṇaṃ nāma, tathā “pattakallaṃ esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “patthakallaṃ esā ñatthī”tiādivacanaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1353_2: “Bhante saṅgho”ti vattabbe bha-kāragha-kārānaṃ ba-kāraga-kāre katvā “bante saṃgo”ti
tika-vin05t:1353_3: vacanaṃ dhanitassa sithilakaraṇaṃ nāma. “Suṇātu me”ti vivaṭena mukhena vattabbe pana
tika-vin05t:1353_4: “suṇaṃtu me”ti vā “esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “esaṃ ñattī”ti vā avivaṭena mukhena ananunāsikaṃ
tika-vin05t:1353_5: katvā vacanaṃ vimuttassa niggahitavacanaṃ nāma. “Pattakalla”nti avivaṭena mukhena
tika-vin05t:1353_6: anunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbe “pattakallā”ti vivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ akatvā vacanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1353_7: niggahitassa vimuttavacanaṃ nāma. Iti sithile kattabbe dhanitaṃ, dhanite kattabbe
tika-vin05t:1353_8: sithilaṃ, vimutte kattabbe niggahitaṃ, niggahite kattabbe vimuttanti imāni cattāri
tika-vin05t:1353_9: byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsenti. Evaṃ vadanto hi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe
tika-vin05t:1354_0: Itaresu pana dīgharassādīsu chasu byañjanesu dīghaṭṭhāne dīghameva, rassaṭṭhāne rassamevāti
tika-vin05t:1354_1: evaṃ yathāṭhāne taṃ tadeva akkharaṃ bhāsantena anukkamāgataṃ paveṇiṃ avināsentena
tika-vin05t:1354_2: kammavācā kātabbā. Sace pana evaṃ akatvā dīghe vattabbe rassaṃ, rasse vā vattabbe
tika-vin05t:1354_3: dīghaṃ vadati, tathā garuke vattabbe lahukaṃ, lahuke vā vattabbe garukaṃ vadati,
tika-vin05t:1354_4: sambandhe vā pana vattabbe vavatthitaṃ, vavatthite vā vattabbe sambandhaṃ vadati,
tika-vin05t:1354_5: evaṃ vuttepi kammavācā na kuppati. Imāni hi cha byañjanāni kammaṃ na kopenti. Yaṃ
tika-vin05t:1354_6: pana suttantikattherā “da-kāro ta-kāramāpajjati, ta-kāro da-kāramāpajjati, ca-kāro
tika-vin05t:1354_7: ja-kāramāpajjati, ja-kāro ca-kāramāpajjati, ya-kāro ka-kāramāpajjati, ka-kāro ya-kāramāpajjati,
tika-vin05t:1354_8: tasmā da-kārādīsu vattabbesu ta-kārādivacanaṃ na virujjhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ kammavācaṃ
tika-vin05t:1354_9: patvā na vaṭṭati. Tasmā vinayadharena neva da-kāro ta-kāro kātabbo…pe… na ka-kāro
tika-vin05t:1354_10: ya-kāro. Yathāpāḷiyā niruttiṃ sodhetvā dasavidhāya byañjananiruttiyā vuttadose pariharantena
tika-vin05t:1354_11: kammavācā kātabbā. Itarathā hi sāvanaṃ hāpeti nāma.
tika-vin05t:1355: Akāle vā sāvetīti sāvanāya akāle anokāse ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃyeva anussāvanakammaṃ katvā pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti. Iti imehi pañcahākārehi anussāvanato kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1356_0: 253. Sīmato vipattiyaṃ pana atikhuddakasīmā nāma yā ekavīsati bhikkhū na gaṇhāti.
tika-vin05t:1356_1: Kurundiyaṃ pana “yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin05t:1356_2: yā evarūpā sīmā, ayaṃ sammatāpi asammatā gāmakhettasadisāva hoti, tattha kataṃ kammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_3: kuppati. Esa nayo sesasīmāsupi. Ettha pana atimahatī nāma yā kesaggamattenapi tiyojanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_4: atikkamitvā sammatā hoti. Khaṇḍanimittā nāma aghaṭitanimittā vuccati. Puratthimāya
tika-vin05t:1356_5: disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkameneva dakkhiṇāya pacchimāya uttarāya disāya kittetvā
tika-vin05t:1356_6: puna puratthimāya disāya pubbakittitaṃ nimittaṃ paṭikittetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_7: akhaṇḍanimittā hoti. Sace pana anukkamena āharitvā uttarāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā
tika-vin05t:1356_8: tattheva ṭhapeti, khaṇḍanimittā hoti. Aparāpi khaṇḍanimittā nāma yā animittupagaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_9: tacasārarukkhaṃ vā khāṇukaṃ vā paṃsupuñjaṃ vā vālukapuñjaṃ vā aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_10: nimittaṃ katvā sammatā hoti. Chāyānimittā nāma yā pabbatacchāyādīnaṃ yaṃ kiñci chāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_11: nimittaṃ katvā sammatā hoti. Animittā nāma yā sabbena sabbaṃ nimittāni akittetvā
tika-vin05t:1356_12: sammatā hoti. Bahisīme ṭhito sīmaṃ sammannati nāma nimittāni kittetvā nimittānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_13: bahi ṭhito sammannati. Nadiyā samudde jātassare sīmaṃ sammannatīti etesu nadīādīsu
tika-vin05t:1356_14: yaṃ sammannati, sā evaṃ sammatāpi “sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmā, sabbo samuddo asīmo,
tika-vin05t:1356_15: sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti vacanato asammatāva hoti. Sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindatīti attano
tika-vin05t:1356_16: sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ sambhindati. Sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharatīti attano sīmāya paresaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_17: sīmaṃ ajjhottharati. Tattha yathā sambhedo ca ajjhottharaṇañca hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ sīmākathāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_18: vuttameva. Iti imā ekādasapi sīmā asīmā gāmakhettasadisā eva, tāsu nisīditvā kataṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_19: kammaṃ kuppati. Tena vuttaṃ “imehi ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjantī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1357_0: Parisato kammavipattiyaṃ pana kiñci anuttānaṃ nāma natthi. Yampi tattha kammappattachandārahalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:1357_1: vattabbaṃ siyā, tampi parato “cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin05t:1357_2: vuttameva. Tattha pakatattā kammappattāti catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro pakatattā
tika-vin05t:1357_3: anukkhittā anissāritā parisuddhasīlā cattāro bhikkhū kammappattā kammassa arahā anucchavikā
tika-vin05t:1357_4: sāmino. Na tehi vinā taṃ kammaṃ karīyati, na tesaṃ chando vā pārisuddhi vā eti, avasesā
tika-vin05t:1357_5: pana sacepi sahassamattā honti, sace samānasaṃvāsakā sabbe chandārahāva honti, chandapārisuddhiṃ
tika-vin05t:1357_6: datvā āgacchantu vā mā vā, kammaṃ pana tiṭṭhati. Yassa pana saṅgho parivāsādikammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1357_7: karoti, so neva kammappatto nāpi chandāraho, apica yasmā taṃ puggalaṃ vatthuṃ katvā
tika-vin05t:1357_8: saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, tasmā kammārahoti vuccati. Sesakammesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:1358_0: 254. Apalokanakammaṃ katamāni pañca ṭhānāni gacchati, osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ bhaṇḍukammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1358_1: brahmadaṇḍaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamanti ettha “osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇa”nti padasiliṭṭhatāyetaṃ
tika-vin05t:1358_2: vuttaṃ, paṭhamaṃ pana nissāraṇā hoti, pacchā osāraṇā. Tattha yā sā kaṇṭakassa sāmaṇerassa
tika-vin05t:1358_3: daṇḍakammanāsanā, sā nissāraṇāti veditabbā. Tasmā etarahi sacepi sāmaṇero buddhassa
tika-vin05t:1358_4: vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati, akappiyaṃ “kappiya”nti dīpeti, micchādiṭṭhiko
tika-vin05t:1358_5: hoti, antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato, so yāvatatiyaṃ nivāretvā taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1358_6: No ce vissajjeti, saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā “vissajjehī”ti vattabbo. No ce vissajjeti,
tika-vin05t:1358_7: byattena bhikkhunā apalokanakammaṃ katvā nissāretabbo. Evañca pana kammaṃ kātabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1359_0: “Saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa dhammassa saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:1359_1: avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko, yaṃ aññe sāmaṇerā labhanti dirattatirattaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
tika-vin05t:1359_2: sahaseyyaṃ, tassā alābhāya nissāraṇā ruccati saṅghassā’ti. Dutiyampi. Tatiyampi bhante
tika-vin05t:1359_3: saṅghaṃ pucchāmi ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero…pe… ruccati saṅghassā’ti, cara pire vinassā”ti.
tika-vin05t:1360_0: So aparena samayena “ahaṃ, bhante, bālatāya añāṇatāya alakkhikatāya evaṃ akāsiṃ,
tika-vin05t:1360_1: svāhaṃ saṅghaṃ khamāpemī”ti khamāpento yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā apalokanakammeneva osāretabbo,
tika-vin05t:1360_2: evañca pana osāretabbo. Saṅghamajjhe byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1361_0: “Saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa dhammassa saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:1361_1: avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko, yaṃ aññe sāmaṇerā labhanti dirattatirattaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
tika-vin05t:1361_2: sahaseyyaṃ, tassā alābhāya nissārito, svāyaṃ idāni sorato nivātavutti lajjidhammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1361_3: okkanto hirottappe patiṭṭhito katadaṇḍakammo accayaṃ deseti, imassa sāmaṇerassa yathā
tika-vin05t:1362: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ apalokanakammaṃ osāraṇañca nissāraṇañca gacchati. Bhaṇḍukammaṃ pabbajjāvinicchayakathāya vuttameva.
tika-vin05t:1363_0: Brahmadaṇḍo pana na kevalaṃ channasseva paññatto, yo aññopi bhikkhu mukharo hoti,
tika-vin05t:1363_1: bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭento khuṃsento vambhento viharati, tassapi dātabbo,
tika-vin05t:1363_2: evañca pana dātabbo. Saṅghamajjhe byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1364_0: “Bhante, itthannāmo bhikkhu mukharo, bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭento khuṃsento
tika-vin05t:1364_1: vambhento viharati, so bhikkhu yaṃ iccheyya, taṃ vadeyya, bhikkhūhi itthannāmo bhikkhu
tika-vin05t:1364_2: neva vattabbo, na ovaditabbo na anusāsitabbo, saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi ‘itthannāmassa
tika-vin05t:1364_3: bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa dānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā’ti. Dutiyampi pucchāmi…pe… tatiyampi
tika-vin05t:1364_4: pucchāmi ‘itthannāmassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa dānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā”’ti.
tika-vin05t:1365: Tassa aparena samayena sammā vattitvā khamāpentassa brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabbo, evañca pana paṭippassambhetabbo. Byattena bhikkhunā saṅghamajjhe sāvetabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1366_0: “Bhante, bhikkhusaṅgho asukassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍaṃ adāsi, so bhikkhu sorato nivātavutti
tika-vin05t:1366_1: lajjidhammaṃ okkanto hirottappe patiṭṭhito paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare tiṭṭhati, saṅghaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1366_2: bhante, pucchāmi ‘tassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa paṭippassaddhi ruccati saṅghassā”’ti.
tika-vin05t:1367: Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ vatvā apalokanakammeneva brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabboti.
tika-vin05t:1368: Kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamanti yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunikkhandhake –
tika-vin05t:1369_0: “Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo kaddamodakena osiñcanti ‘appeva
tika-vin05t:1369_1: nāma amhesu sārajjeyyu’nti, kāyaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti, ūruṃ vivaritvā
tika-vin05t:1369_2: bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti, aṅgajātaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti. Bhikkhuniyo obhāsenti,
tika-vin05t:1369_3: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ sampayojenti ‘appeva nāma amhesu sārajjeyyu”’nti –
tika-vin05t:1370_0: Imesu vatthūsu yesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tassa
tika-vin05t:1370_1: bhikkhuno daṇḍakammaṃ kātu”nti vatvā “kiṃ nu kho daṇḍakammaṃ kātabba”nti saṃsaye
tika-vin05t:1370_2: uppanne “avandiyo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbo”ti evaṃ avandiyakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1370_3: anuññātaṃ, taṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamaṃ, imassa apalokanakammassa ṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:1370_4: Tassa hi kammaññeva lakkhaṇaṃ, na osāraṇādīni, tasmā kammalakkhaṇanti vuccati. Tassa
tika-vin05t:1370_5: karaṇaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā saddhiṃ vitthārato dassayissāma. Bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitassa
tika-vin05t:1371_0: “Ayye, asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ dasseti, etassa ayyassa avandiyakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:1371_1: ruccatī”ti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmi. ‘Ayye, asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ
tika-vin05t:1371_2: dasseti, etassa ayyassa avandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatī’ti dutiyampi. Tatiyampi bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1372: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammena avandiyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1373_0: Tato paṭṭhāya so bhikkhu bhikkhunīhi na vanditabbo. Sace avandiyamāno hirottappaṃ
tika-vin05t:1373_1: paccupaṭṭhapetvā sammā vattati, tena bhikkhuniyo khamāpetabbā. Khamāpentana bhikkhunupassayaṃ
tika-vin05t:1373_2: agantvā vihāreyeva saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā
tika-vin05t:1373_3: añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ, bhante, paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare tiṭṭhāmi, na puna apāsādikaṃ
tika-vin05t:1373_4: dassessāmi, bhikkhunisaṅgho mayhaṃ khamatū”ti khamāpetabbaṃ. Tena saṅghena vā gaṇena
tika-vin05t:1373_5: vā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pesetvā ekabhikkhunā vā sayameva gantvā bhikkhuniyo vattabbā “ayaṃ
tika-vin05t:1373_6: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhito, iminā accayaṃ desetvā bhikkhunisaṅgho khamāpito,
tika-vin05t:1373_7: bhikkhunisaṅgho imaṃ bhikkhuṃ vandiyaṃ karotū”ti. So vandiyo kātabbo, evañca pana
tika-vin05t:1373_8: kātabbo. Bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa anumatiyā byattāya bhikkhuniyā sāvetabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1374_0: “Ayye, asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ dassetīti bhikkhunisaṅghena avandiyo
tika-vin05t:1374_1: kato, so lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhito, accayaṃ desetvā
tika-vin05t:1374_2: bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ khamāpesi, tassa ayyassa vandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatīti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1375: Tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ apalokanakammeneva vandiyo kātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1376_0: 255. Ayaṃ panettha pāḷimuttakopi kammalakkhaṇavinicchayo. Idañhi kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāma
tika-vin05t:1376_1: bhikkhunisaṅghamūlakaṃ paññattaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassapi panetaṃ labbhatiyeva. Yañhi
tika-vin05t:1376_2: bhikkhusaṅgho salākabhattauposathaggesu ca apalokanakammaṃ karoti, etampi kammalakkhaṇameva.
tika-vin05t:1376_4: yāvatatiyaṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ katvā cīvaraṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Appamattakavissajjakena
tika-vin05t:1376_5: pana cīvaraṃ karontassa paccayabhājanīyakathāyaṃ vuttappabhedāni sūciādīni anapaloketvāpi
tika-vin05t:1376_6: dātabbāni. Tesaṃ dāne soyeva issaro, tato atirekaṃ dentena apaloketvā dātabbaṃ. Tato
tika-vin05t:1376_7: hi atirekadāne saṅgho sāmī. Gilānabhesajjampi tattha vuttappakāraṃ sayameva dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1376_8: atirekaṃ icchantassa apaloketvā dātabbaṃ. Yopi ca dubbalo vā chinniriyāpatho vā pacchinnabhikkhācārapatho
tika-vin05t:1376_9: vā mahāgilāno, tassa mahāvāsesu tatruppādato devasikaṃ nāḷi vā upaḍḍhanāḷi vā, ekadivasaṃyeva
tika-vin05t:1376_10: vā pañca vā dasa vā taṇḍulanāḷiyo dentena apalokanakammaṃ katvāva dātabbā. Pesalassa
tika-vin05t:1376_11: bhikkhuno tatruppādato iṇapalibodhampi bahussutassa saṅghabhāranittharakassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1377_0: Catupaccayavasena dinnatatruppādato saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ jaggāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, “ayaṃ bhikkhu
tika-vin05t:1377_1: issaravatāya vicāretī”ti kathāpacchindanatthaṃ pana salākaggādīsu vā antarasannipāte
tika-vin05t:1377_2: vā saṅghaṃ āpucchitvāva jaggāpetabbo. Cīvarapiṇḍapātatthāya odissa dinnatatruppādatopi
tika-vin05t:1377_3: apaloketvā āvāso jaggāpetabbo, anapaloketvāpi vaṭṭati, “sūro vatāyaṃ bhikkhu cīvarapiṇḍapātatthāya
tika-vin05t:1377_4: odissa dinnato āvāsaṃ jaggāpetī”ti evaṃ uppannakathāpacchedanatthaṃ pana apalokanakammameva katvā jaggāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1378_0: Cetiye chattaṃ vā vedikaṃ vā bodhigharaṃ vā āsanagharaṃ vā akataṃ vā karontena jiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:1378_1: vā paṭisaṅkharontena sudhākammaṃ vā karontena manusse samādapetvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1378_2: Sace kārako natthi, cetiyassa upanikkhepato kāretabbaṃ. Upanikkhepepi asati apalokanakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1378_3: katvā tatruppādato kāretabbaṃ, saṅghikenapi apaloketvā cetiyakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1378_4: Cetiyassa santakena apaloketvāpi saṅghikakiccaṃ na vaṭṭati, tāvakālikaṃ pana gahetvā
tika-vin05t:1378_5: paṭipākatikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Cetiye sudhākammādīni karontehi pana bhikkhācārato vā
tika-vin05t:1378_6: saṅghato vā yāpanamattaṃ alabhantehi cetiyasantakato yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjantehi
tika-vin05t:1378_7: vattaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, “vattaṃ karomā”ti macchamaṃsādīhi saṅghabhattaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1379_0: Ye vihāre ropitā phalarukkhā saṅghena pariggahitā honti, jagganakammaṃ labhanti.
tika-vin05t:1379_1: Yesaṃ phalāni ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā bhājetvā paribhuñjanti, tesu apalokanakammaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1379_2: Ye pana apariggahitā, tesu apalokanakammaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ pana salākaggayāgaggabhattaggaantarasaaāpātesupi
tika-vin05t:1379_3: kātuṃ vaṭṭati, uposathagge pana vaṭṭatiyeva. Tattha hi anāgatānampi chandapārisuddhi
tika-vin05t:1379_4: āharīyati, tasmā taṃ suvisodhitaṃ hoti. Evañca pana kātabbaṃ, byattena bhikkhunā
tika-vin05t:1380_0: “Bhante, yaṃ imasmiṃ vihāre antosīmāya saṅghasantakaṃ mūlatacapattaaṅkurapupphaphalakhādanīyādi
tika-vin05t:1380_1: atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ruccatīti saṅghaṃ pucchāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1382_0: Catūhi pañcahi bhikkhūhi kataṃ sukatameva. Yasmimpi vihāre dve tayo janā vasanti,
tika-vin05t:1382_1: tehi nisīditvā katampi saṅghena katasadisameva. Yasmiṃ pana eko bhikkhu hoti, tena
tika-vin05t:1382_2: bhikkhunā uposathadivase pubbakaraṇapubbakiccaṃ katvā nisinnena katampi katikavattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1382_3: saṅghena katasadisameva hoti. Karontena pana phalavārena kātumpi cattāro māse cha
tika-vin05t:1382_4: māse ekasaṃvaccharanti evaṃ paricchinditvāpi aparicchinditvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Paricchinne
tika-vin05t:1382_5: yathāparicchedaṃ paribhuñjitvā puna kātabbaṃ. Aparicchinne yāva rukkhā dharanti,
tika-vin05t:1382_6: tāva vaṭṭati. Yepi tesaṃ rukkhānaṃ bījehi aññe rukkhā ropitā honti, tesampi sā eva katikā.
tika-vin05t:1383_0: Sace pana aññasmiṃ vihāre ropitā honti, tesaṃ yattha ropitā, tasmiṃyeva vihāre saṅgho
tika-vin05t:1383_1: sāmī. Yepi aññato bījāni āharitvā purimavihāre pacchā ropitā, tesu aññā katikā kātabbā,
tika-vin05t:1383_2: katikāya katāya puggalikaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti, yathāsukhaṃ phalādīni paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:1383_3: Sace panettha taṃ taṃ okāsaṃ parikkhipitvā pariveṇāni katvā jagganti, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1383_4: puggalikaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti, aññe paribhuñjituṃ na labhanti. Tehi pana saṅghassa dasamabhāgaṃ
tika-vin05t:1383_5: datvā paribhuñjitabbāni. Yopi majjhevihāre rukkhaṃ sākhāhi parivāretvā rakkhati, tassapi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:1384_0: Porāṇakavihāraṃ gatassa sambhāvanīyabhikkhuno “thero āgato”ti phalāphalaṃ āharanti,
tika-vin05t:1384_1: sace tattha mūle sabbapariyattidharo bahussutabhikkhu vihāsi, “addhā ettha dīghā
tika-vin05t:1384_2: katikā katā bhavissatī”ti nikkukkuccena paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Vihāre phalāphalaṃ piṇḍapātikānampi
tika-vin05t:1384_3: vaṭṭati, dhutaṅgaṃ na kopeti. Sāmaṇerā attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ bahūni phalāni denti,
tika-vin05t:1384_4: aññe bhikkhū alabhantā khiyyanti, khiyyanamattameva taṃ hoti. Sace dubbhikkhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:1384_5: ekaṃ panasarukkhaṃ nissāya saṭṭhipi janā jīvanti, tādise kāle sabbesaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya
tika-vin05t:1384_6: bhājetvā khāditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ sāmīci. Yāva pana katikavattaṃ na paṭippassambhati, tāva
tika-vin05t:1384_7: tehi khāyitaṃ sukhāyitameva. Kadā pana katikavattaṃ paṭippassambhati? Yadā samaggo
tika-vin05t:1384_8: saṅgho sannipatitvā “ito paṭṭhāya bhājetvā khādantū”ti sāvebhi, ekabhikkhuke pana
tika-vin05t:1384_9: vihāre etena sāvitepi purimakatikā paṭippassambhatiyeva. Sace paṭippassaddhāya katikāya
tika-vin05t:1384_10: sāmaṇerā neva rukkhato pātenti, na bhūmito gahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ denti, patitaphalāni
tika-vin05t:1384_11: pādehi paharantā vicaranti, tesaṃ dasamabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva upaḍḍhaphalabhāgena
tika-vin05t:1384_12: phātikammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Addhā phātikammalobhena āharitvā dassenti, puna subhikkhe jāte
tika-vin05t:1384_13: kappiyakārakesu āgantvā sākhāparivārādīni katvā rukkhe rakkhantesu sāmaṇerānaṃ phātikammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1385_0: “Vihāre phalāphalaṃ atthī”ti sāmantagāmehi manussā gilānānaṃ vā gabbhinīnaṃ vā atthāya
tika-vin05t:1385_1: āgantvā “ekaṃ nāḷikeraṃ detha, ambaṃ detha, labujaṃ dethā”ti yācanti, dātabbaṃ, na
tika-vin05t:1385_2: dātabbanti? Dātabbaṃ. Adīyamāne hi te domanassikā honti. Dentena pana saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā
tika-vin05t:1385_3: yāvatatiyaṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ katvāva dātabbaṃ, katikavattaṃ vā katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1385_4: evañca pana kātabbaṃ. Byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1386_0: “Sāmantagāmehi manussā āgantvā gilānādīnaṃ atthāya phalāphalaṃ yācanti, dve nāḷikerāni
tika-vin05t:1386_1: dve tālaphalāni dve panasāni pañca ambāni pañca kadaliphalāni gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1386_2: asukarukkhato ca asukarukkhato ca phalaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ ruccati bhikkhusaṅghassā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1387_0: Tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya gilānādīnaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā yācantā “gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin05t:1387_1: na vattabbā, vattaṃ pana ācikkhitabbaṃ “nāḷikerādīni iminā nāma paricchedena gaṇhantānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1387_2: asukarukkhato ca asukarukkhato ca phalaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ kata”nti. Anuvicaritvā
tika-vin05t:1387_3: pana “ayaṃ madhuraphalo ambo, ito gaṇhathā”tipi na vattabbā.
tika-vin05t:1388_0: Phalabhājanakāle pana āgatānaṃ sammatena upaḍḍhabhāgo dātabbo, asammatena apaloketvā
tika-vin05t:1388_1: dātabbaṃ. Khīṇaparibbayo vā maggagamiyasatthavāho vā añño vā issaro āgantvā yācati,
tika-vin05t:1388_2: apaloketvāva dātabbaṃ, balakkārena gahetvā khādanto na vāretabbo. Kuddho hi so rukkhepi
tika-vin05t:1388_3: chindeyya, aññampi anatthaṃ kareyya. Puggalikapariveṇaṃ āgantvā gilānassa nāmena
tika-vin05t:1388_4: yācanto “amhehi chāyādīnaṃ atthāya ropitaṃ, sace atthi, tumhe jānāthā”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin05t:1388_5: Yadi pana phalabharitāva rukkhā honti, kaṇṭake bandhitvā phalavārena gaṇhanti, apaccāsīsantena
tika-vin05t:1388_6: hutvā dātabbaṃ, balakkārena gaṇhanto na vāretabbo. Pubbe vuttamevettha kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1389_0: Saṅghassa phalārāmo hoti, paṭijagganaṃ na labhati. Sace taṃ koci vattasīsena jaggati,
tika-vin05t:1389_1: saṅghasseva hoti. Athāpi kassaci paṭibalassa bhikkhuno “imaṃ sappurisa jaggitvā dehī”ti
tika-vin05t:1389_2: saṅgho bhāraṃ karoti, so ce vattasīsena jaggati, evampi saṅghasseva hoti. Phātikammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1389_3: paccāsīsantassa pana tatiyabhāgena vā upaḍḍhabhāgena vā phātikammaṃ kātabbaṃ. “Bhāriyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1389_4: kamma”nti vatvā ettakena anicchanto pana “sabbaṃ taveva santakaṃ katvā mūlabhāgaṃ
tika-vin05t:1389_5: dasamabhāgamattaṃ datvā jaggāhī”tipi vattabbo, garubhaṇḍattā pana na mūlacchejjavasena
tika-vin05t:1389_6: dātabbaṃ. So mūlabhāgaṃ datvā khādanto akatāvāsaṃ vā katvā katāvāsaṃ vā jaggitvā
tika-vin05t:1389_7: nissitakānaṃ ārāmaṃ niyyāteti, tehipi mūlabhāgo dātabbova.
tika-vin05t:1390_0: Yadā pana bhikkhū sayaṃ jaggituṃ pahonti, atha tesaṃ jaggituṃ na dātabbaṃ, jaggitakāle
tika-vin05t:1390_1: pana na vāretabbā, jagganakāleyeva vāretabbā. “Bahu tumhehi khāyitaṃ, idāni mā jaggittha,
tika-vin05t:1390_2: bhikkhusaṅghoyeva jaggissatī”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace pana neva vattasīsena jagganto atthi,
tika-vin05t:1390_3: na phātikammena, na saṅgho jaggituṃ pahoti, eko anāpucchitvāva jaggitvā phātikammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1390_4: vaḍḍhetvā paccāsīsati, apalokanakammena phātikammaṃ vaḍḍhetvāva dātabbaṃ. Iti imaṃ
tika-vin05t:1390_5: sabbampi kammalakkhaṇameva hoti. Apalokanakammaṃ imāni pañca ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1392: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, anusiṭṭho so mayā, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo āgaccheyya, ‘āgacchāhī’ti vattabbo”ti –
tika-vin05t:1394_0: “Suṇantu me āyasmantā, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dhammakathiko, imassa neva suttaṃ
tika-vin05t:1394_1: āgacchati, no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati,
tika-vin05t:1394_2: yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1395: Evaṃ ubbāhikavinicchaye dhammakathikassa bhikkhuno nissāraṇā nissāraṇā nāma.
tika-vin05t:1396: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajjuposatho pannaraso, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1397: Evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti uposatho nāma.
tika-vin05t:1398: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajja pavāraṇā pannarasī, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho pavāreyyā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1399: Evaṃ pavāraṇakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti pavāraṇā nāma.
tika-vin05t:1400_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, yadi
tika-vin05t:1400_1: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ anusāseyya”nti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1400_2: itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ anusāseyyā”ti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin05t:1400_3: antarāyike dhamme puccheyya”nti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin05t:1400_4: antarāyike dhamme puccheyyā”ti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ
tika-vin05t:1400_5: puccheyya”nti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyā”ti,
tika-vin05t:1400_6: “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti, “yadi
tika-vin05t:1400_7: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1401: Evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā sammannituṃ ṭhapitā ñatti sammuti nāma.
tika-vin05t:1402_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:1402_1: nissaṭṭhaṃ, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1402_2: dadeyyā”ti, “yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyu”nti –
tika-vin05t:1404_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ
tika-vin05t:1404_1: karoti deseti, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti,
tika-vin05t:1404_2: “yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti,
tika-vin05t:1406: “Suṇantu me āyasmantā āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāma, āgame kāḷe pavāreyyāmā”ti.
tika-vin05t:1407_0: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe
tika-vin05t:1407_1: adhikaraṇakārakā taṃ kāḷaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ, āvāsikena bhikkhunā byattena paṭibalena āvāsikā bhikkhū ñāpetabbā –
tika-vin05t:1408: “Suṇantu me āyasmantā āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāma, āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1410: Sabbeheva ekajjhaṃ sannipatitabbaṃ, sannipatitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin05t:1411_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, amhākaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1411_1: viharataṃ bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ, sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi
tika-vin05t:1411_2: aññamaññaṃ kāressāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvatteyya,
tika-vin05t:1411_3: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyya
tika-vin05t:1412: Evaṃ tiṇavatthārakasamathena katvā sabbapaṭhamā sabbasaṅgāhikañatti kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin05t:1413: Tathā tato parā ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekaṃ katvā dve ñattiyo. Iti yathāvuttappabhedaṃ osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ…pe… kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamanti ñattikammaṃ imāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1414_1: khandhake vuttā nissāraṇā, tasseva pattukkujjanavasena khandhake vuttā osāraṇā ca
tika-vin05t:1415_0: “Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa patto nikkujjitabbo. Bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1415_1: alābhāya parisakkati, bhikkhūnaṃ anatthāya parisakkati, bhikkhūnaṃ avāsāya parisakkati,
tika-vin05t:1415_2: bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati, bhikkhū bhikkhūhi bhedeti, buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
tika-vin05t:1415_3: dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi
tika-vin05t:1415_4: aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa pattaṃ nikkujjituṃ.
tika-vin05t:1416: Evañca pana bhikkhave nikkujjitabbo. Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin05t:1417_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, vaḍḍho licchavī āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya
tika-vin05t:1417_1: sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa
tika-vin05t:1417_2: pattaṃ nikkujjeyya, asambhogaṃ saṅghena kareyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin05t:1418_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, vaḍḍho licchavī āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya
tika-vin05t:1418_1: sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṃ nikkujjati, asambhogaṃ
tika-vin05t:1418_2: saṅghena karoti, yassāyasmato khamati vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattassa nikkujjanā asambhogaṃ
tika-vin05t:1418_3: saṅghena karaṇaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1419: “Nikkujjito saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto asambhogo saṅghena, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1420_0: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa patto ukkujjitabbo. Na bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1420_1: alābhāya parisakkati, na bhikkhūnaṃ anatthāya parisakkati…pe… na saṅghassa avaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:1420_2: bhāsati. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa pattaṃ ukkujjituṃ.
tika-vin05t:1421_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, ukkujjitabbo. Tena, bhikkhave, vaḍḍhena licchavinā saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1421_1: upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā
tika-vin05t:1422: “Saṅghena me, bhante, patto nikkujjito, asambhogomhi saṅghena, sohaṃ, bhante, sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi, saṅghaṃ pattukkujjanaṃ yācāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1425_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto nikkujjito, asambhogo
tika-vin05t:1425_1: saṅghena, so sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, saṅghaṃ pattukkujjanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1425_2: yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṃ ukkujjeyya,
tika-vin05t:1426_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto nikkujjito, asambhogo
tika-vin05t:1426_1: saṅghena, so sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, saṅghaṃ pattukkujjanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1426_2: yācati, saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṃ ukkujjati, sambhogaṃ saṅghena karoti,
tika-vin05t:1426_3: yassāyasmato khamati vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattassa ukkujjanā sambhogaṃ saṅghena
tika-vin05t:1426_4: karaṇaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin05t:1427: “Ukkujjito saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto sambhogo saṅghena, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1428_0: Ettha ca aṭṭhasu aṅgesu ekakenapi aṅgena samannāgatassa pattanikkujjanakammaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin05t:1428_1: vaṭṭati, antosīmāya vā nissīmaṃ gantvā nadīādīsu vā nikkujjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1428_2: nikkujjite pana patte tassa gehe koci deyyadhammo na gahetabbo, “asukassa gehe bhikkhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1428_3: mā gaṇhitthā”ti aññavihāresupi pesetabbaṃ. Ukkujjanakāle pana yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā
tika-vin05t:1429_2: etāsaṃ sammutīnaṃ vasena sammuti veditabbā. Kathinacīvaradānamatakacīvaradānavasena
tika-vin05t:1429_3: dānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathinuddhāravasena uddhāro veditabbo. Kuṭivatthuvihāravatthudesanāvasena
tika-vin05t:1429_4: desanā veditabbā. Yā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathe sabbasaṅgāhikañattiñca ekekasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:1429_5: pakkhe ekekañattiñcāti tisso ñattiyo ṭhapetvā puna ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekāti dve ñattidutiyakammavācā
tika-vin05t:1429_6: vuttā, tāsaṃ vasena kammalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iti ñattidutiyakammaṃ imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1430_0: 258. Ñatticatutthakammaṭṭhānabhede pana tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ vasena
tika-vin05t:1430_1: nissāraṇā, tesaṃyeva ca kammānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena osāraṇā veditabbā. Bhikkhunovādakasammutivasena
tika-vin05t:1430_2: sammuti veditabbā. Parivāsadānamānattadānavasena dānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Mūlāyapaṭikassanakammavasena
tika-vin05t:1430_3: niggaho veditabbo. Ukkhittānuvattikā, aṭṭha yāvatatiyakā, ariṭṭho, caṇḍakāḷī ca imete
tika-vin05t:1430_4: yāvatatiyakāti imāsaṃ ekādasannaṃ samanubhāsanānaṃ vasena samanubhāsanā veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1430_6: imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati. Evaṃ kammāni ca kammavipatti ca tesaṃ kammānaṃ kārakasaṅghaparicchedo
tika-vin05t:1452_0: 1. Idāni pakiṇṇakakathā ca veditabbā. “Gaṇabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ
tika-vin05t:1452_1: gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhi ākārehi pasavati viññattito vā nimantanato vā. Kathaṃ viññattito
tika-vin05t:1452_2: pasavati? Cattāro bhikkhū ekato ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā upāsakaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ catunnampi
tika-vin05t:1452_3: bhattaṃ dehī”ti vā viññāpeyyuṃ, pāṭekkaṃ vā passitvā “mayhaṃ dehi, mayhaṃ dehī”ti
tika-vin05t:1452_4: evaṃ ekato vā nānāto vā viññāpetvā ekato vā gacchantu nānāto vā, bhattaṃ gahetvāpi
tika-vin05t:1452_5: ekato vā bhuñjantu nānāto vā. Sace ekato gaṇhanti, gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti, sabbesaṃ āpatti.
tika-vin05t:1452_6: Paṭiggahaṇameva hettha pamāṇaṃ. Evaṃ viññattito pasavati.
tika-vin05t:1453_0: Kathaṃ nimantanato pasavati? Cattāro bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā “tumhe, bhante, odanena
tika-vin05t:1453_1: nimantemi, odanaṃ me gaṇhatha ākaṅkhatha oloketha adhivāsetha paṭimānethā”ti evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1453_2: yena kenaci vevacanena vā bhāsantarena vā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā nimanteti.
tika-vin05t:1453_3: Evaṃ ekato nimantitā paricchinnakālavasena ajjatanāya vā svātanāya vā ekato gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1453_4: ekato gaṇhanti, ekato bhuñjanti, gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti, sabbesaṃ āpatti. Ekato nimantitā
tika-vin05t:1453_5: ekato vā nānāto vā gacchanti, ekato gaṇhanti, ekato vā nānāto vā bhuñjanti, āpattiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1453_6: Ekato nimantitā ekato vā nānāto vā gacchanti, nānāto gaṇhanti, ekato vā nānāto vā
tika-vin05t:1453_7: bhuñjanti, anāpatti. Cattāri pariveṇāni vā vihāre vā gantvā nānāto nimantitā, ekaṭṭhāne
tika-vin05t:1453_8: ṭhitesuyeva vā eko puttena eko pitarāti evampi nānāto nimantitā ekato vā nānāto vā
tika-vin05t:1453_9: gacchantu, ekato vā nānāto vā bhuñjantu, sace ekato gaṇhanti, gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:1453_10: sabbesaṃ āpatti. Evaṃ tāva nimantanato pasavati.
tika-vin05t:1454_0: Tasmā sace koci saṅghabhattaṃ kattukāmena nimantanatthāya pesito vihāraṃ āgamma “bhante,
tika-vin05t:1454_1: sve amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti avatvā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā “saṅghabhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1454_2: gaṇhathā”ti vā “saṅgho bhattaṃ gaṇhatū”ti vā vadati, bhattuddesakena paṇḍitena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1454_3: Nimantanikā gaṇabhojanato, piṇḍapātikā ca dhutaṅgabhedato mocetabbā. Kathaṃ? Evaṃ
tika-vin05t:1454_4: tāva vattabbaṃ “sve na sakkā upāsakā”ti. Punadivase, bhanteti. Punadivasepi na sakkāti.
tika-vin05t:1454_5: Evaṃ yāva aḍḍhamāsampi haritvā puna vattabbo “kiṃ tvaṃ avacā”ti. Sace punapi “saṅghabhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1454_6: gaṇhathā”ti vadati, tato “imaṃ tāva upāsaka pupphaṃ kappiyaṃ karohi, imaṃ tiṇa”nti
tika-vin05t:1454_7: evaṃ vikkhepaṃ katvā puna “tvaṃ kiṃ kathayitthā”ti pucchitabbo. Sace punapi tatheva
tika-vin05t:1454_8: vadati, “āvuso, tvaṃ piṇḍapātike vā mahallakatthere vā na lacchasi, sāmaṇere lacchasī”ti
tika-vin05t:1454_9: vattabbo. “Nanu, bhante, asukasmiṃ asukasmiñca gāme bhadante bhojesuṃ, ahaṃ kasmā
tika-vin05t:1454_10: na labhāmī”ti ca vutte te nimantituṃ jānanti, tvaṃ na jānāsīti. Te kathaṃ nimantesuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1454_11: bhanteti? Te evamāhaṃsu “amhākaṃ, bhante, bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Sace sopi tatheva vadati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1455_0: Atha punapi “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, “na dāni tvaṃ, āvuso, bahū bhikkhū lacchasi,
tika-vin05t:1455_1: tayo eva, āvuso, lacchasī”ti vattabbo. “Nanu, bhante, amukasmiñca amukasmiñca gāme
tika-vin05t:1455_2: sakalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhojesuṃ, ahaṃ kasmā na labhāmī”ti. “Tvaṃ nimantituṃ na jānāsī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1455_3: Te kathaṃ nimantesuṃ, bhanteti? Te evamāhaṃsu “amhākaṃ, bhante, bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
tika-vin05t:1455_4: Sace sopi tatheva “bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Atha punapi “bhattamevā”ti
tika-vin05t:1455_5: vadati, tato vattabbo – “gaccha tvaṃ, natthamhākaṃ tava bhattenattho, nibaddhagocaro
tika-vin05t:1455_6: esa amhākaṃ, mayamettha piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti. Taṃ “caratha, bhante”ti vatvā āgataṃ
tika-vin05t:1455_7: pucchanti “kiṃ bho laddhā bhikkhū”ti? Kiṃ etena, bahu ettha vattabbaṃ, therā “sve
tika-vin05t:1455_8: piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti āhaṃsu, mā dāni tumhe pamajjitthāti. Dutiyadivase cetiyavattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1455_9: katvā ṭhitabhikkhū saṅghattherena vattabbā “āvuso, dhuragāme saṅghabhattaṃ, apaṇḍitamanusso
tika-vin05t:1455_10: pana agamāsi, gacchāma, dhuragāme piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti. Bhikkhūhi therassa vacanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1455_11: kātabbaṃ, na dubbacehi bhavitabbaṃ, gāmadvāre aṭṭhatvāva piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ, tesu
tika-vin05t:1456_0: Sace āsanasālāya bhattaṃ ṭhapetvā rathikāsu āhiṇḍantā ārocenti “āsanasālāyaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1456_1: bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti, na vaṭṭati. Atha pana “bhattaṃ ādāya tattha tattha gantvā bhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1456_2: gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, paṭikacceva vā vihāraṃ atiharitvā patirūpe ṭhāne ṭhapetvā āgatāgatānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1456_3: denti, ayaṃ abhihaṭabhikkhā nāma vaṭṭati. Sace pana bhattasālāya dānaṃ sajjetvā taṃ
tika-vin05t:1456_4: taṃ pariveṇaṃ pahiṇanti “bhattasālāya bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti, vaṭṭati. Ye pana manussā
tika-vin05t:1456_5: piṇḍacārike bhikkhū disvā āsanasālaṃ sammajjitvā tattha nisīdāpetvā bhojenti, na
tika-vin05t:1456_6: te paṭikkhipitabbā. Ye pana gāme bhikkhaṃ alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamante bhikkhū disvā
tika-vin05t:1456_7: “bhante, bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, te paṭikkhipitabbā, na nivattitabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:1456_8: “nivattatha, bhante, bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, “nivattathā”ti vuttapade nivattituṃ
tika-vin05t:1456_9: vaṭṭati. “Nivattatha, bhante, ghare bhattaṃ kataṃ, gāme bhattaṃ kata”nti vadanti,
tika-vin05t:1456_10: gehe ca gāme ca bhattaṃ nāma yassa kassaci hoti, nivattituṃ vaṭṭati. “Nivattatha
tika-vin05t:1456_11: bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti sambandhaṃ katvā vadanti, nivattituṃ na vaṭṭati. Āsanasālāto
tika-vin05t:1456_12: piṇḍāya carituṃ nikkhamante disvā “nisīdatha, bhante, bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:1457_0: “Aññatra samayā”ti vacanato gilānasamayo cīvaradānasamayo cīvarakārasamayo addhānagamanasamayo
tika-vin05t:1457_1: nāvābhiruhanasamayo mahāsamayo samaṇabhattasamayoti etesu sattasu samayesu aññatarasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:1457_2: anāpatti. Tasmā yathā mahācammassa parato maṃsaṃ dissati, evaṃ antamaso pādāpi phālitā
tika-vin05t:1457_3: honti, vālikāya vā sakkharāya vā pahaṭamatte dukkhaṃ uppādenti, na sakkā ca hoti
tika-vin05t:1457_4: antogāme piṇḍāya carituṃ, īdise gelaññe gilānasamayoti bhuñjitabbaṃ, na lesakappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1458_0: Cīvaradānasamayo nāma anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine
tika-vin05t:1458_1: pañcamāsā. Etthantare “cīvaradānasamayo”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ. Cīvare kariyamāne cīvarakārasamayoti
tika-vin05t:1458_2: bhuñjitabbaṃ. Yadā hi sāṭakañca suttañca labhitvā cīvaraṃ karonti, ayaṃ cīvarakārasamayo
tika-vin05t:1458_3: nāma, visuṃ cīvarakārasamayo nāma natthi, tasmā yo tattha cīvare kattabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin05t:1458_4: kammaṃ karoti, mahāpaccariyañhi “antamaso sūcivedhako”tipi vuttaṃ. Tena “cīvarakārasamayo”ti
tika-vin05t:1458_5: bhuñjitabbaṃ. Kurundiyaṃ pana vitthāreneva vuttaṃ “yo cīvaraṃ vicāreti chindati,
tika-vin05t:1458_6: moghasuttakaṃ ṭhapeti, āgantukapattaṃ ṭhapeti, paccāgataṃ sibbeti, āgantukapattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1458_7: bandhati, anuvātaṃ chindati ghaṭeti āropeti, tattha paccāgataṃ sibbeti, suttaṃ karoti
tika-vin05t:1458_8: valeti, pipphalikaṃ niseti, parivattanaṃ karoti, sabbopi cīvaraṃ karotiyevāti vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1458_9: Yo pana samīpe nisinno jātakaṃ vā dhammapadaṃ vā katheti, ayaṃ na cīvarakārako, etaṃ
tika-vin05t:1459: Addhānagamanasamaye antamaso aḍḍhayojanaṃ gantukāmenapi “aḍḍhayojanaṃ gacchissāmī”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ, gacchantena bhuñjitabbaṃ, gatena ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1460: Nāvābhiruhanasamaye “nāvaṃ abhiruhissāmī”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ, āruḷhena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvāpi yāva na orohati, tāva bhuñjitabbaṃ, oruḷhena ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1461_0: Mahāsamayo nāma yattha dve tayo bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā yāpenti, antamaso catutthepi
tika-vin05t:1461_1: āgate na yāpenti, ayaṃ mahāsamayo. Yattha pana sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā sannipatanti,
tika-vin05t:1461_2: tattha vattabbameva natthi, tasmā tādise kāle “mahāsamayo”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1462_0: Samaṇabhattasamayo nāma yo koci paribbājakasamāpanno bhattaṃ karoti, ayaṃ samaṇabhattasamayova.
tika-vin05t:1462_1: Tasmā sahadhammikesu vā titthiyesu vā aññatarena yena kenaci kate bhatte “samaṇabhattasamayo”ti
tika-vin05t:1462_2: bhuñjitabbaṃ. “Anāpatti samaye, dve tayo ekato bhuñjanti, piṇḍāya caritvā ekato sannipatitvā
tika-vin05t:1462_3: bhuñjanti, niccabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, pañca
tika-vin05t:1462_4: bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattī”ti vacanato yepi akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā
tika-vin05t:1462_5: dve vā tayo vā ekato gahetvā bhuñjanti, tesampi anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1463_1: gilānacatutthanti pañcannaṃ catutthānaṃ vasena vinicchayo veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Idhekacco
tika-vin05t:1463_2: cattāro bhikkhū “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimanteti. Tesu tayo gatā, eko na gato. Upāsako
tika-vin05t:1463_3: “eko, bhante, thero kuhi”nti pucchati. Nāgato upāsakāti. So aññaṃ taṃkhaṇappattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1463_4: kañci “ehi, bhante”ti gharaṃ pavesetvā catunnampi bhattaṃ deti, sabbesaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1463_5: Kasmā? Gaṇapūrakassa animantitattā. Tayo eva hi tattha nimantitā gaṇhiṃsu, tehi gaṇo
tika-vin05t:1463_6: na pūrati, gaṇapūrako ca animantito, tena gaṇo bhijjatīti. Etaṃ animantitacatutthaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1464_0: Piṇḍapātikacatutthe nimantanakāle eko piṇḍapātiko hoti, so nādhivāseti, gamanavelāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1464_1: pana “ehi bhante”ti vutte anadhivāsitattā anāgacchantampi “etha bhikkhaṃ lacchathā”ti
tika-vin05t:1464_2: gahetvā gacchanti, so taṃ gaṇaṃ bhindati, tasmā sabbesaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1465: Anupasampannacatutthe sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ nimantitā honti, sopi gaṇaṃ bhindati.
tika-vin05t:1466: Pattacatutthe eko sayaṃ āgantvā pattaṃ peseti, evampi gaṇo bhijjati, tasmā sabbesaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1467_0: Gilānacatutthe gilānena saddhiṃ nimantitā honti, tattha gilānasseva anāpatti, itaresaṃ
tika-vin05t:1467_1: pana gaṇapūrako hoti. Na hi gilānena gaṇo bhijjati, tasmā tesaṃ āpatti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1467_2: pana avisesena vuttaṃ “samayaladdhako sayameva muccati, sesānaṃ gaṇapūrakattā āpattikaro
tika-vin05t:1467_3: hotī”ti. Tasmā cīvaradānasamayaladdhakādīnampi vasena catukkāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1468_0: Sace pana adhivāsetvā gatesupi catūsu janesu eko paṇḍito bhikkhu “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ gaṇaṃ
