tika-vin05t:1468_1: bhindissāmi, nimantanaṃ sādiyathā”ti vatvā yāgukhajjakāvasāne bhattatthāya pattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1468_2: gaṇhantānaṃ adatvā “ime tāva bhikkhū bhojetvā vissajjetha, ahaṃ pacchā anumodanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1468_3: katvā gamissāmī”ti nisinno, tesu bhutvā gatesu “detha, bhante, patta”nti upāsakena
tika-vin05t:1468_4: pattaṃ gahetvā bhatte dinne bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā gacchati, sabbesaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1468_5: Pañcannañhi bhojanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇabhojane visaṅketaṃ natthi, odanena nimantetvā
tika-vin05t:1468_6: kummāsaṃ gaṇhantāpi āpajjanti, tāni ca tehi ekato na gahitāni, yāguādīhi pana visaṅketaṃ
tika-vin05t:1468_7: hoti, tāni tehi ekato gahitānīti evaṃ eko paṇḍito aññesampi anāpattiṃ karoti. Niccabhattanti
tika-vin05t:1468_8: dhuvabhattaṃ vuccati, “niccabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, bahūnaṃ ekato gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1469_0: 2. “Paramparabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ pana nimantanatoyeva
tika-vin05t:1469_1: pasavati. Yo hi “pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādinā
tika-vin05t:1469_2: nimantito taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarabhojanaṃ bhuñjati, tassetaṃ
tika-vin05t:1469_3: bhojanaṃ “paramparabhojana”nti vuccati. Evaṃ bhuñjantassa ṭhapetvā gilānasamayaṃ
tika-vin05t:1469_4: cīvaradānasamayaṃ cīvarakārasamayañca aññasmiṃ samaye pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā nimantanapaṭipāṭiyāva
tika-vin05t:1470_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vikappetvā paramparabhojanaṃ bhuñjitu”nti vacanato paṭhamanimantanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1470_1: aññassa vikappetvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Ayaṃ vikappanā nāma sammukhāpi parammukhāpi
tika-vin05t:1470_2: vaṭṭati. Sammukhā disvā “mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vā “dammī”ti vā
tika-vin05t:1470_3: vatvā bhuñjitabbaṃ, adisvā pañcasu sahadhammikesu yassa kassaci nāmaṃ gahetvā “mayhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1470_4: bhattapaccāsaṃ itthannāmassa vikappemī”ti vā “dammī”ti vā vatvā bhuñjitabbaṃ. Dve
tika-vin05t:1470_5: tīṇi nimantanāni pana ekasmiṃ patte pakkhipitvā missetvā ekaṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1470_6: “Anāpatti dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Sace dve tīṇi kulāni nimantetvā
tika-vin05t:1470_7: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīdāpetvā ito cito ca āharitvā bhattaṃ ākiranti, sūpabyañjanaṃ ākiranti,
tika-vin05t:1471_0: Sace pana mūlanimantanaṃ heṭṭhā hoti, pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ upari, taṃ uparito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t:1471_1: bhuñjantassa āpatti, hatthaṃ pana anto pavesetvā paṭhamanimantanato ekampi kabaḷaṃ
tika-vin05t:1471_2: uddharitvā bhuttakālato paṭṭhāya yathā tathā vā bhuñjantassa anāpatti. “Sacepi tattha
tika-vin05t:1471_3: khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā ākiranti, yena ajjhotthataṃ bhattaṃ ekarasaṃ hoti, koṭito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t:1471_4: bhuñjantassa anāpattī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “khīrabhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1471_5: vā rasabhattaṃ vā labhitvā nisinnassa tattheva aññepi khīrabhattaṃ vā rasabhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1471_6: vā ākiranti, khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā pivato anāpatti, bhuñjantena paṭhamaṃ laddhamaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:1471_7: vā bhattapiṇḍaṃ vā mukhe pakkhipitvā koṭito paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sappipāyāsepi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin05t:1472_0: Mahāupāsako bhikkhuṃ nimanteti, tassa kulaṃ upagatassa upāsakopi tassa puttadārabhātubhaginiādayopi
tika-vin05t:1472_1: attano attano koṭṭhāsaṃ āharitvā patte pakkhipanti, “upāsakena paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ abhuñjitvā
tika-vin05t:1472_2: pacchā laddhaṃ bhuñjantassa āpattī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1472_3: “vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ “sace pāṭekkaṃ pacanti, attano attano pakkabhattato
tika-vin05t:1472_4: āharitvā denti, tattha pacchā āhaṭaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ. Yadi pana
tika-vin05t:1472_5: sabbesaṃ ekova pāko hoti, paramparabhojanaṃ na hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāupāsako nimantetvā
tika-vin05t:1472_6: nisīdāpeti, añño manusso pattaṃ gaṇhāti, na dātabbaṃ. Kiṃ, bhante, na dethāti. Nanu
tika-vin05t:1472_7: upāsaka tayā nimantitamhāti. “Hotu, bhante, laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjathā”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:1472_8: bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. “Aññena āharitvā bhatte dinne āpucchitvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1473_0: Anumodanaṃ katvā gacchantaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmā “svepi, bhante, āgaccheyyāthā”ti sabbe
tika-vin05t:1473_1: nimantenti, punadivase āgantvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Sabbehi
tika-vin05t:1473_2: nimantitattā. Ekopi bhikkhu piṇḍāya caranto bhattaṃ labhati, tamañño upāsako nimantetvā
tika-vin05t:1473_3: ghare nisīdāpeti, na ca tāva bhattaṃ sampajjati, sace so bhikkhu piṇḍāya caritvā
tika-vin05t:1473_4: laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti. Abhuñjitvā nisinne “kiṃ, bhante, na bhuñjasī”ti vutte
tika-vin05t:1473_5: “tayā nimantitattā”ti vatvā “laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjatha, bhante”ti vutte bhuñjituṃ
tika-vin05t:1473_6: vaṭṭati. Sakalena gāmena ekato hutvā nimantitassa yattha katthaci bhuñjato anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1473_7: Pūgepi eseva nayo. “Anāpatti sakalena gāmena nimantito tasmiṃ gāme yattha katthaci
tika-vin05t:1473_8: bhuñjati, sakalena pūgena nimantito tasmiṃ pūge yattha katthaci bhuñjati, nimantiyamāno
tika-vin05t:1473_9: ‘bhikkhaṃ gahessāmī’ti bhaṇati, niccabhatte salākabhatte pakkhike uposathike pāṭipadike
tika-vin05t:1473_10: pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1474_0: Tattha nimantiyamāno bhikkhaṃ gahessāmīti bhaṇatīti ettha “bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti nimantiyamāno
tika-vin05t:1474_1: “na mayhaṃ tava bhattenattho, bhikkhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vadati, anāpattīti attho. Ettha
tika-vin05t:1474_2: pana mahāpadumatthero āha “evaṃ vadanto imasmiṃ sikkhāpade animantanaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:1474_3: bhuñjanatthāya pana okāso kato hotīti neva gaṇabhojanato, na cārittato muccatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1474_4: Mahāsumatthero āha “yadaggena animantanaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti, tadaggena neva gaṇabhojanaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1476_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1476_1: vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1476_2: samayo cīvaradānasamayo cīvarakārasamayo. Ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti –
tika-vin05t:1477_0: Evamāgataṃ cārittasikkhāpadaṃ vuttaṃ. Iminā hi sikkhāpadena yo pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1477_1: aññatarena “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādinā akappiyanimantanena nimantito, teneva nimantanabhattena
tika-vin05t:1477_2: sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ “ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī”ti vā “cārittaṃ
tika-vin05t:1477_3: āpajjāmī”ti vā īdisena vacanena anāpucchitvā yena bhattena nimantito, taṃ bhutvā
tika-vin05t:1477_4: vā abhutvā vā avītivatteyeva majjhanhike yasmiṃ kule nimantito, tato aññāni kulāni
tika-vin05t:1477_5: paviseyya, tassa vuttalakkhaṇaṃ duvidhampi samayaṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1477_6: Tasmā akappiyanimantanena nimantiyamāno sace “bhikkhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vadati, imināpi
tika-vin05t:1478_0: 3. Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāti ettha pana kittāvatā santo hoti, kittāvatā asanto?
tika-vin05t:1478_1: Antovihāre yattha ṭhitassa kulāni payirupāsanacittaṃ uppannaṃ, tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ
tika-vin05t:1478_2: passe vā abhimukhe vā passati, yassa sakkā hoti pakativacanena ārocetuṃ, ayaṃ santo
tika-vin05t:1478_3: nāma, ito cito ca pariyesitvā ārocanakiccaṃ pana natthi. Yo hi evaṃ pariyesitabbo,
tika-vin05t:1478_4: so asantoyeva. Apica antoupacārasīmāya bhikkhuṃ disvā “āpucchissāmī”ti gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1478_5: Tattha yaṃ passati, so āpucchitabbo. No ce passati, asantaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā paviṭṭho
tika-vin05t:1479_0: Sace pana sambahulā kenaci kammena gāmaṃ pavisanti, “vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:1479_1: sabbehi aññamaññaṃ āpucchitabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ gāme taṃ kammaṃ na sampajjatīti aññaṃ gāmaṃ
tika-vin05t:1479_2: gacchanti, gāmasatampi hotu, puna āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi. Sace pana ussāhaṃ paṭippassambhetvā
tika-vin05t:1479_3: vihāraṃ gacchantā antarā aññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitukāmā honti, puna āpucchitabbameva. Kulaghare
tika-vin05t:1479_4: vā āsanasālāya vā bhattakiccaṃ katvā telabhikkhāya vā sappibhikkhāya vā caritukāmo
tika-vin05t:1479_5: hoti, sace passe bhikkhu atthi, āpucchitvā gantabbaṃ. Asante bhikkhumhi “natthī”ti
tika-vin05t:1479_6: gantabbaṃ, vīthiṃ otaritvā bhikkhuṃ passati, āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi, anāpucchitvāpi
tika-vin05t:1479_7: caritabbameva. Gāmamajjhena maggo hoti, tena gacchantassa “telādibhikkhāya carissāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:1479_8: citte uppanne sace passe bhikkhu atthi, āpucchitvā caritabbaṃ. Maggā anokkamma bhikkhāya
tika-vin05t:1479_9: carantassa pana āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi. Sace sīho vā byaggho vā āgacchati, megho
tika-vin05t:1479_10: vā uṭṭheti, añño vā koci upaddavo uppajjati, evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpucchāpi bahigāmato
tika-vin05t:1480_0: 4. “Na ca, bhikkhave, abhinne sarīre paṃsukūlaṃ gahetabbaṃ, yo gaṇheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1480_1: vacanato abbhuṇhe allasarīre paṃsukūlaṃ na gahetabbaṃ, gaṇhanto dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin05t:1480_2: Upaddavā ca tassa honti, bhinne pana gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1481_0: Kittāvatā pana bhinnaṃ hoti? Kākakulalasoṇasiṅgālādīhi mukhatuṇḍakena vā dāṭhāya
tika-vin05t:1481_1: vā īsakaṃ phālitamattenapi. Yassa pana patato ghaṃsanena chavimattaṃ chinnaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:1481_2: cammaṃ acchinnaṃ, etaṃ abhinnameva, camme pana chinne bhinnaṃ. Yassapi sajīvakāleyeva
tika-vin05t:1481_3: pabhinnā gaṇḍakuṭṭhapīḷakā vā vaṇo vā hoti, idampi bhinnaṃ, tatiyadivasato pabhuti
tika-vin05t:1481_4: uddhumātakādibhāvena kuṇapabhāvaṃ upagatampi bhinnameva. Sabbena sabbaṃ pana abhinnepi
tika-vin05t:1481_5: susānagopakehi vā aññehi vā manussehi gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. No ce aññaṃ labhati, satthakena
tika-vin05t:1481_6: vā kenaci vā vaṇaṃ katvā gahetabbaṃ. Visabhāgasarīre pana satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā samaṇasaññaṃ
tika-vin05t:1481_7: uppādetvā sīse vā hatthapādapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā vaṇaṃ katvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1482_1: acchinnacīvarassa vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:1482_2: viññāpetuṃ. Yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchati, sace tattha hoti saṅghassa vihāracīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:1482_3: vā uttarattharaṇaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā bhisicchavi vā, taṃ gahetvā pārupituṃ ‘labhitvā
tika-vin05t:1482_4: odahissāmī’ti. No ce hoti saṅghassa vihāracīvaraṃ vā uttarattharaṇaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:1482_5: vā bhisicchavi vā, tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbaṃ, na tveva naggena
tika-vin05t:1482_6: āgantabbaṃ, yo āgaccheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato idha vuttanayena paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1483_0: Ayaṃ panettha anupubbakathā. Sace hi core passitvā daharā pattacīvarāni gahetvā palātā,
tika-vin05t:1483_1: corā therānaṃ nivāsanapārupanamattaṃyeva haritvā gacchanti, therehi neva tāva cīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:1483_2: viññāpetabbaṃ, na sākhāpalāsaṃ bhañjitabbaṃ. Atha daharā sabbaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ chaḍḍetvā
tika-vin05t:1483_3: palātā, corā therānañca nivāsanapārupanaṃ tañca bhaṇḍakaṃ haritvā gacchanti, daharehi
tika-vin05t:1483_4: āgantvā attano nivāsanapārupanāni na tāva therānaṃ dātabbāni. Na hi te anacchinnacīvarā
tika-vin05t:1483_5: attano atthāya sākhāpalāsaṃ bhañjituṃ labhanti, acchinnacīvarānaṃ pana atthāya labhanti.
tika-vin05t:1483_6: Acchinnacīvarāva attanopi paresampi atthāya labhanti, tasmā therehi vā sākhāpalāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1483_7: bhañjitvā vākādīhi ganthetvā daharānaṃ dātabbaṃ, daharehi vā therānaṃ atthāya bhañjitvā
tika-vin05t:1483_8: ganthetvā tesaṃ hatthe datvā vā adatvā vā attanā nivāsetvā attano nivāsanapārupanāni
tika-vin05t:1483_9: therānaṃ dātabbāni, neva bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ hoti, na tesaṃ dhāraṇe dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1484_0: Sace antarāmagge rajakattharaṇaṃ vā hoti, aññe vā tādise manusse passanti, cīvaraṃ
tika-vin05t:1484_1: viññāpetabbaṃ. Yāni ca nesaṃ te vā viññattamanussā aññe vā sākhāpalāsanivāsane bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:1484_2: disvā ussāhajātā vatthāni denti, tāni sadasāni vā hontu adasāni vā nīlādinānāvaṇṇāni
tika-vin05t:1484_3: vā, kappiyānipi akappiyānipi sabbānipi acchinnacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā tesaṃ nivāsetuñca
tika-vin05t:1491_0: Ayañhi pañho acchinnacīvarakabhikkhuṃ sandhāya vutto. Atha pana titthiyehi samāgacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1491_1: te ca nesaṃ kusacīravākacīraphalakacīrāni denti, tānipi laddhiṃ aggahetvā nivāsetuṃ
tika-vin05t:1492_0: Yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchanti, tattha vihāracīvarādīsu yaṃ atthi, taṃ anāpucchāpi
tika-vin05t:1492_1: gahetvā nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā labhati. Tañca kho “labhitvā odahissāmi, puna ṭhapessāmī”ti
tika-vin05t:1492_2: adhippāyena, na mūlacchejjāya. Labhitvā ca pana ñātito vā upaṭṭhākato vā aññato vā
tika-vin05t:1492_3: kutoci pākatikameva kātabbaṃ. Videsagatena pana ekasmiṃ saṅghike āvāse saṅghikaparibhogena
tika-vin05t:1492_4: bhuñjanatthāya ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sacassa paribhogeneva taṃ jīrati vā nassati vā, gīvā
tika-vin05t:1492_5: na hoti. Sace pana etesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ gihivatthādīnaṃ bhisicchavipariyantānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1492_6: kiñci na labhati, tena tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbanti.
tika-vin05t:1493_0: 6. “Na, bhikkhave, paṭibhānacittaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ itthirūpakaṃ purisarūpakaṃ, yo kārāpeyya,
tika-vin05t:1493_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato itthipurisarūpaṃ kātuṃ vā kārāpetuṃ vā bhikkhuno na
tika-vin05t:1493_2: vaṭṭati. Na kevalaṃ itthipurisarūpameva, tiracchānarūpampi antamaso gaṇḍuppādarūpaṃ
tika-vin05t:1493_3: bhikkhuno sayaṃ kātuṃ vā “karohī”ti vattuṃ vā na vaṭṭati, “upāsaka dvārapālaṃ karohī”ti
tika-vin05t:1493_4: vattumpi na labhati. Jātakapakaraṇaasadisadānādīni pana pasādanīyāni nibbidāpaṭisaṃyuttāni
tika-vin05t:1493_5: vā vatthūni parehi kārāpetuṃ labhati, mālākammādīni sayampi kātuṃ labhati.
tika-vin05t:1494_0: 7. “Na, bhikkhave, vippakatabhojano bhikkhu vuṭṭhāpetabbo, yo vuṭṭhāpeyya, āpatti
tika-vin05t:1494_1: dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato antaraghare vā vihāre vā araññe vā yattha katthaci bhuñjamāno
tika-vin05t:1494_2: bhikkhu aniṭṭhite bhojane na vuṭṭhāpetabbo, antaraghare pacchā āgatena bhikkhaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin05t:1494_3: gantabbaṃ. Sace manussā vā bhikkhū vā “pavisathā”ti vadanti, “mayi pavisante bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:1494_4: uṭṭhahissantī”ti vattabbaṃ. “Etha, bhante, āsanaṃ atthī”ti vutte pana pavisitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1494_5: Sace koci kiñci na vadati, āsanasālaṃ gantvā atisamīpaṃ agantvā sabhāgaṭṭhāne ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1494_6: Okāse kate “pavisathā”ti vuttena pavisitabbaṃ. Sace pana yaṃ āsanaṃ tassa pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin05t:1494_7: tattha abhuñjanto bhikkhu nisinno hoti, taṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Yāgukhajjakādīsu
tika-vin05t:1494_8: pana yaṃ kiñci pivitvā khāditvā vā yāva añño āgacchati, tāva nisinnaṃ rittahatthampi
tika-vin05t:1494_9: uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Vippakatabhojanoyeva hi so hoti.
tika-vin05t:1495_0: Sace pana āpattiṃ atikkamitvāpi vuṭṭhāpetiyeva, yaṃ so vuṭṭhāpeti, ayañca bhikkhu
tika-vin05t:1495_1: pavārito hoti, tena vattabbo “gaccha udakaṃ āharāhī”ti. Vuḍḍhataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetuṃ
tika-vin05t:1495_2: idameva ekaṭṭhānaṃ. Sace so udakampi na āharati, sādhukaṃ sitthāni gilitvā vuḍḍhassa
tika-vin05t:1496_0: “Sace vuṭṭhāpeti, pavārito ca hoti, ‘gaccha udakaṃ āharā’ti vattabbo. Evañcetaṃ labhetha,
tika-vin05t:1496_1: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce labhetha, sādhukaṃ sitthāni gilitvā vuḍḍhassa āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1496_2: Natvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ‘kenaci pariyāyena vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno āsanaṃ paṭibāhitabba’nti
tika-vin05t:1497_0: 8. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, navakena bhikkhunā uddisantena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ
tika-vin05t:1497_1: uccatare vā dhammagāravena, therena bhikkhunā uddisāpentena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ
tika-vin05t:1497_2: nīcatare vā dhammagāravenā”ti vacanato navakatarena bhikkhunā uddisantena uccatarepi
tika-vin05t:1497_3: āsane nisīdituṃ, vuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā uddisāpentena nīcatarepi āsane nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1498_0: 9. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tivassantarena saha nisīditu”nti vacanato tivassantarena
tika-vin05t:1498_1: bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekāsane nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati. Tivassantaro nāma yo dvīhi vassehi mahantataro
tika-vin05t:1498_2: vā daharataro vā hoti, yo pana ekena vassena mahantataro vā daharataro vā, yo vā
tika-vin05t:1498_3: samānavasso, tattha vattabbameva natthi, ime sabbe ekasmiṃ mañce vā pīṭhe vā dve
tika-vin05t:1498_4: dve hutvā nisīdituṃ labhanti. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, duvaggassa mañcaṃ duvaggassa
tika-vin05t:1499_0: 10. Yaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ pahoti, taṃ saṃhārimaṃ vā hotu asaṃhārimaṃ vā, tathārūpe api
tika-vin05t:1499_1: phalakakhaṇḍe anupasampannenapi saddhiṃ nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1499_2: yaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pahoti, ettakaṃ pacchimaṃ dīghāsana”nti hi vuttaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1499_3: ṭhapetvā paṇḍakaṃ mātugāmaṃ ubhatobyañjanakaṃ asamānāsanikehi saha dīghāsane nisīditu”nti
tika-vin05t:1499_4: vacanato pana dīghāsanepi paṇḍakādīhi saha nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1500_0: 11. Gilānaṃ upaṭṭhahantena “natthi vo, bhikkhave, mātā, natthi pitā, ye vo upaṭṭhaheyyuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1500_1: tumhe ce, bhikkhave, aññamaññaṃ na upaṭṭhahissatha, atha ko carahi upaṭṭhahissati.
tika-vin05t:1500_2: Yo, bhikkhave, maṃ upaṭṭhaheyya, so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā”ti imaṃ bhagavato anusāsaniṃ
tika-vin05t:1501_0: Sace upajjhāyo hoti, upajjhāyena yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo, vuṭṭhānamassa āgametabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1501_1: Sace ācariyo hoti, ācariyena yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo, vuṭṭhānamassa āgametabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin05t:1501_2: saddhivihāriko hoti, saddhivihārikena yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo, vuṭṭhānamassa āgametabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1501_3: Sace antevāsiko hoti, antevāsikena yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo, vuṭṭhānamassa āgametabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1501_4: Sace samānupajjhāyako hoti, samānupajjhāyakena yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo, vuṭṭhānamassa
tika-vin05t:1501_5: āgametabbaṃ. Sace samānācariyako hoti, samānācariyakena yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo, vuṭṭhānamassa
tika-vin05t:1501_6: āgametabbaṃ. Sace na hoti upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā saddhivihāriko vā antevāsiko vā
tika-vin05t:1501_7: samānupajjhāyako vā samānācariyako vā, saṅghena upaṭṭhātabbo. No ce upaṭṭhaheyya,
tika-vin05t:1502_0: Vacanato yassa te upajjhāyādayo tasmiṃ vihāre natthi, āgantuko hoti ekacārikabhikkhu,
tika-vin05t:1502_1: saṅghassa bhāro, tasmā saṅghena upaṭṭhātabbo. No ce upaṭṭhaheyya, sakalassa saṅghassa
tika-vin05t:1502_2: āpatti. Vāraṃ ṭhapetvā jaggantesu pana yo attano vāre na jaggati, tasseva āpatti,
tika-vin05t:1502_3: saṅghattheropi vārato na muccati. Sace sakalo saṅgho ekassa bhāraṃ karoti, eko vā
tika-vin05t:1502_4: vattasampanno bhikkhu “ahameva jaggissāmī”ti jaggati, saṅgho āpattito muccati.
tika-vin05t:1504_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gilāno dūpaṭṭho hoti. Asappāyakārī hoti,
tika-vin05t:1504_1: sappāye mattaṃ na jānāti, bhesajjaṃ na paṭisevitā hoti, atthakāmassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa
tika-vin05t:1504_2: yathābhūtaṃ ābādhaṃ nāvikattā hoti ‘abhikkamantaṃ vā abhikkamatīti, paṭikkamantaṃ
tika-vin05t:1504_3: vā paṭikkamatīti, ṭhitaṃ vā ṭhito’ti, uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1504_4: tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ anadhivāsakajātiko hotī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1505: Evaṃ vuttāni pañca ayuttaṅgāni ārakā parivajjetvā –
tika-vin05t:1506_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gilāno sūpaṭṭho hoti. Sappāyakārī hoti, sappāye
tika-vin05t:1506_1: mattaṃ jānāti, bhesajjaṃ paṭisevitā hoti, atthakāmassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin05t:1506_2: ābādhaṃ āvikattā hoti ‘abhikkamantaṃ vā abhikkamatīti, paṭikkamantaṃ vā paṭikkamatīti,
tika-vin05t:1506_3: ṭhitaṃ vā ṭhito’ti, uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1506_4: kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ adhivāsakajātiko hotī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1509_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko nālaṃ gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-vin05t:1509_1: Na paṭibalo hoti bhesajjaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ, sappāyāsappāyaṃ na jānāti, asappāyaṃ upanāmeti,
tika-vin05t:1509_2: sappāyaṃ apanāmeti, āmisantaro gilānaṃ upaṭṭhāti, no mettacitto, jegucchī hoti uccāraṃ
tika-vin05t:1509_3: vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā vantaṃ vā nīhātuṃ, na paṭibalo hoti gilānaṃ kālena kālaṃ
tika-vin05t:1509_4: dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṃ samādapetuṃ samuttejetuṃ sampahaṃsetu”nti –
tika-vin05t:1510: Evaṃ vuttāni pañca ayuttaṅgāni ārakā parivajjetvā –
tika-vin05t:1511_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko alaṃ gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ. Paṭibalo
tika-vin05t:1511_1: hoti bhesajjaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ, sappāyāsappāyaṃ jānāti, asappāyaṃ apanāmeti, sappāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1511_2: upanāmeti, mettacitto gilānaṃ upaṭṭhāti, no āmisantaro, ajegucchī hoti uccāraṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1511_3: passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā vantaṃ vā nīhātuṃ, paṭibalo hoti gilānaṃ kālena kālaṃ dhammiyā
tika-vin05t:1513_0: 12. Dhammiṃ kathaṃ karontena ca “sīlavā hi tvaṃ katakusalo, kasmā mīyamāno bhāyasi,
tika-vin05t:1513_1: nanu sīlavato saggo nāma maraṇamattapaṭibaddhoyevā”ti evaṃ gilānassa bhikkhuno maraṇavaṇṇo
tika-vin05t:1513_2: na saṃvaṇṇetabbo. Sace hi tassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ sutvā āhārupacchedādinā upakkamena ekajavanavārāvasesepi
tika-vin05t:1513_3: āyusmiṃ antarā kālaṃ karoti, imināva mārito hoti. Paṇḍitena pana bhikkhunā iminā
tika-vin05t:1513_4: nayena anusiṭṭhi dātabbā “sīlavato nāma anacchariyā maggaphaluppatti, tasmā vihārādīsu
tika-vin05t:1513_5: āsattiṃ akatvā buddhagataṃ dhammagataṃ saṅghagataṃ kāyagatañca satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t:1513_6: manasikāre appamādo kātabbo”ti. Maraṇavaṇṇepi saṃvaṇṇite so tāya saṃvaṇṇanāya kañci
tika-vin05t:1513_7: upakkamaṃ akatvā attano dhammatāya yathāyunā yathānusandhināva marati, tappaccayā
tika-vin05t:1514_0: 13. “Na ca, bhikkhave, attānaṃ pātetabbaṃ, yo pāteyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1514_1: gilānena bhikkhunāpi yena kenaci upakkamena antamaso āhārupacchedanenapi attā na
tika-vin05t:1514_2: māretabbo. Yopi gilāno vijjamāne bhesajje ca upaṭṭhākesu ca maritukāmo āhāraṃ upacchindati,
tika-vin05t:1514_3: dukkaṭameva. Yassa pana mahāābādho cirānubandho, bhikkhū upaṭṭhahantā kilamanti jigucchanti,
tika-vin05t:1514_4: “kadā nu kho gilānato muccissāmā”ti aṭṭīyanti. Sace so “ayaṃ attabhāvo paṭijaggiyamānopi
tika-vin05t:1514_5: na tiṭṭhati, bhikkhū ca kilamantī”ti āhāraṃ upacchindati, bhesajjaṃ na sevati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1514_6: Yo pana “ayaṃ rogo kharo, āyusaṅkhārā na tiṭṭhanti, ayañca me visesādhigamo hatthappatto
tika-vin05t:1514_7: viya dissatī”ti upacchindati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Agilānassapi uppannasaṃvegassa “āhārapariyesanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1514_8: nāma papañco, kammaṭṭhānameva anuyuñjissāmī”ti kammaṭṭhānasīsena upacchindantassa
tika-vin05t:1514_9: vaṭṭati. Visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvā āhāraṃ upacchindati, na vaṭṭati. Sabhāgānañhi
tika-vin05t:1515_0: 14. “Na ca, bhikkhave, appaṭivekkhitvā āsane nisīditabbaṃ, yo nisīdeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1515_1: vacanato āsanaṃ anupaparikkhitvā na nisīditabbaṃ. Kīdisaṃ pana āsanaṃ upaparikkhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1515_2: kīdisaṃ na upaparikkhitabbaṃ? Yaṃ suddhaṃ āsanameva hoti apaccattharaṇakaṃ, yañca
tika-vin05t:1515_3: āgantvā ṭhitānaṃ passataṃyeva attharīyati, taṃ na paccavekkhitabbaṃ, nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1515_4: Yampi manussā sayaṃ hatthena akkamitvā “idha bhante nisīdathā”ti denti, tasmimpi
tika-vin05t:1515_5: vaṭṭati. Sacepi paṭhamameva āgantvāpi nisinnā pacchā uddhaṃ vā adho vā saṅkamanti,
tika-vin05t:1515_6: paṭivekkhaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Yampi tanukena vatthena yathā talaṃ dissati, evaṃ paṭicchannaṃ
tika-vin05t:1515_7: hoti, tasmimpi paṭivekkhaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Yaṃ pana paṭikacceva pāvārakojavādīhi atthataṃ
tika-vin05t:1515_8: hoti, taṃ hatthena parāmasitvā sallakkhetvā nisīditabbaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “ghanasāṭakenapi
tika-vin05t:1515_9: atthate yasmiṃ vali na paññāyati, taṃ na paṭivekkhitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1516_0: 15. “Na, bhikkhave, davāya silā paṭivijjhitabbā, yo paṭivijjheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1516_1: vacanato hasādhippāyena pāsāṇo na pavaṭṭetabbo. Na kevalañca pāsāṇo, aññampi yaṃ
tika-vin05t:1516_2: kiñci dārukhaṇḍaṃ vā iṭṭhakakhaṇḍaṃ vā hatthena vā yantena vā paṭivijjhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1516_3: Cetiyādīnaṃ atthāya pāsāṇādayo hasantā hasantā pavaṭṭentipi khipantipi ukkhipantipi,
tika-vin05t:1516_4: “kammasamayo”ti vaṭṭati, aññampi īdisaṃ navakammaṃ vā karontā bhaṇḍakaṃ vā dhovantā
tika-vin05t:1516_5: rukkhaṃ vā dhovanadaṇḍakaṃ vā ukkhipitvā paṭivijjhanti, vaṭṭati, bhattavissaggakālādīsu
tika-vin05t:1516_6: kāke vā soṇe vā kaṭṭhaṃ vā kathalaṃ vā khipitvā palāpenti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1517_0: 16. “Na, bhikkhave, dāyo ālimpitabbo, yo ālimpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1517_1: vane aggi na dātabbo. Sace pana “etthantare yo koci satto maratū”ti aggiṃ deti, pārājikānantariyathullaccayapācittiyavatthūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1517_2: anurūpato pārājikādīni akusalarāsi ca hoti. “Allatiṇavanappatayo ḍayhantū”ti aggiṃ
tika-vin05t:1517_3: dentassa pācittiyaṃ, “dabbūpakaraṇāni vinassantū”ti aggiṃ dentassa dukkaṭaṃ. “Khiḍḍādhippāyenapi
tika-vin05t:1517_4: dukkaṭa”nti saṅkhepaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Yaṃ kiñci allasukkhaṃ saindriyānindriyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1517_5: ḍayhatū”ti aggiṃ dentassa vatthuvasena pārājikathullaccayapācittiyadukkaṭāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1518_0: Paṭaggidānaṃ pana parittakaraṇañca bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, tasmā araññe vanakammikehi
tika-vin05t:1518_1: vā dinnaṃ sayaṃ vā uṭṭhitaṃ aggiṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “tiṇakuṭiyo mā vinassantū”ti
tika-vin05t:1518_2: tassa aggino paṭiaggiṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati, yena saddhiṃ āgacchanto aggi ekato hutvā nirupādāno
tika-vin05t:1518_3: nibbāti. “Parittampi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tiṇakuṭikānaṃ samantā bhūmitacchanaṃ parikhākhaṇanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1518_4: vā, yathā āgato aggi upādānaṃ alabhitvā nibbāti, etañca sabbaṃ uṭṭhiteyeva aggismiṃ
tika-vin05t:1518_5: asati anupasampanne sayampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Anuṭṭhite pana anupasampannehi kappiyavohārena
tika-vin05t:1518_6: kāretabbaṃ, udakena pana nibbāpentehi appāṇakameva udakaṃ āsiñcitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1519_0: 17. Assaddhesu micchādiṭṭhikulesu sakkaccaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ labhitvā anupaparikkhitvā
tika-vin05t:1519_1: neva attanā paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na paresaṃ dātabbaṃ. Visamissampi hi tāni kulāni piṇḍapātaṃ
tika-vin05t:1519_2: denti. Yampi ābhidosikaṃ bhattaṃ vā khajjakaṃ vā tato labhati, tampi na paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1519_3: Apihitavatthumpi hi sappavicchikādīhi adhisayitaṃ chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ tāni kulāni denti.
tika-vin05t:1519_4: Gandhahaliddādimakkhitopi tato piṇḍapāto na gahetabbo. Sarīre rogaṭṭhānāni puñchitvā
tika-vin05t:1520_0: 18. “Anāpatti, bhikkhave, gopakassa dāne”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha kataraṃ gopakadānaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1520_1: kataraṃ na vaṭṭati? Mahāsumatthero tāva āha “yaṃ gopakassa paricchinditvā dinnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1520_2: hoti ‘ettakaṃ divase divase gaṇhā’ti, tadeva vaṭṭati, tato uttari na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1520_3: Mahāpadumatthero panāha “kiṃ gopakānaṃ paṇṇaṃ āropetvā nimittasaññaṃ vā katvā dinnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1520_4: atthi, etesaṃ hatthe vissaṭṭhakassa ete issarā, tasmā yaṃ denti, taṃ bahukampi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1520_5: Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “manussānaṃ ārāmaṃ vā aññaṃ vā phalāphalaṃ dārakā
tika-vin05t:1520_6: rakkhanti, tehi dinnaṃ vaṭṭati, āharāpetvā pana na gahetabbaṃ. Saṅghike pana cetiyassa
tika-vin05t:1520_7: santake ca keṇiyā gahetvā rakkhantasseva dānaṃ vaṭṭati, vetanena rakkhantassa attano
tika-vin05t:1520_8: bhāgamattaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “yaṃ gihīnaṃ ārāmarakkhakā bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1520_9: denti, etampi vaṭṭati. Bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmagopakā yaṃ attano bhatiyā khaṇḍitvā
tika-vin05t:1520_10: denti, etaṃ vaṭṭati. Yopi upaḍḍhārāmaṃ vā kecideva rukkhe vā bhatiṃ labhitvā rakkhati,
tika-vin05t:1520_11: tassapi attano sampattarukkhatoyeva dātuṃ vaṭṭati, keṇiyā gahetvā rakkhantassa pana
tika-vin05t:1520_12: sabbampi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Etaṃ pana sabbaṃ byañjanato nānaṃ, atthato ekameva, tasmā
tika-vin05t:1521_0: Apicettha ayampi vinicchayo veditabbo – yattha āvāsikā āgantukānaṃ na denti, phalavāre
tika-vin05t:1521_1: ca sampatte aññesaṃ abhāvaṃ disvā corikāya attanāva khādanti, tattha āgantukehi ghaṇṭiṃ
tika-vin05t:1521_2: paharitvā bhājetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Yattha pana āvāsikā rukkhe rakkhitvā phalavāre
tika-vin05t:1521_3: sampatte bhājetvā khādanti, catūsu paccayesu sammā upanenti, anissarā tattha āgantukā.
tika-vin05t:1521_4: Yepi rukkhā cīvaratthāya niyametvā dinnā, tesupi āgantukā anissarā. Esa nayo sesapaccayatthāya
tika-vin05t:1521_5: niyametvā dinnepi. Ye pana tathā aniyametvā āvāsikā ca te rakkhitvā gopetvā corikāya
tika-vin05t:1521_6: paribhuñjanti, na tesu āvāsikānaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbaṃ. Ye phalaparibhogatthāya dinnā,
tika-vin05t:1521_7: āvāsikā ca ne rakkhitvā gopetvā sammā upanenti, tesuyeva tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1521_8: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ niyametvā dinnaṃ theyyacittena paribhuñjanto
tika-vin05t:1521_9: bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabbo, paribhogavasena bhājetvā paribhuñjantassa bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1521_10: Yaṃ panettha senāsanatthāya niyamitaṃ, taṃ paribhogavaseneva bhājetvā paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin05t:1522_0: Odissa cīvaratthāya dinnaṃ cīvareyeva upanetabbaṃ. Sace dubbhikkhaṃ hoti, bhikkhū
tika-vin05t:1522_1: piṇḍapātena kilamanti, cīvaraṃ pana sulabhaṃ, saṅghasuṭṭhutāya apalokanakammaṃ katvā
tika-vin05t:1522_2: piṇḍapātepi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Senāsanena gilānapaccayena vā kilamantesu saṅghasuṭṭhutāya
tika-vin05t:1522_3: apalokanakammaṃ katvā tadatthāyapi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Odissa piṇḍapātatthāya ca gilānapaccayatthāya
tika-vin05t:1522_4: ca dinnepi eseva nayo. Odissa senāsanatthāya dinnaṃ pana garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, taṃ rakkhitvā
tika-vin05t:1522_5: gopetvā tadatthameva upanetabbaṃ. Sace pana dubbhikkhaṃ hoti, bhikkhū piṇḍapātena
tika-vin05t:1522_6: na yāpenti, ettha rājarogacorabhayādīhi aññattha gacchantānaṃ vihārā palujjanti,
tika-vin05t:1522_7: tālanāḷikerādike vināsenti, senāsanapaccayaṃ pana nissāya yāpetuṃ sakkā hoti, evarūpe
tika-vin05t:1522_8: kāle senāsanaṃ vissajjetvāpi senāsanajagganatthāya paribhogo bhagavatā anuññāto.
tika-vin05t:1522_9: Tasmā ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvā itarāni lāmakakoṭiyā piṇḍapātatthāya
tika-vin05t:1522_10: vissajjetuṃ vaṭṭanti, mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana katvā na upanetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1523_0: Yo pana ārāmo catupaccayatthāya niyametvā dinno, tattha apalokanakammaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1523_1: Yena paccayena pana ūnaṃ, tadatthaṃ upanetuṃ vaṭṭati, ārāmo paṭijaggitabbo, vetanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1523_2: datvāpi jaggāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ye pana vetanaṃ labhitvā ārāmeyeva gehaṃ katvā vasantā
tika-vin05t:1523_3: rakkhanti, te ce āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nāḷikeraṃ vā tālapakkaṃ vā denti, yaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin05t:1523_4: saṅghena anuññātaṃ hoti “divase divase ettakaṃ nāma khādathā”ti, tadeva te dātuṃ
tika-vin05t:1523_5: labhanti, tato uttari tesaṃ dentānampi gahetuṃ na vaṭṭanti. Yo pana ārāmaṃ keṇiyā
tika-vin05t:1523_6: gahetvā saṅghassa catupaccayatthāya kappiyabhaṇḍameva deti, ayaṃ bahukampi dātuṃ
tika-vin05t:1523_7: labhati. Cetiyassa padīpatthāya vā khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇatthāya vā dinnaārāmopi
tika-vin05t:1523_8: jaggitabbo, vetanaṃ datvāpi jaggāpetabbo. Vetanañca panettha cetiyasantakampi saṅghasantakampi
tika-vin05t:1523_9: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Etampi ārāmaṃ vetanena tattheva vasitvā rakkhantānañca keṇiyā gahetvā
tika-vin05t:1524_0: 19. Dhammikarakkhaṃ yācantena atītaṃ anāgataṃ vā ārabbha odissa ācikkhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1524_1: Atītañhi ārabbha atthi odissa ācikkhanā, atthi anodissa ācikkhanā, anāgataṃ ārabbhapi
tika-vin05t:1524_2: atthi odissa ācikkhanā, atthi anodissa ācikkhanā. Kathaṃ atītaṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā
tika-vin05t:1524_3: hoti? Bhikkhūnaṃ vihāre gāmadārakā vā dhuttādayo vā ye keci anācāraṃ ācaranti, rukkhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1524_4: vā chindanti, phalāphalaṃ vā haranti, parikkhāre vā acchindanti, bhikkhu vohārike
tika-vin05t:1524_5: upasaṅkamitvā “amhākaṃ vihāre idaṃ nāma kata”nti vadati. “Kenā”ti vutte “asukena
tika-vin05t:1524_6: ca asukena cā”ti ācikkhati. Evaṃ atītaṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti, sā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1524_7: Tañce sutvā te vohārikā tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbaṃ bhikkhussa gīvā hoti, “daṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:1524_8: gaṇhissantī”ti adhippāyepi sati gīvāyeva hoti. Sace pana “tassa daṇḍaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin05t:1524_9: vadati, pañcamāsakamatte gahite pārājikaṃ hoti. “Kenā”ti vutte pana “asukenāti vattuṃ
tika-vin05t:1524_10: amhākaṃ na vaṭṭati, tumheyeva jānissatha. Kevalañhi mayaṃ rakkhaṃ yācāma, taṃ no
tika-vin05t:1524_11: detha, avahaṭabhaṇḍañca āharāpethā”ti vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ anodissa ācikkhanā hoti, sā
tika-vin05t:1524_12: vaṭṭati. Evaṃ vutte sacepi te vohārikā kārake gavesitvā tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbasāpateyyepi
tika-vin05t:1524_13: gahite bhikkhuno neva gīvā, na āpatti. Parikkhāraṃ harante disvā tesaṃ anatthakāmatāya
tika-vin05t:1524_14: “coro coro”ti vattumpi na vaṭṭati. Evaṃ vuttepi hi yaṃ tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:1524_15: bhikkhuno gīvā hoti. Attano vacanakaraṃ pana “iminā me parikkhāro gahito, taṃ āharāpehi,
tika-vin05t:1524_16: mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karohī”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Dāsadāsīvāpiādīnampi atthāya aḍḍaṃ karonti
tika-vin05t:1525_0: Kathaṃ anāgataṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti? Vuttanayeneva parehi anācārādīsu katesu
tika-vin05t:1525_1: bhikkhu vohārike evaṃ vadati “amhākaṃ vihāre idañcidañca karonti, rakkhaṃ no detha
tika-vin05t:1525_2: āyatiṃ akaraṇatthāyā”ti. “Kena evaṃ kata”nti vutte ca “asukena ca asukena cā”ti ācikkhati.
tika-vin05t:1525_3: Evaṃ anāgataṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti, sāpi na vaṭṭati. Tesañhi daṇḍe kate
tika-vin05t:1525_4: purimanayeneva sabbaṃ bhikkhussa gīvā, sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Sace vohārikā “bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1525_5: vihāre evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ karontānaṃ imaṃ nāma daṇḍaṃ karomā”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā āṇāya
tika-vin05t:1525_6: atiṭṭhamāne pariyesitvā daṇḍaṃ karonti, bhikkhuno neva gīvā, na āpatti. Vihārasīmāya
tika-vin05t:1525_7: rukkhādīni chindantānaṃ vāsipharasuādīni gahetvā pāsāṇehi koṭṭenti, na vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin05t:1525_8: dhārā bhijjati, kārāpetvā dātabbā. Upadhāvitvā tesaṃ parikkhāre gaṇhanti, tampi na
tika-vin05t:1525_9: kātabbaṃ. Lahuparivattañhi cittaṃ, theyyacetanāya uppannāya mūlacchejjampi gaccheyya.
tika-vin05t:1526_0: 20. Uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍetuṃ
tika-vin05t:1526_1: vā chaḍḍāpetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati. Cattāripi vatthūni ekapayogena chaḍḍentassa ekameva
tika-vin05t:1526_2: dukkaṭaṃ, pāṭekkaṃ chaḍḍentassa vatthugaṇanāya dukkaṭāni. Āṇattiyampi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:1526_3: Dantakaṭṭhachaḍḍanepi dukkaṭameva. Oloketvā vā avalañje vā uccārādīni chaḍḍentassa
tika-vin05t:1526_4: anāpatti. Yampi manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ropimaṃ khettaṃ hotu nāḷikerādiārāmo
tika-vin05t:1526_5: vā, tatthāpi yattha katthaci ropimaharitaṭṭhāne etāni vatthūni chaḍḍetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1526_6: Chaḍḍentassa purimanayeneva āpattibhedo veditabbo. Khette vā ārāme vā nisīditvā bhuñjamāno
tika-vin05t:1526_7: ucchuādīni vā khādamāno gacchanto ucchiṭṭhodakacalakādīni haritaṭṭhāne chaḍḍeti,
tika-vin05t:1526_8: antamaso udakaṃ pivitvā matthakacchinnanāḷikerampi chaḍḍeti, dukkaṭaṃ. Kasitaṭṭhāne
tika-vin05t:1526_9: nikkhittabīje aṅkure uṭṭhitepi avuṭṭhitepi dukkaṭameva. Anikkhittabījesu pana khettakoṇādīsu
tika-vin05t:1526_10: vā asañjātaropimesu khettamariyādādīsu vā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati, manussānaṃ kacavarachaḍḍanaṭṭhānepi
tika-vin05t:1526_11: vaṭṭati. Manussesu sassaṃ uddharitvā gatesu chaḍḍitakhettaṃ nāma hoti, tattha vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1526_12: Yattha pana “lāyitampi pubbaṇṇādi puna uṭṭhahissatī”ti rakkhanti, tattha na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1527_0: 21. “Na, bhikkhave, nahāyamānena bhikkhunā rukkhe kāyo ugghaṃsetabbo, yo ugghaṃseyya,
tika-vin05t:1527_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato nahāyantena rukkhe vā nahānatitthe nikhanitvā ṭhapitatthambhe
tika-vin05t:1527_2: vā iṭṭhakasilādārukuṭṭānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ kuṭṭe vā kāyo na ghaṃsetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1528_0: “Na, bhikkhave, aṭṭāne nahāyitabbaṃ, yo nahāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1528_1: aṭṭānepi nahāyituṃ na vaṭṭati. Aṭṭānaṃ nāma rukkhaṃ phalakaṃ viya tacchetvā aṭṭhapadākārena
tika-vin05t:1528_2: rājiyo chinditvā nahānatitthe nikhananti, tattha cuṇṇāni ākiritvā manussā kāyaṃ ghaṃsanti.
tika-vin05t:1529_0: “Na, bhikkhave, gandhabbahatthakena nahāyitabbaṃ, yo nahāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1529_1: vacanato nahānatitthe ṭhapitena dārumayahatthena cuṇṇāni gahetvā manussā sarīraṃ
tika-vin05t:1530_0: “Na, bhikkhave, kuruvindakasuttiyā nahāyitabbaṃ, yo nahāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1530_1: vacanato kuruvindakasuttiyāpi nahāyituṃ na vaṭṭati. Kuruvindakasutti nāma kuruvindakapāsāṇacuṇṇāni
tika-vin05t:1530_2: lākhāya bandhitvā kataguḷikakalāpako vuccati, yaṃ ubhosu antesu gahetvā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti.
tika-vin05t:1531: “Na, bhikkhave, viggayha parikammaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ, yo kārāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato aññamaññaṃ sarīrena ghaṃsituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1532_0: “Na, bhikkhave, mallakena nahāyitabbaṃ, yo nahāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1532_1: bhikkhave, gilānassa akatamallaka”nti vacanato makaradaṇḍake chinditvā mallakamūlasaṇṭhānena
tika-vin05t:1532_2: kataṃ “mallaka”nti vuccati, idaṃ gilānassapi na vaṭṭati. Akatamallakaṃ nāma dante
tika-vin05t:1532_3: acchinditvā kataṃ, idaṃ agilānassa na vaṭṭati, iṭṭhakakhaṇḍaṃ pana kapālakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1533_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ukkāsikaṃ puthupāṇika”nti vacanato ukkāsikaṃ puthupāṇikañca
tika-vin05t:1533_1: vaṭṭati. Ukkāsikaṃ nāma vatthavaṭṭi, tasmā nahāyantassa yassa kassaci nahānasāṭakavaṭṭiyā
tika-vin05t:1533_2: piṭṭhiṃ ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭati. Puthupāṇikanti hatthaparikammaṃ vuccati, tasmā sabbesaṃ
tika-vin05t:1534_0: Idaṃ panettha nahānavattaṃ – udakatitthaṃ gantvā yattha vā tattha vā cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:1534_1: vegena ṭhitakeneva na otaritabbaṃ, sabbadisā pana oloketvā vivittabhāvaṃ ñatvā khāṇugumbalatādīni
tika-vin05t:1534_2: vavatthapetvā tikkhattuṃ ukkāsitvā avakujja ṭhitena uttarāsaṅgacīvaraṃ apanetvā pasāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1534_3: kāyabandhanaṃ mocetvā cīvarapiṭṭheyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace udakasāṭikā natthi, udakante
tika-vin05t:1534_4: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ mocetvā sace ninnaṭṭhānaṃ atthi, ātape pasāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1534_5: No ce atthi, saṃharitvā ṭhapetabbaṃ. Otarantena saṇikaṃ nābhippamāṇamattaṃ otaritvā
tika-vin05t:1534_6: vīciṃ anuṭṭhapentena saddaṃ akarontena nivattitvā āgatadisābhimukhena nimujjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1534_7: evaṃ cīvaraṃ rakkhitaṃ hoti. Ummujjantenapi saddaṃ akarontena saṇikaṃ ummujjitvā
tika-vin05t:1534_8: nahānapariyosāne udakante ukkuṭikena nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ parikkhipitvā uṭṭhāya suparimaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin05t:1534_9: nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvāva ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1535_0: 22. “Na, bhikkhave, vallikā dhāretabbā… na pāmaṅgo dhāretabbo… na kaṇṭhasuttakaṃ
tika-vin05t:1535_1: dhāretabbaṃ… na kaṭisuttakaṃ dhāretabbaṃ… na ovaṭṭikaṃ dhāretabbaṃ… na kāyūraṃ dhāretabbaṃ…
tika-vin05t:1535_2: na hatthābharaṇaṃ dhāretabbaṃ… na aṅgulimuddikā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1535_3: vacanato kaṇṇapiḷandhanādi yaṃ kiñci ābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tattha vallikāti kaṇṇato
tika-vin05t:1535_4: nikkhantamuttolambakādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Na kevalañca vallikā eva, yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin05t:1535_5: kaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ antamaso tālapaṇṇampi na vaṭṭati. Pāmaṅganti yaṃ kiñci palambakasuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1535_6: Kaṇṭhasuttakanti yaṃ kiñci gīvūpagaṃ ābharaṇaṃ. Kaṭisuttakanti yaṃ kiñci kaṭipiḷandhanaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1535_7: antamaso suttatantumattampi. Ovaṭṭikanti valayaṃ. Kāyūrādīni pākaṭāneva.
tika-vin05t:1536_0: 23. “Na, bhikkhave, dīghā kesā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1536_1: bhikkhave, dvemāsikaṃ vā duvaṅgulaṃ vā”ti vacanato sace kesā antodvemāse dvaṅgulaṃ
tika-vin05t:1536_2: pāpuṇanti, antodvemāseyeva chinditabbā, dvaṅgulehi atikkāmetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sacepi
tika-vin05t:1536_3: na dīghā, dvemāsato ekadivasampi atikkāmetuṃ na labhatiyeva. Ubhayathāpi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedova
tika-vin05t:1536_4: vutto, tato oraṃ pana na vaṭṭanabhāvo nāma natthi.
tika-vin05t:1537_0: “Na, bhikkhave, kattarikāya kesā chedāpetabbā, yo chedāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin05t:1537_1: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ābādhapaccayā kattarikāya kese chedāpetu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1537_2: vinā kattarikāya kese chedāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1538_0: “Na, bhikkhave, kocchena kesā osaṇṭhetabbā… na phaṇakena kesā osaṇṭhetabbā… na hatthaphaṇakena
tika-vin05t:1538_1: kesā osaṇṭhetabbā… na sitthatelakena kesā osaṇṭhetabbā… na udakatelakena kesā osaṇṭhetabbā,
tika-vin05t:1538_2: yo osaṇṭheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato maṇḍanatthāya kocchādīhi kesā na osaṇṭhetabbā,
tika-vin05t:1538_3: uddhalomena pana anulomanipātanatthaṃ hatthaṃ temetvā sīsaṃ puñchitabbaṃ, uṇhābhitattarajasirānampi
tika-vin05t:1539_0: 24. “Na, bhikkhave, ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ oloketabbaṃ, yo olokeyya,
tika-vin05t:1539_1: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ābādhapaccayā ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ
tika-vin05t:1539_2: oloketu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ vinā ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhaṃ na oloketabbaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin05t:1539_3: ca kaṃsapattādīnipi yesu mukhanimittaṃ paññāyati, sabbāni ādāsasaṅkhameva gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1539_4: kañjiyādīnipi ca udakapattasaṅkhameva. Tasmā yattha katthaci olokentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1539_5: Ābādhapaccayā pana “sañchavi nu kho me vaṇo, udāhu na tāvā”ti jānanatthaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1539_6: “jiṇṇo nu khomhi, no”ti evaṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokanatthampi vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1540_0: “Na, bhikkhave, mukhaṃ ālimpitabbaṃ… na mukhaṃ ummadditabbaṃ… na mukhaṃ cuṇṇetabbaṃ…
tika-vin05t:1540_1: na manosilikāya mukhaṃ lañchetabbaṃ… na aṅgarāgo kātabbo… na mukharāgo kātabbo… na
tika-vin05t:1540_2: aṅgarāgamukharāgo kātabbo, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ābādhapaccayā
tika-vin05t:1540_3: mukhaṃ ālimpitu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ vinā mukhavilimpanādi na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1541_0: 25. “Na, bhikkhave, naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gantabbaṃ, yo gaccheyya,
tika-vin05t:1541_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato naccādiṃ dassanāya na gantabbaṃ. Ettha ca naccanti
tika-vin05t:1541_2: naṭādayo vā naccantu soṇḍā vā antamaso morasūvamakkaṭādayopi, sabbametaṃ naccameva,
tika-vin05t:1541_3: tasmā antamaso moranaccampi dassanāya gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sayampi naccantassa
tika-vin05t:1541_4: vā naccāpentassa vā dukkaṭameva. Gītanti naṭādīnaṃ vā gītaṃ hotu ariyānaṃ parinibbānakāle
tika-vin05t:1541_6: vā antamaso dantagītampi, “yaṃ gāyissāmā”ti pubbabhāge okūjantā karonti, sabbametaṃ
tika-vin05t:1542_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyantassa. Attanāpi tasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:1542_1: sare sārajjati, parepi tasmiṃ sare sārajjanti, gahapatikāpi ujjhāyanti, sarakuttimpi
tika-vin05t:1542_2: nikāmayamānassa samādhissa bhaṅgo hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati. Ime
tika-vin05t:1542_3: kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyantassa. Na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1542_4: āyatakena gītassarena dhammo gāyitabbo, yo gāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1543: Vacanato āyatakena gītassarena dhammopi na gāyitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1544_0: Āyatako nāma gītassaro taṃ taṃ vattaṃ bhinditvā akkharāni vināsetvā pavatto. Dhamme
tika-vin05t:1544_1: pana suttantavattaṃ nāma atthi, jātakavattaṃ nāma atthi, gāthāvattaṃ nāma atthi,
tika-vin05t:1544_2: taṃ vināsetvā atidīghaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, caturassena vattena parimaṇḍalāni padabyañjanāni
tika-vin05t:1544_3: dassetabbāni. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sarabhañña”nti vacanato pana sarena dhammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1544_4: bhaṇituṃ vaṭṭati. Sarabhaññe kira taraṅgavattadhotakavattagalitavattādīni dvattiṃsa
tika-vin05t:1544_5: vattāni atthi, tesu yaṃ icchati, taṃ kātuṃ labhati. Sabbesaṃ padabyañjanaṃ avināsetvā
tika-vin05t:1544_6: vikāraṃ akatvā samaṇasāruppena caturassena nayena pavattanaṃyeva lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1545_0: Vāditaṃ nāma tantibaddhādivādanīyabhaṇḍaṃ vāditaṃ vā hotu kuṭabherivāditaṃ vā antamaso
tika-vin05t:1545_1: udakabherivāditampi, sabbametaṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana niṭṭhubhanto vā sāsaṅke vā ṭhito
tika-vin05t:1545_2: accharikaṃ vā phoṭeti, pāṇiṃ vā paharati, tattha anāpatti, sabbaṃ antarārāme ṭhitassa
tika-vin05t:1545_3: passato anāpatti, passissāmīti vihārato vihāraṃ gacchantassa āpattiyeva. Āsanasālāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1545_4: nisinno passati, anāpatti. Passissāmīti uṭṭhahitvā gacchato āpatti, vīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā
tika-vin05t:1545_5: gīvaṃ parivattetvā passatopi āpattiyeva. Salākabhattādīnaṃ vā atthāya aññena vā kenaci
tika-vin05t:1545_6: karaṇīyena gantvā gataṭṭhāne passati vā suṇāti vā, anāpatti. Āpadāsu tādisena upaddavena
tika-vin05t:1545_7: upadduto samajjaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati, evaṃ pavisitvā passantassa suṇantassa vā anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1545_8: “Cetiyassa upahāraṃ detha upāsakā”ti vattumpi, “tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upahāraṃ karomā”ti
tika-vin05t:1545_9: vutte sampaṭicchitumpi na labhati. “Tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti vutte
tika-vin05t:1546_0: 26. “Na, bhikkhave, attano aṅgajātaṃ chetabbaṃ, yo chindeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1546_1: vacanato aṅgajātaṃ chindantassa thullaccayaṃ, aññaṃ pana kaṇṇanāsāaṅguliādiṃ yaṃ
tika-vin05t:1546_2: kiñci chindantassa tādisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ uppādentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Ahikīṭadaṭṭhādīsu pana
tika-vin05t:1546_3: aññābādhapaccayā vā lohitaṃ vā mocentassa chindantassa vā anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1547_0: 27. “Na, bhikkhave, gihīnaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetabbaṃ, yo
tika-vin05t:1547_1: dasseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato gihīnaṃ vikubbaniddhiṃ dassetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1548_0: 28. “Na, bhikkhave, sovaṇṇamayo patto dhāretabbo…pe… na rūpiyamayo…pe… na maṇimayo…pe…
tika-vin05t:1548_1: na veḷuriyamayo…pe… na phalikamayo…pe… na kaṃsamayo…pe… na kācamayo…pe… na tipumayo
tika-vin05t:1548_2: …pe… na sīsamayo…pe… na tambalohamayo patto dhāretabbo, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1548_3: vacanato suvaṇṇamayādipatto na vaṭṭati. Sacepi gihī bhattagge suvaṇṇataṭṭikādīsu
tika-vin05t:1548_4: byañjanaṃ katvā upanāmenti, āmasitumpi na vaṭṭati. Phalikamayakācamayakaṃsamayāni
tika-vin05t:1548_5: pana taṭṭikādīni bhājanāni puggalikaparibhogeneva na vaṭṭanti, saṅghikaparibhogena
tika-vin05t:1548_6: vā gihivikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti. Tambalohamayopi pattoyeva na vaṭṭati, thālakaṃ pana
tika-vin05t:1548_7: vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve patte ayopattaṃ mattikāpatta”nti dveyeva ca pattā anuññātā.
tika-vin05t:1549_0: “Na, bhikkhave, tumbakaṭāhe piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ, yo careyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1549_1: vacanato lābukaṭāhaṃ pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati, taṃ labhitvā pana tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin05t:1550: “Na, bhikkhave, chavasīsapatto dhāretabbo, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato chavasīsamayopi patto na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1551_1: bhūmiādhārake dārudaṇḍaādhārake ca pattaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ettha ca “bhūmiādhārake
tika-vin05t:1551_2: tayo daṇḍādhārake dve patte uparūpari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1551_3: pana vuttaṃ “bhūmiādhārake tiṇṇaṃ pattānaṃ anokāso, dve ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dāruādhārakadaṇḍādhārakesupi
tika-vin05t:1551_4: susajjitesu eseva nayo. Bhamakoṭisadiso pana dāruādhārako tīhi daṇḍakehi baddho,
tika-vin05t:1551_5: daṇḍādhārako ca ekassapi pattassa anokāso, tattha ṭhapetvāpi hatthena gahetvāva nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1552_0: “Na, bhikkhave, miḍḍhante patto nikkhipitabbo, yo nikkhipeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1552_1: vacanato ālindakamiḍḍhikādīnaṃ ante ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana parivattetvā tattheva
tika-vin05t:1552_2: patiṭṭhāti, evarūpāya vitthiṇṇāya miḍḍhikāya ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1553_0: “Na, bhikkhave, paribhaṇḍante patto nikkhipitabbo, yo nikkhipeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1553_1: vacanato bāhirapasse katāya tanukamiḍḍhikāya antepi eseva nayo. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1553_2: coḷaka”nti vacanato coḷakaṃ pattharitvā tattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmiṃ pana asati
tika-vin05t:1553_3: kaṭasārake vā taṭṭikāya vā mattikāya vā paribhaṇḍakatāya bhūmiyā yattha na dussati,
tika-vin05t:1553_4: tathārūpāya vālikāya vā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Paṃsurajādīsu pana kharabhūmiyaṃ vā ṭhapentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1554: “Na, bhikkhave, patto laggetabbo, yo laggeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato nāgadantādīsu yattha katthaci laggetuṃ na vaṭṭati, cīvaravaṃsepi bandhitvā ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1555_0: “Na, bhikkhave, mañce patto nikkhipitabbo, yo nikkhipeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1555_1: bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanatthameva vā kataṃ hotu nisīdanasayanatthaṃ vā, yattha katthaci mañce
tika-vin05t:1555_2: vā pīṭhe vā ṭhapentassa dukkaṭaṃ, aññena pana bhaṇḍakena saddhiṃ bandhitvā ṭhapetuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1555_3: aṭaniyaṃ bandhitvā olambituṃ vā vaṭṭati, bandhitvāpi upari ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1555_4: Sace pana mañco vā pīṭhaṃ vā ukkhipitvā cīvaravaṃsādīsu aṭṭakacchannena ṭhapitaṃ
tika-vin05t:1555_5: hoti, tattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Aṃsavaṭṭanakena aṃsakūṭe laggetvā aṅke ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1555_6: chatte bhattapūropi aṃsakūṭe laggitapattopi ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Bhaṇḍakena pana
tika-vin05t:1555_7: saddhiṃ bandhitvā aṭṭakaṃ katvā vā ṭhapite yo koci ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1556_0: “Na, bhikkhave, pattahatthena kavāṭaṃ paṇāmetabbaṃ, yo paṇāmeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1556_1: vacanato pattahatthena kavāṭaṃ na paṇāmetabbaṃ. Ettha ca na kevalaṃ yassa patto hatthe,
tika-vin05t:1556_2: so eva pattahattho. Na kevalañca kavāṭameva paṇāmetuṃ na labhati, apica kho pana
tika-vin05t:1556_3: hatthe vā piṭṭhipāde vā yattha yatthaci sarīrāvayave pattasmiṃ sati hatthena vā pādena
tika-vin05t:1556_4: vā sīsena vā yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena kavāṭaṃ vā paṇāmetuṃ ghaṭikaṃ vā ukkhipituṃ
tika-vin05t:1556_5: sūciṃ vā kuñcikāya avāpurituṃ na labhati, aṃsakūṭe pana pattaṃ laggetvā yathāsukhaṃ avāpurituṃ labhati.
tika-vin05t:1557_0: “Na, bhikkhave, calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā pattena nīharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1557_1: yo nīhareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato calakādīni pattena nīharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1557_2: Ettha ca calakānīti cabbetvā apaviddhāmisāni. Aṭṭhikānīti macchamaṃsaaakāni. Ucchiṭṭhodakanti
tika-vin05t:1557_3: mukhavikkhālitodakaṃ. Etesu yaṃ kiñci pattena nīharantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ
tika-vin05t:1557_4: katvā hatthaṃ dhovitumpi na labhati. Hatthadhotapādadhotaudakampi patte ākiritvā
tika-vin05t:1557_5: nīharituṃ na vaṭṭati, anucchiṭṭhaṃ suddhapattaṃ ucchiṭṭhahatthena gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1557_6: vāmahatthena panettha udakaṃ āsiñcitvā ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvā ucchiṭṭhahatthena
tika-vin05t:1557_7: gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Ettāvatāpi hi so ucchiṭṭhapatto hoti, hatthaṃ pana bahiudakena
tika-vin05t:1557_8: vikkhāletvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Macchamaṃsaphalāphalādīni ca khādanto yaṃ tattha aṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin05t:1557_9: vā calakaṃ vā chaḍḍetukāmo hoti, taṃ patte ṭhapetuṃ na labhati. Yaṃ pana paṭikhāditukāmo
tika-vin05t:1557_10: hoti, taṃ patte ṭhapetuṃ labhati. Aṭṭhikakaṇṭakādīni tattheva katvā hatthena luñcitvā
tika-vin05t:1557_11: khādituṃ vaṭṭati. Mukhato nīhaṭaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci puna khāditukāmo patte ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin05t:1557_12: na labhati, siṅgiveranāḷikerakhaṇḍādīni ḍaṃsitvā puna ṭhapetuṃ labhati.
tika-vin05t:1558_0: 29. “Na ca, bhikkhave, sabbapaṃsukūlikena bhavitabbaṃ, yo bhaveyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1558_1: vacanato sabbapaṃsukūlikena na bhavitabbaṃ. Ettha pana cīvarañca mañcapīṭhañca paṃsukūlaṃ
tika-vin05t:1559_1: na dātabbaṃ, yo na dadeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato aparissāvanakassa yācamānassa
tika-vin05t:1559_2: parissāvanaṃ adātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yo pana attano hatthe parissāvane vijjamānepi yācati,
tika-vin05t:1560_0: “Na ca, bhikkhave, aparissāvanakena bhikkhunā addhānamaggo paṭipajjitabbo, yo paṭipajjeyya,
tika-vin05t:1560_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato aparissāvanakena maggo na gantabbo. Sacepi na hoti
tika-vin05t:1560_2: parissāvanaṃ vā dhammakaraṇaṃ vā, saṅghāṭikaṇṇo adhiṭṭhātabbo “iminā parissāvetvā pivissāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1561_1: Daṇḍaparissāvanaṃ nāma yattha rajakānaṃ khāraparissāvanaṃ viya catūsu pādesu baddhanisseṇikāya
tika-vin05t:1561_2: sāṭakaṃ bandhitvā majjhe daṇḍake udakaṃ āsiñcanti, taṃ ubhopi koṭṭhāse pūretvā parissāvati.
tika-vin05t:1562_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ottharaka”nti vacanato ottharakaṃ parissāvanampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1562_1: Ottharakaṃ nāma yaṃ udake ottharitvā ghaṭakena udakaṃ gaṇhanti, tañhi catūsu daṇḍakesu
tika-vin05t:1562_2: vatthaṃ bandhitvā udake cattāro khāṇuke nikhanitvā tesu bandhitvā sabbapariyante
tika-vin05t:1562_3: udakato mocetvā majjhe ottharitvā ghaṭena udakaṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-vin05t:1563_0: 31. “Na, bhikkhave, naggena naggo abhivādetabbo, yo abhivādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādivacanato
tika-vin05t:1563_1: na naggena naggo abhivādetabbo, na naggena abhivādetabbaṃ, na naggena naggo abhivādāpetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1563_2: na naggena abhivādāpetabbaṃ, na naggena naggassa parikammaṃ kātabbaṃ, na naggena
tika-vin05t:1563_3: naggassa dātabbaṃ, na naggena paṭiggahetabbaṃ, na naggena khāditabbaṃ, na naggena
tika-vin05t:1563_4: bhuñjitabbaṃ, na naggena sāyitabbaṃ, na naggena pātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1564_1: vatthapaṭicchādi”nti vacanato tisso paṭicchādiyo vaṭṭanti. Ettha ca jantāgharapaṭicchādi
tika-vin05t:1564_2: udakapaṭicchādi ca parikammaṃ karontasseva vaṭṭati, sesesu abhivādanādīsu na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1565_0: 32. “Na, bhikkhave, pupphābhikiṇṇesu sayanesu sayitabbaṃ, yo saseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1565_1: vacanato pupphehi santhatesu sayanesu na sayitabbaṃ, gandhagandhaṃ pana gahetvā kavāṭe
tika-vin05t:1565_2: pañcaṅguliṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati pupphaṃ gahetvā vihāre ekamantaṃ nikkhipituṃ.
tika-vin05t:1566_0: 33. “Na, bhikkhave, āsittakūpadhāne bhuñjitabbaṃ, yo bhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1566_1: vacanato āsittakūpadhāne ṭhapetvā na bhuñjitabbaṃ. Āsittakūpadhānanti tambalohena
tika-vin05t:1566_2: vā rajatena vā katāya peḷāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ, paṭikkhittattā pana dārumayāpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1567_0: 34. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, maḷorika”nti vacanato maḷorikāya ṭhapetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1567_2: paviṭṭhāni. Ādhārakasaṅkhepagamanato hi paṭṭhāya chiddaṃ viddhampi aviddhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1568_0: 35. “Na, bhikkhave, ekabhājane bhuñjitabbaṃ, yo bhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ādivacanato
tika-vin05t:1568_1: na ekabhājane bhuñjitabbaṃ, na ekathālake pātabbaṃ. Sace pana eko bhikkhu bhājanato
tika-vin05t:1568_2: phalaṃ vā pūpaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati, tasmiṃ apagate itarassa sesakaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1568_3: itarassapi tasmiṃ khīṇe puna gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1569_0: “Na, bhikkhave, ekamañce tuvaṭṭitabbaṃ, yo tuvaṭṭeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ādivacanato
tika-vin05t:1569_1: na ekamañce nipajjitabbaṃ, na ekattharaṇe nipajjitabbaṃ. Vavatthānaṃ pana dassetvā
tika-vin05t:1569_2: majjhe kāsāvaṃ vā kattarayaṭṭhiṃ vā antamaso kāyabandhanampi ṭhapetvā nipajjantānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1569_3: anāpatti. Ekapāvuraṇehi ekattharaṇapāvuraṇehi ca na nipajjitabbaṃ. Ekaṃ attharaṇañceva
tika-vin05t:1569_5: ekaṃ antaṃ attharitvā ekaṃ pārupitvā nipajjantānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1570_0: 36. “Na, bhikkhave, celappaṭikā akkamitabbā, yo akkameyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1570_1: na celasanthāro akkamitabbo, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gihīnaṃ maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānena
tika-vin05t:1570_2: celappaṭikaṃ akkamitu”nti vacanato pana kāci itthī apagatagabbhā vā hoti garugabbhā
tika-vin05t:1570_3: vā, evarūpesu ṭhānesu maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānena akkamituṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1570_4: dhotapādakaṃ akkamitu”nti vacanato pādadhovanaṭṭhāne dhotehi pādehi akkamanatthāya
tika-vin05t:1571_0: 37. “Na, bhikkhave, katakaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ, yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1571_1: vacanato katakaṃ na vaṭṭati. Katakaṃ nāma padumakaṇṇikākāraṃ pādaghaṃsanatthaṃ kaṇṭake
tika-vin05t:1571_2: uṭṭhāpetvā kataṃ. Taṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā hotu caturassādibhedaṃ vā, bāhulikānuyogattā paṭikkhittameva,
tika-vin05t:1571_3: neva paṭiggahetuṃ, na paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tisso pādaghaṃsaniyo
tika-vin05t:1571_4: sakkharaṃ kathalaṃ samuddapheṇaka”nti vacanato sakkharādīhi pādaghaṃsanaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1572_0: 38. “Na, bhikkhave, cāmaribījanī dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1572_1: cāmarivālehi katabījanī na vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, makasabījaniṃ. Anujānāmi
tika-vin05t:1572_2: bhikkhave tisso bījaniyo vākamayaṃ usīramayaṃ morapiñchamayaṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1572_3: vidhūpanañca tālavaṇṭañcā”ti vacanato makasabījanīādi vaṭṭati. Tattha vidhūpananti
tika-vin05t:1572_4: bījanī vuccati. Tālavaṇṭaṃ pana tālapaṇṇehi vā kataṃ hotu veḷudantavilīvehi vā morapiñchehi
tika-vin05t:1572_5: vā cammavikatīhi vā, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Makasabījanī dantamayavisāṇamayadaṇḍakāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1573_0: 39. “Na, bhikkhave, chattaṃ dhāretabbaṃ, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1573_1: bhikkhave, gilānassa chatta”nti vacanato agilānena chattaṃ na dhāretabbaṃ. Yassa
tika-vin05t:1573_2: pana kāyaḍāho vā pittakopo vā hoti cakkhu vā dubbalaṃ, añño vā koci ābādho vinā chattena
tika-vin05t:1573_3: uppajjati, tassa gāme vā araññe vā chattaṃ vaṭṭati. Vasse pana cīvaraguttatthampi
tika-vin05t:1573_4: vāḷamigacorabhayesu attaguttatthampi vaṭṭati, ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ pana sabbattheva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1573_5: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, agilānenapi ārāme ārāmūpacāre chattaṃ dhāretu”nti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1573_6: pana agilānassapi ārāmaārāmūpacāresu chattaṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1574_0: 40. “Na, bhikkhave, dīghā nakhā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1574_1: bhikkhave, maṃsappamāṇena nakhaṃ chinditu”nti vacanato dīghā nakhā chinditabbā. “Na,
tika-vin05t:1574_2: bhikkhave, vīsatimaṭṭhaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ, yo kārāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1574_3: bhikkhave, malamattaṃ apakaḍḍhitu”nti vacanato vīsatipi nakhe likhitamaṭṭhe kārāpetuṃ
tika-vin05t:1574_4: na vaṭṭati, nakhato malamattaṃ pana apakaḍḍhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1575_0: “Na, bhikkhave, sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetabbaṃ, yo saṃharāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin05t:1575_1: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ābādhapaccayā sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetu”nti vacanato gaṇḍavaṇādiābādhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1575_2: vinā sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Na, bhikkhave, dīghaṃ nāsikālomaṃ dhāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1575_3: yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato saṇḍāsena nāsikālomaṃ saṃharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1575_4: Sakkharādīhi nāsikālomaṃ gāhāpanepi āpatti natthi, anurakkhaṇatthaṃ pana “anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1575_5: bhikkhave, saṇḍāsa”nti saṇḍāso anuññāto. “Na, bhikkhave, palitaṃ gāhāpetabbaṃ, yo
tika-vin05t:1575_6: gāhāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato palitaṃ gāhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana bhamukāya
tika-vin05t:1575_7: vā nalāṭe vā dāṭhikāya vā uggantvā bībhacchaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ, tādisaṃ lomaṃ palitaṃ
tika-vin05t:1576_0: 41. “Na, bhikkhave, akāyabandhanena gāmo pavisitabbo, yo paviseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1576_1: vacanato akāyabandhanena gāmo na pavisitabbo, abandhitvā nikkhamantena yattha sarati,
tika-vin05t:1576_2: tattha bandhitabbaṃ. “Āsanasālāya bandhissāmī”ti gantuṃ vaṭṭati, saritvā yāva na
tika-vin05t:1577_0: 42. “Na, bhikkhave, gihinivatthaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ, yo nivāseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1577_1: ādivacanato hatthisoṇḍādivasena gihinivatthaṃ na nivāsetabbaṃ, setapaṭapārutādivasena
tika-vin05t:1577_2: na gihipārutaṃ pārupitabbaṃ, mallakammakarādayo viya kacchaṃ bandhitvā na nivāsetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1577_3: Evaṃ nivāsetuṃ gilānassapi maggappaṭipannassapi na vaṭṭati. Yampi maggaṃ gacchantā
tika-vin05t:1577_4: ekaṃ vā dve vā koṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari lagganti, anto vā ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:1577_5: tathā nivāsetvā bahi aparaṃ nivāsenti, sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati. Gilāno pana antokāsāvassa
tika-vin05t:1577_6: ovaṭṭikaṃ dassetvā aparaṃ upari nivāsetuṃ labhati, agilānena dve nivāsentena saguṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:1578_0: 43. “Na, bhikkhave, ubhatokājaṃ haritabbaṃ, yo hareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1578_1: ubhatokājaṃ harituṃ na vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekatokājaṃ antarākājaṃ sīsabhāraṃ
tika-vin05t:1578_2: khandhabhāraṃ kaṭibhāraṃ olambaka”nti vacanato ekatokājādiṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1579_0: 44. “Na, bhikkhave, dīghaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditabbaṃ, yo khādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1579_1: vacanato na dīghaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ
tika-vin05t:1579_2: dantakaṭṭhaṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, caturaṅgulapacchimaṃ dantakaṭṭha”nti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1579_3: manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ caturaṅgulapacchimañca dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1580_0: 45. “Na, bhikkhave, rukkho abhiruhitabbo, yo abhiruheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1580_1: bhikkhave, sati karaṇīye porisaṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhituṃ āpadāsu yāvadattha”nti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1580_2: na rukkhaṃ abhiruhitabbaṃ, sukkhakaṭṭhagahaṇādikicce pana sati purisappamāṇaṃ abhiruhituṃ
tika-vin05t:1580_3: vaṭṭati. Āpadāsūti vāḷamigādayo vā disvā maggamūḷho vā disā oloketukāmo hutvā davaḍāhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1580_4: vā udakoghaṃ vā āgacchantaṃ disvā atiuccampi rukkhaṃ ārohituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1581_0: 46. “Na, bhikkhave, buddhavacanaṃ chandaso āropetabbaṃ, yo āropeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin05t:1581_1: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sakāya niruttiyā buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇitu”nti vacanato vedaṃ
tika-vin05t:1581_2: viya buddhavacanaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāya vācanāmaggaṃ ārocetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sakāya pana māgadhikāya
tika-vin05t:1582_0: 47. “Na, bhikkhave, lokāyataṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ, yo pariyāpuṇeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1582_1: ādivacanato lokāyatasaṅkhātaṃ “sabbaṃ ucchiṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ anucchiṭṭhaṃ, seto kāko,
tika-vin05t:1582_2: kāḷo bako iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenā”ti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:1582_3: neva pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ, na parassa vācetabbaṃ. Na ca tiracchānavijjā pariyāpuṇitabbā,
tika-vin05t:1583_0: 48. “Na, bhikkhave, khipite ‘jīvā’ti vattabbo, yo vadeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1583_1: bhikkhave, gihīnaṃ ‘jīvatha bhante’ti vuccamānena ‘ciraṃ jīvā’ti vattu”nti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1583_2: khipite “jīvā”ti na vattabbaṃ, gihinā pana “jīvathā”ti vuccamānena “ciraṃ jīvā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1584_0: 49. “Na, bhikkhave, lasuṇaṃ khāditabbaṃ, yo khādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1584_1: bhikkhave, ābādhapaccayā lasuṇaṃ khāditu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ vinā lasuṇaṃ khādituṃ
tika-vin05t:1584_2: na vaṭṭati, sūpasampākādīsu pakkhittaṃ pana vaṭṭati. Tañhi paccamānesu muggasūpādīsu
tika-vin05t:1584_3: vā macchamaṃsavikatiyā vā tele vā badarasāḷavādīsu vā ambilasākādīsu vā uttaribhaṅgesu
tika-vin05t:1584_4: vā yattha katthaci antamaso yāgubhattepi pakkhittaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1585_0: 50. “Na, bhikkhave, adhotehi pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamitabbaṃ, yo akkameyya, āpatti
tika-vin05t:1585_1: dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato adhotehi pādehi mañcapīṭhādisenāsanaṃ parikammakatā vā bhūmi
tika-vin05t:1585_2: na akkamitabbā. “Na, bhikkhave, allehi pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamitabbaṃ, yo akkameyya
tika-vin05t:1585_3: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato yehi akkantaṭṭhāne udakaṃ paññāyati, evarūpehi allapādehi
tika-vin05t:1585_4: paribhaṇḍakatā bhūmi vā senāsanaṃ vā na akkamitabbaṃ. Sace pana udakasinehamattameva
tika-vin05t:1585_5: paññāyati, na udakaṃ, vaṭṭati. Pādapuñchaniṃ pana allapādehipi akkamituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1585_6: “Na, bhikkhave, saupāhanena senāsanaṃ akkamitabbaṃ, yo akkameyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1585_7: vacanato dhotapādehi akkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ saupāhanena akkamituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1586_0: “Na, bhikkhave, parikammakatāya bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhitabbaṃ, yo niṭṭhubheyya, āpatti
tika-vin05t:1586_1: dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato parikammakatāya bhūmiyā na niṭṭhubhitabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1586_2: kheḷamallaka”nti evaṃ anuññāte kheḷamallake niṭṭhubhitabbaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1586_3: coḷakena paliveṭhetu”nti vacanato sudhābhūmiyā vā paribhaṇḍabhūmiyā vā mañcapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1586_4: nikkhipantena sace taṭṭikā vā kaṭasārako vā natthi, coḷakena mañcapīṭhānaṃ pādā veṭhetabbā,
tika-vin05t:1586_5: tasmiṃ asati paṇṇampi attharituṃ vaṭṭati, kiñci anattharitvā ṭhapentassa pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1586_6: Yadi pana tattha nevāsikā anatthatāya bhūmiyāpi ṭhapenti, adhotapādehipi vaḷañjenti,
tika-vin05t:1587_0: “Na, bhikkhave, parikammakatā bhitti apassetabbā, yo apasseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1587_1: vacanato parikammakatā bhitti setabhitti vā hotu cittakammakatā vā, na apassetabbā.
tika-vin05t:1587_2: Na kevalañca bhittimeva, dvārampi vātapānampi apassenaphalakampi pāsāṇatthambhampi
tika-vin05t:1587_3: rukkhatthambhampi cīvarena vā yena kenaci appaṭicchādetvā apassituṃ na labhati. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1587_4: bhikkhave, paccattharitvā nipajjitu”nti vacanato pana dhotapādehi akkamitabbaṃ, paribhaṇḍakataṃ
tika-vin05t:1587_5: bhūmiṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ senāsanaṃ vā saṅghikamañcapīṭhaṃ vā attano santakena paccattharaṇena
tika-vin05t:1587_6: paccattharitvāva nipajjitabbaṃ. Sace niddāyatopi paccattharaṇe saṅkuṭite koci sarīrāvayavo
tika-vin05t:1587_7: mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā phusati, āpattiyeva, lomesu pana phusantesu lomagaṇanāya āpattiyo.
tika-vin05t:1587_8: Paribhogasīsena apassayantassapi eseva nayo. Hatthatalapādatalehi pana phusituṃ akkamituṃ
tika-vin05t:1587_9: vā vaṭṭati, mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā harantassa kāye paṭihaññati, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1588_1: anupasampanno avandiyo, nānāsaṃvāsako vuḍḍhataro adhammavādī avandiyo, mātugāmo avandiyo,
tika-vin05t:1588_2: paṇḍako avandiyo, pārivāsiko avandiyo, mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho avandiyo, mānattāraho
tika-vin05t:1588_3: avandiyo, mānattacāriko avandiyo, abbhānāraho avandiyo”ti vacanato ime dasa avandiyāti veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1589: “Pacchupasampannena pureupasampanno vandiyo, nānāsaṃvāsako vuḍḍhataro dhammavādī vandiyo, tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vandiyo”ti – vacanato ime tayo vanditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1590_0: 52. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tīṇi tūlāni rukkhatūlaṃ latātūlaṃ poṭakītūla”nti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1590_1: imāni tīṇi tūlāni kappiyāni. Tattha rukkhatūlanti simbalirukkhādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci
tika-vin05t:1590_2: rukkhānaṃ tūlaṃ. Latātūlanti khīravalliādīnaṃ yāsaṃ kāsañci vallīnaṃ tūlaṃ. Poṭakītūlanti
tika-vin05t:1590_3: poṭakītiṇādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikānaṃ antamaso ucchunaḷādīnampi tūlaṃ. Etehi
tika-vin05t:1590_4: tīhi sabbabhūtagāmā saṅgahitā honti. Rukkhavallitiṇajātiyo hi muñcitvā añño bhūtagāmo
tika-vin05t:1590_5: nāma natthi, tasmā yassa kassaci bhūtagāmassa tūlaṃ bimbohane vaṭṭati. Bhisiṃ pana
tika-vin05t:1590_6: pāpuṇitvā sabbametaṃ akappiyatūlanti vuccati. Na kevalañca bimbohane etaṃ tūlameva,
tika-vin05t:1590_7: haṃsamorādīnaṃ sabbasakuṇānaṃ sīhādīnaṃ sabbacatuppadānañca lomampi vaṭṭati, piyaṅgupupphabakulapupphādīnaṃ
tika-vin05t:1590_8: pana yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tamālapattaṃ suddhameva na vaṭṭati, missakaṃ pana
tika-vin05t:1590_9: vaṭṭati, bhisīnaṃ anuññātaṃ pañcavidhaṃ uṇṇāditūlampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1591_0: 53. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañca bhisiyo uṇṇabhisiṃ coḷabhisiṃ vākabhisiṃ tiṇabhisiṃ
tika-vin05t:1591_1: paṇṇabhisi”nti vacanato pañcahi uṇṇādīhi pūritā pañca bhisiyo anuññātā. Tūlagaṇanāya
tika-vin05t:1591_2: hi etāsaṃ gaṇanā vuttā. Tattha uṇṇaggahaṇena na kevalaṃ eḷakalomameva gahitaṃ, ṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t:1591_3: pana manussalomaṃ yaṃ kiñci kappiyākappiyamaṃsajātīnaṃ pakkhicatuppadānaṃ lomaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin05t:1591_4: idha uṇṇaggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ. Tasmā channaṃ cīvarānaṃ channaṃ anulomacīvarānañca
tika-vin05t:1591_5: aññatarena bhisicchaviṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipitvā bhisiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakalomāni
tika-vin05t:1591_6: pana apakkhipitvā kambalameva catugguṇaṃ pañcaguṇaṃ vā pakkhipitvā katāpi uṇṇabhisisaṅkhyameva gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1592_0: Coḷabhisiādīsu yaṃ kiñci navacoḷaṃ vā purāṇacoḷaṃ vā saṃharitvā anto pakkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:1592_1: vā katā coḷabhisi. Yaṃ kiñci vākaṃ pakkhipitvā katā vākabhisi. Yaṃ kiñci tiṇaṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-vin05t:1592_2: katā tiṇabhisi. Aññatra suddhatamālapattā yaṃ kiñci paṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā katā paṇṇabhisīti
tika-vin05t:1592_3: veditabbā. Tamālapattaṃ pana aññena missameva vaṭṭati. Suddhaṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ panetaṃ
tika-vin05t:1592_4: uṇṇādipañcavidhaṃ tūlaṃ bhisiyaṃ vaṭṭati, taṃ masūrakepi vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1592_5: Etena masūrakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti. Bhisiyā pamāṇaniyamo natthi,
tika-vin05t:1592_6: mañcabhisi pīṭhabhisi bhūmattharaṇabhisi caṅkamanabhisi pādapuñchanabhisīti etāsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1592_7: anurūpato sallakkhetvā attano rucivasena pamāṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Bimbohanaṃ pana pamāṇayuttameva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1593_0: 54. “Na, bhikkhave, aḍḍhakāyikāni bimbohanāni dhāretabbāni, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1593_1: yesu kaṭito paṭṭhāya yāva sīsaṃ upadahanti, tādisāni upaḍḍhakāyappamāṇāni bimbohanāni
tika-vin05t:1593_2: paṭikkhipitvā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sīsappamāṇaṃ bimbohana”nti sīsappamāṇaṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1593_3: Sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yassa vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ miniyamānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1593_4: vidatthi ceva caturaṅgulañca hoti, majjhaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti. “Dīghato pana
tika-vin05t:1593_5: diyaḍḍharatanaṃ vā dviratanaṃ vā”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ sīsappamāṇassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo,
tika-vin05t:1593_6: ito uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati, heṭṭhā vaṭṭati. Agilānassa sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti
tika-vin05t:1593_7: dvayameva vaṭṭati, gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi
tika-vin05t:1593_8: vaṭṭati. “Yāni pana bhisīnaṃ anuññātāni pañca kappiyatūlāni, tehi bimbohanaṃ mahantampi
tika-vin05t:1593_9: vaṭṭatī”ti phussadevatthero āha. Vinayadharaupatissatthero pana “bimbohanaṃ karissāmīti
tika-vin05t:1593_10: kappiyatūlaṃ vā akappiyatūlaṃ vā pakkhipitvā karontassa pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
tika-vin05t:1594_1: vaṭṭati, so ca “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uccakampi āsandika”nti vacanato aṭṭhaṅgulato
tika-vin05t:1594_2: uccapādakopi vaṭṭati. Ekatobhāgena dīghapīṭhameva hi aṭṭhaṅgulato uccapādakaṃ na
tika-vin05t:1594_3: vaṭṭati, tasmā caturassapīṭhaṃ pamāṇātikkantampi vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1594_4: sattaṅga”nti vacanato tīsu disāsu apassayaṃ katvā katamañcopi vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1594_5: bhikkhave, uccakampi sattaṅga”nti vacanato ayampi pamāṇātikkanto ca vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1594_6: bhikkhave, bhaddapīṭha”ntiādinā pāḷiyaṃ anuññātaṃ vettamayapīṭhaṃ pilotikābaddhapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1594_7: dārupaṭṭikāya upari pāde ṭhapetvā bhojanaphalakaṃ viya kataṃ eḷakapādapīṭhaṃ āmalakākārena
tika-vin05t:1594_8: yojitaṃ bahupādakaṃ āmaṇḍakavaṭṭikapīṭhaṃ palālapīṭhaṃ phalakapīṭhañca pāḷiyaṃ anāgatañca
tika-vin05t:1595_0: “Na, bhikkhave, ucce mañce sayitabbaṃ, yo sayeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1595_1: pamaṇātikkante mañce sayantassa dukkaṭaṃ, taṃ pana karontassa kārāpentassa ca chedanakaṃ
tika-vin05t:1595_2: pācittiyaṃ. Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjantena chinditvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1595_3: Sace na chinditukāmo hoti, bhūmiyaṃ nikhanitvā pamāṇaṃ upari dasseti, uttānakaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1595_4: katvā paribhuñjati, ukkhipitvā tulāsaṅghāṭe ṭhapetvā aṭṭaṃ katvā paribhuñjati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1595_5: “Na, bhikkhave, uccā mañcapaṭipādakā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin05t:1595_6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ mañcapaṭipādaka”nti vacanato manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulena
tika-vin05t:1595_7: aṭṭhaṅgulaparamova mañcapaṭipādako vaṭṭati, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1596_0: 56. “Na, bhikkhave, uccāsayanamahāsayanāni dhāretabbāni, seyyathidaṃ, āsandi pallaṅko
tika-vin05t:1596_1: gonako cittako paṭikā paṭalikā tūlikā vikatikā uddalomi ekantalomi kaṭṭissaṃ koseyyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1596_2: kuttakaṃ hatthattharaṃ assattharaṃ rathattharaṃ ajinapaveṇī kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:1596_3: sauttaracchadaṃ ubhatolohitakūpadhānaṃ, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1596_4: uccāsayanamahāsayanāni na vaṭṭanti. Tattha uccāsayanaṃ nāma pamāṇātikkantaṃ mañcaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1596_5: Mahāsayanaṃ nāma akappiyattharaṇaṃ. Āsandiādīsu āsandīti pamāṇātikkantāsanaṃ. Pallaṅkoti
tika-vin05t:1596_6: pādesu vāḷarūpāni ṭhapetvā kato. Gonakoti dīghalomako mahākojavo. Caturaṅgulādhikāni
tika-vin05t:1596_7: kira tassa lomāni. Cittakoti ratanacitrauṇṇāmayattharako. Paṭikāti uṇṇāmayo setattharako.
tika-vin05t:1596_8: Paṭalikāti ghanapupphako uṇṇāmayalomattharako, yo “āmalakapaṭo”tipi vuccati. Tūlikāti
tika-vin05t:1596_10: ekato uggatalomaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. Ekantalomīti ubhato uggatalomaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1596_11: Kaṭṭissanti ratanaparisibbitaṃ koseyyakaṭṭissamayaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ. Koseyyanti ratanaparisibbitaṃ
tika-vin05t:1597_0: Kuttakanti soḷasannaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ ṭhatvā naccanayoggaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. Hatthattharaassattharā
tika-vin05t:1597_1: hatthiassapiṭṭhīsu attharaṇakaattharaṇā eva. Rathattharepi eseva nayo. Ajinapaveṇīti
tika-vin05t:1597_2: ajinacammehi mañcappamāṇena sibbitvā katā paveṇī. Kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇanti
tika-vin05t:1597_3: kadalimigacammaṃ nāma atthi, tena kataṃ pavarapaccattharaṇanti attho. Taṃ kira setavatthassa
tika-vin05t:1597_4: upari kadalimigacammaṃ pattharitvā sibbitvā karonti. Sauttaracchadanti saha uttaracchadena,
tika-vin05t:1597_5: uparibaddhena rattavitānena saddhinti attho. Setavitānampi heṭṭhā akappiyapaccattharaṇe
tika-vin05t:1597_6: sati na vaṭṭati, asati pana vaṭṭati. Ubhatolohitakūpadhānanti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti
tika-vin05t:1597_7: mañcassa ubhatolohitakūpadhānaṃ, etaṃ na kappati. Yaṃ pana ekameva upadhānaṃ ubhosu
tika-vin05t:1597_8: passesu rattaṃ vā hotu padumavaṇṇaṃ vā vicitraṃ vā, sace pamāṇayuttaṃ, vaṭṭati, mahāupadhānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1597_9: pana paṭikkhittaṃ. Gonakādīni saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā mañcapīṭhakesu
tika-vin05t:1597_10: attharitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti, dhammāsane pana gihivikatanīhārena labbhanti,
tika-vin05t:1598_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā tīṇi āsandiṃ pallaṅkaṃ tūlikaṃ gihivikataṃ abhinisīdituṃ,
tika-vin05t:1598_1: na tveva abhinipajjitu”nti – vacanato āsandādittayaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesesu gonakādīsu
tika-vin05t:1598_2: gihivikatesu dhammāsane vā bhattagge vā antaraghare vā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati, nipajjituṃ
tika-vin05t:1598_3: na vaṭṭati. Tūlonaddhaṃ pana mañcapīṭhaṃ bhattagge antaraghareyeva nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1598_4: tatthāpi nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati. Tūlonaddhaṃ pana mañcapīṭhaṃ kārāpentassapi uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1599_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, onaddhamañcaṃ onaddhapīṭha”nti vacanato pana cammādīhi onaddhaṃ
tika-vin05t:1599_1: mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pāvāraṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, koseyyapāvāraṃ.
tika-vin05t:1599_2: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kojavaṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kambala”nti – vacanato pāvārādīni
tika-vin05t:1599_3: saṅghikāni vā hontu puggalikāni vā, yathāsukhaṃ vihāre vā antaraghare vā yattha katthaci
tika-vin05t:1599_4: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭanti. Kojavaṃ panettha pakatikojavameva vaṭṭati, mahāpiṭṭhiyakojavaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1600_1: kavāṭāni mañcapīṭhāni tālavaṇṭāni suvaṇṇarajatayoni pānīyaghaṭapānīyasarāvāni, yaṃ
tika-vin05t:1600_2: kiñci cittakammakataṃ, sabbaṃ senāsanaparibhoge vaṭṭati. “Pāsādassa dāsidāsaṃ khettavatthuṃ
tika-vin05t:1600_3: gomahiṃsaṃ demā”ti vadanti, pāṭekkaṃ gahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, pāsāde paṭiggahite paṭiggahitameva hoti.
tika-vin05t:1601_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekapalāsikaṃ upāhanaṃ… na, bhikkhave, diguṇā upāhanā dhāretabbā…
tika-vin05t:1601_1: na tiguṇā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na guṇaṅguṇūpāhanā dhāretabbā… yo dhāreyya, āpatti
tika-vin05t:1601_2: dukkaṭassā”ti – vacanato ekapaṭalāyeva upāhanā vaṭṭati, dvipaṭalā pana tipaṭalā na
tika-vin05t:1601_3: vaṭṭatiyeva. Guṇaṅguṇūpāhanā nāma catupaṭalato paṭṭhāya vuccati, sā pana majjhimadeseyeva
tika-vin05t:1601_4: na vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu guṇaṅguṇūpāhana”nti
tika-vin05t:1601_5: – vacanato paccantimesu janapadesu guṇaṅguṇūpāhanā navā vā hotu paribhuttā vā, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1601_6: Majjhimadese pana “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, omukkaṃ guṇaṅguṇūpāhanaṃ. Na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1601_7: navā guṇaṅguṇūpāhanā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato paṭimuñcitvā
tika-vin05t:1601_8: apanītā paribhuttāyeva guṇaṅguṇūpāhanā vaṭṭati, aparibhuttā paṭikkhittāyeva. Ekapaṭalā
tika-vin05t:1601_9: pana paribhuttā vā hotu aparibhuttā vā, sabbattha vaṭṭati. Ettha ca manussacammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1601_10: ṭhapetvā yena kenaci cammena katā upāhanā vaṭṭati. Upāhanakosakasatthakakosakakuñcikakosakesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:1602_0: “Na, bhikkhave, sabbanīlikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na sabbapītikā upāhanā dhāretabbā…
tika-vin05t:1602_1: na sabbalohitikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na sabbamañjiṭṭhikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na sabbakaṇhā
tika-vin05t:1602_2: upāhanā dhāretabbā… na sabbamahāraṅgarattā upāhanā dhāretabbā. Na sabbamahānāmarattā
tika-vin05t:1602_3: upāhanā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti – vacanato sabbanīlikādi upāhanā
tika-vin05t:1602_4: na vaṭṭati. Ettha ca nīlikā umāpupphavaṇṇā hoti. Pītikā kaṇikārapupphavaṇṇā… lohitikā
tika-vin05t:1602_5: jayasumanapupphavaṇṇā… mañjiṭṭhikā mañjiṭṭhavaṇṇā eva… kaṇhā addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇā… mahāraṅgarattā
tika-vin05t:1602_6: satapadipiṭṭhivaṇṇā… mahānāmarattā sambhinnavaṇṇā hoti paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇā. Kurundiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1602_7: pana “padumapupphavaṇṇā”ti vuttaṃ. Etāsu yaṃ kiñci labhitvā rajanaṃ coḷakena puñchitvā
tika-vin05t:1602_8: vaṇṇaṃ bhinditvā dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati, appamattakepi bhinne vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1603_0: “Na, bhikkhave, nīlakavaddhikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na pītakavaddhikā upāhanā dhāretabbā…
tika-vin05t:1603_1: na lohitakavaddhikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na mañjiṭṭhikavaddhikā upāhanā dhāretabbā…
tika-vin05t:1603_2: na kaṇhavaddhikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na mahāraṅgarattavaddhikā upāhanā dhāretabbā…
tika-vin05t:1603_3: na mahānāmarattavaddhikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1603_4: vacanato yāsaṃ vaddhāyeva nīlādivaṇṇā honti, tāpi na vaṭṭanti, vaṇṇabhedaṃ pana katvā dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1604_0: “Na, bhikkhave, khallakabaddhā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na puṭabaddhā upāhanā dhāretabbā…
tika-vin05t:1604_1: na pāliguṇṭhimā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na tūlapuṇṇikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na tittirapattikā
tika-vin05t:1604_2: upāhanā dhāretabbā… na meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na ajavisāṇavaddhikā
tika-vin05t:1604_3: upāhanā dhāretabbā… na vicchikāḷikā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na morapiñchaparisibbitā
tika-vin05t:1604_4: upāhanā dhāretabbā… na citrā upāhanā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1604_5: – vacanato khallakabaddhādi upāhanāpi na vaṭṭati. Tattha khallakabaddhāti paṇhipidhānatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:1604_6: tale khallakaṃ bandhitvā katā. Puṭabaddhāti yonakaupāhanā vuccati, yā yāva jaṅghato
tika-vin05t:1604_7: sabbapādaṃ paṭicchādeti. Pāliguṇṭhimāti paliguṇṭhitvā katā, upari pādamattameva paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin05t:1604_8: na jaṅghaṃ. Tūlapuṇṇikāti tūlapicunā pūretvā katā. Tittirapattikāti tittirapattasadisā
tika-vin05t:1604_9: vicitrabaddhā. Meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikāti kaṇṇikaṭṭhāne meṇḍakasiṅgasaṇṭhāne vaddhe yojetvā
tika-vin05t:1604_10: katā. Ajavisāṇavaddhikādīsupi eseva nayo, vicchikāḷikāpi tattheva vicchikanaṅguṭṭhasaṇṭhāne
tika-vin05t:1604_11: vaddhe yojetvā katā. Morapiñchaparisibbitāti talesu vā vaddhesu vā morapiñchehi suttakasadisehi
tika-vin05t:1604_12: parisibbitā. Citrāti vicitrā. Etāsu yaṃ kiñci labhitvā sace tāni khallakādīni apanetvā
tika-vin05t:1604_13: sakkā honti vaḷañjituṃ, vaḷañjetabbā. Tesu pana sati vaḷañjantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1605_0: “Na, bhikkhave, sīhacammaparikkhaṭā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na byagghacammaparikkhaṭā
tika-vin05t:1605_1: upāhanā dhāretabbā… na dīpicammaparikkhaṭā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na ajinacammaparikkhaṭā
tika-vin05t:1605_2: upāhanā dhāretabbā… na uddacammaparikkhaṭā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na majjāracammaparikkhaṭā
tika-vin05t:1605_3: upāhanā dhāretabbā… na kāḷakacammaparikkhaṭā upāhanā dhāretabbā… na luvakacammaparikkhaṭā
tika-vin05t:1605_4: upāhanā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti – vacanato sīhacammādiparikkhaṭāpi
tika-vin05t:1605_5: upāhanā na vaṭṭati. Tattha sīhacammaparikkhaṭā nāma pariyantesu cīvare anuvātaṃ viya
tika-vin05t:1605_6: sīhacammaṃ yojetvā katā. Esa nayo sabbattha. Luvakacammaparikkhaṭāti pakkhibiḷālacammaparikkhaṭā.
tika-vin05t:1605_7: Etāsupi yā kāci taṃ cammaṃ apanetvā dhāretabbā.
tika-vin05t:1606_0: “Na, bhikkhave, kaṭṭhapādukā dhāretabbā… na tālapattapādukā… na veḷupattapādukā,
tika-vin05t:1606_1: na tiṇapādukā… na muñjapādukā, na pabbajapādukā… na hintālapādukā, na kamalapādukā…
tika-vin05t:1606_2: na kambalapādukā… na sovaṇṇapādukā… na rūpiyamayā pādukā… na maṇimayā… na veḷuriyamayā…
tika-vin05t:1606_3: na phalikamayā … na kaṃsamayā… na kācamayā… na tipumayā… na sīsamayā… na tambalohamayā…
tika-vin05t:1606_4: na kāci saṅkamanīyā pādukā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti – vacanato
