tika-vin05t:1606_5: yena kenaci tiṇena vā aññena vā katā yā kāci saṅkamanīyā pādukā na dhāretabbā. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1606_6: bhikkhave, tisso pādukā dhuvaṭṭhāniyā asaṅkamanīyāyo, vaccapādukaṃ passāvapādukaṃ
tika-vin05t:1606_7: ācamanapāduka”nti – vacanato pana bhūmiyaṃ suppatiṭṭhitā niccalā asaṃhāriyā vaccapādukādī
tika-vin05t:1607_0: “Na, bhikkhave, saupāhanena gāmo pavisitabbo, yo paviseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1607_1: vacanato saupāhanena gāmo na pavisitabbo. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā
tika-vin05t:1607_2: saupāhanena gāmaṃ pavisitu”nti vacanato pana yassa pādā vā phālitā pādakhīlā vā ābādho
tika-vin05t:1607_3: pādā vā dukkhā honti, yo na sakkoti anupāhano gāmaṃ pavisituṃ, evarūpena gilānena
tika-vin05t:1607_4: saupāhanena gāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ajjhārāme upāhanaṃ dhāretuṃ
tika-vin05t:1607_5: ukkaṃ padīpaṃ kattaradaṇḍa”nti vacanato ajjhārāme agilānassapi upāhanaṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1608_0: “Na, bhikkhave, ācariyesu ācariyamattesu upajjhāyesu upajjhāyamattesu anupāhanesu
tika-vin05t:1608_1: caṅkamamānesu saupāhanena caṅkamitabbaṃ, yo caṅkameyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti – vacanato
tika-vin05t:1608_2: ācariyādīsu anupāhanesu caṅkamantesu saupāhanena na caṅkamitabbaṃ. Ettha ca pabbajjācariyo
tika-vin05t:1608_3: upasampadācariyo nissayācariyo uddesācariyoti ime cattāropi idha ācariyā eva. Avassikassa
tika-vin05t:1608_4: chabbasso ācariyamatto. So hi catuvassakāle taṃ nissāya vacchati. Evaṃ ekavassassa
tika-vin05t:1608_5: sattavasso, duvassassa aṭṭhavasso, tivassassa navavasso, catuvassassa dasavassoti
tika-vin05t:1608_6: imepi ācariyamattā eva. Upajjhāyassa sandiṭṭhasambhattā pana sahāyabhikkhū, ye vā
tika-vin05t:1608_7: pana keci dasavassehi mahantatarā, te sabbepi upajjhāyamattā nāma. Ettakesu bhikkhūsu
tika-vin05t:1609_0: “Na, bhikkhave, mahācammāni dhāretabbāni sīhacammaṃ byagghacammaṃ dīpicammaṃ, yo
tika-vin05t:1609_1: dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa”. “Na, bhikkhave, gocammaṃ dhāretabbaṃ, yo dhāreyya,
tika-vin05t:1609_2: āpatti dukkaṭassa”. “Na, bhikkhave, kiñci cammaṃ dhāretabbaṃ, yo dhāreyya, āpattidukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1609_3: – vacanato majjhimadese sīhacammādi yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ gahetvā pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1609_4: Sīhacammādīnañca pariharaṇeyeva paṭikkhepo kato. Bhūmattharaṇavasena pana aññattha
tika-vin05t:1609_5: anīharantena yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1610_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu cammāni attharaṇāni eḷakacammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1610_1: ajacammaṃ migacamma”nti vacanako pana paccantimesu janapadesu yaṃ kiñci eḷakacammañca
tika-vin05t:1610_2: ajacammañca attharitvā nipajjituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā vaṭṭati. Migacamme eṇimigo vātamigo
tika-vin05t:1610_3: pasadamigo kuruṅgamigo migamātuko rohitamigoti etesaṃyeva cammāni vaṭṭanti, aññesaṃ pana –
tika-vin05t:1612: Ye ca vāḷamigā keci, tesaṃ cammaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1613_0: Tattha vāḷamigāti sīhabyagghaacchataracchā. Na kevalañca eteyeva, yesaṃ vā pana cammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1613_1: vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ, te ṭhapetvā avasesā antamaso gomahiṃsasasabiḷārādayopi sabbe imasmiṃ
tika-vin05t:1613_2: atthe “vāḷamigā”tveva veditabbā. Etesañhi sabbesaṃ pana cammaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1614_0: “Na, bhikkhave, yānena yāyitabbaṃ, yo yāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1614_1: gilānassa yāna”nti vacanato agilānena bhikkhunā yānena na gantabbaṃ. Kataraṃ pana
tika-vin05t:1614_2: yānaṃ kappati, kataraṃ na kappatīti? “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, purisayuttaṃ hatthavaṭṭakaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1614_3: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sivikaṃ pāṭaṅki”nti vacanato purisayuttaṃ hatthavaṭṭakaṃ sivikā
tika-vin05t:1614_4: pāṭaṅkī ca vaṭṭati. Ettha ca purisayuttaṃ itthisārathi vā hotu purisasārathi vā,
tika-vin05t:1614_5: vaṭṭati, dhenuyuttaṃ pana na vaṭṭati. Hatthavaṭṭakaṃ pana itthiyo vā vaṭṭentu purisā vā, vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1615_0: 57. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ahatānaṃ dussānaṃ ahatakappānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ ekacciyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1615_1: uttarāsaṅgaṃ ekacciyaṃ antaravāsakaṃ, utuddhaṭānaṃ dussānaṃ catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ
tika-vin05t:1615_2: diguṇaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ diguṇaṃ antaravāsakaṃ, paṃsukūle yāvadatthaṃ, pāpaṇike ussāho
tika-vin05t:1615_3: karaṇīyo”ti vacanato adhotānaṃ ekavāraṃ dhotānañca vatthānaṃ dupaṭṭā saṅghāṭi kātabbā,
tika-vin05t:1615_4: uttarāsaṅgo antaravāsako ca ekapaṭṭo kātabbo. Utuddhaṭānaṃ pana hatavatthānaṃ pilotikānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1615_5: saṅghāṭi catugguṇā kātabbā, uttarāsaṅgo antaravāsako ca dupaṭṭo kātabbo, paṃsukūle
tika-vin05t:1615_6: pana yathāruci kātabbaṃ. Antarāpaṇato patitapilotikacīvarepi ussāho karaṇīyo, pariyesanā
tika-vin05t:1615_7: kātabbā, paricchedo pana natthi, paṭṭasatampi vaṭṭati. Sabbamidaṃ sādiyantassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin05t:1615_8: vuttaṃ. Tīsu pana cīvaresu dve vā ekaṃ vā chinditvā kātabbaṃ. Sace nappahoti, āgantukapattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1616_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve chinnakāni ekaṃ acchinnakanti. Dve chinnakāni ekaṃ acchinnakaṃ
tika-vin05t:1616_1: nappahoti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve acchinnakāni
tika-vin05t:1616_2: ekaṃ chinnakanti. Dve acchinnakāni ekaṃ chinnakaṃ nappahoti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:1616_3: ārocesuṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, anvādhikampi āropetuṃ. Na ca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ acchinnakaṃ
tika-vin05t:1617: Tasmā sace pahoti āgantukapattaṃ, na vaṭṭati, chinditabbameva.
tika-vin05t:1618_0: “Na, bhikkhave, potthako nivāsetabbo, yo nivāseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1618_1: sabbanīlakāni cīvarāni dhāretabbāni… na sabbapītakāni… na sabbalohitakāni… na sabbamañjiṭṭhakāni…
tika-vin05t:1618_2: na sabbakaṇhāni… na sabbamahāraṅgarattāni… na sabbamahānāmarattāni… na acchinnadasāni…
tika-vin05t:1618_3: na dīghadasāni… na pupphadasāni… na phaladasāni cīvarāni dhāretabbāni… na kañcukaṃ…
tika-vin05t:1618_4: na tirīṭakaṃ… na veṭhanaṃ dhāretabbaṃ, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti – vacanato
tika-vin05t:1618_5: potthakādīni na dhāretabbāni. Tattha potthakoti makacimayo vuccati, akkadussakadalidussaerakadussānipi
tika-vin05t:1618_6: potthakagatikāneva. Sabbanīlakādīni rajanaṃ dhovitvā puna rajitvā dhāretabbāni. Na
tika-vin05t:1618_7: sakkā ce honti dhovituṃ, paccattharaṇāni vā kātabbāni. Tipaṭṭacīvarassa vā majjhe
tika-vin05t:1618_8: dātabbāni. Tesaṃ vaṇṇanānattaṃ upāhanāsu vuttanayameva. Acchinnadasadīghadasāni dasā
tika-vin05t:1618_9: chinditvā dhāretabbāni. Kañcukaṃ labhitvā phāletvā rajitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1618_10: Veṭhanepi eseva nayo. Tirīṭakaṃ pana rukkhacchallimayaṃ, taṃ pādapuñchaniṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1619_0: 58. “Na, bhikkhave, adhammakammaṃ kātabbaṃ, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1619_1: bhikkhave, adhammakamme kayiramāne paṭikkositu”nti vacanato adhammakammaṃ na kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1619_2: kayiramānañca nivāretabbaṃ. Nivārentehi ca “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, catūhi pañcahi
tika-vin05t:1619_3: paṭikkosituṃ, dvīhi tīhi diṭṭhiṃ āvikātuṃ, ekena adhiṭṭhātuṃ ‘na metaṃ khamatī”ti
tika-vin05t:1619_4: vacanato yattha nivārentassa bhikkhuno upaddavaṃ karonti, tattha ekakena na nivāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1619_5: Sace cattāro pañca vā honti, nivāretabbaṃ. Sace pana dve vā tayo vā honti, “adhammakammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1619_6: idaṃ, na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ aññassa santike attano diṭṭhi āvikātabbā. Sace ekova
tika-vin05t:1619_7: hoti, “na metaṃ khamatī”ti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Sabbañcetaṃ tesaṃ anupaddavatthāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1620_0: 59. “Na, bhikkhave, anokāsakato bhikkhu āpattiyā codetabbo, yo codeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1620_1: vacanato codentena “karotu me āyasmā okāsaṃ, ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ okāsaṃ kārāpetvā
tika-vin05t:1620_2: codetabbo. Adhippāyabhedo panettha veditabbo. Ayañhi adhippāyo nāma cāvanādhippāyo
tika-vin05t:1620_4: dhammakathādhippāyoti anekavidho. Tattha purimesu catūsu adhippāyesu okāsaṃ akārāpentassa
tika-vin05t:1620_5: dukkaṭaṃ, okāsaṃ kārāpetvāpi sammukhā amūlakena pārājikena codentassa saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin05t:1620_6: amūlakena saṅghādisesena codentassa pācittiyaṃ, amūlikāya ācāravipattiyā codentassa
tika-vin05t:1620_7: dukkaṭaṃ, akkosādhippāyena vadantassa pācittiyaṃ. Asammukhā pana sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi
tika-vin05t:1620_8: vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ, asammukhā eva sattavidhampi kammaṃ karontassa dukkaṭameva. Kurundiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1620_9: pana “vuṭṭhānādhippāyena ‘tvaṃ imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpanno, taṃ paṭikarohī’ti vadantassa
tika-vin05t:1620_10: okāsakiccaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Uposathapavāraṇaṃ ṭhapentassapi okāsakammaṃ natthi,
tika-vin05t:1620_11: ṭhapanakhettaṃ pana jānitabbaṃ “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajjuposatho pannaraso,
tika-vin05t:1620_12: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kare”ti.
tika-vin05t:1621: Etasmiñhi re-kāre anatikkanteyeva ṭhapetuṃ labbhati, tato paraṃ pana yya-kāre patte na labbhati. Esa nayo pavāraṇāya.
tika-vin05t:1622_0: Anuvijjakassapi osaṭe vatthusmiṃ “atthetaṃ tavā”ti anuvijjanādhippāyena vadantassa
tika-vin05t:1622_1: okāsakammaṃ natthi. Dhammakathikassapi dhammāsane nisīditvā “yo idañcidañca karoti,
tika-vin05t:1622_2: ayaṃ bhikkhu assamaṇo”tiādinā nayena anodissa dhammaṃ kathentassa okāsakammaṃ natthi.
tika-vin05t:1622_3: Sace pana odissa niyametvā “asuko ca asuko ca assamaṇo anupāsako”ti katheti, dhammāsanato
tika-vin05t:1622_4: orohitvā āpattiṃ desetvā gantabbaṃ. “Na, bhikkhave, suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāpattikānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1622_5: avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe okāso kārāpetabbo, yo kārāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1622_6: suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ akāraṇe vatthusmiṃ okāso na kāretabbo. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin05t:1622_7: puggalaṃ tulayitvā okāsaṃ kātu”nti vacanato “bhūtameva nu kho āpattiṃ vadati, abhūta”nti
tika-vin05t:1623_0: 60. “Na, bhikkhave, saddhādeyyaṃ vinipātetabbaṃ, yo vinipāteyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin05t:1623_1: vacanato saddhādeyyaṃ na vinipātetabbaṃ. Ṭhapetvā mātāpitaro sesañātīnaṃ dentopi
tika-vin05t:1623_2: vinipātetiyeva, mātāpitaro pana rajje ṭhitāpi patthayanti, dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1624: 61. “Na, bhikkhave, santaruttarena gāmo pavisitabbo, yo paviseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato santaruttarena gāmo na pavisitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1625_0: 62. “Pañcime, bhikkhave, paccayā saṅghāṭiyā nikkhepāya. Gilāno vā hoti, vassikasaṅketaṃ
tika-vin05t:1625_1: vā hoti, nadīpāragataṃ vā hoti, aggaḷaguttivihāro vā hoti, atthatakathinaṃ vā hoti.
tika-vin05t:1625_2: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca paccayā saṅghāṭiyā nikkhepāyā”ti – vacanato pana gahetvā
tika-vin05t:1625_3: gantuṃ asamattho gilāno vā hoti, vassikasaṅketādīsu vā aññataraṃ kāraṇaṃ, evarūpesu
tika-vin05t:1625_4: paccayesu saṅghāṭiṃ aggaḷaguttivihāre ṭhapetvā santaruttarena gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Sabbesveva
tika-vin05t:1625_6: pamāṇaṃ, gutte eva vihāre nikkhipitvā bahi gantuṃ vaṭṭati, nāgutte. Āraññakassa pana
tika-vin05t:1625_7: vihāro na sugutto hoti, tena bhaṇḍukkhalikāya pakkhipitvā pāsāṇasusirarukkhasusirādīsu
tika-vin05t:1625_8: supaṭicchannesu ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ. Uttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakānaṃ nikkhepepi imeyeva
tika-vin05t:1626_0: 63. “Na, bhikkhave, sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulā satthakammaṃ vā vatthikammaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1626_1: kārāpetabbaṃ, yo kārāpeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vacanato yathāparicchinne okāse
tika-vin05t:1626_2: yena kenaci satthena vā sūciyā vā kaṇṭakena vā sattikāya vā pāsāṇasakkhalikāya vā
tika-vin05t:1626_3: nakhena vā chindanaṃ vā phālanaṃ vā vijjhanaṃ vā lekhanaṃ vā na kātabbaṃ, sabbañhetaṃ
tika-vin05t:1626_4: satthakammameva hoti. Yena kenaci pana cammena vā vatthena vā vatthipīḷanampi na
tika-vin05t:1626_5: kātabbaṃ, sabbañhetaṃ vatthikammameva hoti. Ettha ca “sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulā”ti
tika-vin05t:1626_6: idaṃ satthakammaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ, vatthikammaṃ pana sambādheyeva paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1626_7: Tattha pana khāraṃ vā dātuṃ yena kenaci rajjukena vā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati, yadi tena
tika-vin05t:1626_8: chijjati, succhinnaṃ. Aṇḍavuḍḍhirogepi satthakammaṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā “aṇḍaṃ phāletvā
tika-vin05t:1626_9: bījāni uddharitvā arogaṃ karissāmī”ti na kātabbaṃ, aggitāpanabhesajjalepanesu pana
tika-vin05t:1626_10: paṭikkhepo natthi. Vaccamagge bhesajjamakkhitā ādānavaṭṭi vā veḷunāḷikā vā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1626_11: yāya khārakammaṃ vā karonti, telaṃ vā pavesenti.
tika-vin05t:1627_0: 64. “Na, bhikkhave, nahāpitapubbena khurabhaṇḍaṃ pariharitabbaṃ, yo parihareyya,
tika-vin05t:1627_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato nahāpitapubbena khurabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariharituṃ na
tika-vin05t:1627_2: vaṭṭati, aññassa santakena pana kese chedetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace vetanaṃ gahetvā chindati,
tika-vin05t:1627_3: na vaṭṭati. Yo anahāpitapubbo, tasseva pariharituṃ vaṭṭati, taṃ vā aññaṃ vā gahetvā
tika-vin05t:1628_0: 65. “Saṅghikāni, bhikkhave, bījāni puggalikāya bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1628_1: Puggalikāni bījāni saṅghikāya bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbānī”ti
tika-vin05t:1628_2: – vacanato puggalikāya bhūmiyā saṅghikesu bījesu ropitesu saṅghikāya bhūmiyā vā puggalikesu
tika-vin05t:1628_3: bījesu ropitesu dasamabhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Idaṃ kira jambudīpe porāṇakacārittaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1628_4: tasmā dasa koṭṭhāse katvā eko koṭṭhāso bhūmisāmikānaṃ dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1629_0: 66. “Santi, bhikkhave, maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā, na sukarā apātheyyena
tika-vin05t:1629_1: gantuṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pātheyyaṃ pariyesituṃ. Taṇḍulo taṇḍulatthikena, muggo
tika-vin05t:1629_2: muggatthikena, māso māsatthikena, loṇaṃ loṇatthikena, guḷo guḷatthikena, telaṃ telatthikena,
tika-vin05t:1629_3: sappi sappitthikenā”ti – vacanato tādisaṃ kantāraṃ nittharantena pātheyyaṃ pariyesituṃ
tika-vin05t:1629_4: vaṭṭati. Kathaṃ pana pariyesitabbanti? Sace kecisayameva ñatvā denti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1629_5: No ce denti, ñātipavāritaṭṭhānato vā bhikkhācāravattena vā pariyesitabbaṃ. Tathā
tika-vin05t:1629_6: alabhantena aññātikaappavāritaṭṭhānato yācitvāpi gahetabbaṃ. Ekadivasena gamanīye
tika-vin05t:1629_7: magge ekabhattatthāya pariyesitabbaṃ. Dīghe addhāne yattakena kantāraṃ nittharati,
tika-vin05t:1630_0: 67. “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ, tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi,
tika-vin05t:1630_1: kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo na kappati. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti
tika-vin05t:1630_2: appaṭikkhittaṃ, tañce kappiyaṃ anulometi, akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappati. Yaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1630_3: bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ, tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1630_4: paṭibāhati, taṃ vo na kappati. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1630_5: tañce kappiyaṃ anulometi, akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappatī”ti – ime cattāro mahāpadese
tika-vin05t:1630_6: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ nayaggahaṇatthāya āha. Tattha dhammasaṅgāhakattherā suttaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin05t:1630_7: parimaddantā idaṃ addasaṃsu. “Ṭhapetvā dhaññaphalarasa”nti satta dhaññarasāni “pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1630_9: nava mahāphalāni sabbañca aparaṇṇaṃ dhaññagatikameva. Taṃ kiñcāpi na paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1630_10: atha kho akappiyaṃ anulometi, tasmā pacchābhattaṃ na kappati. Aṭṭha pānāni anuññātāni,
tika-vin05t:1630_12: Tāni kiñcāpi na anuññātāni, atha kho kappiyaṃ anulomenti, tasmā kappanti. Ṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t:1630_13: hi sānulomaṃ dhaññaphalarasaṃ aññaṃ phalapānaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ natthi, sabbaṃ yāmakālikaṃyevāti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1631_0: Bhagavatā – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, cha cīvarāni khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ
tika-vin05t:1631_1: sāṇaṃ bhaṅga”nti cha cīvarāni anuññātāni, dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi tesaṃ anulomāni
tika-vin05t:1631_2: dukūlaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ cīnapaṭṭaṃ somārapaṭṭaṃ iddhimayaṃ devadattiyanti aparāni cha anuññātāni.
tika-vin05t:1631_3: Tattha pattuṇṇanti pattuṇṇadese pāṇakehi sañjātavatthaṃ. Dve paṭāni desanāmeneva
tika-vin05t:1631_4: vuttāni. Tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni, dukūlaṃ sāṇassa, itarāni dve kappāsikassa vā sabbesaṃ vā.
tika-vin05t:1632_0: Bhagavatā ekādasa patte paṭikkhipitvā dve pattā anuññātā lohapatto ca mattikāpatto
tika-vin05t:1632_1: ca. Lohathālakaṃ mattikāthālakaṃ tambalohathālakanti tesaṃyeva anulomāni. Bhagavatā
tika-vin05t:1632_2: tayo tumbā anuññātā lohatumbo kaṭṭhatumbo phalatumboti. Kuṇḍikā kañcanako udakatumboti
tika-vin05t:1632_3: tesaṃyeva anulomāni. Kurundiyaṃ pana “pānīyasaṅkhapānīyasarāvakānaṃ ete anulomā”ti
tika-vin05t:1632_4: vuttaṃ. Paṭṭikā sūkarantanti dve kāyabandhanāni anuññātāni. Dussapaṭṭena rajjukena
tika-vin05t:1632_5: ca katakāyabandhanāni tesaṃyeva anulomāni. Setacchattaṃ kilañjacchattaṃ paṇṇacchattanti
tika-vin05t:1632_6: tīṇi chattāni anuññātāni. Ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ tesaṃyeva anulomanti iminā nayena pāḷiñca
tika-vin05t:1632_7: aṭṭhakathañca anupekkhitvā aññānipi kappiyākappiyānaṃ anulomāni vinayadharena veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1633_0: 68. Vinayadharo ca puggalo vinayapariyattimūlake pañcānisaṃse chānisaṃse sattānisaṃse
tika-vin05t:1633_1: aṭṭhānisaṃse navānisaṃse dasānisaṃse ekādasānisaṃse labhati. Katame pañcānisaṃse
tika-vin05t:1634_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ānisaṃsā vinayadhare puggale. Attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti
tika-vin05t:1634_1: surakkhito, kukkuccapakatānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti, visārado saṅghamajjhe voharati, paccatthike
tika-vin05t:1634_2: sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhāti, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1635_0: Kathamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito? Idhekacco bhikkhu āpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1635_1: āpajjanto chahākārehi āpajjati alajjitā, aññāṇatā, kukkuccapakatatā, akappiye kappiyasaññitā,
tika-vin05t:1635_2: kappiye akappiyasaññitā, satisammosā. Kathaṃ alajjitāya āpajjati? Akappiyabhāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:1635_3: jānantoyeva madditvā vītikkamaṃ karoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1638_0: Kathaṃ aññāṇatāya āpajjati? Aññāṇapuggalo hi mando momūho kattabbākattabbaṃ ajānanto
tika-vin05t:1638_1: akattabbaṃ karoti, kattabbaṃ virādheti. Evaṃ aññāṇatāya āpajjati. Kathaṃ kukkuccapakatatāya
tika-vin05t:1638_2: āpajjati? Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vinayadharaṃ pucchitvā kappiyaṃ
tika-vin05t:1638_3: ce, kattabbaṃ siyā, akappiyaṃ ce, na kattabbaṃ, ayaṃ pana “vaṭṭatī”ti madditvā vītikkamatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1639_0: Kathaṃ akappiye kappiyasaññitāya āpajjati? Acchamaṃsaṃ “sūkaramaṃsa”nti khādati,
tika-vin05t:1639_2: vikāle kālasaññāya bhuñjati, akappiyapānakaṃ “kappiyapānaka”nti pivati. Evaṃ akappiye
tika-vin05t:1639_3: kappiyasaññitāya āpajjati. Kathaṃ kappiye akappiyasaññitāya āpajjati? Sūkaramaṃsaṃ
tika-vin05t:1639_5: bhuñjati, kāle vikālasaññāya bhuñjati, kappiyapānakaṃ “akappiyapānaka”nti pivati.
tika-vin05t:1639_6: Evaṃ kappiye akappiyasaññitāya āpajjati. Kathaṃ satisammosā āpajjati? Sahaseyyacīvaravippavāsabhesajjacīvarakālātikkamanapaccayā
tika-vin05t:1639_7: āpattiṃ satisammosā āpajjati. Evamidhekacco bhikkhu imehi chahi ākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin05t:1640_0: Vinayadharo pana imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ na āpajjati. Kathaṃ lajjitāya nāpajjati?
tika-vin05t:1640_1: So hi “passatha bho, ayaṃ kappiyākappiyaṃ jānantoyeva paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karotī”ti
tika-vin05t:1640_2: imaṃ parūpavādaṃ rakkhantopi nāpajjati. Evaṃ lajjitāya nāpajjati, sahasā āpannampi
tika-vin05t:1640_3: desanāgāminiṃ desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhahitvā suddhante patiṭṭhāti. Tato –
tika-vin05t:1642: Agatigamanañca na gacchati, ediso vuccati lajjipuggalo”ti. –
tika-vin05t:1644_0: Kathaṃ ñāṇatāya nāpajjati? So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ jānāti, tasmā kappiyaṃyeva karoti,
tika-vin05t:1644_1: akappiyaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ ñāṇatāya nāpajjati. Kathaṃ akukkuccapakatatāya nāpajjati?
tika-vin05t:1644_2: Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vatthuṃ oloketvā mātikaṃ padabhājanaṃ antarāpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1644_3: anāpattiṃ oloketvā kappiyaṃ ce hoti, karoti, akappiyaṃ ce, na karoti. Evaṃ akukkuccapakatatāya
tika-vin05t:1644_4: nāpajjati. Kathaṃ akappiye kappiyasaññitādīhi nāpajjati? So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin05t:1644_5: tasmā akappiye kappiyasaññī na hoti, kappiye akappiyasaññī na hoti, suppatiṭṭhitā
tika-vin05t:1644_6: cassa sati hoti, adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetabbaṃ vikappeti. Iti imehi chahi
tika-vin05t:1644_7: ākārehi āpattiṃ nāpajjati. Anāpajjanto akhaṇḍasīlo hoti, parisuddhasīlo hoti. Evamassa
tika-vin05t:1645_0: Kathaṃ kukkuccapakatānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti? Tiroraṭṭhesu tirojanapadesu ca uppannakukkuccā
tika-vin05t:1645_1: bhikkhū “asukasmiṃ kira vihāre vinayadharo vasatī”ti dūratova tassa santikaṃ āgantvā
tika-vin05t:1645_2: kukkuccaṃ pucchanti. So tehi katassa kammassa vatthuṃ oloketvā āpattānāpattigarukalahukādibhedaṃ
tika-vin05t:1645_3: sallakkhetvā desanāgāminiṃ desāpetvā, vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhāpetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin05t:1646_0: Visārado saṅghamajjhe voharatīti avinayadharassa hi saṅghamajjhe kathentassa bhayaṃ
tika-vin05t:1646_1: sārajjaṃ okkamati, vinayadharassa taṃ na hoti. Kasmā? “Evaṃ kathentassa doso hoti,
tika-vin05t:1647_0: Paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhātīti ettha dvidhā paccatthikā nāma
tika-vin05t:1647_1: attapaccatthikā ca sāsanapaccatthikā ca. Tattha mettiyabhūmajakā ca bhikkhū vaḍḍho
tika-vin05t:1647_2: ca licchavī amūlakena antimavatthunā codesuṃ, ime attapaccatthikā nāma. Ye pana aññepi
tika-vin05t:1647_3: dussīlā pāpadhammā, sabbete attapaccatthikā. Viparītadassanā pana ariṭṭhabhikkhukaṇṭakasāmaṇeravesālikavajjiputtakā
tika-vin05t:1647_5: vatvā katapaggahā sāsanapaccatthikā nāma. Te sabbepi sahadhammena sahakāraṇena vacanena
tika-vin05t:1647_6: yathā taṃ asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti, evaṃ suniggahitaṃ katvā niggaṇhāti.
tika-vin05t:1648_0: Saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti ettha pana tividho saddhammo pariyattipaṭipattiadhigamavasena.
tika-vin05t:1648_1: Tattha tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ pariyattisaddhammo nāma. Terasa dhutaguṇā cuddasa
tika-vin05t:1648_2: khandhakavattāni dveasīti mahāvattānīti ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma. Cattāro maggā
tika-vin05t:1648_3: ca cattāri phalāni ca, ayaṃ adhigamasaddhammo nāma.
tika-vin05t:1649_0: Tattha keci therā “yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo
tika-vin05t:1649_1: mamaccayena satthā”ti iminā suttena “sāsanassa pariyatti mūla”nti vadanti. Keci therā
tika-vin05t:1649_2: “ime ca subhadda bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṃ, asuñño loko arahantehi assā”ti iminā suttena
tika-vin05t:1649_3: “sāsanassa paṭipatti mūla”nti vatvā “yāva pañca bhikkhū sammāpaṭipannā saṃvijjanti,
tika-vin05t:1649_4: tāva sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hotī”ti āhaṃsu. Itare pana therā “pariyattiyā antarahitāya suppaṭipannassapi
tika-vin05t:1649_5: dhammābhisamayo natthī”ti vatvā āhaṃsu “sacepi pañca bhikkhū cattāri pārājikāni rakkhakā
tika-vin05t:1649_6: honti, te saddhe kulaputte pabbājetvā paccantime janapade upasampādetvā dasavaggaṃ
tika-vin05t:1649_7: gaṇaṃ pūretvā majjhimajanapade upasampadaṃ karissanti, etenupāyena vīsativaggaṃ saṅghaṃ
tika-vin05t:1649_8: pūretvā attanopi abbhānakammaṃ katvā sāsanaṃ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ gamayissanti. Evamayaṃ
tika-vin05t:1649_9: vinayadharo tividhassapi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotī”ti. Evamayaṃ vinayadharo
tika-vin05t:1650_0: Katame chānisaṃse labhatīti? Tassādheyyo uposatho pavāraṇā saṅghakammaṃ pabbajjā
tika-vin05t:1650_1: upasampadā, nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti. Yepi ime cātuddasiko, pannarasiko,
tika-vin05t:1650_2: sāmaggiuposatho, saṅghe uposatho, gaṇe uposatho, puggale uposatho, suttuddeso, pārisuddhi,
tika-vin05t:1650_3: adhiṭṭhānauposathoti nava uposathā, sabbe te vinayadharāyattā, yāpi ca imā cātuddasikā,
tika-vin05t:1650_4: pannarasikā, sāmaggipavāraṇā, saṅghe pavāraṇā, gaṇe pavāraṇā, puggale pavāraṇā, tevācikā
tika-vin05t:1650_5: pavāraṇā, dvevācikā pavāraṇā, samānavassikā pavāraṇāti nava pavāraṇā, tāpi vinayadharāyattā
tika-vin05t:1650_6: eva, tassa santakā, so tāsaṃ sāmī.
tika-vin05t:1651_0: Yānipi imāni apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakammanti
tika-vin05t:1651_1: cattāri saṅghakammāni, yā cāyaṃ upajjhāyena hutvā kulaputtānaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā
tika-vin05t:1651_2: ca kātabbā, ayampi vinayadharāyattāva. Na hi añño dvipiṭakadharopi evaṃ kātuṃ labhati,
tika-vin05t:1651_3: so eva nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, añño neva nissayaṃ dātuṃ labhati, na
tika-vin05t:1651_4: sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ. Teneva “na, bhikkhave, ekena dve sāmaṇerā upaṭṭhāpetabbā,
tika-vin05t:1651_5: yo upaṭṭhāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti paṭikkhipitvā puna anujānantenapi “anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1651_6: bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā ekena dve sāmaṇere upaṭṭhāpetuṃ, yāvatake vā pana ussahati
tika-vin05t:1651_7: ovadituṃ anusāsituṃ, tāvatake upaṭṭhāpetu”nti byattasseva sāmaṇerupaṭṭhāpanaṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1651_8: Sāmaṇerupaṭṭhāpanaṃ paccāsīsanto pana vinayadharassa santike upajjhaṃ gāhāpetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1651_9: sādituṃ labhati. Ettha ca nissayadānañceva sāmaṇerupaṭṭhānañca ekamaṅgaṃ. Iti imesu
tika-vin05t:1651_10: chasu ānisaṃsesu ekena saddhiṃ purimāni pañca cha honti. Dvīhi saddhiṃ satta, tīhi
tika-vin05t:1651_11: saddhiṃ aṭṭha, catūhi saddhiṃ nava, pañcahi saddhiṃ dasa, sabbehipetehi saddhiṃ ekādasāti
tika-vin05t:1651_12: evaṃ vinayadharo puggalo pañca cha satta aṭṭha nava dasa ekādasa ca ānisaṃse labhatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:1664: Yaṃ siddhaṃ iminā puññaṃ, yañcaññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā;
